courses.title: UX WRITING 101 - How To Write Great Microcopy
courses.bio: Learn UX writing Skills, User Research, Voice, Tone, Microcopy and Accessibility. Build a Career and Land a Job in UX
objectives: Understand what UX writing is and why it’s essential in product design.
Recognize the difference between UX writing and other forms of writing.
Discover how to use tone and voice to reflect brand personality and user context.
Gain hands-on experience writing microcopy for buttons, error messages, forms, and onboarding flows.
Understand the importance of user research and how UX writers use it to improve content.
Explore freelance opportunities, essential tools, and career tips for getting started in UX writing.

Introduction to UX Writing: The Qualities of Great UX Writing
Understanding the User: Tone and Voice in UX Writing
Design and UX Writing Collaboration: Design and UX Writing Collaboration QUIZ
UX Writing Career Guide: Essential Skills and Tools for UX Writers

requirements: No prior experience in UX writing or design is required
courses.description:
Ever clicked a button and instantly understood what to do next? That’s the power of UX WRITING.
UX writing is the art of crafting the words that guide users through digital products—buttons, error messages, form labels, onboarding flows, and more. Done well, it's invisible. Done poorly, it breaks the user experience.
In this beginner-friendly course, you’ll learn how to write clear, concise, and helpful microcopy that enhances usability and builds trust. Whether you're a writer, designer, or someone looking to break into tech, this course will give you the practical skills and confidence to become a UX writer
This course is designed to take you from curious beginner to confident UX writer. You’ll start with the basics: what UX writing really is, how it fits into product teams, and what makes great microcopy. From there, you’ll dive into the psychology of users—how they think, what they need, and how to speak their language using tone, voice, and empathy. You'll learn how to write everything from onboarding messages to CTAs, error states, and empty screens, with real-world examples and exercises along the way.
More importantly, you'll learn how UX writers work in the real world. That means collaborating with designers and developers, working with design tools, maintaining content consistency across platforms, and supporting the narrative through every part of the user journey. You'll even explore the career side of things—how to build a strong UX writing portfolio, find freelance work, and use industry tools that professionals rely on.


By the end of this course, you’ll be able to:
Write UX copy that improves usability and reduces friction
Speak the language of designers and developers
Create a portfolio that showcases your UX thinking
Confidently apply for UX writing jobs or freelance gigs


The truth is: UX writing is one of the most powerful and overlooked skills in tech. And yet, very few people know how to do it well. By enrolling now, you’ll gain a competitive edge, whether you’re a writer, designer, marketer, or aspiring tech professional looking to future-proof your career.


ENROLL now to get instant access to lessons, templates, and real-world examples that will transform how you write for digital products.
Don’t wait—the best time to become a UX writer is now.
target_audience: Aspiring UX writers
Content writers, copywriters, and editors
UX and UI designers
Product managers and marketers
Freelancers

courses.description:
Do you want to become a UI/UX designer but you don't know where to start? This course will allow you to develop your user interface design skills and you can add UI designer to your CV and start getting clients for your skills.


Hi everyone. I'm Arash and I'm a UI/UX designer. In this course, I will help you learn and master Figma app comprehensively from scratch. Figma is an innovative and brilliant tool for User Interface design. It's used by everyone from entrepreneurs and start-ups to Apple, Airbnb, Facebook, etc.
By the end of this course, you will be able to create world-class User Interface (UI) and User Experience (UX) designs. Throughout the course first, you will learn about all the Design Basics, UI Elements, Typography, etc. and then we will work on real-world projects together.
Moreover, we will design a finance app completely from scratch and I will share with you all the necessary techniques and hidden secrets you need for mobile application and web design.
Additionally, we will design a complete modern landing page together where you will learn the essentials of web design.
This course has been designed for people completely new to UI/UX design or let’s say design in general. We will start with the most basic principles and work all the way through, step by step.
We start the course by explaining the differences between UI and UX design. And then we will start learning about Figma app in Figma Academy section. After that, we'll create a simple low-fidelity wireframe to understand its usage and benefits.
I’ll go over all of the essential tools necessary for creating an amazing User Interface (UI) and User Experience (UX). Not only will you learn about Figma app, but also you will learn about Adobe Photoshop, Vectary, Dribbble, Behance, etc.
The Design Basics section covers all the necessary principles, including: Layout, Iconography, Typography, Color Contrast, Composition, Spacing, etc.
One of the interesting parts of the User Experience design process is micro-interactions. I will teach you how to use InVision Studio for creating this kind of interaction.
With over 10 hours of content across 150+ lectures, I will take you from beginner to expert, and teach you everything you need to know in order to use Figma in a professional manner.
An amazing course for people with zero design experience, or for experienced designers that want to learn and master Figma and want to become a User Interface designer. By the end of this course, you’ll have a complete, real-world project for your own portfolio, and every student will have the knowledge and confidence to apply for a UI/UX designer job.


Don't just take my word for it, see what my past students had to say about my design courses:
"I loved this course. Highly recommended if you want to build real-world designs. loved Arash's style of teaching." - Mustafa Alabdullah
"This course is AMAZING! I really like the content especially the projects. I could finally find a course to take me from the very basic concepts to the most complex part of UI/UX design. I 100% recommend it." - Zhan K
"A comprehensive and detailed course for anyone looking to become a UI/UX designer. Clear and easy to understand explanations. It covers all of the topics required for a real-world professional." - Erikas

courses.title: Leather carving notebook case
courses.bio: The carving, dyeing, and production of notebooks is a very interesting and practical piece of leather carving art
objectives: How to copy patterns to leather
How to use a rotary knife
How to carve flowers
How to dyeing
How to punch holes and sew them together
How to create a raised effect on the surface
How to polish leather edges
requirements: Requires relevant tools and materials, as well as a certain foundation in leather carving
courses.description:
This is a very interesting and practical course that easily teaches you how to carve, dye, and then make very practical notepad covers. The course provides a detailed explanation of how to carve infinitely continuous flowers, carve their backgrounds, use conventional dyeing techniques, and combine them into finished products.
The size of the completed work is 185x262x2.6mm, suitable for a notebook of 172x250x13mm.
The course, after precise editing, lasts for 80 minutes and is divided into 5 chapters on leather carving and dyeing. It features high-definition shooting with multiple lenses and angles, accompanied by voice explanations and English subtitles. A leather carving art teacher with 20 years of experience provides detailed demonstrations. The entire process is easy to understand, without the need for too many tools, and low-cost learning of leather carving art. Suitable for beginners who enjoy leather carving art.
The lecturer is a professional leather carving craftsman with 20 years of experience in leather carving research. His research projects include leather carving techniques for subjects such as portraits, landscapes, animals, and flowers. I have trained hundreds of students (ranging in age from 5 to 70) and have extensive experience in course recording.
If you encounter any problems during your studies, you can contact me and communicate with me. I am glad that you have participated in this course, and I also hope to communicate with you and work together to make you feel the joy of learning leather carving.
target_audience: People who love leather art

courses.title: An Introduction to Design as a Process for Innovation
courses.bio: Learn how the process of design can be used to drive innovation, develop new product ideas, and transform your company.
objectives: Understand the three pillars of design, that are used by designers when driving innovation
Understand the process designers use to identify opportunity, make sense of data, build a solution, and test that solution
Understand how design can be used as a problem-solving process in many contexts
requirements: There are no requirements necessary for this course.
courses.description:
Many people consider design to be the secret upon which companies like Apple, Nike, and Starbucks have built billion dollar businesses. You don't need to be a designer to think like one, and the most important thing to understand about design is the process of design.
This course offers an introduction to design, and describes why you should leverage the process of design in order to develop new product ideas, drive innovation, and transform your organization. You'll learn about the way designers approach problems, and you'll gain a conceptual view of how the process of design works.

This course provides an overview of the design process - the steps used to arrive at an innovative new product, system, or service.
target_audience: People with no design experience, who want to enter the field of design
People who are tasked with managing designers, either internally or as outside vendors or agencies
People curious about the way design process works
People looking for an introduction to the theory of design-led innovation

courses.title: 元宇宙UI/UX設計
courses.bio: UI/UX多維思考!為人工智能時代打造嶄新設計!
objectives: 了解什麼是元宇宙
了解什麼是UI/UX
了解元宇宙中的UI/UX的特色
了解什麼樣的工具能製作元宇宙中的UI/UX原型
requirements: 無
若是有一台oculus的quest系列VR頭戴顯示器更好
courses.description:
你好,我是Rainnie,孵科未來的創辦人,這次想帶給你一堂元宇宙的UI/UX設計!
在當今數字世界的浪潮中，元宇宙正在崛起，成為了許多公司和組織關注的重點。UI/UX設計是元宇宙中一個至關重要的領域，甚至UI/UX是最基礎的建設,它對於用戶體驗和使用者參與至關重要。如果你想要成為一名成功的UI/UX設計師，想要擺脫目前手機端/電腦端/智能手錶端千篇一律的UI/UX設計,那我強烈推薦你參加這堂元宇宙UI/UX設計課程,將會打開你新的設計思路。
在本課程開始前，我會先普及元宇宙是什麼，這將有助於你更好地理解元宇宙中UI/UX設計的重要性。接著，我將會解釋什麼是UI/UX設計，並介紹元宇宙中的UI/UX和一般手機/網頁端的UI/UX之間的區別。這些知識將為你提供一個良好的基礎，使你能夠更好地理解和應用UI/UX設計原則和方法。
最後，我將深入介紹元宇宙UI/UX設計的流程和工具。我將通過案例研究和實際操作，幫助你了解UI/UX設計的最佳實踐和流程。擬將學習如何設計和創建元宇宙中的虛擬環境，以及如何通過UI/UX設計提高用戶參與和體驗。我還將介紹設計師在XR設計過程中使用的工具和技術，包括Shapes XR等等。
這個課程旨在為您提供元宇宙UI/UX設計方面的專業知識和提供你經過驗證後的XR設計流程和工具，使你能夠在日益發展的元宇宙領域中取得成功。如果你是一個有志於成為優秀UI/UX設計師的人，或者是想要進入元宇宙領域的人，我誠邀你參加這堂課程，讓我幫助你打開UI/UX設計的新思路和格局！
target_audience: 對元宇宙感興趣的任何人
對UI/UX設計感興趣的任何人

courses.title: Gamification — Prozesse und Produkte, die begeistern
courses.bio: Eine kleine Einführung in Gamification, menschenfokusiertes Design und dem Kern der Motivation!
objectives: Du hast einen guten Einblick in das Thema Gamification erhalten.

Einleitung: Kurze Abgrenzung: Serious Games und Game-Based-Learning
Umsetzung: Zum Ende hin noch zwei wichtige Gedanken!

requirements: Kein Vorwissen notwendig.
courses.description:
Du möchtest wissen, was es mit Gamification auf sich hat? Dann bist du hier genau richtig!
In diesem Kurs lernst du die Grundlagen der Gamification. Du erfährst, was "weiße" Gamification so toll macht. Wie schauen uns die Motivatoren an, die jeden Menschen antreiben.
Gamification benutzt Mechaniken und Erkenntnisse aus dem Gamedesign um Prozesse und Produkte im spielfremdem Kontext motivierend zu gestalten.
Der Kurs konzentriert sich auf die positiven Motivatoren. Negative Motivatoren, wie Druck oder Belohnungen, werden nur kurz beschrieben.

Menschenfokusiertes Design
Belohnung
Strafe
Druck
Sinn
Welt retten
Missionen
Selbstverbesserung
Flow
Flow erleben
Klassifizierung nach Bartle
Flash

Umgebung spiegelt Aufgabe
Der/Die Weise
Ermächtigung
Wahlmöglichkeit
Selbstorganisation
Fortschrittsanzeige
Kreativität ermöglichen

Produktentwickler, die ihre Produkte verbessern wollen.

This course is great for anyone who is studying UX or for UX designers. We cover many topics starting with the very beginning of how to set up your project, how to set up a research plan, best practices when coming up with questions for your research, creating user interviews scripts, conducting research, research synthesis, affinity mapping, personas, empathy maps, customer journey maps, sketching frameworks, how to create wireframes/prototypes, setting up for user testing, creating user testing scripts, conducting user testing, synthesizing user testing findings, design systems, visual design best practices, creating resumes, portfolios, and UX case studies for your portfolio....and much more
We will start with theory/methodology and principles, then reasons why to use each method, when to use a method, examples of these practices/methods. Then we will get very practical and learn how to create each method. We'll learn best practices for each method. We'll dive deep into design thinking, design systems and when you combine everything in this class you'll walk away with a very solid understanding of the UX process, LEAN methodologies and practical guide to the work involved + I include templates and frameworks for everything that you download and keep for ever!

courses.title: Intro to UX: Design Effective Dashboards With Brain Science
courses.bio: You will be introduced to different types of dashboards used today and how to apply brain science to design them better.
objectives: Identify and understand the different types of dashboard design classifications.
Understand the building blocks to design successful dashboard that are easy for stakeholders to understand.
Learn about important psychologist who have helped shape UX design fundamentals
Send your designs for feedback & commenting.
You'll learn how to set hierarchy of specific ui elements within the dashboard.
Have a dashboard to be used in your portfolio for hiring managers and senior designers to see.
You will be able to start earning money from your design understanding.
Create quick wireframes.
You will be able to talk correctly with other UX design professionals.

Designing with Brain Science in Mind: Put Your Knowledge To The Test!

requirements: No prior experience in psychology is needed. I want to help beginners and juniors make their way into the field.
No previous design experience is needed.
courses.description:
In this class, you will be introduced to different types of dashboards used today; and how to apply brain science to design them better. If names like George Miller and John Sweller don’t sound familiar, get ready for a rollercoaster ride of learning! You will learn why dashboards are a core necessity in today’s society, what they are used for, and the different types of visualization methods used within them. The class project will allow you to design your very own dashboard applying the knowledge learned from this class. This class is geared towards students who are new to UX and want to get a better understanding of design principles in real scenarios and experienced designers who want to broaden their understanding of how effective dashboards are designed.


You'll learn that operational and analytical dashboards are all around us. By understanding how our brain works, and applying design principles, you will be able to create your own dashboard to use as a portfolio piece or to just test out your new knowledge. You will need the knowledge you have gained from this class, and paper and pencil. For more high fidelity designs, programs like Sketch, Photoshop, Illustrator, Figma, Adobe XD, or any other design software will be needed.
Your challenge, apply the knowledge from this class and design your own operational or analytical dashboard, either using paper and pencil sketches, or high fidelity designs using Sketch, Figma, Photoshop, etc.
target_audience: Aspiring product designers and beginner graphic designers.
This course is for beginners, newbies & amateurs in the field of UX design.
Aimed at people new to the world of design & user experience.
For anyone that needs to add ‘UX Design’ to their portfolio.

courses.title: 产品经理必懂的交互设计原则
courses.bio: 12个交互设计原则与案例展示
objectives: 了解什么是交互
通过实例，了解6个著名设计法则
通过实例，了解6个交互设计需达成的效果
了解产品经理与交互设计和原型的关系

课程内容: 12个交互设计原则与案例展示（上）
12个交互设计原则与案例展示（下）

requirements: 有一定产品工作经验，了解交互设计
courses.description:
这是一门专为工作中涉及到交互设计的产品经理设计的小课。交互设计是一种能够使产品变得易用，能够有效的使用界面语言向用户传递信息，进而实现人机交互的技术手段。而产品经理需掌握的原型设计图就是利用交互设计技术生产出来的产物，交互设计指导原型绘制，而原型体现着交互原则。
为了提升交互设计能力，三节课特别为你邀请到拥有12年产品工作经验；带领团队完成多个从0到1的创新型产品的静凡老师，为你梳理12个产品经理必懂的交互设计原则，并通过实例助你理解。希望你在设计产品时能够因遵循这些原则而注意到更多细节。祝你以用户为中心，做好产品设计。
本节课程是由授课老师与三节课合作制作的。在此，要特别感谢老师的辛苦付出！经历了课程立项、设计、开发中的众多环节，我们才能最终为你呈现现在的这门课程。无论是授课老师还是三节课团队，都希望这门课程能够让你有所收获，希望同学们结合个人工作情况，学以致用。

courses.title: Exploring German Design at Universum Science Museum TM
courses.bio: Real Time Case Study
objectives: Human-Centric Product Design
Hands-On Scientific Exploration
Innovation and Invention Skills
Energy Conversion Concepts
Social Connection through Design
Architectural Landscape and City Norms
Real-Time Class Project

Architecture and Landscapes of the City: Architecture and Landscapes of the City Breman

requirements: Accessibility for Everyone This course is designed to be inclusive, welcoming individuals from all backgrounds.
Encouraging Self-Reflection Students are encouraged to actively engage with the content by taking notes for self-reflection purposes. This practice enhances the learning experience.
No Prior Experience Required A standout feature of this course is its inclusivity – no prior experience is needed to enroll. Regardless of your background or expertise.
Simplified Learning Approach the course adopts a simplified learning approach, breaking down complex concepts into easily digestible segments.
Universally Understandable Content The language and delivery of content have been meticulously crafted to be universally understandable.
courses.description:
Embark on a captivating educational journey through the technical marvels of Universum Science Museum in Bremen, Germany, and unravel the intricate layers of German design culture. This course is tailored for students seeking insights into product design, human-centric approaches, scientific experiments, and the broader cultural influences shaping design in Germany.
Key Insights:
Human-Centric Product Design:
Gain a deep understanding of product design perspectives with a focus on human-centric approaches. Explore how the museum's exhibits embody a thoughtful consideration of human experience.
Hands-On Scientific Exploration:
Immerse yourself in the world of scientific experiments. Learn how to design and conduct experiments to understand basic laws of physics, fostering a hands-on approach to learning.
Innovation and Invention Skills:
Develop essential skills of innovation and invention. Understand how experiments can be adapted and changed to suit individual preferences, fostering a culture of creativity and exploration.
Energy Conversion Concepts:
Delve into the concepts of potential and kinetic energy. Learn how to design experiments that effectively demonstrate the conversion of energy, providing a practical and tangible grasp of fundamental scientific principles.
Social Connection through Design:
Explore the role of design in fostering social connections. Engage in social games that promote teamwork, connectedness, and leadership skills, demonstrating how design goes beyond products to influence human interaction.
Architectural Landscape and City Norms:
Understand the nuances of German architecture, city planning, and adherence to cultural norms. Explore the cleanliness and discipline prevalent in German cities, gaining insights into how these elements influence design thinking.
Real-Time Class Project:
Apply your newfound knowledge by undertaking a real-time class project. Execute hands-on action projects, designed to be a valuable addition to your portfolio. Experience the iterative process of design, embracing both successes and challenges.
Who Should Enroll:
Students interested in product design and scientific exploration.
Individuals curious about German design culture and architectural landscapes.
Design enthusiasts seeking hands-on experiences and real-world projects.
Those looking to enhance their innovation and invention skills.
Aspiring designers eager to understand human-centric approaches.
Professionals seeking insights into the German approach to design and education.
Join us on this transformative learning journey, exploring the convergence of science, design, and culture at the Universum Science Museum in Bremen, Germany. Enroll now to broaden your design horizons and cultivate a deeper appreciation for the intricate tapestry of German design excellence.
Courtesy,
Dr. FAK Noble Ai Researcher, Scientists, Product Developer, Innovator & Pure Consciousness Expert
Founder of Noble Transformation Hub TM
target_audience: Product Design Enthusiasts
Science and Innovation Seekers
Design Students and Professionals
Curiosity-Driven Learners
Individuals Interested in Human-Centric Approaches
Innovation and Invention Enthusiasts
Aspiring Designers and Design Thinkers
Professionals Seeking Cultural Insights

courses.title: AI-Powered UX: Next-Gen Product Design
courses.bio: UX Design meets Gen-AI
objectives: Design user experiences with Gen-AI assistance
Design and conduct interviews and surveys using ChatGPT
Create detailed personas, user journeys, and a visual flowchart quickly
Build wireframes and high-fidelity prototypes with Figma + AI
requirements: Basic UX knowledge
courses.description:
Artificial intelligence is transforming the way we design user experiences, making them more intuitive, efficient, and highly personalized. In this course, guided by Matheus, you'll embark on a journey where AI and UX design merge to create innovative digital products.
This course is structured into three key areas: research, ideation, and design.
Research: Learn how to design and conduct AI-assisted user research, collect valuable insights, and analyze data effectively. We’ll also explore competitive benchmarking to understand market trends and opportunities.
Ideation: Develop detailed user personas, enrich user journeys, and create visual flowcharts to map interactions. These foundational elements will guide the entire design process, ensuring solutions that truly meet user needs.
Design: Take your UX skills to the next level by leveraging AI to create wireframes and high-fidelity prototypes in Figma. You'll discover how AI-powered tools can streamline workflows, enhance creativity, and speed up iteration cycles.
Throughout the course, you’ll have access to a downloadable PDF with all the prompts used in the lessons, allowing you to follow along easily and apply what you learn in real-time.
By the end of this course, you’ll have the knowledge and tools to integrate AI into your UX design process, making your projects smarter, faster, and more impactful. Get ready to embrace the future of UX with AI-powered design!
target_audience: UX Designers, UI Designers, Product Designers, UX Researchers and Gen-AI enthusiasts

courses.title: Material Mastery Unveiling Hardness through Exploration TM
courses.bio: Real Time Case Study Material Properties
objectives: Understand the significance of exploring materials through the lens of hardness.
Trigger curiosity and develop a keen sense of how different materials can be understood through this interesting parameter.
Engage in a simple yet impactful scratch test to determine the hardness of various materials.
Learn how to conduct and interpret scratch tests, a practical approach to understanding material properties.
Explore the hardness properties of a variety of materials, including plastics, rubber, glass, ceramics, and more.
Gain insights into how hardness varies across different materials and its implications for design.
Develop the ability to document observations from scratch tests.
Understand the significance of recording sound, texture, and marks created during the exploration of material hardness.
Acquire practical knowledge essential for designers in material selection.
Gain a comprehensive understanding of the hierarchy of material hardness.
Understand the practical application of material hardness knowledge in real-world design scenarios.
requirements: Anyone can learn this class it is very simple.
Students are advised to take notes for self-reflection purposes
No prior experience is needed to join this course
courses.description:
Why This Course?
From manufacturing firms to strategic sourcing and product design studios, I brings a wealth of real-world experience to your learning journey. His acclaimed design for a critical care ventilator attests to his commitment to excellence in material selection and application.
About the Course:
This course is a unique exploration into the tactile realm of material properties, specifically hardness. As a designer, understanding how to assess and interpret hardness is paramount for effective material selection. Move beyond theoretical learning and embrace a philosophy of exploration, where hands-on activities and case studies redefine your approach to materials.
Key Takeaways:
Exploration in Nature:
Trigger curiosity and explore materials through the intriguing parameter of hardness.
Engage in a simple yet impactful scratch test to reveal the hardness of various materials.
Diverse Material Properties:
Delve into the hardness properties of a variety of materials, from plastics to glass and ceramics.
Understand how hardness varies across different materials and its implications for design.
Hands-On Documentation:
Develop essential documentation skills, recording observations from scratch tests.
Document the sound, texture, and marks created during material exploration.
Practical Knowledge for Designers:
Acquire practical knowledge crucial for designers in the material selection process.
Learn to interpret hardness data and make informed decisions in the design journey.
Hierarchy of Material Hardness:
Gain a comprehensive understanding of the hierarchy of material hardness.
Identify the order from higher to lower hardness, enhancing material selection capabilities.
Effective Communication with Engineering Teams:
Learn to confidently communicate with engineering teams about material choices.
Understand the importance of effective communication for collaborative design efforts.
Team Collaboration and Brainstorming:
Cultivate collaborative skills, engaging with team members in material exploration.
Share findings, participate in collaborative brainstorming sessions, and enhance the creativity of your projects.
Enroll Now:
This transformative journey to master material properties and redefine your approach to design. Whether you're a seasoned professional or an aspiring designer, this course equips you with practical skills, fostering a deeper connection with materials. Enroll today and unlock the secrets of material mastery!


Courtesy,
Dr. FAK Noble Ai Researcher, Scientists, Product Developer, Innovator & Pure Consciousness Expert
Founder of Noble Transformation Hub TM
target_audience: Anyone who wants to learn future Design education with real life cases studies and insights
Design Enthusiasts
Industrial Designers
Engineers and Engineering Students
Product Development Professionals
Students in Design and Engineering Fields
Manufacturing and Production Professionals
Curious Minds Interested in Material Science
UI/UX Designers and Graphic Designers
Entrepreneurs in Product Development
Professionals Seeking Collaborative Skills

courses.description:
Are you excited to get into the world of UI/UX but don't know how and where to start? Well, I've designed this course to allow you to learn how to start and end as a UX/UI designer & start getting paid for having that skill by working on a design project for a web landing page & mobile app screens.

Hello buddy! My name is Kerlos & I’m a Senior UI/UX Designer & Instructor. I'll help you learn the design basics & fundamentals using Adobe XD which is a great design tool used by industry professionals. By the end of this course, you will be able to produce practical and effective User Interfaces (UI) for both Mobile Apps & Websites.

I've designed this course to cover the Digital Design Fundamentals that make you a Good Designer in the first place before we dive into the process of designing a Landing Web Page & Mobile App screens for a project using the ADOBE XD.

You'll also get to know where could you get your design assets like the images and fonts that you'll need for creating your next awesome project, as long as the design inspiration websites you should visit daily to feed your visual design memory.

Join me in this wonderful experience we will have together, to become the UX/UI Designer that companies love to hire.
target_audience: Junior/Beginner UX/UI designers who want to learn design basics & Adobe XD interface.
People who love to create and explore!

courses.title: ChromaCraft: Mastering Colors for Designers TM
courses.bio: Real Time Case Study
objectives: Master the construction of a color wheel through hands-on exercises and iterative processes. Understand the relationships between primary, secondary, and tertia
Explore the intricacies of RGB, CMYK colors, and various color schemes such as triadic and tetradic. Grasp the scientific principles underpinning color creation
Delve into the technical aspects of color, including the deflection of UV light spectrum. Gain a detailed understanding of terms like hue, tint, shade, and satu
Develop practical skills in extracting colors and emotions from images. Learn techniques to apply meaningful color choices based on visual content.
Analyze the skills of painters and different painting styles to comprehend the emotional impact of colors in art. Apply insights to design scenarios.
Explore the fascinating concept of synaesthesia, understanding its various types and practical applications in the context of design.
Discover the functional meanings associated with each color. Explore keywords, emotions, and cultural variations to create a quick reference guide for design
Decode the secrets of various color combinations, from complimentary to split complimentary, triadic, and understand the significance of warm and cool colors.

Rhythm, Harmony, Composed, Balanced and: Rhythm, Harmony, Composed, Balanced and Symetrical
Gestalt Law of Pyschology - Law of Figur: Gestalt Law of Pyschology - Law of Figure and Ground

requirements: Anyone can learn this class it is very simple
Students are advised to take notes for self-reflection purposes
No prior experience is needed to join this course
courses.description:
About the Course:
"ChromaCraft" is not just a course; it's an immersive experience designed to transform your understanding of colors. From constructing a color wheel to unraveling the science behind color creation, this course provides a unique blend of theoretical insights and hands-on learning. Embracing the philosophy of learning by doing, participants will gain a deep understanding of color theory and its real-world applications.
Key Benefits of the Course:
Mastering the Color Wheel:
Learn the art of constructing a color wheel through iterative processes, gaining mastery over primary, secondary, and tertiary colors.
In-Depth Color Exploration:
Explore the world of RGB, CMYK colors, and various color schemes like triadic and tetradic, demystifying the science behind the creation of colors.
Science of Color Creation:
Delve into the technical aspects of color, understanding the deflection of UV light spectrum and decoding terms like hue, tint, shade, and saturation with practical examples.
Practical Color Extraction:
Develop practical skills in extracting colors and emotions from images, enhancing your ability to infuse meaning into your designs.
Painter's Palette:
Analyze the skills of painters and different painting styles to comprehend the emotional impact of colors in art.
Synaesthesia Unveiled:
Explore the intriguing concept of synaesthesia, its varied types, and its practical applications in the world of design.
Functional Meanings of Colors:
Discover the functional meanings associated with each color, exploring keywords, emotions, and cultural variations. Benefit from a quick reference guide for design inspiration.
Color Combinations Decoded:
Decode the secrets of color combinations, from complimentary to split complimentary, triadic, and the significance of warm and cool colors. Utilize this knowledge as a quick reference guide for graphic and product design.
Join "ChromaCraft" and Elevate Your Design Palette: This course is more than just learning about colors; it's about mastering the art of incorporating colors strategically and meaningfully into your designs. "ChromaCraft" is your ticket to becoming a color virtuoso. Enroll now and unleash the full spectrum of your design potential!
target_audience: Graphic designers seeking to deepen their understanding of color theory and elevate their skills in choosing and combining colors effectively.
Product designers aiming to incorporate color strategically in their designs, whether for physical products or digital interfaces.
Web designers looking to enhance their ability to create visually appealing and harmonious color schemes for websites and digital platforms.
Artists and painters interested in gaining insights into the emotional impact of colors and how they can be effectively used in various art forms.
Photographers wanting to understand color theory to enhance the visual impact of their photographs and make informed decisions about color correction.
Students studying design, whether in graphic design, industrial design, or related disciplines, looking to build a solid foundation in color theory.
Marketing and branding professionals interested in understanding the psychological and cultural implications of color in branding and marketing strategies.
Enthusiasts with a passion for design who want to explore the fascinating world of color, from its scientific underpinnings to its creative applications.
Individuals interested in sustainable design who wish to incorporate thoughtful color choices in environmentally conscious projects.

courses.description:
The Holistic UX Design Course: Master Universal UX Principles That Transcend Any Tool and Transform Your UX Career With 30 Years of Proven Strategic Wisdom


— Course Description
Have you ever felt overwhelmed by the vastness of UX design?
Perhaps you've just completed your education or have been working in the field for a year or two and wish to broaden your skill set. You might be a seasoned designer looking to expand your expertise beyond your specialisation. Or you might be someone working closely with UX designers who wants to understand the strategic thinking behind great user experiences.
Welcome to The Holistic UX Design Course — where you'll learn a universal approach to UX design that you can apply to nearly any project or technology, now and in the future.


— Why This Course Is Different
While other courses specialise in specific software, I teach you to think like a UX strategist. Drawing from 30 years of experience across diverse industries, teams, and technologies, I'll share the fundamental principles that have remained constant throughout every shift in tools and trends.
This isn't about mastering the latest app — it's about understanding people, processes, and systems. It's about developing a mindset that makes you invaluable, regardless of the software your company uses or the new tools that emerge next year.
AI-Era Advantage
In today's AI-transformed landscape, 83% of UX professionals utilise AI tools; however, the industry is bifurcating into strategic leaders and tool operators. This course positions you as a strategic leader. While AI handles routine tasks, the generalist thinking, systems understanding, and human-centred collaboration you'll develop become premium skills that orchestrate AI capabilities rather than compete with them.


— Your Journey Through Holistic UX Design
Section 1: The Generalist Advantage
Embrace the broad perspective that makes you versatile and effective
Learn the two core perspectives that frame all UX thinking
Understand why specialists often miss the bigger picture
Section 2: Client Briefs & Business Cases
Decode what clients want
Align user needs with business goals effectively
Navigate different levels of UX maturity in organisations
Ask the right questions that lead to successful projects
Section 3: Research & The Crystallisation Process
Map user environments and understand behaviours deeply
Study competition strategically
Collaborate with stakeholders to gather meaningful insights
Apply my unique Crystallisation Process for iterative refinement
Prioritise to maintain focus on essentials
Section 4: Concepts & Design Philosophy
Master Object-Oriented UX for scalable design systems
Apply Gestalt Principles for intuitive interfaces
Implement Systems Thinking for complex interactions
Transform raw data into clearly defined content strategies
Address systemic issues and identify hidden opportunities
Section 5: Visual Design & Communication
Craft interfaces that are both functional and delightful
Dive into copy that guides and engages users
Navigate cross-cultural design considerations
Stand out from competitors through thoughtful design decisions
Section 6: Professional Delivery & Beyond
Execute flawless handoffs to development teams
Manage ongoing projects effectively
Implement personal project management systems like PARA
Position yourself strategically for future opportunities


— Real-World Application
Throughout the course, we'll work with two comprehensive case studies:
A luxury hotel website — focusing on public-facing, novice user interfaces
A professional SaaS tool — exploring expert user workflows and complex interactions
We will, of course, also look into mobile and tablet design extensively
You'll see how the same principles apply across vastly different contexts, giving you confidence to tackle any UX challenge.


— What Makes This Course Special
30 Years of Battle-Tested Experience
I've worked across every major technological shift in UX — from DOS to AI. The principles I teach have survived them all because they're based on human psychology and strategic thinking.
Tool-Agnostic Freedom
Unlike others who might lock you into specific software, I provide the freedom to work with any tool your employer uses or any new platform that emerges. Your skills remain valuable regardless of technology changes.
Strategic, Not Just Tactical
This isn't about making things look pretty or learning keyboard shortcuts. It's about understanding why specific designs work, how to approach complex problems, and how to communicate your decisions effectively.
Practical Assignments
Each section includes hands-on exercises where you'll apply concepts to real scenarios. Compare your solutions to mine — not to find "right" answers, but to expand your thinking and validate your approach.


— Your Instructor
Massimo, 30-Year UX Veteran
With three decades of experience spanning multiple industries, technologies, and design paradigms, I've seen what works and what doesn't. More importantly, I've identified the universal principles that transcend any specific tool or trend.
I've designed for Fortune 500 companies, startups, government agencies, and everything in between. Now, I'm sharing the comprehensive framework that has guided my entire career — a framework that will make you resilient and valuable in an ever-changing field.


— Course Benefits
By completing this course, you'll:
Think strategically about UX challenges, not just execute tasks
Communicate confidently with clients, stakeholders, and teams
Adapt quickly to new tools and technologies
Command higher rates by offering strategic value, not just technical skills
Build lasting careers based on principles, not fleeting trends
You will also receive 26 useful, high-quality downloads to support you throughout this course and your ongoing career, including a glossary index for future reference. This index will make it easy to find the right video when revisiting topics.


— Invest in Your Future
Stop chasing the latest tools. Start building a foundation that will serve you throughout your entire UX career.
Enrol now and join me on this journey to master holistic UX design.
See you in the first lesson!
target_audience: Beginning UX Designers (0-2 years experience) seeking solid strategic foundations
Career Changers wanting a comprehensive UX understanding beyond just tools
Specialised Designers feeling constrained and wanting broader perspectives
Product Owners & Developers needing to understand UX thinking and process
Anyone tired of tool-specific tutorials that might become outdated someday

courses.description:
■■■■■
【2019年7月更新】
・基本機能の一部を最新バージョンに合わせて更新
└ 多角形ツールの追加に伴い「描画ツールの使いかた」を更新
└ アセット機能内の「シンボル」→「コンポーネント」変更に伴い「アセット機能の解説」を更新
└ 最新バージョンに合わせた「アートボード内の基本操作」「CCライブラリ機能の解説」「プレビューの公開・共有方法について」 「プロトタイプの設定方法」を更新
└ 「デザインスペックの確認・共有方法について」の解説を追加
・基本操作のおさらいとして「フォームや表を作成してみよう」のセクションを追加
・アニメーション機能などの基本的な解説「アプリのような動きや機能をつけてみよう」のセクションを追加
■■■■■
※注意
AdobeXDは随時バージョンを更新しており、一部機能やインターフェイスに若干の違いがあります。
一部ベータ版を使用しているレクチャーもありますが、基本的な操作に影響はありませんのでご安心ください。
■■■■■
皆さん初めまして、 デザイナーをしております株式会社IMAKEの濱野と申します。
昨今、UI・UXデザインの重要性に注目されています。
なぜなら、ユーザビリティが高くないと利用者が使いづらいと感じてしまい、せっかく作ったサービスやサイトからユーザーが離れていってしまう可能性があるためです。
また、サイトやアプリが完成した後に、ユーザーやクライアントから使い勝手のレビューをもらって、ワイヤーフレームから作り直さなければいけないケースもあります。
最近の制作フローでは、プロトタイプツールを用いて開発前になるべくプロトタイプを作っておくことで、テストマーケティングをしたり、コミュニケーションコストなどを削減して、なるべくリスクを軽減していく動きが増えています。
しかし、今までWebデザイン・アプリデザインの動的なアプローチを相手に伝えるためのプロトタイプを作るには、大変な労力を必要としました。そこで開発されたのがAdobe XDです。
本コースでは、「Adobe XDの基本操作」から「Adobe XDを用いたプロトタイプの制作方法」は勿論のこと、「UI/UXの重要性」や「利用方法」、「用語の理解」、「ケーススタディを用いた実践」などを解説していきます。
なお、講師が使用するOSはWindows10です。

今回は”誰でも”と使えるいうところを踏まえ、Windowsユーザーでも使えるように解説をしていきたいと思います。
Macユーザーでもわかるような説明をしておりますのでご安心ください。
ちなみに、一部Mac版にしかない機能もありますので、予めご了承下さい。

是非この機会に動画をご覧いただき、一緒にAdobe XDの基本を学んで実際の制作現場で使っていけるようにXDを使いこなしましょう！

ワイヤーフレーム・デザインカンプ・プロトタイプをすべて補えるツールを求めている方。

courses.description:
Unlock the power of Figma design tokens and transform the way you build and scale design systems! In this course, you will learn how to create and manage design tokens to ensure consistency, efficiency, and flexibility in your projects. Whether you're a seasoned designer or just getting started, this course will provide you with actionable insights on leveraging Figma tokens for better control over typography, colors, spacing, and variants.

What You Will Learn:
How to set up design tokens in Figma for seamless design management.
Best practices for naming, organizing, and applying tokens to your design system.
Ways to improve your design workflow by creating reusable tokens for typography, colors, and spacing.
Course Outline
Primitive Tokens
Move your tokens
Semantic token
Semantic token practice
Naming design tokens
Typography-tokens
Spacing Tokens
Token Management
Radius Tokens
Component Design Tokens
Create component tokens
Why Take This Class: This course will help you streamline your design process and maintain consistency across multiple projects and teams. With design tokens, you can create scalable solutions that make updating and maintaining designs easier than ever.
Who This Class is For: Ideal for UI/UX designers, product designers, Design System Managers, Figma Enthusiasts, Design Team Leaders and Managers, Design Students and Beginners who are looking to improve efficiency and standardize their design process with tokens in Figma. No prior knowledge of tokens is required, but a basic understanding of Figma is helpful.
Materials Needed: Access to Figma is required, along with any basic design tools you already use. All materials and templates will be provided during the course.
target_audience: UI/UX Designers
Product designer

Figma Enthusiasts
Design Team Leaders and Managers

Module 1: Design Thinking (2 Hours): Empathy: Why, for who, and where (30 min)
Ideate: Where and how to visualize (30 min)
Prototype & Test: Sketches and wireframes (30 min)
Module 2: Design Strategy (2 Hours): Color Concepts: How to use colors in design (30 min)
Assignment: Strategic Color Planning for a Product Design
Typography: Font types, style & combinations (30 min)
Create a Font Style Guide for a Brand
Assignment: Create a Web Page Layout Using Grid Principles
Module 3: Capstone Project (1 Hour): Live Project - Social Media Using Design Strategy - 9 Position Grid Method
Live Design - Web Z Pattern with 9 Position Grid System
Design a Z-Pattern Homepage + Social Media Promo Post
The Conclusion: Thank you for Completing the course with flying colors, What is next for you?

requirements: A basic understanding of any design tool (Figma, Canva, Adobe Illustrator, etc.)
A desire to go beyond surface-level design
No prior design thinking or strategy knowledge required
courses.description:
Design is more than just visuals — it's about solving problems, creating experiences, and delivering impact. In this course, you'll learn to combine the power of Design Thinking with the precision of Design Strategy to create designs that are not just beautiful, but meaningful.
You’ll start by mastering the five stages of Design Thinking: Empathize, Define, Ideate, Prototype, and Test. These stages will help you deeply understand your users, define real problems, generate creative ideas, and bring them to life with confidence and purpose.
Next, you’ll dive into core design strategy concepts — color theory, typography, and layout systems — and understand how these visual elements influence perception, usability, and emotional response in your designs.
To apply your learning, you’ll complete a Capstone Project where you'll design a social media post, a poster, or a mobile UI screen. This real-world project helps you practice your skills and build a portfolio piece you can proudly showcase.
Whether you're a beginner or a working creative professional, this course will help you design with clarity, purpose, and measurable impact. You’ll gain not just technical skills, but also the mindset to approach design strategically.
No prior knowledge of Design Thinking or formal training is required — just a passion to learn and grow as a designer.
target_audience: UX/UI, Graphic, and Visual Designers
Design students and self-taught creatives
Freelancers and marketers creating visual content
Anyone who wants to create designs with strategic thinking

courses.title: Lean Inception: Design Thinking y Lean StartUp
courses.bio: El método paso a paso para equipos de productos exitosos
objectives: Qué es una Inception y cómo tener éxito con Lean Inception
La combinación efectiva de Lean StartUp y Design Thinking
Cómo construir el producto adecuado, siguiendo el enfoque del Producto Mínimo Viable
Cómo los equipos ágiles exitosos comienzan su trabajo
Lean Inception
requirements: Interés en Design Thinking, Agile y Lean
courses.description:
El método paso a paso para equipos de productos exitosos. Descubre Lean Inception, la combinación eficaz de Design Thinking y Lean StartUp


¡Dirige a tu equipo por el camino correcto con Lean Inception!


¡Aprende a ejecutar un Lean Inception, el método capaz de alinear a las personas para construir el producto ideal!


Lanzar un nuevo producto no es una tarea fácil, ya que implica muchos riesgos. Pero, ¿y si conocieras una técnica que te pusiera en el camino correcto de una manera simple y efectiva? Sería increíble, ¿de acuerdo?


Por eso es tan importante esta formación. El Lean Inception desarrollado por Paulo Caroli ya ayudó a muchas personas y empresas a dar vida a sus proyectos. Es la guía paso a paso completa para que usted y su equipo logren el mejor desarrollo de productos posible en este momento.


Lean inception es la combinación efectiva de Design Thinking y Lean StartUp para decidir el Producto Mínimo Viable (MVP). Es un taller colaborativo que ayudará a un grupo de personas, generalmente un equipo ágil, un escuadrón o un equipo de producto, a comprender, alinear y planificar la construcción del producto lean. La construcción de un producto exitoso comienza con un Lean Inception.


Puede parecer complicado realizar un Lean Inception a distancia, pero es totalmente posible y es tan importante como el presencial. ¡Sigue los consejos de este entrenamiento para prepararte de la mejor manera posible!


El Lean Inception consiste en una serie de actividades, ¡generalmente programadas en una semana! Consulte en esta capacitación un ejemplo de agenda, siga la explicación de cada actividad y los beneficios de este exitoso taller.


¡Lean Inception trae un método simple y poderoso que cambiará la forma en que se hacen negocios ahora!


La capacitación Lean Inception Digital se basa en el libro Lean Inception, best-seller. Tiene 14 módulos presentados por Paulo Caroli, el autor de Lean Inception. Aprenderá mucho más sobre Lean Inception, cuándo hacerlo, cuándo no hacerlo, Producto Mínimo Viable (MVP), detalles de cada actividad con consejos sobre técnicas de facilitación. Míralo tantas veces como quieras.
target_audience: Product Owners

Desarrollador

UX
Emprendedores

requirements: Accessibility for Everyone This course is designed to be inclusive, welcoming individuals from all backgrounds.
Encouraging Self-Reflection Students are encouraged to actively engage with the content by taking notes for self-reflection purposes. This practice enhances the learning experience.
No Prior Experience Required A standout feature of this course is its inclusivity – no prior experience is needed to enroll. Regardless of your background or expertise.
Simplified Learning Approach the course adopts a simplified learning approach, breaking down complex concepts into easily digestible segments.
Universally Understandable Content The language and delivery of content have been meticulously crafted to be universally understandable.
courses.description:
Embark on a transformative journey to master the intricacies of system-level projects with a specialized focus on the child adoption process. This comprehensive course ensures a rapid comprehension of complex projects within condensed timeframes, empowering participants with a unique blend of strategic systems thinking and behavioral design.
Key Learning Objectives:
Rapid Comprehension of System-Level Projects:
Acquire the ability to efficiently understand and navigate intricate system-level projects within constrained timeframes.
Application of Behavioral Case Studies:
Integrate behavioral case studies into real-world scenarios, addressing and solving complex issues within the child adoption process.
In-Depth Grasp of Behavioral Economics:
Gain a profound understanding of behavioral economics concepts, including triggers, barriers, primers, and Q trigger action. Apply this knowledge to comprehend and influence decision-making in the adoption context.
Utilizing Behavioral Economics for Social Solutions:
Explore leveraging behavioral economics principles to address societal challenges in child adoption, such as mitigating social stigma and fostering acceptance.
Holistic System Design Mapping:
Develop skills in mapping the entire system design process, focusing on the child adoption process. Understand government regulations, execution at state and national levels, and identify opportunities to address challenges.
Giga Maps for Comprehensive Insight:
Create and analyze comprehensive giga maps showcasing gathered information, identifying problems, proposing solution proposals, and presenting final strategic outcomes in the form of actionable cards.
Mindset Transformation for Optimal Outcomes:
Undergo a transformative mindset shift necessary for excelling in system-level projects. Learn to navigate challenges without a predefined image, evolving the best information to achieve the most favorable outcomes.
Strategic Implementation of Final Solutions:
Apply the gained knowledge through final solutions presented in the form of practical, applicable cards and comprehensive giga maps. Ensure a complete understanding and implementation of strategies for impactful results.
This mastery program promises to equip participants with a diverse skill set, preparing them to address complex challenges within the realm of system-level projects, specifically in the context of child adoption. Join us to blend strategic thinking with behavioral design, ensuring a holistic approach to creating meaningful and impactful solutions.

courses.description:
Figma UI/UX Design (Hindi) | Become UI/UX Designer in India 2023/2024 ( हिन्दी  )
Welcome to my Full Masterclass on "UI/UX Design in Figma ( हिन्दी  ) for 2024. In This particular lecture series, You will understand Fundamentals of UI/UX Design in Hindi language. If you want to know that How to Become UI/UX Designer in India in 2024, Then also you should attend my all lectures.
After Completing my course on Figma UI/UX Design, You will feel more Confident in UI/UX Design. You can easily Create Interface of Web or app with the help of these masterclass. We will clear your concept, So that you can Build your own application or website Interface.


Q: What is UI/UX design?
UI/UX design, or user interface and user experience design, is the process of creating digital products that are both visually appealing and easy to use. UI designers focus on the look and feel of a product, while UX designers focus on the user's journey and how they interact with the product.
Q: Why should I learn UI/UX design?
UI/UX design is a valuable skill to have in today's digital world. Businesses of all sizes need UI/UX designers to create user-friendly websites, apps, and other digital products. UI/UX designers are also in high demand in the tech industry, and they can earn a good salary.
Q: What is Figma?
Figma is a cloud-based design tool that is popular among UI/UX designers. It is a powerful tool that can be used to create everything from simple wireframes to high-fidelity prototypes. Figma is also collaborative, so designers can work on projects together in real time.
Q: Why should I learn UI/UX design in Figma?
Figma is a popular tool among UI/UX designers for a reason. It is powerful, easy to use, and collaborative. By learning UI/UX design in Figma, you will be able to create professional-looking designs that are also user-friendly.
Q: What will I learn in this course?
In this course, you will learn the basics of UI/UX design, as well as how to use Figma to create your own designs. You will learn about different design principles, such as typography, color theory, and layout. You will also learn how to create wireframes, prototypes, and mockups.
Q: Who is this course for?
This course is for anyone who wants to learn UI/UX design. Whether you are a complete beginner or you have some experience, this course will teach you everything you need to know to create professional-looking designs.
Q: What are the prerequisites for this course?
There are no prerequisites for this course. All you need is a computer and an internet connection.
Q: How long is the course?
The course is approximately 10 hours long. You can learn at your own pace and complete the course in as much or as little time as you need.
Q: What will I receive after completing the course?
After completing the course, you will receive a certificate of completion. You will also be able to download all of the course materials, including the Figma files and templates.
target_audience: Who want to Learn Figma & Become UI/UX designer

requirements: no experience required, you will learn Everything you need to know
courses.description:
Adobe XD is a powerful and easy-to-use vector-based experience design platform that gives teams the tools they need to craft the world’s best experiences collaboratively. Available on Mac and Windows systems, XD meets teams where they’re working with cross-platform compatibility.
Features
1-Repeat grid
Helps creating a grid of repeating items such as lists, and photo galleries.
2-Prototype and animation
Creates animated prototypes through linking artboards. These prototypes can be previewed on supported mobile devices.
3-Interoperability
XD supports and can open files from Illustrator, Photoshop, Sketch, and After Effects. In addition to the Adobe Creative Cloud, XD can also connect to other tools and services such as Slack and Microsoft Teams to collaborate. XD is also able to auto-adjust and move from macOS to Windows. For security, prototypes can be sent with password protection to ensure full disclosure.
4-Content-Aware Layout
Design and edit components without the nudging or the tinkering. Content-Aware Layout aligns and evenly-spaces as you add, remove, or resize objects. Make adjustments with smart controls and get back to exploring.
5-Voice design
Apps can be designed using voice commands. In addition, what users create for smart assistants can be previewed as well.
6-Components
Users can create components to create logos, buttons, and other assets for reuse. Their appearance can change with the context where they are used.
7-Responsive resize
Responsive resize automatically adjusts and sizes pictures and other objects on the artboards. This allows the user to have their content automatically adjusted for different screens for different sized platforms such as mobile phones and PCs.
8-Plugins
XD is compatible with custom plugins that add additional features and uses. Plugins range from design to functionality, automation and animation.


9-The student will learn how to use simple resources to create an app or game from scratch
We will learn:
How to use the Tools available in the program (Adobe XD)
Combine  images
Identify the component
Changing colours
Use files from Lottie files
Interact between pages and modify them
Prototype
At the end of the Course and application through this educational video, the student will be able to understand the Concept of producing any idea and its embodiment through the famous Adobe XD program, and we will try to explain in a simple way  without any ambiguity , and there are Adobe XD training quiz for and Assessment that you can try to test your adobe XD knowledge.
you will get full project (Adobe XD Format)

requirements: No prior design experience needed! This course is created for complete beginners.
A computer (Windows or Mac) with an internet connection.
Basic computer skills (for example: how to open a browser, download a file, or install software).
A willingness to learn and practice — that’s the most important!
courses.description:
Are you dreaming of designing beautiful websites and mobile apps but don’t know where to start?


This beginner-friendly course is your complete guide to learning Figma, the most popular design tool for web and app interfaces today. You don’t need any previous design experience — we start from zero and guide you step by step!
In this course, you will learn how to use Figma to create professional web pages and mobile app screens. You’ll explore all the important tools, learn to plan your designs with wireframes, and create beautiful, modern user interfaces that look great and work well.


What you will learn:
The basics of web and mobile app design
How to set up and use Figma with confidence
How to create wireframes to plan your layouts
Designing full website pages (home, about, blog, and more)
Designing complete mobile app screens and flows
How to convert website designs into mobile app designs
Prototyping your designs so they feel real and interactive
Exporting your designs and preparing them for sharing or development
Branding basics, including logo creation
How to publish your design projects and even connect them to a domain


This course is perfect for absolute beginners, aspiring designers, entrepreneurs, developers who want to learn design, or anyone who wants to turn creative ideas into real, usable designs.
All you need is a computer and a free Figma account — no coding skills required!


By the end of the course, you’ll have the skills and confidence to design beautiful, user-friendly websites and mobile apps on your own.


Join now and start your journey to becoming a confident web and app designer today!
target_audience: Absolute beginners who want to learn web design or mobile app design without any prior experience.
Aspiring UI/UX designers who want to start their design journey using an industry-standard tool (Figma).
Graphic designers who want to move into digital product design (web and mobile).
Entrepreneurs, startup founders, or business owners who want to design their own website or mobile app mockups before hiring a developer.
Web developers or front-end developers who want to understand design basics and improve their collaboration with designers.
Students and hobbyists who love creativity and want to learn how to bring their design ideas to life.
This course is for anyone who wants to learn how to design beautiful websites and mobile apps with Figma, from scratch.

courses.title: Certificación Internacional en Design Thinking
courses.bio: Curso de preparación para optar por la certificación Internacional en Design Thinking (CERTIPROF)
objectives: Conocer la importancia del Design Thinking
Comprender cada una de las fases que componen la metodología
Conocer las herramientas y técnicas que se utilizan en cada fase de la metodología
Preparar al estudiante para el examen de certificación internacional de Design Thinking

Empatizar: Descubre las problemáticas o necesidades de mercado
Definir: Define cuál es la problemática más importante
Idear: Genera múltiples ideas con potencial de innovación
Evaluar: Analiza los resultados y si es necesario regresa a la mesa de trabajo

requirements: No se requiere experiencia en metodologías de innovación. Aprenderás todo lo que necesitas para optar por el examen de Certificación de Design Thiking de Certiprof
courses.description:
La cuarta revolución industrial y la digitalización ha cambiado la forma de hacer negocios; los clientes demandan mayor calidad y rápidos tiempos de respuesta en un contexto competitivo que pasó de ser local a uno internacional. Lo que exige que las organizaciones deban estar preparadas al cambio, a la innovación y al trabajo en equipo. Quien sobrevive en el mundo de los negocios no es el más fuerte si no el que mejor se adapte.
El Design Thinking es una metodología compuesta por cinco fases que permiten una alta comprensión de las necesidades del cliente, incita a la síntesis de las variables más relevantes de sus necesidades, para luego proponer soluciones creativas y a la medida que puedan convertirse en experimentos rápidos y de bajo costo para determinar su viabilidad, resultando en un proceso de diseño iterativo cuyo producto final es generar aprendizaje rápidamente y a bajo costo.
Quien no innova está condenado al fracaso, indistintamente si se trata de una organización nueva o una con amplia trayectoria en el mercado. Por lo que este curso está dirigido a personas que quieran liderar los procesos de cambio y transformación de las organizaciones por medio de metodologías de innovación, como lo es el Design Thinking
target_audience: Personas que requieran una certificación internacional que valide su conocimiento en Design Thinking
Profesionales que quieran conocer metodologías de innovación para optimizar procesos o solucionar problemáticas empresariales

courses.title: Remote Usability Testing 101

Introduction: What are benefits of Usability Testing

NEW ADDED: AI Driven Usability Testing: Generative AI: A Game Changer for Remote Usability Testing

requirements: Interest in User experience , UX design, User Research or related Discipline. You do not need prior knowledge or experience.
courses.description:
If you want to learn Usability Testing, this is the course for you!
By the end of this course, you will learn how to conduct a Remote Usability Test that will allow you to measure the user experience of any app or website.
In fact, Remote usability testing will allow you to discover how real people will use the product in the real world. This will help you gather useful UX data that will help you make better decisions for the user experience direction of your app or website.
However, since there are so many distinct kinds of usability tests but in this course, I specifically focus on Remote moderated and unmoderated testing because it allows you to move out of your lab and test in real settings of the user. As we are going more global, and technology is great remote testing is more powerful than before. It allows you to capture insights that are not possible even in the lab or in-person testing.
With the help of this usability testing course, you will be able to:
Quickly learn the fundamentals of remote usability testing.
Moderate usability tests like a pro.
Learn how to pick between remote and lab-based usability testing, as well as moderated and unmoderated tests.
7 steps process to understand how to conduct remote usability testing
Learn when to do lab testing.
Real-life demo of unmoderated testing
Learn tips and tricks, as well as design workflows from a UX Designer with 14+ years of experience
Prewritten unmoderated test guide and guidelines to perform analysis.
target_audience: User experience Researcher and designer
Anyone curious to learn Usability Testing
Early stage startup founder

courses.title: 하루 10분으로 끝내는 UXUI 디자인을 위한 실전 피그마 Figma (+ PDF 전자책 추가 제공)
courses.bio: UX 디자이너 및 PO 출신 쏘이가 알려주는 디자이너, 기획자, 개발자를 위한 웹/앱 UIUX 디자인 툴 피그마 기초부터 응용까지
objectives: 실무에서 사용하는 프로세스 그대로 피그마를 활용하고 결과물을 만들어봅니다.
피그마의 개념과 원리를 제대로 알고 응용할 수 있습니다.
서비스 기획단계에서 필요한 와이어프레임을 그릴 수 있습니다.
스스로 웹/앱 UXUI 디자인이 가능합니다.
피그마를 활용해 웹/앱 프로토타이핑을 할 수 있습니다.
컴포넌트 작업을 통한 디자인 시스템을 만들 수 있습니다.
피그마를 통한 협업 및 업무 커뮤니케이션 방법에 대해 배워봅니다.

와이어프레임 만들기: 와이어프레임 그리기 01 : 메인 페이지 (feat. 아이콘 플러그인)
모바일 웹을 디자인해보자 02 : GUI 디자인하기: GUI 디자인하기 01 : 컴포넌트와 오토레이아웃 활용하여 카드 UI 구성하기

requirements: 노트북만 있으면 누구나 수강하실 수 있습니다.
courses.description:
* 지속적으로 강의 콘텐츠 업로드 예정입니다.

*이벤트!
지금 결제하시는 분들께 크몽, 탈잉 등에서 판매중인 28,000원 상당의 '[PDF] 피그마로 콘텐츠 만들기' 전자책을 무료로 증정해드립니다.
UI디자인 뿐 아니라 카드뉴스, 유튜브 썸네일, 상세페이지 등 콘텐츠 만드는 방법까지 함께 실습해보세요.



1. 강의 소개


포토샵, 일러스트 어려워서 못해먹겠다고요?
유료 디자인툴 구입이 부담스러우시다고요?
일일히 파일보내는 협업 과정에 지치셨다고요?
그런 여러분들께 100% 무료 디자인툴 "피그마(figma)"를 추천드립니다!
7년간 온오프라인으로 포토샵&일러스트 강의를 하면서
수강생분들께 가장 많이 들었던 질문 중 하나는 바로 이겁니다.

" 포토샵 파일 받을 수 있을까요? ㅠㅠ
한 번 배워보려고 결제하기는 너무 부담스러워서요.."


아무래도 초보자 입장에서 한 달 사용을 위해 포토샵, 일러스트를 구매하는 건 망설여지죠.
UI 디자인 전문가 입장에서도 어도비 외에 추가 툴을 구매하는 건 조금 망설여지는 일이기도 하고요.


혹시 그런 이유 때문에 디자인을 배우길, UI 디자인 툴을 사용해보길 망설였다면
지금 여러분들께 피그마를 추천드립니다!
디자인툴 강의만 7년 차, 제가 도와 드릴게요!




2. 피그마의 장점 세 가지

하나. 100%무료다
피그마는 개인에 한해 100% 무료로 모든 기능을 제공하고 있어요.
초보자나 프리랜서에게는 아주 큰 장점이 되겠죠!
둘. 쉽다!
포토샵, 일러스트 혹은 기타 디자인툴에 비해 훨씬 쉽습니다.
PPT보다도 쉽다니까요~!
셋. 협업이 용이하다.
실시간 연동을 통해 한 화면에서 두 명, 세 명이 동시에 작업이 가능합니다.
외주 작업물을 보내거나 개발자에게 파일을 전달할 때도 굳이 매 번 원본 파일을 보낼 필요가 없어요!




3. 쏘이 강의만의 특징


① 왕초보도 가능합니다!
작업전 도구 셋팅부터 잡아드립니다.
빈 화면에서 최종 결과물까지 전 과정을 차근차근 배웁니다.
기초부터 제대로 이해하면서 최종 결과물까지 도달하게 됩니다.
몇 번이고 반복해서 영상을 시청하실 수 있어요.


② 재미없는 강의는 싫어요! 재밌게 배우자!
공부하는 것이 아니라 노는 것처럼, 완성 과정에서 자연스럽게 툴을 습득합니다.
기능 위주가 아닌 '결과물' 위주로 배워갑니다.


③ 피그마 기능만? nono! 실무 협업과정 전체를 알려드려요!
와이어프레임 제작부터 기획안 작성, 디자인, 프로토타이핑까지 모바일 서비스 디자인 실무를 총체적으로 다뤄봅니다.


④ 수업을 듣고나면 이런걸 만들 수 있어요 ∨
와이어프레임
UI 기획안
모바일 서비스 디자인
프로토타이핑
협업 꿀팁까지!




4. 강의 듣는 법


강의는 매 회차 실습으로 구성되어 있습니다.
먼저 1~2회 이상 눈으로 시청한 뒤 실습해보시기를 권장드립니다.


이렇게 실습하면 더 재미있고 수월하게 피그마 실력을 늘리실 수 있으실거예요!
target_audience: UXUI 디자이너로 취업을 원하는 취업 준비생
UI 기획 스킬이 필요한 기획자, PM
디자이너와 커뮤니케이션이 필요한 PM, 기획자, 개발자 등
모바일 서비스 디자인을 경험해보고 싶은 누구나
와이어프레임 제작, 프로토타이핑 등 더 다양한 스킬을 배우고 싶은 디자이너

courses.bio: UXデザインだけでは達成できないイノベーションデザインを行うことができるとして注目されているサービスデザインについてのベーシックな知識とプロセスを解説します。

courses.description:
サービスデザインについての書籍や情報が少ないのは何故だと思いますか？
実はサービスデザインは日々進化し、サービスデザイナーによって様々なデザインメソッドやリサーチ手法が開発されています。
また、サービスデザインがカバーする範囲や役割が非常に広く、ケースバイケースで試行錯誤を繰り返す必要がある為、
メソッドやプロセスを体系化しにくく、その為「こうすれば良い」という教本的なものが作りにくい状況にあります。
そんな中、本プログラムでは必ず抑えるべき「最もベーシックな知識とプロセス」について解説します。
target_audience: 部署等が縦割りに分断されてしまい、顧客体験の流れ自体も分断されていると感じるプロダクト・サービスのビジネスオーナーや経営層
UXの改善計画に行き詰まりを感じているUXデザイナー・エンジニア
自社のプロダクト・サービスが良いものだと確信しているが、どのように包括的にブランド設計を進めていけばよいかわからない経営者や事業計画者の方
自社のコンピタンス（強み）から新たなイノベーションサービスを開発したいと思う経営者や事業計画者の方

This course is designed for anyone who is interested to learn more about UX research and design
What  you will learn:

...and more!
Contents and Overview
You'll start with What is evaluative research; Methods and Usability testing; There's a big difference between making a simple product and making a product sim; Concept validation; The best kind of design is a process dynamic and adaptable; The best kind of design is a process of dynamic and adaptable; Heuristic Evaluation; Heuristic evaluation - What, Why, How, What, Where; What is good design means and card sorting; Different methods of card sorting and another quote of good information; Best practices for evaluative research.
Then you will learn about What is synthesis; What is thematic analysis and when to use thematic analysis; Example of thematic analysis; Example of thematic analysis - Step 1; Example of thematic analysis - Step 2; Example of thematic analysis - Step 3; Example of thematic analysis - Step 4 and 5; Example of thematic analysis - Step 6 and 7.
We will also cover Types of research - Qualitative and Quantitative research; Qualitative research; Generative research; Qualitative research; Evaluative research; Qualitative research; Data analysis and statistics.
This course will also tackle What is design thinking and What the process looks like; Implementing the Design Thinking Process; How does research fit into the design thinking process.
We'll also talk about Respondent sourcing and engagement; What is a participant?; What is the right time to start thinking about participants?; Who to consider when sourcing participants and target market; Screening the right participants; Step 1; Define Your criteria and Screening process for quantitative studies; Step 2; Pick up the right participants; Step 3; Describe your screener; Step 4 - Write your screening questions; Step 5 - Order your questions; Step 6 - Incentives; Step 7 - Creating your Screener and other factors of it; Virtual Session Considerations.
Then, What is research bias and Identifying bias in research; Types of biases; Tips to avoid biases.
And finally, What is Generative research; Module of design research and the UX research process; Generated research methods use; What are Diary Studies; Diary studies best practices; What is concept validation; Concept validation best practices; What is user reviews; User review best practices; What are Focus groups and some famous quotes; Focus groups best practices.

requirements: No prior design experience needed. Just bring curiosity and a laptop — I’ll guide you from zero to confident UI building in Figma.
courses.description:
Want to learn how to design clean, functional user interfaces using Figma — without getting overwhelmed?

In this beginner-friendly crash course, I’ll guide you step-by-step through Figma’s most essential tools and workflows. Whether you’re new to UI design or transitioning from another platform, this class gives you the confidence and clarity to start designing like a pro.

We’ll cover:


Navigating the Figma interface
Using auto-layouts for responsive design
Creating components and reusable styles
Applying layout grids
Exporting assets for real-world use


You’ll apply your new skills in a hands-on project, where we’ll design a full Sign Up screen for a travel app — complete with input fields, buttons, a logo, and social sign-in.


This class is practical, fast-paced, and no-fluff. Just the essentials that matter.

By the end of this course, you’ll:


Understand how to work inside Figma with confidence
Design your first UI screen from scratch
Build a solid foundation for future design projects


This course is designed with beginners in mind, but even if you have some experience with design tools, you’ll benefit from the clarity and structure provided here. My goal is to make learning UI design feel approachable, rewarding, and fun.


Whether you’re looking to break into tech, work on freelance projects, or improve your design workflow, this course gives you the starting point you need.

objectives: UI/UX改善をするための心構えやプロセスを学ぶことが出来ます。

requirements: 初歩的なPC操作スキル。
UI/UXを学びたいという意欲。
courses.description:
サービスを提供する上で、サイトやアプリのUI/UXはかかせないものです。
サイトやアプリを作る際、UI/UXが疎かになってしまうことでユーザーは使いづらいと感じてしまい、せっかく良いサービスをリリースしても離れてしまいます。


UI/UXとは、「ユーザーがもっと使いやすい・見やすいサイトやアプリ」をUIといい、「ユーザーが満足してまた使いたくなるような体験」をUXといいます。（この講座内でもっと詳しく解説します）


実際に自分が行っている業務でも、新しくサイトやアプリのデザインを新規で制作するよりも、既存のサービスを改善するためのUI/UXのサイトやアプリのリニューアルをしたいと企業から相談を受けるケースが多いと感じています。
なぜ、こんな事を求められるかというと、競合サービスが有る中で自分のサービスは「ユーザーがもっと使いやすい・見やすいサイトやアプリ（UI）」にして「ユーザーが満足してまた使いたくなるような体験（UX）」を与えることで、リピーターや申込数を増やしたいという狙いがあるからです。


しかし、それを改善するには「ユーザーの声」はもちろんのこと、「サービスの理解と課題の洗い出し」「チームとの共通理解と共通言語化」「提案するための資料作成」「UI/UX制作や開発業務」など、行うことは山積みです。
そんな中で改善の進め方がうまく行かないと、改善を試しては結果につながらず、右往左往して時間の無駄になってしまいます。


では、どうすればよいか？
結論から言うと、UI/UX改善をするためには必ず目的（課題解決案）と骨子（プロトタイプ）が必要になります。
ここがブレてしまうと改善の成果が見られないまま、労力や時間のコストに見合わない結果になりがちです。


本コースでは、改善の進め方に必要な「課題の洗い出し」や「フレームワークを使ったフロー」「制作ツール」などを紹介して、誰でも効率の良い改善提案ができるプロセスを学ぶことが出来ます！


そして、今やUI/UX改善はデザイナーだけが行うものではありません。
改善において必要な共通言語や方向性（ベクトル）などをあわせないと、言葉が伝わらないためにチームとして機能せず、かつ、エンジニアやデザイナーが主導になったシステム周りだけが改善して偏りができ、最終的にはユーザーの気持ちを置いてけぼりになったUI/UXが実装されるということになりやすいからです。
チームで理解や提案できないものは、ユーザーにも到底理解できませんよね。
なので、チーム全員で改善に取り組めるように、チームも最適化していく必要があります。


これからデザイン改善を行うデザイナーだけではなく、改善に携わる全ての方にわかりやすいような解説を心がけて作成しておりますので、是非ご覧いただけたらと思います。
target_audience: サービス改善を担ったが、どのようにして取り組めばよいかわからないデザイナー以外の業種の方々。

Módulo V - Prototipos Digitales De Alta: Primeros pasos con el UI KIT

requirements: No necesitas conocimientos previos, !Solo una actitud de aprender!
courses.description:
Un buen diseño de prototipos es fundamental para el desarrollo de una aplicación móvil que genere un alto impacto y deseabilidad en tu público objetivo. Los prototipos son parte fundamental en el mundo de desarrollo de las Apps, ya que te permite aprender rápido y ahorrar dinero en la implementación al construir algo que realmente funcione para tu usuario final.


Este curso está orientado a introducirte en el diseño de aplicaciones móviles a través de un paso previo al desarrollo técnico en sí, la fase del prototipado. Aquí aprenderás los fundamentos de la experiencia de usuario (UX), patrones de diseño de UI y a diseñar una estrategia para la construcción de prototipos que involucren dos puntos principales en toda creación de productos digitales: Las necesidades y la experiencia del usuario.


En este curso tendrás el conocimiento para evolucionar tu idea de App desde cero y lo haremos utilizando herramientas para cada una de las 3 etapas evolutivas de un prototipo:
Marvel: para aprender a aterrizar las primeras ideas con tu equipo de trabajo.
Proto IO: Para las pruebas con usuarios y comunicación de la visión del aplicativo con el equipo de desarrollo.
Figma: Una aplicación que está revolucionando el mercado debido a sus características colaborativas, que además te permite crear prototipos de muy alta fidelidad, capaces de entregar una visión exacta de cómo se verá el producto final a tus principales stakeholders o inversores.
target_audience: Desarrolladores de apps
Interesados en llevar a la realidad sus propias apps
Interesados en aprender sobre UX/UI
Emprendedores que desean construir sus apps

objectives: 網頁設計組成與規範

requirements: 使用工具：photoshop、sketch、Axure
courses.description:
隨著網路深入生活，許多企業也日益注重網路行銷，在網頁設計中，因為品牌類型、設計主題、設計用途的不同，所設計出的網頁、呈現的風格也截然不同。


作為界面設計師，網頁視覺的設計同樣也是必備的技能之一，想掌握網頁設計的核心，就一定不能錯過這個課程！


本套課程將全面系統的學習網頁基礎常識、設計規範、案例分析、原型設計、視覺輸出、包裝等內容，真正意義上從零開始學習網頁設計（不包含前端代碼學習），讓學員擁有獨立完成規範化網頁設計技能


課程一共有12節課，由淺入深，附有9個網頁實戰練習，令你掌握網頁設計的核心，相信你學完整個課程很快可以做出屬於自己的作品。
target_audience: UI設計師
平面設計師
網頁設計師

requirements: Não é necessário nenhum conhecimento prévio de design ou da ferramenta do Figma, neste curso o aluno será conduzido desde o básico até o avançado.
courses.description:
Seja bem vindo ao curso PROFIGMA WEB!


Este curso foi criado com a intenção de conduzir o aluno do básico ao avançado para prototipação de landing pages e sistemas web responsivos.


Você aprenderá a desenvolver com o Figma a XP Zone, uma landing page incrível e responsiva, onde o usuário poderá saber como funciona o projeto, após criar seu cadastro o usuário entrará no sistema da XP Zone, uma plataforma de gamers para troca e venda de jogos na região.


Reservei esse espaço para pessoas que são sedentas por inovação, pessoas que não querem o mesmo, mas querem ir além e assim como eu, pensam em impactar o mundo e melhorar a vida das pessoas.
Não quero só te ensinar ferramentas e propriedades do Figma, não quero só criar sistemas "Bonitinhos", quero que você crie experiências únicas em aplicações e sistemas. Então se optar em começar esse curso, arregace as mangas, prepare várias garrafas de café e vamos juntos inovar em um mundo de possibilidades infinitas.


Sobre o professor:


Head of designer com mais de 8 anos de experiência no mercado, bacharel em Marketing e Design pela Universidade Paulista de Jundiaí. Participou e foi responsável pela criação de todo o design UI e UX dos bancos digitais Pride Bank, Impact Bank e trabalha a 4 anos como Head of Designer na empresa Welight Tecnologia S.A e Impact Bank.


Durante o curso o aluno irá passar por todas as ferramentas do Figma, incluindo os novos recursos da CONFIG 2023, onde tivemos diversos updates na ferramenta, como variables, wrap, autolayout etc.

courses.description:
من السهل ابتكار فكرة جديدة لتطبيق جديد سريع الانتشار ، ولكن ليس من السهل تحويل هذا التطبيق إلى حقيقة - أو هكذا قد تعتقد. وهنا يأتي دور Figma. تعد Figma أداة تصميم UI / UX تعاونية مجانية يمكنها مساعدتك في تصميم مجموعة واسعة من الواجهات بتفاصيل رائعة - ونحن هنا لتعليمك كيفية القيام بذلك.


من خلال الدورة هنتعلم أساسيات ومبادئ تجربة وواجهة المستخدم وتعريف الفرق بين الأثنين. والخوض في تجربة جديدة ومعرفة طريقة التعامل مع المعطيات الخاصة بتجربة المستخدم واستخدام البرامج المناسبة لتنفيذ تصميم المنتج واخراجه بالشكل الذي يتناسب مع جودة سوق العمل.
سيشمل الكورس تصميم مشروع من البداية. تجهيز الأيقونات والصور، وكيفية التعامل معها بأفضل طريقة ممكنة.


هنتعلم في الكورس دة
- معرفة الفرق بين تجربة وواجهة المستخدم (UIUX)
- كيفية حفظ المشاريع ومشاركتها مع المطورين
- كيف تكتب التعليقات داخل البرنامج
- كيف تعمل المكونات
- كيفية إنشاء نموذج أولي وإضافة تأثيرات بين الصفحات
- كيف تعمل المتغيرات
- صمم مشروعًا من البداية إلى النهاية
- كيفية إنشاء مساحة عمل وإنشاء صفحات
- تعرف على كل الأدوات الممكنة بشكل منفصل وتعرف على الاختصارات
- اضافة ايقونات وصور للمشروع المتضمن بالدورة لسهولة التدريب
- كيفية تحضير الايقونات والصور
- معرفة نظرية الالوان
- مراحل تجربة المستخدم
- التعرف على واجهة تطبيق فيجما
- التعرف على الادوات
- التعرف على سوق العمل
- البدء في تنفيذ اول تطبيق
والمزيد في الدورة
بعد استكمال الدورة ستكون قادر على العمل كمستقل او ضمن شركات والمنافسة بشدة. وفقا لما تعلمته خلال الدورة
