courses.title: AI-Powered UX Design Patterns
courses.bio: Case studies, challenges and best practices
objectives: Describe key AI-powered interaction patterns like adaptive interaction, feedback loops, and human-in-the-loop systems.
Identify examples and applications of AI-powered design patterns.
Use design patterns to create personalized, engaging, and trustworthy AI solutions.
Describe challenges and best practices of designing and implementing various AI-powered design patterns.

Feedback and Learning Patterns: Corrective Feedback and Error Recovery Pattern

requirements: Previous experience in product development, UX (User Experience) design, HCI (Human-Computer Interaction), or data-driven projects can enhance your engagement in this course. However, if you do not have this experience, curiosity about how AI shapes modern products and a willingness to explore ethical and technical challenges are sufficient.
courses.description:
AI is transforming user experiences by making digital interactions smarter, adaptive, and more intuitive. This course explores AI-powered design patterns—structured approaches that leverage AI to create engaging, efficient, and human-centered digital experiences.
By understanding and applying these patterns, learners will be able to:
Describe key AI-powered interaction patterns like adaptive interaction, feedback loops, and human-in-the-loop systems.
Identify examples and applications of AI-powered design patterns.
Use design patterns to create personalized, engaging, and trustworthy AI solutions.
Describe challenges and best practices of designing and implementing various AI-powered design patterns.
What You Will Learn:
AI-Driven Adaptive Patterns – How AI adjusts experiences dynamically based on user behavior.
Conversational AI Patterns – Designing intuitive AI-powered chatbots and voice assistants.
Natural User Interaction - How AI help design interactions based on human behaviors.
Human-AI Collaboration – How users and AI co-create, guide, or enhance digital interactions.
Gamification & Engagement – AI-powered rewards, challenges, and social interaction strategies.
Feedback & Learning Loops – Using AI to refine and optimize interactions through continuous feedback.
Who Should Take This Course?
Designers (UX/UI, Interaction) – Enhance digital products with AI-driven interactions.
Developers – Implement AI-powered patterns in software and applications.
Product Managers – Understand AI’s impact on user engagement and strategy.
Researchers & Educators – Explore cutting-edge AI interaction design methodologies.
By the end of this course, you’ll have a deep understanding of AI-powered interaction design patterns and be able to apply them in real-world applications across various industries.
target_audience: designers (UI/UX, product, interaction), developers, product managers, researchers and educators.

requirements: Basic understanding of UI/UX design concepts is helpful but not required

courses.description:
This course is designed for UI/UX professionals and aspiring designers who want to work more efficiently by integrating AI into their design workflow. Learn clear, step-by-step methods to leverage AI for user research, idea generation, wireframing, and microcopy - all within practical, real-world scenarios.
Discover how AI tools like Figma plugins, Canva AI, Uizard, and ChatGPT can save time during foundational design tasks.
Follow hands-on demonstrations and actionable examples that show how to translate business or user needs into research, concepts, and UI layouts - using both AI and your own creative judgment.
Understand key principles for crafting and refining AI prompts to get usable results for visual design, accessibility, and user flows.
See how to automate repetitive processes, improve accessibility, and boost consistency across your projects.
Learn practical techniques for reviewing, editing, and applying AI-generated outputs to maintain professional, high-quality standards in every deliverable.
Who This Course Is For
UI/UX designers (beginner to intermediate) looking to build a streamlined, modern workflow
Product designers or freelancers seeking to increase speed and reduce manual overhead in daily tasks
Anyone wanting hands-on practice with AI features now standard in the design industry
Requirements:
Familiarity with basic UI/UX flows is helpful. No previous AI experience or coding knowledge is necessary.
By the end of this course, you’ll be able to integrate AI as a practical productivity tool in your daily work - improving project outcomes and freeing up more time for creative problem solving.
target_audience: Beginner and junior UI/UX designers wanting to improve speed and efficiency using AI
Freshers entering the design industry looking for practical AI implementation in their design work

Anyone curious about integrating AI into the creative process without expensive tools

courses.description:
In today's digital age, building an online presence for your business or personal brand is more important than ever. With Adobe XD, you can design and prototype interfaces for web and mobile that are both visually stunning and easy to use. This course is designed to take you from a beginner to a confident user of Adobe XD. You'll start by learning the basics of UI design and prototyping, then work your way up to creating polished designs that are both functional and visually appealing. With step-by-step tutorials and hands-on projects, you'll gain practical experience in creating user interfaces, wireframes, and interactive prototypes. Plus, you'll learn how to collaborate with other designers and developers to turn your designs into a reality.

The basics of Adobe XD and its interface

How to create wireframes and design interfaces for web and mobile

Collaboration with other designers and developers to turn your designs into reality.
Who this course is for: This course is perfect for beginners who want to learn UI design and prototyping using Adobe XD. It's also suitable for those who want to switch from other design tools to Adobe XD or expand their design skills.
By the end of this course, you'll have a strong foundation in UI design and prototyping with Adobe XD, which will help you create user-friendly, visually stunning interfaces and prototypes that stand out in today's competitive digital landscape.
Enroll now and take the first step towards becoming an Adobe XD pro!

courses.description:
UX und UI-Design für den Erfolg deines Projekts
Das Design deiner App oder deiner Website bestimmt den Erfolg deines Produkts grundlegend mit. In diesem Kurs lernst du, wie du eine perfekte User Experience erreichst und der Besucher zu deinem Stammkunden wird. Du lernst die durchdachte Verwendung von HTML, CSS und Javascript. Mit genialem, aber simplem Web Design kannst du jede Webseite und App mit wichtigen UI- & UX-Funktionen versehen.
Eine durchdacht gestaltete Benutzeroberfläche (User Interface) für Webseite oder App verleiht deinem Projekt eine gute User Experience. In diesem Kurs lernst du alles über diese zwei Themen, wofür Sie gebraucht werden, wie du Sie erfolgreich umsetzt und vieles mehr.

courses.description:
Requirements:
You'll need an account with Figma FigJam or Miro. A free plan is available for both.
No previous design sprint, design thinking, UX research or UX Design/UI Design experience is needed.
No previous FigJam or Miro skills or design experience required.
No previous experience conducting or participating in design sprints.


Description:
Hi, I'm Teresa Cain, an award winning author, speaker and expert on design sprints and want to introduce you to concept of 2 hour design sprints. Many organizations have based their own design thinking process from Stanford's Design Thinking Method or using Google and Jake Knapp’s 5 Day process from the book “Sprint: How to Solve Big Problems and Test New Ideas in Just Five Days”. However, 5 day design sprints have had its challenges during the Covid-19 pandemic including the ability to conduct a remote design sprint using the same process effectively, loss of productive time and the ability to collaborate with multiple stakeholders in one room.
The adaptation of technology firms to 2 hour design sprints teaches organizations, product managers, researchers and designers how to adapt to a 2 hour process derived from design thinking and design sprint methods to increase the frequency and speed of solving small and medium problems whether virtual or in-person, while still using the 5 day design sprint method to solve large or complex problems.
I spent over 36 months teaching, testing and implementing this concept at organizations and conferences around the world, and released a #1 Bestseller and #1 New Release book in Business Technology Innovation on Amazon called Solving Problems in 2 Hours: How to Brainstorm and Create Solutions with Two Hour Design Sprints on what I learned and how organizations can succeed using shorter design sprint methods.
I created an on-demand training in Udemy for UX researchers, product managers, designers or any organization looking to keep their roadmap on track or get ahead of competitors by using problem solving techniques that allow you to solution and implement features faster. 2 hour design sprints can help teams deliver value driven features to clients faster by simplifying traditional methods. Learn how 2 hour design sprints can help you accelerate your product roadmap today.
Learn:
The benefits of a 2 hour design sprint
When to use 2 hour design vs 5 day design sprints
How to execute a 2 hour design sprint using FigJam or Miro
How to use ChatGPT to accelerate design sprint preparation
How to solve problems at your organization using 2 hour design sprints
How to moderate a 2 hour design sprint as a product manager, researcher, designer or engineer
How to validate roadmap features quicker and get stakeholder buy-in
How to train your team to run design sprints in FigJam or Miro
What's Included:
Receive the tools and a step-by-step instruction on running your own 2 hour design sprint:
Over 120 minutes of Training Videos
2 hour design sprint template
Demonstration on how to setup and conduct a 2 hour design sprint
Resources, tips, tools and podcasts
Assignments and quizzes
Who this Course is for:
Anyone who wants to start using FigJam or Miro as a collaborative whiteboard tool for workshops
Anyone who writes user stories or requirements for a backlog
Anyone who wants to solve problems for their customers or users
Anyone who conducts user research or usability testing
Anyone who is in the field of user experience, product manager and UI UX Design
Aimed at those who have not conducted design sprints, conducted design sprints, or would like to use a new method to accelerate user feedback and integrated design methods

User Experience Designers
UX Researchers
Design Managers
Scrum Masters

Sensory Design Mastery:

Semantics vs. Semiotics:
Differentiate between semantics and semiotics, enhancing your design language to convey meaning effectively and create products that resonate with users on a profound level.

courses.description:
Course Description:
Unveil the intricate world of Emotional Design through our comprehensive course, "EmotionCraft: Mastering the Art of Emotional Design." This transformative journey empowers students to delve into the nuanced realm of emotional product creation, unraveling the symbiotic relationship between cognition and emotions. With a focus on three distinct emotional levels – Western, Behavior, and Reflective – this course is a gateway to understanding the profound impact emotions have on design.
Course Highlights:
Meaningful Emotion Design: Gain a profound understanding of emotional design, exploring its implications on products, services, graphics, and systems, transcending mere functionality.
Cognition vs. Emotions Clarified: Illuminate the distinctions between emotions and cognition, navigating decision-making processes across visit, behavior, and reflective levels, all through real-time examples and illustrative flowcharts.
Narrative Impact on Buying Decisions: Explore why people make emotional decisions based on narrative storytelling attached to products, transcending the dichotomy of form and function.
Emotions in B2B Decision-Making: Discover the surprising influence of emotions on B2B buying decisions, backed by real-time statistics and a comprehensive understanding of emotional dynamics.
Pleasure-Centric Design Influence: Uncover the power of pleasurable experience design in influencing peak experiences, aligning with Maslow's Hierarchy principles of self-actualization and self-esteem.
Illustrative Examples of Good and Bad Designs: Learn from a rich array of examples showcasing both good and bad emotional designs, dissected with visuals for enhanced comprehension.
Metaphorical Design Attributes: Delve into the world of metaphorical emotional design, exploring how product attributes, such as the iconic Charles and Ray Eames chair, influence metaphorical resemblance and user selection.
Subjectivity of Emotional Colors: Explore the subjective nature of emotional colors in different cultural and contextual contexts, fostering a rough understanding that encourages internalization by students.
Material Selection and Emotions: Investigate how different materials evoke a spectrum of emotions, engaging in a simple yet powerful one-minute exercise to grasp the emotional impact of touch and feel.
Class Project for Practical Application: Engage in a hands-on class project involving 10 different products, encouraging students to communicate emotions through their design decisions. This project aids in sensitizing students to the intricate process of product design, fostering the development of their signature style.
Embark on this enlightening journey with "EmotionCraft," where the fusion of design and emotions creates a profound impact on the way we perceive, interact, and connect with the world of products.


Courtesy,
Dr. FAK Noble Ai Researcher, Scientists, Product Developer, Innovator & Pure Consciousness Expert
Founder of Noble Transformation Hub TM

courses.description:
Visily is a UI design tool for non-designers that enables teams, regardless of size and skills, to brainstorm and create beautiful app wireframes. It is the most accessible UI design software on the market focused on supporting all team sizes, from solo entrepreneurs and founders right through to growth teams of multiple people. Any team member can create designs as designers or non-designers, allowing founders, entrepreneurs, product managers, and developers to design beautiful app wireframes through an intuitive user experience, rich template library, and advanced AI features. Visily is exciting as it saves early startups time and money but also opens up the potential to any founders as no technical background is required to get the most out of the tool.
This course will cover user interface designing using the powerful tools within Visily. In the first section, I'll cover the Visily interface, where you can find powerful tools like AI Sketch-to-Design and AI Screenshot-to-Design feature unique to Visily. You can turn screenshots into customizable mockup designs. This feature is ideal when you are researching your design and want to bring different inspiration sources. I'll also go over team collaboration and how you can use Visily to work closely with others in the same project.
Later on I will guide you through designing and prototyping a "Food Delivery" App which will include multiple artboards, custom icon on Visily library, and everything else you need to create a polished realistic design.
Please join me as a Non-Designer in design or as a UI/UX designer wanting to switch from other tools like Figma or Adobe XD

Önceden bir bilgi gerektirmeyen bu kurs, yeni başlayanlar için idealdir ve mevcut tasarım becerilerini geliştirmek isteyen herkes için uygundur. Kursun sonunda, kullanıcı ihtiyaçlarını karşılayan ve estetik açıdan etkileyici arayüzler oluşturabilecek donanıma sahip olacaksınız.
Kurs, UI/UX tasarım temelleri ile başlayarak, kullanıcı deneyimi ve arayüz tasarımının temel prensiplerini anlamanızı sağlayacaktır. Renk teorisi dersinde, renklerin psikolojik etkileri ve tasarımdaki pratik kullanımlarını keşfedeceksiniz. Renklerin duygusal yanını ve etkisini öğrenerek tasarımlarınıza katacağınız derinlik ile estetik açıdan güçlü projeler geliştirebilirsiniz.
Tipografi konusunu ele alarak, yazı stilleri, yazı tipleri ve metin hiyerarşisi hakkında bilgi sahibi olacaksınız. Ayrıca, UX yasaları aracılığıyla kullanıcı davranışlarını yönlendiren temel tasarım prensiplerini öğrenerek, kullanıcı deneyimini daha etkili hale getireceksiniz.
Kullanıcı araştırması yaparak hedef kitle analizi ve kullanıcı personelarının oluşturulmasını öğrenmek, kullanıcı odaklı tasarım için kritik bir aşama olacaktır. Son olarak, etkileşim tasarımı konusuyla kullanıcı akışları ve etkileşimli öğelerin tasarımına odaklanarak pratik becerilerinizi geliştirecek, öğrendiğiniz teorik bilgileri uygulamaya dönüştüreceksiniz.
Bu içerik, katılımcılara kapsamlı bir tasarım anlayışı kazandırmayı ve onları UI/UX tasarım alanında donanımlı bireyler haline getirmeyi hedefliyor.
target_audience: Bu kurs, UI/UX tasarımına ilgi duyan, yeni başlayanlar ve kariyerine tasarım ekleyerek geliştirmek isteyenler için idealdir. Grafik tasarımcılar, yazılımcılar ve dijital ürün tasarımı alanında uzmanlaşmak isteyen profesyoneller için de uygundur. Tasarım dünyasına sağlam bir başlangıç yapmak veya mevcut becerilerini geliştirmek isteyen herkes bu kursun içeriğinden fayda sağlayacaktır.
Katılmak için önceden herhangi bir bilgiye veya deneyime sahip olmanız gerekmiyor; yeni başlayanlar için tasarlandı.
Motivasyon ve yaratıcılık, bu yolculukta en büyük yardımcınız olacak.

courses.description:
Empezando con Figma (3.5 horas)
Un curso para principiantes en diseño UX/UI con Figma
Este curso es una introducción completa a Figma, desde un principiante absoluto hasta las funciones avanzadas. Corto y enfocado, proporcionándote todo lo que necesitas saber para abordar cualquier diseño.
Comenzaremos desde cero configurando tu cuenta de Figma y familiarizándonos con su estructura de archivos. Luego, nos sumergiremos en los fundamentos de Figma, como configurar marcos y anidarlos, agregar formas, texto, colores y cuadrículas, y crear diseños de UI sólidos. Una vez que te sientas cómodo con lo básico, profundizaremos en temas más avanzados como la creación de diseños de UI sólidos y trabajar con componentes para elementos reutilizables.
Aprenderás cómo establecer estilos y variables para la consistencia, crear diseños responsivos con diseño automático y agregar prototipos básicos para dar vida a tus diseños, siempre teniendo en cuenta la colaboración con el desarrollo.
Con ejercicios paso a paso y valiosos consejos y trucos, te convertirás en un experto en Figma en menos de 4 horas. Es perfecto para principiantes o aquellos que cambian de otro software de diseño como Sketch o Adobe XD a Figma.

courses.description:
2023 Edition.
You've just landed on Udemy's highest rated course on user experience (UX). Thousands of user researchers and designers have used this course to kick-start their career in UX. You can do it, too.
Gain hands-on practice in all the key areas of UX — from interviewing your users through to prototyping and usability testing your designs.
Build a UX portfolio to boost your job prospects as you complete five real-world sample projects.
Gain industry-recognised certification by preparing for the BCS Foundation Certificate in User Experience.
UX Mastery reviewed dozens of online courses in UX, but they gave just one course 10/10: this one.
Build Your UX Portfolio As You Work Through 5 User Research and Design Projects.
The sample projects in the course include:
Find my pet: a product that allows people to track down wayward pets who have got lost.
Tomorrow’s shopping cart: a device that lets customers find any product in a supermarket.
Gift Giver, a gift recommendation system based on an extremely accurate product recommendation technology.
The Citizen Journalist: a system that will allow ordinary people to film events, take photographs, write a story and create a crowdsourced, online newspaper.
The Digital Postcard, an app that will allow users to create and send their own postcard, either by using a photograph they have taken on their phone, or by selecting a professionally taken image of a local beauty spot.


A career in User Experience is one of the most rewarding and challenging jobs in the technology sector. This online training course will give you the background you need to get started.
Prepare for the BCS Foundation Certificate in User Experience.
This course covers the comprehensive syllabus for the BCS Foundation Certificate in User Experience and contains 90 multiple-choice quiz questions to test your knowledge and prepare for the exam. You can take the exam (at extra cost) anywhere in the world at a Pearson Vue exam centre.
Free bonus offer!
Free bonus #1: A 81-page student workbook packed with design exercises, tutorials on UX methods, templates to record user research observations, stencils for UI prototypes, a detailed reading list and a glossary of terms..
Free bonus #2: A 417-page, high quality PDF that contains every slide shown on the course. Print this out, load it on your mobile device or keep it handy on your computer: it's your choice.
Free bonus #3: A written transcript of every lecture. Comprising 231 pages and 89,236 words, this document is useful if English isn’t your native language or if you just want a readable and searchable version of the course.
Free bonus #4: 90 multiple-choice quiz questions to test your knowledge as you progress through the course.
Free bonus #5: Access to our thriving Facebook group where you can network with fellow students, ask questions and submit assignments for peer review.


Download everything. If you have a slow internet connection, or want to take this course with you on your laptop, smartphone or other portable device, sign up and download all the videos and other course materials now.
When does it start?
Today! This is a self-paced course, so you can start anytime and view the lectures anywhere. Sign up now and you could be watching the first video in under 5 minutes.
How long will it take?
With over 140 lectures and 9 hours of content, this is the most in-depth course on UX you'll find on Udemy. If you allocate 60-90 mins a day, and do all of the activities, it will take 2-3 weeks to complete. And if you want to spread the course out over a longer period, that’s fine too.
Is it for me?
This course is for you if you want to get hands-on practice in all the stages of user experience. Perhaps you’re starting out in the field of user experience. Or maybe you want to transition from your current job role to a career in UX. Whatever your background, you’ll apply your skills to a real world project that will become the first entry in your UX portfolio.
What if I get stuck?
As you move through each of the steps in the design process, you’ll be able to test your knowledge and compare your work with other students so you can see what “good” looks like. I review the course forum every day and I answer all student questions within 24 hours. So if you struggle with any of the material, just ask a question and I'll help you out.
Can’t I learn this stuff from a book?
It’s certainly possible to build your user experience expertise by reading books and blog posts, but that can be a slow process and it makes it hard to see the big picture. With this workshop, it’s you and me together working for a client, and I’m giving you the same tips, the same advice, and sharing the same techniques I’ve learned over the years on hundreds of design projects.
What if I don't like it?
Over 17,000 people have taken this online course and over 90% of students give it 4 or 5 stars, so I'm confident that you'll love this course. Just in case, I offer a 30-day, no questions asked, money-back guarantee. So sign up today, it's risk free!
Kick start your career in user experience with this 12-hour, online, video training course.
target_audience: Anyone who wants to transition from their current job role to a career in user experience.

Web site designers who want to understand the principles of human-centred design.
Marketing managers who want to find out about the business and brand benefits of user experience.
Business analysts who want quick and effective tools for communicating requirements of users.

courses.description:
Pada course ini akan lebih difokuskan pada perancangan user-interface, Human Centered Design, Metode Design Thinking, menciptakan user personal, point of view, panduan praktis membuat how might we statement, affinity diagram, pembuatan wireframe menggunakan Figma, pembuatan high fidelity prototyping menggunakan Figma, konsep user research, menentukan usability metric dan testing.
User Interface (UI) Designer tidak bisa dipisahkan dengan User Experience (UX) Designer. UI Designer memiliki tugas menentukan tampilan aplikasi dan/atau situs. Sementara UX Designer menentukan bagaimana suatu aplikasi dan/atau situs bisa beroperasi dengan mudah. Tapi dalam bekerja, keduanya harus berlandaskan pada hasil riset supaya aplikasi dan/atau situs yang dirancang benar-benar efektif.
Adapun beberapa topik yang akan dipelajari yaitu:
Pengantar Interaksi Manusia dan Komputer
Design Thinking
Define & Ideate Process
User Flow & Wireframe
Fundamental of UI Designs & Design System
Praktik UI (Figma)
Prototyping
User Research
Course ini tidak memiliki prasyarat ilmu yang harus dikuasai. Sehingga sangat cocok untuk Anda yang tertarik dengan bidang ataupun karir di bidang UI dan UX.
Keberadaan User Interface (UI) dan User Experience (UX) Designer semakin dibutuhkan beberapa waktu belakangan. Salah satu alasannya karena banyak perusahaan yang mulai menggunakan platform mobile dan situs untuk perkembangan bisnis.
Dengan mengikuti course ini diharapkan peserta memiliki pengetahuan yang mumpuni untuk membuat dan mengembangkan produk teknologi yang dibutuhkan oleh user sehingga dapat memulai untuk membangun karir di bidang UI and UX. Selamat mengikuti course ini.

requirements: The main requirements for this course are Mac computer, installation of Xcode and the SF Symbols App from Apple. Students can use their favorite design tool such as Sketch, Adobe XD, Figma, Zeplin, InVision Inspect and Material Gallery. A section of the course also requires using Xcode Playgrounds on the iPad for building iOS interfaces. The other requirements for this course are your curiosity and willingness to learn new skills to make things.
courses.description:
Welcome to Design With SwiftUI. Learn to design with SwiftUI using the official Apple SwiftUI documentation, Human Interface Guidelines, cloning iOS, and visionOS system-wide designs from Apple. In this course, you will discover how to create great and beautiful designs with SwiftUI, allowing you to explore many design ideas. You will incorporate SwiftUI design best practices and workflow into your design process and use the same tool (Xcode) iOS, watchOS, and visionOS engineers use in building great apps. In particular, this is an excellent resource for busy developers who have not had time to learn how the SwiftUI layout system works. For designers, it will help you build modern interfaces and on-device demos that engineers can test immediately.
If you are a designer, this course removes and substitutes the old and traditional way of working with developers. Design in Figma or Sketch and hand it off to a developer. The modern way is to design in SwiftUI (Xcode) to see hardware and platform capabilities rather than waiting for a developer to tell you what is possible and what is not possible.


COURSE AIMS
SwiftUI is easy and approachable by anyone. Instead of building throw-away prototypes, SwiftUI helps you create and ship what you have designed. This course aims to help designers make technical decisions around app structure, functionality, and appearance so that developers can implement those decisions easily. It also helps you design iOS interfaces using the same frameworks and technologies for building actual iOS, watchOS, and visionOS apps. For developers, it helps you build gorgeous-looking UIs to focus on the backend and functionality.


MY PROMISE
I can assure you, the boundaries of amazing designs and user interfaces you can create with SwiftUI are non-existent.


ABOUT ME
Hi, I am Amos. I am an iOS Developer Advocate living in Finland. I have an educational background in Design and Human-Computer Interaction. Since 2019, I have chosen to build animations, designs, and interactions with nothing but SwiftUI. Join me to do the same.
target_audience: SwiftUI beginers
User interface designers
App designers
App developers
User interface prototypers
Anyone who wants to learn how to design with SwiftUI
Designers who want to learn how to design with code
Anyone who wants to learn SwiftUI design best practices

courses.description:
Embark on a transformative journey with "Cultural Chronicles," a course that delves deep into the mastery of design documentation, focusing on the preservation of indigenous practices and the intricate craft of horse doll making. Explore the vital skills required for thorough documentation, from research methodologies to effective communication through photos and videos. This course not only imparts technical expertise but also emphasizes the empathetic engagement needed to understand and document the social, economic, and cultural fabric of communities.
Key Highlights:
Holistic Documentation Skills: Acquire comprehensive skills for design documentation, mastering the art of creating detailed reports using visual elements, including pictures and videos, for effective storytelling.
Intuitive Topic Selection: Learn how to choose indigenous topics with precision, considering the qualification of a craft or the urgency of preserving dying practices. Benefit from insights gained through real-world experiences, including lessons learned from mistakes.
IDEO Design Thinking Application: Apply IDEO design thinking principles to extract meaningful primary and secondary information from communities practicing indigenous crafts. Develop a strategic approach that encompasses asking, listening, speaking, and observing.
Sustainable Farming Practices: Explore sustainable farming practices, including permaculture principles, through vivid pictures and detailed documentation. Understand the intricate balance of nurturing ecosystems while maintaining clean and sustainable agricultural setups.
One-Man Forest Revolution: Uncover the inspiring story of an individual who ignited a one-man revolution, creating a large-scale forest system. Gain insights into how such endeavors can motivate and inspire the next generation.
Craft Making Unveiled: Dive into the intricacies of craft making, from initial stages like cutting textiles to final ornamentation. Witness the step-by-step journey through detailed documentation, complemented by visuals and explanatory notes.
Empathetic Community Engagement: Develop the skills to empathize and engage with indigenous communities, unraveling their histories, livelihoods, education, and aspirations. Gain a profound understanding of the community's context for more insightful documentation.
"Horse Making Dolls" Unraveled: Focus on the captivating craft of "Horse Making Dolls," documenting the entire process from creation to market sale. Explore the cultural significance and economic potential embedded in this craft.
Commercialization Strategies: Engage in discussions about potential commercialization opportunities for indigenous crafts, exploring how these crafts can be transformed into marketable products to uplift community livelihoods.
Technical Mastery of Documentation: Hone essential technical skills for documentation, from proper crediting to incorporating visuals effectively. Learn to structure your documentation with precision, including prefaces, introductions, and conclusions.
Enroll in "Cultural Chronicles" to become a master of design documentation, equipped to preserve and celebrate the rich heritage of indigenous practices while developing critical skills for impactful storytelling.


Courtesy,
Dr. FAK Noble Ai Researcher, Scientists, Product Developer, Innovator & Pure Consciousness Expert
Founder of Noble Transformation Hub TM

courses.title: Emotional Design Thinking & Design Psychology Masterclass
courses.bio: A power-packed masterclass on emotional design thinking and design psychology from Starter to Guru !
objectives: Design Psychology: The roots of design psychology and its practical applications in design.
Emotional Design: How to add an emotional experience to design, how to enhance it using other elements and how to maintain design coherence.
Design Thinking: Understanding and adding an X factor appeal in design. Understanding conscious and unconscious appeal
Jargon: Terminologies of design psychology, major theories, notable cases in history, case studies which enable students to better present their case in the boardroom and offer expert opinions.
Design Evaluation: Evaluation and prediction of the potential of a designs to become a market success.

Introduction and historical perspective: Introduction to the psychological roots of design and linkage to modern design.
Anthroporphism: Anthropomorphism in fonts, colors and sounds
Practical applications: Similarity, user profiling & emotionally consistent design
The workings of the subconscious mind
Summing it all together, Writing functional and psychological design breifs

requirements: Best suited for people involved in design and marketing.

courses.description:
This course has been designed by consulting cutting edge research on the novel subjects of emotional design, design thinking and design psychology. This power packed training has the potential to give students a whole new perspective on design. All types of designers (UX, Product, Industrial, Graphic, etc..) and marketing and creative managers who have an inquisitive eye can benefit from this training. The first part of the course starts with the very origins of emotional design and psychology. The second part covers how humans connect to design. The third part practically applies all theories in design, citing cases and solved examples.
The project is a combination of various tasks covering all the video lectures.
Think & Observe 10 designs around you. Consciously try to note what sensation transference they give to the consumers. Write down at least 5 feelings per design.
Study Ford Edsel and figure out the reason for its failure from a design technology perspective.
Take any 5 products, search for a female version of the product, search for a male version and correspond them to the age, gender and status these objects have been created as.
Write down a functional design briefs, user profiles and psychological design briefs for the following items: (minimum 200 words each)
An office table
A home juicer
A handbag

requirements: Accessibility for Everyone This course is designed to be inclusive, welcoming individuals from all backgrounds.
Encouraging Self-Reflection Students are encouraged to actively engage with the content by taking notes for self-reflection purposes. This practice enhances the learning experience.
No Prior Experience Required A standout feature of this course is its inclusivity – no prior experience is needed to enroll. Regardless of your background or expertise.
Simplified Learning Approach the course adopts a simplified learning approach, breaking down complex concepts into easily digestible segments.
Universally Understandable Content The language and delivery of content have been meticulously crafted to be universally understandable.
courses.description:
Welcome to "Creative Sparks," a unique program led by a seasoned Mechanical Engineer and Industrial Product Designer with over 7+ years of diverse experience across manufacturing, strategic sourcing, product design studios, UI/UX design, and research-based projects. The instructor's portfolio includes an award-winning medical device, showcasing excellence in the field.
Program Overview:
This program is your gateway to unlocking creativity and mastering design thinking for effective problem finding and ideation. In a world where design is not a formulaic process, the program adopts a hands-on, action-oriented approach, emphasizing the philosophy that true design learning happens through doing.
Key Components:
Daily 15-Minute Creative Activity: Learn a simple yet powerful 15-minute creative activity designed to fit seamlessly into your daily schedule. Explore how this short exercise can be a catalyst for consistent and painless improvement of your creativity.
Compounding Effect in Ideation: Understand the compounding effect of dedicating 15 minutes each day to creativity. Transform these short daily bursts into a repository of a hundred different ideas, emphasizing quality over quantity in problem finding and solution ideation.
Discipline in Problem-Solution Focus: Cultivate discipline in focusing the first 15 minutes on problem finding and the next 15 minutes on ideation. Learn to channel your creative energy into key rough sketches that form the basis of problem-solving.
Mindset Shift for Problem Finding: Explore the mindset shift needed for effective problem finding within the constraints of a 15-minute time frame. Dive into real-life examples and case studies that demonstrate how seemingly complex problems can be identified through this creativity exercise.
Habit Formation for Design Improvement: Develop a habit of continuous improvement in design skills. Witness the transformation as this exercise not only disciplines you to be creative but also accelerates your speed in generating and executing a multitude of ideas when working with a team.
Collaborative 30-Minute Sessions: Encourage collaborative creativity by forming networks with peers. Engage in 30-minute sessions, combining the individual 15-minute exercises for enhanced problem-solving and ideation within a supportive community.
Diverse Design Challenges: Delve into various design challenges, including product design problems, system design issues, and biomimicry solutions. Learn to extract problem statements and solutions in a focused 15-minute span, creating a subconscious programming for effective and efficient creativity.
Scientific 15-Minute Concentration Principle: Understand the science behind the 15-minute concentration principle. Discover why this duration is optimal for maintaining focus without distraction, suitable for both beginners and experts.
Embark on a journey of creative exploration and problem-solving mastery with "Creative Sparks." Elevate your design thinking skills through short yet impactful daily exercises, and witness the transformation of your creative mindset in just 15 minutes a day.


Courtesy,
Dr. FAK Noble Ai Researcher, Scientists, Product Developer, Innovator & Pure Consciousness Expert
Founder of Noble Transformation Hub TM

courses.title: UX UX & Design Thinking Experiência do Usuário em Interfaces
courses.bio: Aprenda os Princípios Essenciais de UI/UX e aplique o Design Thinking para Criar interfaces Intuitivas e Envolventes
objectives: Os alunos serão capazes de aplicar os princípios do design thinking ao processo de design de interface
Utilizar abordagens centradas no usuário, empatia, colaboração e iteração.
Os alunos irão explorar as melhores práticas e técnicas utilizadas na criação de interfaces intuitivas
Criação de interfaces intuitivas, usáveis e esteticamente agradáveis, como hierarquia visual, tipografia, cores, layout e fluxo de interação.
Os alunos irão desenvolver habilidades teóricas na criação de protótipos de baixa e alta fidelidade
Eles também aprenderão a conduzir testes de usabilidade e avaliação heurística para iterar e aprimorar suas interfaces.
Esses resultados ou objetivos de aprendizado fornecem uma visão geral das principais habilidades e conhecimentos que os alunos podem esperar ao concluir o curso

Introdução ao UI/UX e Design Thinking: Introdução ao UI/UX e Design Thinking

Novas tendências em design de interface

requirements: Não há requisitos específicos para fazer este curso. Ele foi projetado para atender tanto a iniciantes no campo de UI/UX quanto a pessoas com algum conhecimento prévio. No entanto, é recomendado que os alunos tenham familiaridade básica com o uso de computadores e navegadores da web. Ter habilidades de design gráfico ou experiência prévia em design de interface pode ser útil, mas não é obrigatório.

Além disso, os alunos devem ter acesso a um computador com conexão à internet para participar das aulas online e realizar as atividades práticas. É altamente recomendado que os alunos tenham acesso a ferramentas de design, como Sketch, Figma, Adobe XD ou outras ferramentas de prototipagem, para praticar os conceitos aprendidos durante o curso. No entanto, se os alunos não tiverem acesso a essas ferramentas, sugestões de alternativas gratuitas ou recursos adicionais serão fornecidas ao longo do curso.

O objetivo deste curso é tornar o conteúdo acessível e reduzir os obstáculos para iniciantes no campo de UI/UX. Portanto, ele foi projetado de forma a fornecer uma base sólida de conhecimento e habilidades, independentemente do nível de experiência anterior.
courses.description:
O curso "UI/UX e Design Thinking: Interfaces para Sites e Aplicativos" é um programa abrangente projetado para ajudar você a adquirir habilidades e conhecimento teórico no campo do design de interface do usuário (UI) e experiência do usuário (UX). Combinando os Princípios do Design Thinking com os conceitos fundamentais de UI/UX, este curso oferece uma oportunidade única de mergulhar no processo de criação de interfaces eficazes e centradas no usuário.


Ao longo deste curso, você explorará uma variedade de tópicos essenciais relacionados ao UI/UX e Design Thinking, começando pela compreensão dos princípios básicos e das melhores práticas no design de interfaces. Você aprenderá sobre hierarquia visual, tipografia, escolha de cores, layout, fluxo de interação e muito mais, descobrindo como aplicar esses conceitos para criar interfaces intuitivas, atraentes e funcionais.


Além disso, você será introduzido ao pensamento de design e entenderá como abordar os desafios de design de maneira centrada no usuário, considerando empatia, colaboração e iteração. Você aprenderá a realizar pesquisas e análises de usuários, criar personas, mapear jornadas do usuário e realizar testes de usabilidade, a fim de garantir que suas interfaces atendam às necessidades e expectativas dos usuários.


Durante o curso, você também explorará o design responsivo e adaptativo, descobrindo como criar interfaces que se ajustem perfeitamente a diferentes dispositivos e tamanhos de tela. Você aprenderá a priorizar o conteúdo, otimizar o desempenho e realizar testes de compatibilidade, garantindo que sua interface seja acessível e eficaz em qualquer plataforma.


Além disso, você desenvolverá habilidades teóricas na prototipagem rápida e de alta fidelidade, utilizando ferramentas populares de design para criar protótipos interativos que permitem testar e aprimorar sua interface antes da implementação.


Por fim, você será apresentado a tendências em design de interface, como microinterações, interfaces de voz, realidade aumentada e experiências imersivas e personalizadas. Você descobrirá como essas tendências estão moldando o futuro do design de interface e como incorporá-las em seus projetos para criar experiências envolventes e inovadoras.


Com a conclusão deste curso, você estará equipado com as habilidades e conhecimentos necessários para criar interfaces impactantes para sites e aplicativos. Seja você um iniciante no campo de UI/UX ou um profissional em busca de aprimoramento, este curso oferece uma base sólida para impulsionar sua carreira no design de interface do usuário.


Não espere mais! Inscreva-se agora e comece sua jornada para se tornar um designer de interface de destaque, capaz de criar experiências digitais incríveis que cativam e encantam os usuários.
target_audience: Este curso é destinado a indivíduos interessados em adquirir habilidades em UI/UX (User Interface/User Experience) e Design Thinking, com foco na criação de interfaces eficazes para sites e aplicativos. Ele foi projetado para atender a uma variedade de perfis de alunos, incluindo:

Iniciantes em UI/UX: Se você é novo no campo de UI/UX e deseja aprender os princípios fundamentais e as melhores práticas para projetar interfaces eficazes, este curso é para você. Ele fornecerá uma base sólida de conhecimento e habilidades para começar sua jornada como designer de interface.

Designers gráficos ou web designers em transição: Se você já possui experiência em design gráfico ou web design e está interessado em expandir suas habilidades para o campo de UI/UX, este curso oferece uma oportunidade para adquirir conhecimentos específicos e se familiarizar com as metodologias e abordagens de design centrado no usuário.

Desenvolvedores interessados em aprimorar sua compreensão de UI/UX: Se você é um desenvolvedor ou programador que deseja entender melhor a importância do design de interface e da experiência do usuário no desenvolvimento de sites e aplicativos, este curso irá fornecer insights valiosos e ajudá-lo a colaborar de forma mais efetiva com designers de interface.

Empreendedores ou profissionais de negócios: Se você é um empreendedor ou profissional de negócios que deseja compreender melhor os princípios de UI/UX e como eles podem impactar o sucesso de um produto digital, este curso fornecerá o conhecimento necessário para tomar decisões informadas e colaborar de forma efetiva com designers.

Independentemente do seu nível de experiência ou formação, este curso fornecerá um conjunto sólido de conhecimentos e habilidades em UI/UX e Design Thinking. Ao final do curso, você estará preparado para criar interfaces eficazes que atendam às necessidades dos usuários e proporcionem uma experiência positiva.

courses.description: User interface design(UI) and user experience design(UX) is a very crucial parts of determining the final output of software, applications, or process. User interface design and user experience design(UI/UX) has lots of benefits since they have a greater impact on influencing how users might use or uninstall an app or the retention rate of an app or software and the like. Welcome to this course future designers, in this course, we will be learning to design Interfaces using Figma as the primary design tool. You'll be introduced to some useful resources/ links to help you thrive in an ever-changing world. Figma makes it fun and easier to get your designs up to speed with positive outcomes especially when you use a creative approach to doing what you love doing best. In this lesson, you'll learn to use shapes(components) and tools to create stunning user interfaces. Some fundamental design principles would be taught and demonstrated in the course. courses.bio: Learn the Essentials of UI UX Design from a Sr. Designer with 8+ Years of Experience
objectives: UI/UX Design principles
UI UX Essential Vocabulary
UX Design with Sketch App
A roadmap for UI/UX design success

Introduction to UI/UX: How to Create Gorgeous Presentations Fast
What is the difference between UI and UX Design?
UI/UX Tools for Success: Google Docs, Sheets and Slides for Designers
Easy PDF Creation, Editing and Management
How to Remove Backgrounds in 1 Min
UX Project: Let's Create a Responsive We: Responsive Design: Test, Test and Test
Further UI/UX Essentials: Human Interface Guidelines and Google Material

requirements: Basic Computer (Mac, Linux or Windows)
Basic Internet Connection
courses.description:
In this getting started in UI UX for beginners course you will learn essential UI and UX design concepts from the ground up, together with Sketch App, which is one of the top design softwares out there.


You don’t need to have any prior experience with UI/UX design as this course will cover all the basics during the first section of the course.


This course is divided into two sections: in the first one you will learn the basic theory of UI and UX Design (and no prior experience is required) and in the second part you will learn the basics of Sketch App so that you can consolidate what you learned about UI/UX in the first part and see efficient workflows that will help you tackle design projects.


You will learn everything you need to know in order to get started to become familiar with the world of UI/UX design and the tools you’ll need to become a UI/UX Designer.


In just a bit more than 1 hour you will be able to understand basic UI/UX design workflow, key user experience design principles and interface design essentials using Sketch App as a primary design tool.


Most of these advanced techniques are the same used in large companies and will give you an edge as a designer so that you can work smart and not hard.


The best part about this is that these UI/UX principles don’t take a long time to learn, and it’s quite the opposite actually!


But why should you learn UI UX Design from me?


I’ll briefly introduce myself: my name is Pierluigi and I’m a full-time designer with over 8 years of experience.


After graduating with a BA Graphic Design from one of the top Design Universities in London I worked and managed hundreds of design projects for companies of all sizes and tech backgrounds, from Fortune 500 companies to Million-Dollar Companies that needed to raise their next round of funding.


On the side, I have also designed over 20 design products and my designs have been downloaded over 50000+ times


I also have a design channel on Youtube with over 300 videos and I’m active on Dribbble and Instagram with over 30000 followers.


I had a deep passion for design ever since I was in high school and since this industry gave me so much I want to give back by sharing the knowledge I gathered as a designer over all these years.


So join me today in this course and we’ll learn more about the exciting field of UI/UX design, so that you can bring your design career to the next level.
target_audience: Beginners with no previous experience in UI/UX Design
Intermediate or Advanced designer that are looking to consolidate their UI/UX basic knowledge

courses.description:
MÁSTER Diseño de Experiencias de Usuario Interfaz Web UX UI
Aprende desde cero UX/UI: Experiencia de Usuario, Usabilidad y Diseño de Interfaces.
Instructor: Arquitecto Álvaro García  Actualizado: Octubre del 2025 Requisitos previos: Ninguno


Descripción del Curso:
Dominar UX/UI es hoy una de las habilidades más demandadas en el mercado digital. Con este curso aprenderás desde cero a crear interfaces web y apps que no solo sean atractivas, sino también usables, intuitivas y centradas en el usuario. Con un enfoque práctico y accesible, entenderás cómo combinar diseño, experiencia de usuario y usabilidad para diferenciarte de la competencia y potenciar tus proyectos digitales.
Al inscribirte en este Máster en Diseño de Experiencias de Usuario e Interfaces Web, obtendrás conocimientos aplicables a cualquier sector digital: desde startups y proyectos personales, hasta grandes empresas y agencias creativas. Aprenderás a diseñar prototipos funcionales, mejorar la navegación de sitios web y crear experiencias que conviertan. Una formación completa y actualizada, pensada para que avances a tu ritmo y logres destacar en un mercado global cada vez más competitivo.
Con esta formación sobre experiencias de usuarios para interfaz web (UX UI) podrás adquirir las habilidades necesarias para el diseño de interfaz interactivas, análisis de comportamiento de usuarios, stakeholders, estrategias de contenidos, arquitectura de la información, prototipado avanzado, usabilidad web, estudios de imagen, análisis de color, etc. es que actualmente el diseño UX / UI (User Experience and User Interfaz) son de gran relevancia y un requisito muy valorado en las empresas en los trabajos de diseño y desarrollo web.
Actualmente resulta imprescindible para cualquier diseñador dominar la integración entre usabilidad, funcionalidad y estética en los diseños de web y apps. Con esta formación podrás aprender el método de diseño que se centra principalmente en usuario y su interacción con la información publicad en el sitio web. Esto permitirá aumentar el tiempo de permanencia y la interacción entre tus visitas.
El curso esta orientado a estudiantes y profesiones creativos de campos como el diseño web, visual designer, diseño UX/UI, diseñadores interactivos, product designer, service designer, etc. Podrás desarrollar, organizar y diseñar páginas web que se alineen con los intereses y expectativas de los usuarios, mejorando su experiencia de navegación y la usabilidad del sitio. Conocerás todas las técnicas de mejora y optimización de los distintos elementos web, que ayudar a una mejor experiencia de usuario.


Itinerario Formativo:
Introducción a la plataforma de formación Udemy
Bienvenida al Curso de Diseño de Experiencias de Usuario Interfaz Web UX UI.
Introducción al Diseño de Experiencias de Usuario Interfaz Web UX UI
La Experiencia de Usuario
Experiencias de Usuario UX
Diseño centrado en el usuario
Interfaz de usuario UI
Introducción al diseño web
Elementos básicos para el diseño web
Diseño UX UI en Dispositivos
Lenguaje HTML
Wireframe y prototipos en el Diseño UX UI
Roles en el Diseño de Experiencias de Usuario
Recursos para el Alumno del curso "Diseño de Experiencias de Usuario Interfaz Web UX UI"
Consultas, Dudas y Sugerencias de los Alumnos de la Formación
Emisión del Certificado de Finalización del Curso "Diseño de Experiencias de Usuario Interfaz Web UX UI"


Objetivos del curso
Este curso tiene como objetivo que el estudiante adquiera una visión completa de la experiencia de usuario y el diseño de interfaces digitales, entendiendo los fundamentos de la usabilidad, el diseño centrado en el usuario y la creación de flujos de navegación efectivos. A lo largo de la formación aprenderás a diseñar prototipos web y de aplicaciones, a estructurar contenidos de forma clara y a aplicar metodologías de UX/UI que garantizan la satisfacción del usuario final.


Salidas profesionales
Al finalizar este máster, estarás preparado para acceder a puestos en diseño digital de alta demanda, como diseñador UX/UI, especialista en usabilidad, arquitecto de información, consultor de experiencia digital o creador de interfaces para aplicaciones móviles y sitios web. Estos conocimientos también te permitirán emprender proyectos propios, colaborar en startups tecnológicas o destacar en agencias de marketing y diseño.


Dirigido a
Este curso está dirigido a estudiantes, profesionales del diseño, marketing digital, programación o comunicación, así como a cualquier persona interesada en adentrarse en el mundo del UX/UI sin necesidad de experiencia previa. También es ideal para emprendedores y freelancers que deseen optimizar sus proyectos digitales y ofrecer experiencias de usuario diferenciadas que generen mayor impacto y conversión.


Metodología de Aprendizaje:
Recuerda que este curso incluye lecciones en vídeo fullHD con audio de estudio (compatible con TV, PC, Mac, tablet y smartphone), artículos didácticos, actividades, animaciones, ilustraciones, proyectos paso a paso, recursos descargables, links de interés, acceso de por vida, certificado de finalización, tutorización online, y una exclusiva comunidad de aprendizaje privada que nos ayudamos aportando nuestras experiencias en el foro de comunicación del curso.
La modalidad de este curso te permite que empieces y acabes cuando tú quieras, marcando el ritmo de la clase según tu disponibilidad. Puedes volver a visualizar lo que te interese, saltar el contenido que ya domines, hacer preguntas, resolver dudas, compartir tus proyectos... Puedes elegir ver todas las lecciones de forma secuencial (lineal) y aprovecharlas al máximo la formación, pero también puedes decidir ver este curso como una guía de referencia.
Las clases están claramente organizadas en secciones y lecciones, puedes decidir visualizar solo las clases que te resulten más importantes según tus necesidades formativas. La mayoría de las lecciones son independientes para que puedas comprender los conceptos de cada lección sin tener que ver las lecciones anteriores del curso.
Para seguir el programa formativo propuesto no ser requieren conocimientos previos, ya que la formación se acomete desde un nivel de usuario 0. El curso está orientado a aquellos creativos que quieran ampliar sus skills (habilidades) y conocer múltiples trucos, consejos, recursos y recomendaciones, de la mano del instructor Álvaro García. Además la formación disponen de acceso automático al contenido, sin limitación de tiempo, disponibilidad 24/7 (24 horas al día los 7 días de la semana), sin caducidad y con garantía de devolución.


Con la alta definición de los vídeos (vídeo fullHD y audio de estudio) conseguirá no te perder detalle. Podrás ver las clases las veces que requieras para recordar y perfeccionar tus habilidades como diseñador. Tendrás la posibilidad de preguntar, pedir opinión y ayuda al instructor, además de compartir tu experiencia de aprendizaje con los demás alumnos del curso, tan apasionados como tú, repartidos por todo el mundo. Seleccionamos cuidadosamente los contenidos y producimos cada curso para garantizar una experiencia de aprendizaje online integral y de la máxima calidad.


¿A qué esperas?, este curso es ideal para ti, atrévete a convertirte en un experto y expresa tus ideas de la forma que siempre has deseado. Adelante, nos vemos dentro de la formación ;)
target_audience: Para creativos y diseñadores web que buscan dominar UX/UI y crear interfaces digitales modernas y usables.
Ideal para emprendedores y startups que quieren validar ideas y construir productos digitales sin fallar en la experiencia.
Pensado para estudiantes y profesionales de diseño gráfico que desean dar el salto a la experiencia digital.
Dirigido a desarrolladores y product managers que necesitan comprender y aplicar principios UX/UI en sus proyectos.
Perfecto para quienes desean mejorar la usabilidad y accesibilidad de webs y apps, impulsando la satisfacción del usuario.

"UI/UX Design in Figma: Master the Art of Crafting Digital Experiences
Are you ready to transform your passion for design into a fulfilling career? Our comprehensive UI/UX design course using Figma is your gateway to the world of creating exceptional digital experiences.
Starting from the very basics, you'll learn how to analyze user needs, apply design principles, and create visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces. requirements: A Curious Mind: Above all, come with an insatiable thirst for understanding the intricacies of user experience.
Basic Web Navigation Skills: Familiarity with web browsing, because knowing how you navigate helps you understand others.
Some Digital Savvy: A rudimentary understanding of digital platforms will be beneficial, though not mandatory.
Equipment - A Stable Internet Connection: Much of our explorations and experiments happen online.
courses.description:
Hello! I’m Andrew, CEO at Plerdy, and I'm thrilled to guide you through making websites more user-friendly. In our course, "Optimizing User Experience: Comprehensive User Testing Methods," you'll dive deep into the essentials of usability testing. It's all about gaining a clear understanding of your users and ensuring your website is easy to navigate.
We'll start by exploring various user testing methods—like utilizing heatmaps to visually see where people actually click on your site. These tools are essential for identifying what draws attention and what may need improvement. Whether you’re a website builder, an online marketing strategist, or someone eager to enhance websites, this course offers valuable insights for you. Imagine creating a site that’s not only easy to use but also a pleasure to visit. That’s our goal!
Throughout this course, you'll gain a solid understanding of critical concepts like first-click testing and session recordings. You'll learn how to use various tools to track user interactions, analyze behavior, and run your own tests to collect actionable data. We'll also discuss how to implement changes based on testing results to continuously improve user experience.
By the end of this course, you'll be equipped to make every click on your site count, leading to a more engaging and effective website. So, are you ready to enhance your skills and start making user-friendly websites? Let's dive in and begin this comprehensive journey to better user experiences together!
target_audience: Design Enthusiasts: Whether you've dabbled in graphic design or you're an experienced web designer, this course will refine your understanding of user interaction.
Budding UX Researchers: If you're just stepping into the world of user experience research, this course is your compass. It'll guide you through the dense forests of usability.
Digital Marketers: Those looking to sharpen their web campaigns. By understanding usability, you can create more impactful user journeys.
Product Managers and Developers: Grasping the essence of what users want and need can be a game-changer in product development.
Business Owners: Yes, even if you run a small e-commerce site or a vast online platform. Grasping the nuances of usability can elevate your customer's experience, thus driving loyalty.

The three practice tests together cover the concepts and terms in User-Centered Analysis. It is strongly recommended that you review your training material and glossary for User-Centered Analysis.
Note that though the Usability Certification exam has multiple choice questions, this practice test also has multi-select questions. These unofficial questions are not from the official exam, but have been created to help people test their knowledge and prepare for the exam.

Reservei esse espaço para pessoas que são sedentas por inovação, pessoas que não querem o mesmo, mas querem ir além e assim como eu, pensam em impactar o mundo e melhorar a vida de pessoas.
Não quero só te ensinar ferramentas e propriedades do XD, não quero só criar sistemas "Bonitinhos", quero que você crie experiências únicas em aplicações e sistemas. courses.description:
Con este curso intensivo aprenderás diseño de experiencia de usuario e diseño de interfaz desde 0, gracias al método de diseño más difundido al día de hoy: el Design Thinking.
Toda la teoría será aplicada en un proyecto práctico que nos acompañará a lo largo de todo el curso. Vamos a diseñar una plataforma de citas online llamada Frigg. Para eso, nos guiaremos por las cinco fases del Design Thinking para descubrir, aprender y aplicar de forma práctica todas las técnicas y herramientas de diseño.
En la fase de empatizar estudiaremos la investigación UX para poder recopilar información sobre el producto que debemos diseñar y sus usuarios. Vamos a descubrir cómo realizar investigación documental, investigación de usuario y benchmarking.
En la fase de definir iremos trabajando con herramientas como el mapa de empatía, los user persona o los customer journey maps, y utilizaremos técnicas como la de las Cuatro W o los Five Why's para definir el problema a resolver con nuestro producto.
En la fase de ideación aprenderemos cuales son las técnicas más utilizadas para generar ideas creativas, y cómo se deben valorar esas ideas para elegir la que iremos desarrollando en nuestro proyecto.
En la fase de prototipar definiremos el MVP, la Arquitectura de la Información y los flujos de usuario de nuestro producto. También aprenderás los patrones de diseño más difundidos, para que puedas diseñar correctamente tus wireframes y poder pasar a la fase de diseño de interfaz, donde iremos diseñando la capa visual de las pantallas finales.
Para ello te enseñaré a utilizar Figma, una de las herramientas de diseño más potentes y difundidas en el mundo del diseño UX / UI.
Una vez terminado el diseño de nuestras pantallas, aprenderemos las bases del diseño de interacción y construiremos un prototipo navegable en Figma, para añadir interacción y animaciones a nuestro proyecto.
Y finalmente, en la fase de testar aprenderás cómo testar un producto digital a través de técnicas cuantitativas como los tests A/B o los mapas de calor y técnicas cualitativas como las pruebas de usabilidad o los análisis heurísticos.
Todo nuestro curso está orientado a que aprendas cómo manejar correctamente un proyecto en la vida real, empezando por el kick off con el cliente y los stakeholders y terminando con un handoff exitoso gracias a la creación de un sistema de diseño en Figma.
Si quieres aprender o profundizar sobre una profesión tan apasionante como la de diseñador UX, ¡este es tu curso!
¡Te espero en la primera clase!
target_audience: Diseñadores UI que quieran aprender sobre los procesos de diseño UX
Diseñadores UX que quieran profundizar algo más en el proceso de Design Thinking o aprender sobre Diseño de Interfaz o Diseño de Interacción
Desarrolladores que quieran tener conocimientos sobre diseño UX / UI para mejorar en su trabajo diario
Aspirante diseñadores que quieran empezar a trabajar en el mundo del diseño UX o del diseño de interfaz

courses.title: NOVO Figma 2024 - Inteligência Artificial no UX Design
courses.bio: Crie telas, imagens, protótipos e textos com AI em um clique, Figma Slides e conheça o novo UI Kit nativo Google e Apple
objectives: Como se adaptar rapidamente a tudo que mudou no figma em 2024
Como usar Inteligência Artificial do Figma 2024 no seu dia-a-dia
Nova Arquitetura da Informação do Figma 2024, ou seja, tudo que mudou na tela nova
Como traduzir seu design para qualquer língua e aplicar para vagas em todo mundo
Como usar novos UI Kits Material Design, Apple Guidelines e Figma Pro
Figma Slides - Como criar apresentações de impacto para portfólio
requirements: Curso focado em mostrar o que mudou no Figma 2024.
Esse curso não inclui um curso completo de UI Design. O Curso UX Unicórnio é o curso ideal para completos iniciantes.
courses.description:
Pegue em primeira mão um curso com todas as novidades do Figma 2024:


Nova Arquitetura de Informação, ou seja, tudo que mudou e onde features antigas foram parar para você se adaptar rapidamente,
Como usar nativamente os novos UI Kits do Material Design e Apple Guidelines

Inteligência Artificial para criar telas,
Inteligência Artificial para prototipar com um clique,
Inteligência Artificial para criar textos automaticamente,
Inteligência Artificial renomear camadas e remover background,
Inteligência Artificial para traduzir seu portfólio completo com um clique e aplicar para vagas no exterior,


Figma Slides para criar apresentações de impacto com animações e protótipos facilmente,


Se você já conhecia o Figma, este curso te atualizará rapidamente para tudo que mudou em 2024.
É um curso rápido e direto ao ponto para acelerar sua adaptação.

O objetivo não é te ensinar tudo sobre Design de Interfaces, ou UI Design, pois esse conhecimento envolve teorias sobre hierarquia visual, grids, cores, tipografia e há outros cursos especializados nessa frente.

Discutiremos também o que designers de alto valor de mercado precisam fazer para continuar relevantes  quando AI (Inteligência Artificial) pode substituir a maior parte do trabalho operacional. Spoiler: não é apenas sobre habilidades técnicas e principalmente, habilidades comportamentais, de comunicação, liderança e estratégia.
target_audience: Designers
Desenvolvedores
Product Managers que queiram aprender usar a Inteligência Artificial do Figma para gerar novas ideias

courses.title: ノンデザイナーのための「デザインをする前に知っておきたい7ステップ」〜問題解決に向けた思考の整理術〜
courses.bio: 日々の仕事や生活に密着しているデザイン。そもそも「デザイン」とは、一体何でしょうか？ 誰もがデザインできる時代だからこそ、前段階の準備をしっかりとすることが重要です。デザイン初心者の方、必見です！
objectives: デザインに入る前のステップを学び、必要な準備について学ぶことができます。
デザイナー的な考え方や仕事の進め方を学ぶことで、思考の整理に役立ちます。
デザイナーの視点を取り入れることでデザインへの理解が深まります。
デザインを発注する際に、デザイナー視点からモノを伝えられるようになります。
requirements: 現役デザイナーが「デザインに入る前の準備」として実践していることをお伝えする内容です。デザインそのものを学びたい方は、書籍や別講座の受講をお勧めします。
デザインに対する考え方の講座です。「フレームワークとしてのDesign Thinkingを示すデザイン思考」の内容ではありません。
courses.description:
1. 【受講者の悩みや問題】
・デザインに挑戦したいが、自分にはセンスがなくてできない。
・デザインの勉強をしてみたいが、どこから手をつけたらいいか分からない。
・「デザインはデザイナーがするもの」と思い込んでいる。
・思考の整理ができずに、いつもとっ散らかっている。
・デザイナーに仕事を発注したいが、デザイナー目線でのポイントが分からない。


2. 【このコースの特徴】
①　現役デザイナーが実践している内容
30年以上の経験を持つ現役デザイナーが制作現場で実践していることを惜しみなく伝授。
このコースを学べば、「デザインのスタート地点に立つ前の心構えや基礎知識」を一気に習得できます。


②　事例紹介では、実際のケース（作品）をご紹介
理論だけでは分かりにくい部分を、実際のデザイン事例と共にご紹介。
デザインの過程の一部を確認することで
自社（自分）のデザイン制作をイメージしながら学ぶことができます。


③　忙しいビジネスパーソンでも短時間集中で受講可能
デザインのスタート地点に立つ前の心構えや基礎知識の要点を凝縮。
図解とともに、短時間で学ぶことができます。


3. 【カリキュラムの概要】
第1章：はじめに
第2章：デザインとは何か
第3章：対象を知る
第4章：方向性を絞る
第5章：方向性を見える化する
第6章：よいデザインとは
第7章：準備の最終段階
第8章：デザイン（見た目）よりも大事なこと


補足事項： この情報は、2020年12月収録時点での情報です。
target_audience: デザインの考え方を仕事に取り入れたいビジネスパーソン
デザインやデザイナーの考え方に興味のある方
デザインについて学びたいデザイナーの卵の方
デザイナーに発注を考えている企画担当者の方

courses.title: 2024 UI UX Design Fundamentals for Beginners (Revised)
courses.bio: Master UI UX Design & Figma to get a job in UI Design, User Interface, User Experience design, UX Design & Web Design
objectives: Define the roles and responsibilities of a Junior UX Designer or UX Researcher
Understand the complete product design process from UX to UI and launch
Understand the principles of user-centered design and its importance in creating effective user interfaces.
Master the art of creating interactive prototypes to visualize and validate design concepts.
Be proficient in conducting usability tests to gather valuable user feedback and refine designs.
Embrace a user-centric mindset and problem-solving approach throughout the design process.
Acquire skills in selecting color schemes, typography, and visual elements to create aesthetically pleasing interfaces.
Create detailed wireframes and high-fidelity mockups using industry-standard design tools.

Introduction: Getting started with Design and UI UX secrets
Understanding the difference between UI and UX
Tools and Platforms used in UI UX Design: Design tools used for UI UX (Intro to Figma)
Prototyping and Collaborating tools used for supporting the design process
Documentation of a UX Project: Briefing of Project overview and goals
Basic User Personas, Research Findings and Discussion materials
Flows in UX Design: User Flow, Work Flow and Task Flow
Wireframes: Create wireframes for a simple project
Introduction to UI Process: Visual Hierarchy and High Fidelity Mockups
Design Systems: How to create and use Design Systems

requirements: No prior design experience or other skill is required. You will learn everything here you need to know.
courses.description:
Are you intrigued by the world of User Interface (UI) and User Experience (UX) design, but don't know where to start? My "UI/UX Design Essentials for Beginners" course is the perfect stepping stone to dive into the captivating field of digital design. This comprehensive course covers all the fundamental principles and techniques essential for aspiring designers.
In today's digital age, creating user-friendly and aesthetically pleasing interfaces is paramount. This course equips beginners with a solid foundation in UI/UX design, providing the knowledge and skills needed to design products and websites that delight users.
Throughout this course, you will explore key concepts such as information architecture, wireframing, prototyping, and user testing. You'll gain hands-on experience using industry-standard design tools like Sketch, Figma, and Adobe XD, allowing you to bring your creative ideas to life.
I will guide you through real-world case studies and practical exercises, helping you develop a critical eye for design aesthetics and usability. By the end of the course, you will have a deep understanding of how to create intuitive and visually appealing digital experiences, making you a valuable asset in the ever-evolving tech industry.
Whether you're looking to start a career in UI/UX design or simply want to enhance your digital design skills, this course is your gateway to success. Join this course today and unlock the secrets of UI/UX design that will empower you to create engaging and user-centric digital products.
Please join me as a beginner in design or as a seasoned UI/UX designer wanting to switch from other tools like Sketch or Adobe XD
Who this course is for:
Beginners looking to get into the UI/UX field
User Interface designers
Graphic Designers
Product Designers
UX Designers
target_audience: Those with little to no prior experience in UI/UX design, seeking a comprehensive foundation in the field.
Graphic designers looking to expand their skill set and transition into UI/UX design.
Product managers who want to gain a deeper understanding of the design process to collaborate effectively with design teams.
Professionals from diverse backgrounds considering a career switch to UI/UX design and seeking a solid introduction to the field.
Anyone with a passion for design and an interest in creating user-friendly digital experiences.
Individuals planning to launch digital products or startups who need to grasp UI/UX concepts for successful product development.

requirements: Desire to learn and a willingness to be challenged.

courses.description:
Do you want to become a real web designer, but you don't know where to start?
When you have to study UI (user interface) or UX (User experience) design, it's fundamental to start from strategy and design thinking and only after learning this it's ok to start learning the software.
That's why in this course we start from the theory and then we go forward with pratical lessons, analyzing dozens and dozens of websites and landing pages. Also, don't forget to put yourself to a test with the assignments!
In short, it will be a journey full of things to learn, and the only thing that matters will be this: that you arrive at the end of this journey having learned the fundamentals of user experience and web design.
Are you ready for it?


What the other students say (review translated from the italian version of the same course):

In particular, in addition to the competence, I appreciate the way he explains, engaging and fun, which makes everything more pleasant and light."
