Video ini adalah online course yang paling lengkap, to-the point, dan mudah dipahami tentang penggunaan FIGMA untuk UI dan UX di UDEMY! Semua penjelasan disampaikan dalam Bahasa INDONESIA.
Tidak memandang apakah Anda belum pernah menggunakan Figma sebelumnya, atau sudah mengetahui cara membuat desain user interface yang menarik, video course ini dirancang tentu saja untuk Anda! Dalam kursus ini, kami akan mengajari Anda menggunakan Figma untuk berbagai kebutuhan!
Dilengkapi dengan berjam-jam video course, quiz, dan artikel, kursus komprehensif ini tidak membutuhkan pengalaman apapun! Cukup akun Figma yang bisa dimiliki siapapun. Kalau belum punya, cukup daftarkan diri Anda saja! GRATIS!
Video course  ini akan mengajarkan Anda menggunakan layanan Figma dengan setiap bab dilengkapi screencast yang mengajarkan langkah-langkah, perintah, dan menu-menu pada Instagram dengan disertai penjelasan-penjelasan yang menarik! Tunggu apa lagi, ayo belajarlah dengan cara  yang terbaik untuk Anda!
Kami akan memulainya dengan cara memulai Figma. Lantas, kami akan membantu Anda menggunakan layanan-layanan Figma dan mengupas langkah-langkah praktis lainnya.


Topik yang akan dibahas kemudian adalah:
Apa itu Figma
Memulai Figma dari Nol
Menggunakan Figma App untuk Penggunaan Komputer
Berbagai Macam Tool pada Figma
Pembuatan Frame untuk Smartphone, Desktop, dan lainnya
Menggambar Bebas Memakai Pen Tool
Memilih Warna dan Aneka Gradasi untuk Desain
Mempercantik Desain dengan Beragam Efek Khusus
Mengedit Foto
Menambahkan Plugins dan Templates
Bekerja Efektif dengan Menggunakan Components
Contoh Desain untuk Instagram Post (Social Media)
Mendesain Website dengan Cepat dan Menyenangkan
Figma to HTML
Merancang User Interface (UI) untuk Smartphone
Menggunakan Property
Menghadirkan Interaksi dan Animasi pada UI
Menambahkan Animasi yang Menarik
Membuat Overlay di Atas Sebuah Frame
Membuat Aneka Animasi yang Menarik


Ayo, tunggu apa lagi! Jangan khawatir tentang kualitas video course. Kami bisa mengatakan kepada Anda bahwa video course ini adalah yang terlengkap dan terbaik tentang Figma untuk semua golongan.
Tidak percaya? Buktikan sendiri!
target_audience: Desainer Grafis
Desainer UI dan UX
Pengembang Aplikasi Website, Desktop, dan Smartphone

courses.title: Introduction to Content Design
courses.bio: This course will teach you how to use Strategy, Writing and Design in your journey to become a UX Writer
objectives: The role of a Content Designer
How to write user centric microcopy (CTAs, Error Messages, etc.)
The difference between good UX Copy and bad UX Copy
What is a copy deck
Why placeholder copy and low fidelity designs are important
The advantages of using collaborative based design tools (Figma)

Introduction to Content Design: The role of a Content Designer
How to write user centric microcopy (CTAs, Error Messages, etc.)
The difference between good UX Copy and bad UX Copy
Why placeholder copy and low fidelity designs are important
The advantages of using collaborative based design tools (Figma)

requirements: No writing experience needed
Some familiarity with the Agile methodology will be helpful to know, a basic understanding will suffice
courses.description:
This course is intended to help someone interested in becoming a Content Designer/UX Writer (User Experience Writer). There is no pre-requisites to taking this course, however some experience in working at an organization who utilizes the Agile methodology for project management or some familiarly with Agile will be beneficial. All business terms are explained, so if you don't have this experience, don't worry, you will still find this course beneficial and easy to follow.
The main lessons in this course are intended to teach you the following:

The role of a Content Designer - what do they do, how do they work, why they're important
Good vs Bad UX Writing - what constitutes good UX writing and bad UX writing
What Tools to use as a Content Designer - should you learn a lot of tools or a few of them, what are the best ones to learn
How to design a Copy Deck - what is a Copy Deck, how do I create a Copy Deck, is there only one way to create a Copy Deck
How to write Error Messages and CTAs (Call to Actions) - what level of detail should we and should we not provide when writing error messages, what is the user trying to do and how can we help them make decisions
target_audience: Anyone interested in becoming or wanting to learn more about Content Design and/or UX Writing

courses.title: UX Writing from 0 for beginners - Become a great UX writer
courses.bio: Learn how to write great microcopy and optimal text for online products through UX Writing
objectives: Understanding the purpose and use of UX writing
Writing good Placeholders, Error Messages, CTAs and other important messages
Ensure user attraction and satisfaction through your writing
Learn to keep tone and consistency throughout the experience
Efficiently convey the information desired for the product page
requirements: This course goes from the basics, no need for previous knowledge
courses.description:
UX writing is a form of writing designed to enhance the overall user experience of digital products or services. It focuses on the different aspects, such as the tone of the text, to guide the user and create a satisfactory experience. The purposes of this course are to learn the fundamental aspects, such as:


Guidance: It will guide users through the interface by providing clear instructions, labels, and cues that help them navigate and understand how to use the product or service effectively.
Clarity: It ensures that the language used is clear and easy to understand, reducing confusion and frustration for users as they interact with different features and functionalities.
Communication: Communication of important information, such as error messages, notifications, and feedback, help the user make informed decisions and take appropriate actions.
Brand Voice: It conveys the brand's personality and values through the tone, style, and language used in the interface, helping to establish a consistent and memorable brand identity.
Engagement: It can also be used to engage users and encourage specific behaviors, such as completing a signup process, exploring new features, or providing feedback.


Having all of these concepts in mind is crucial to build the most optimized and friendly interface for your product.
target_audience: Best choice for Designers in general, who want to get deeper into perfecting their skills to make their desired user experience excell.

courses.title: Product Design Mastery Test: Beginner to Advanced Evaluation
courses.bio: Assess your UX, UI, and product design knowledge with 45 questions across beginner, intermediate, and advanced level.
courses.description:
Evaluate Your Product Design Skills and Determine Your Strengths.
Are you just starting out in product design, preparing for an interview, or an experienced designer wanting to validate your skills? This course provides a comprehensive self-assessment comprising 45 carefully crafted questions that cover UX, UI, design thinking, strategy, and real-world scenarios.
Through this evaluation, you’ll be able to:
Assess your understanding of product design fundamentals, principles, and laws.
Identify strengths and weaknesses across beginner, intermediate, and advanced levels.
Validate your ability to apply design thinking and usability testing in practice.
Prepare for interviews, job evaluations, self-assessments or career growth in product design.


What makes this test unique?
Covers the full spectrum of product design — from foundations to real-world strategy.
Scenario-based questions that simulate practical design challenges.
Immediate feedback with explanations to help you learn as you test.
Suitable for beginners exploring design and professionals measuring expertise.
Also suitable for a design team that wants to evaluate the knowledge of its design team
Whether you’re a student, a junior designer, or a seasoned professional, this test will give you the clarity you need to grow in your product design journey.
Take the test today and see how your skills measure up
target_audience: Aspiring product designers who want to test their understanding of product design fundamentals before pursuing deeper learning.
Beginner designers looking to validate their knowledge of UX, UI, and design principles.
Intermediate and advanced product designers who want to measure their skills through real-world, scenario-based questions.
Students of design, UX, or HCI who want a self-assessment tool to check their readiness for projects, internships, or jobs.
Professionals in related fields (developers, marketers, product managers) curious to evaluate their product design knowledge.
Anyone preparing for design interviews or certifications who wants to practice in a structured test format.

courses.title: Sketching for UX Designers - Boost UX work with pen & paper!
courses.bio: Learn how to boost your UX design workflow with sketching user interfaces, animations and storyboarding.
objectives: By the end of the course, you will be able to sketch user interfaces, user flows, ui animations and storyboards.
You will understand that you don’t need any artistic skills, sketching is about generating and communicating ideas.
This course is also a great starting point for other areas of visual thinking, like graphic facilitation or sketchnoting.

Sketching Practice Activity Through Gest: Gestalt Principles: Focal Points & Past Experiences
Gestalt Principles: Exercises to Practice Sketching
Advice & Resources: 12 Benefits of Sketching for UX - a Summary
How to work on your Sketching skills
Bonus Lecture: Participate & Discover - WORKBOOK + Other Resources

requirements: There are no requirements necessary to enroll.
Whether you are a student, a beginner or a seasoned professional, improving your sketching skills is going to be a great addition to your workflow as a UX, UI or product designer.
courses.description:
You will learn how you can boost your UX, UI or product design workflow with sketching.


Last update: 25th January 2023 - 4 new files added (UI sketching and Storyboarding Pro Tips posters)
Update:  16th November 2019 - new lecture added: 12 Benefits of Sketching for UX - a summary
Update: 17th October 2017 - new course material added: the Sketching for UX Designers WORKBOOK (24-page long, filled with useful sketching exercises)
Update: 5th June 2017 - new section added: a 40-minute long sketching practice activity through the different Gestalt principles.


The three main parts are
Warming up and drawing basic shapes
Sketching User Interfaces, User Flows and UI Animations
Creating Storyboards.
Not only will I invite you to draw along with me throughout the course, I will also give you exciting exercises to quickly develop your skills.
You will be able to use your sketching skills in many more UX design or service design methods, like in creating Empathy Maps, User Journey Maps and Personas.

In addition, the course provides a great starting point for other areas of visual thinking, like graphic facilitation or sketchnoting, since in the section about Storyboarding I show you how to draw people, locations, objects, how to express process, use containers, color and effects, and so on.
Sketching skills are great for any product design process, but next to applying these skills in your professional workflow, you can improve your personal development as well for example by sketchnoting UX talks or podcasts.
Throughout the course I use pen and paper, so it won't provide you a complete workflow for using digitzier tablets for sketching, but I believe that almost everything I teach you can be applied for sketching on a tablet, so feel free to draw along with me or practice sketching with a digital tool.
Sketching is great because
this technique takes into account how our visual perception works - when we look at images, we understand them much faster than we read words;
it can reveal things we might have not seen before, connections we have not noticed;
it enables a mutual understanding;
it supports the fail fast approach;
it is a quick and cheap way to generate many ideas.
Important: This course is not about teaching how to use Sketch App by Bohemian Coding, but about sketching user interfaces with pen and paper!
Course update log:


Updated on the 17th October 2017: new course material (workbook)
Updated on the 5th June 2017: new section
Released on the 15th April 2017
target_audience: UX Designers
UI Designers
Product Designers
Service Designers
Web Designers
Anyone who wants to improve the workflow of creating digital products (apps, websites, systems)
This course is NOT for you if you want to learn Sketch App by Bohemian Coding

courses.title: Curso UX Research
courses.bio: Conceitos, ferramentas e técnicas para compreender o seu cliente.
objectives: Fundamentos básicos de UX Research
Planejar uma pesquisa de abordagem qualitativa para aplicação em projetos de UX
Imersão - Boas práticas de pesquisa de contexto - pesquisa desk
Desenvolver e conduzir efetivas entrevistas em profundidade com clientes ou potenciais usuários
Aprender a identificar as informações-chave da pesquisa
Apresentar resultados para decisões de impacto estratégico

Módulo II - Método: Defina o seu ponto de partida
Módulo V - Observar e Conversar: Boas Práticas e Técnicas de Rapport

requirements: Não há pré-requisitos.
courses.description:
A compreensão do cliente, cada vez mais complexo e protagonista, é essencial para a perenidade das organizações e deve ser o vetor principal da inovação. Nesse contexto, já é consenso que, para desenvolver e entregar produtos e serviços relevantes, se comunicar com impacto, criar conexão com um público, precisamos aprender a ouvir a voz do cliente.


Nesse curso vamos abordar “como”:
Como realizar um projeto de pesquisa e análise de comportamento do consumidor de forma produtiva, coerente e confiável.
Como ajustar as minhas lentes para extrair informações relevantes.
Como planejar e conduzir uma entrevista em profundidade.
Como analisar, conectar informações, obter insights, requisitos e oportunidades.
Como tomar decisões a partir dessas informações.
Como apresentar as informações para que sejam bem assimiladas.


O curso tem foco em pesquisa qualitativa, de caráter etnogáfico. Ou seja, você vai entender como entrar na realidade dos seus clientes, conversar olho no olho, extrair o que é relevante e valioso para eles.


Você vai perceber que pesquisa com o consumidor não é algo exclusivo de grandes organizações, e que você pode criar vantagens competitivas, oportunidades de inovação e vínculo com seus clientes a partir das preciosas informações que são obtidas nesse processo.
target_audience: Esse curso é ideal para profissionais que precisam compreender comportamentos e processos decisórios de seus clientes a fim de extrair insights e requisitos para projetos de desenvolvimento de soluções (sejam produtos e/ou serviços) ou de comunicação:
Empreendedores que desejam aprimorar ou desenvolver melhor sua proposta de valor
Profissionais UX
Product Owners / Product Managers / Product Marketers / Líderes de Produtos
Designers
Profissionais de Marketing / Publicidade / Comunicação
Desenvolvedores
Especialistas em Interfaces
Iniciantes e entusiastas de UX
Profissionais que atuam como Customer Success
Designer de Serviços

courses.title: LinkedIn & Amazon Web App Design with Figma (2022)
courses.bio: Advanced fast-paced Figma course for UI UX Design, User Experience Design, User Interface Design & Web Design
objectives: Transform your static components into interactive UI elements
Design complex nested components with Auto Layout & Variants
Learn automated ways to re-use components & utilize Figma plugins
Learn how to design Figma UI components with blazing speed
Add Amazon & LinkedIn Figma projects to your design portfolio
Learn Figma in an advanced accelerated path
requirements: Solid understanding of Figma
courses.description:
By completing this advanced accelerated Figma course, you will feel confident adding 2 real world projects like Amazon & LinkedIn to your portfolio.
The course is suitable for students who have a solid foundation in Figma. Students who are already familiar with Figma can greatly benefit from this course by learning cutting edge Figma skills. At the beginning of each section, you will have the full access to download the Figma source files. We will dive right into designing projects in no time.
Amazon Project:
Design scalable and reusable color systems
Breakdown the Amazon project into smaller UI components and re-use them in Figma
Create a prototype in Figma by combining Amazon UI components
Learn how to sync data to your Amazon UI components
LinkedIn Project:
Design LinkedIn UI components with Auto Layout and Variants
Combine LinkedIn UI components into a working prototype in Figma
Transform static components into interactive components
Learn how to re-use components & styles to design the LinkedIn project efficiently
Other important topics that you will learn:
Design complex Figma auto layouts and nested interactive components
Generate color palettes and typographic items in a automated way
Utilize Figma plugins to improve your design workflow
Learn how to design and deliver better products with blazing speed
Build enterprise level design systems and UI components
Learn how to resolve UI issues as we build the components and prototypes together
target_audience: Intermediate Figma designers

courses.title: 【한글자막】 사용자 경험 (UX) : 사용성 및 UX 를 위한 최고의 가이드
courses.bio: UX 분야에 취직하고 사용자 연구와 UX 디자인 기술을 구축하세요! 사용자 인터뷰부터 프로토타입 제작, 디자인 사용성 테스트 등, A 부터 Z까지 UX의 모든 핵심을 마스터하세요!
objectives: 검증된 사용자 중심 디자인 프레임워크를 따라 UX를 워크플로에 불어넣습니다.
현장 방문과 사용자 인터뷰를 계획하여 사용자 요구 사항을 파악합니다.
현장 방문과 사용자 인터뷰를 계획하여 사용자 요구 사항을 파악합니다. 사용성 테스트를 조정하고 관찰 결과의 우선순위를 정합니다.
페르소나, 사용자 스토리, 금지 사항, 사용자 여정 지도를 만듭니다.
사용자의 멘탈 모델을 파악하고 설명합니다.
정보를 분류하고 구성하기 위한 적절한 계획을 선정합니다.
온라인 및 오프라인 카드 소팅 세션을 디자인하고 수행합니다.
적절한 사용자 인터페이스 디자인 패턴을 선택합니다.
사용자로부터 빠르게 자주 피드백을 받기 위한 저렴한 일회성 프로토타입을 개발합니다.
시각 디자인의 보편적인 원칙을 활용하는 사용자 인터페이스 디자인을 만듭니다.
작업, 성공률, 사용자 만족도를 측정하기 위한 사용성 테스트를 디자인합니다.
사용성 휴리스틱을 적용하여 시스템 사용성을 평가합니다.
사용자 경험 BCS Foundation Certificate를 준비합니다.

사건이 벌어지는 곳으로 가라: 맥락 속의 사용자 이해하기: 실용적인 현장 방문 5단계 - 친화도 다이어그램과 사용자 스토리 매핑
현장 방문에 관한 근거 없는 이론 3개
우리는 런던 버스를 통해 유용성에 관한 어떤 점을 배울 수 있을까요?: 레드 루트, 혹은 피처 크립이 효과가 없는 이유
애자일을 위한 확고한 사용자 스토리 구축 방법
사이트 구조와 내비게이션: 새로운 방식으로 검색하기: LATCH - 정보 정리를 위한 5가지 모자걸이 방식
인터랙션 디자인: 간단한 화면 디자인을 위한 간단한 규칙: 멘털 모델, 개념적 모델, 어포던스와 시그니파이어
체크 박스, 라디오 버튼, 피츠의 법칙
드롭다운 메뉴 - UI 컨트롤 최후의 수단?
양식 다시 디자인하기 - 트리거 단어와 마무리 작업
디자인을 제대로 확정하는 것과 알맞은 디자인을 찾는 것
\"증명할 데이터는 있습니다\": 사용성 평가하기: 형성적 사용성 테스트와 총괄적 사용성 테스트
사용성 테스트에 사용자가 다섯 명이면 (대체로) 충분한 이유
대면 사용자 테스트 대 원격 사용자 테스트
참가자가 생각을 소리 내어 말하게 하기
포커페이스를 유지하고 참가자에게 생각을 소리 내어 말하라고 일깨우기
사용성 테스트에서 수행하는 역할: 진행자, 컴퓨터, 관찰자
수강생 모범 사례: '파인드 마이 펫' 사용성 테스트 영상
사용자가 에러를 인식하고 진단하고 복구하도록 돕기
검토자가 두 명 이상 필요한 이유
다음 단계: 이론을 실전에 적용하기: 사용자 조사 활동에 참여할 사용자 모집법
조직 내에서 UX 커리어 구축하는 법
수강생 작품 예시: 새로운 쇼핑 카트
수강생 작품 예시: UX 포트폴리오 점검
이 강의에 대한 피드백을 제공해 주세요

requirements: 이 강의를 수강하는 데 사용자 경험, 디자인 또는 코딩 배경은 필요하지 않습니다.
이 강의는 심층 강의입니다. 하루에 60~90분을 할당하고 모든 활동을 수행하면 완료하는 데 2~3주가 걸립니다.
courses.description:
업계에서 이미 사용하고 있는 UX 실습을 기반으로 한 최고의 강의
실속있는 UX 포트폴리오는 물론, 실무에서 사용가능한 기술까지 가르치는 완벽 강좌
사용자 인터뷰부터 프로토타입 제작, 디자인 사용성 테스트 등, A 부터 Z까지 UX의 모든 핵심 분야에 적용가능한 기술 모두 포함


[본 강의 수강 시 드리는 무료 혜택]
수강생을 위한 템플릿 및 용어집 워크북 제공
강의에 사용된 슬라이드 pdf 파일 제공
모든 강의의 대본 제공
학습을 복기할 수 있는 퀴즈 제공
동료 수강생과의 인적 네트워크 형성(Facebook 그룹 액세스) 가능


[본 강의를 수강해야 하는 이유]
사용자 경험(UX)에 대해 Udemy에서 가장 높은 평가를 받은 강의에 오신 것을 환영합니다. 수많은 사용자 연구원과 디자이너 여러분이 이 강의를 이용하여 UX 커리어를 시작했습니다. 여러분도 할 수 있습니다!


UX의 모든 핵심 분야에 대한 실습 연습 이용 — 사용자 인터뷰부터 프로토타이핑과 디자인 사용성 테스트까지.
5가지 실제 샘플 프로젝트를 완료하면서 취업 전망을 높이는 UX 포트폴리오 구축.
사용자 경험 BCS Foundation Certificate를 준비하여 업계에서 인정받는 인증 취득
수많은 UX 온라인 강의가 UX Mastery의 리뷰를 받았지만 10/10점을 받은 강의는 이 강의뿐입니다.
5개의 사용자 연구 및 디자인 프로젝트 작업을 통해 UX 포트폴리오를 구축하세요.


본 강의의 샘플 프로젝트:
Find my pet: 사람들이 길을 잃은 반려동물을 추적할 수 있는 제품입니다.
Tomorrow’s shopping cart: 고객이 슈퍼마켓에서 어떤 제품이든 찾을 수 있게 해 주는 장치입니다.
Gift Giver: 극도로 정확한 제품 추천 기술을 기반으로 한 선물 추천 시스템입니다.
The Citizen Journalist: 평범한 사람이 행사를 촬영하고, 사진을 찍고, 스토리를 써 크라우드소싱된 온라인 신문을 제작할 수 있는 시스템입니다.
The Digital Postcard: 사용자가 휴대폰으로 찍은 사진을 사용하거나 현지 명승지에서 전문가가 찍은 사진을 선택하여 나만의 엽서를 만들고 보낼 수 있는 앱입니다.


[사용자 경험 (UX) BCS Foundation Certificate 준비 과정 포함]
사용자 경험 커리어는 기술 섹터에서 가장 보람 있고 도전적인 일 중 하나입니다. 이 온라인 교육 강의가 시작하는 데 필요한 배경을 제공해 드립니다.
이 강의는 사용자 경험 BCS Foundation Certificate에 대비한 종합 요강을 다루며 배운 내용을 테스트하고 시험을 준비하기 위한 90개의 선다형 퀴즈 문항이 포함되어 있습니다. 전 세계 어디에서나 Pearson VUE 시험 센터에서 시험에 응시할 수 있습니다(추가 비용 있음).


[추가로 제공하는 보너스 상품]
무료 보너스 #1: 디자인 연습, UX 방법론 자습서, 사용자 연구 관찰 기록 템플릿, UI 프로토타입용 스텐실, 세부적인 읽기 목록, 용어집으로 구성된 81페이지 수강생 워크북
무료 보너스 #2: 강의에 소개된 모든 슬라이드가 포함된 417페이지 고품질 PDF. 인쇄하거나, 모바일 장치에 로드하거나, 편리하게 컴퓨터에 보관하세요. 선택은 여러분에게 달려 있습니다.
무료 보너스 #3: 모든 강의의 대본. 231 페이지, 89,236 단어로 구성된 이 문서는 영어가 여러분의 모국어가 아닐 때나 단순히 강의의 읽고 검색할 수 있는 버전을 이용하고 싶으신 경우에 유용합니다.
무료 보너스 #4: 이 강의를 통해 배운 내용을 테스트하기 위한 90개의 선다형 퀴즈 문항.
무료 보너스 #5: 동료 수강생과 소통하고, 질문하고, 동료 심사를 위해 과제를 제출할 수 있는 Facebook 그룹 액세스 권한.


모든 것을 다운로드하세요. 인터넷 연결이 느리거나 노트북, 스마트폰 또는 다른 휴대용 장치에 이 강의를 넣어서 다니려면 지금 가입하여 모든 비디오와 다른 강의 자료를 다운로드하세요.


[FAQ]
Q1. 언제 시작되나요?
바로 오늘입니다! 이 강의는 여러분의 속도에 맞춘 강의이기 때문에 언제든지 시작하고 어디서나 강의를 볼 수 있습니다. 지금 가입하면 5분도 되지 않아 첫 번째 비디오를 시청할 수 있습니다.
Q2. 얼마나 걸릴까요?
140개 이상의 강의와 9시간 분량의 콘텐츠가 포함된 이 강의는 Udemy에서 UX에 대해 가장 깊이 있게 다루는 강의입니다. 하루에 60~90분을 할당하고 모든 활동을 수행하면 완료하는 데 2~3주가 걸립니다. 오랜 기간에 걸쳐 이 강의를 분산하고자 해도 좋습니다.
Q3. 이 강의는 저를 위한 강의인가요?
사용자 경험의 어떤 단계에서 실습 연습을 하고자 하시든, 이 강의는 여러분을 위한 강의입니다. 아마도 여러분은 사용자 경험 필드에서 처음 시작하는 분일 수 있습니다. 아니면 현재 직무 역할에서 UX 커리어로 전환하고 싶은 분일 수도 있습니다. 여러분이 어떤 배경을 갖고 있든, 여러분은 UX 포트폴리오의 첫 걸음이 될 실제 프로젝트에 기술을 적용하실 수 있습니다.
Q1. 막혔을 때는 어떻게 해야 하나요?
디자인 프로세스의 각 단계를 진행하면서 배운 내용을 테스트하고 다른 수강생과 작업물을 비교하여 “좋은” 결과물은 어떤 결과물인지 확인할 수 있습니다. 저는 강의 포럼을 매일 검토하고 모든 수강생의 질문에 24시간 내에 답변합니다. 그러니 어떤 자료와 관련해서든 문제가 생길 경우 질문하시면 도와드리겠습니다.
Q1. 책에서는 이 내용을 배울 수 없나요?
물론 책과 블로그 게시물을 읽어도 사용자 경험 전문 지식을 쌓을 수 있지만 이러면 과정이 느려지고 큰 그림을 보기 어려울 수 있습니다. 이 워크샵과 함께하면 고객을 위해 함께 작업할 수 있고, 저는 수년 동안 수백 건의 디자인 프로젝트를 통해 습득한 팁과 조언을 드리고 동일한 기법을 여러분께 공유할 수 있습니다.
Q1. 마음에 들지 않으면 어떻게 하나요?
17,000여 명이 이 온라인 강의를 들었으며 90% 이상의 수강생이 별점 5개 만점에 4개를 주었기 때문에 이 강의가 마음에 드실 것으로 확신합니다. 만약의 경우에 대비해 30일 동안 무조건 환불을 제공합니다.  오늘 가입하세요!


지금 바로 수강하세요!
이 사용자 경험 실습 교육 강의를 통해 UX 분야에 취직하고 사용자 연구와 UX 디자인 기술을 구축할 수 있습니다.
- David
target_audience: 현재 직무 역할에서 사용자 경험 커리어로 전환하고 싶은 사람이라면 누구나.
실제 디자인 프로젝트에 기술을 적용하여 사용자 경험 포트폴리오를 구축하고자 하는 사용자 연구원이나 디자이너.
더 매력적인 시스템을 디자인하는 기법을 배우고자 하는 소프트웨어 개발자.
디자인 프로젝트에 사용성을 도입하기 위한 전체 수명 주기 프로세스를 원하는 프로젝트 관리자 및 스크럼 마스터.
디자인 테스트 및 평가 방법을 배우고자 하는 인터페이스 디자이너.
인간 중심 디자인 원칙을 배우고자 하는 웹사이트 디자이너.
사용자 경험의 비즈니스 및 브랜드 이점에 대해 알아보고자 하는 마케팅 관리자.
사용자의 요구 사항을 전달하기 위한 빠르고 효과적인 도구를 원하는 비즈니스 분석가.

courses.description:
This course will teach you everything you need to know about UX, including design, content, and coding. And you'll learn from the ground up, so it doesn't matter how much experience you have when you start.
You'll be exposed to principles and strategies, but, more importantly, you'll learn how to actually apply these abstract concepts by coding three different websites for three very different audiences.
Improve Your Website with UX Strategies
Apply UX strategies to a site's content & design
Understand Information Architecture to enhance the content on your website
Know what dictates how your website should look
Design and code a B2B website, a B2C blog, and an ecommerce site
Understand UX and Learn How to Develop Winning Websites
This course will help you stand out as a web designer, teaching you how to apply User Experience (UX) strategies that will make every site you build useful, usable, and valuable.
Reinforce what you're learning using the bonus 30-page downloadable UX Guidebook. Filled with exercises and activities, the UX Guidebook is a great tool to reference as you progress through the course, or while developing your own custom sites.
You'll also get hands-on experience designing and coding three different types of sites. This will give you the confidence to pursue similar projects if you're already a website designer, if you want to get into web design, or if you want to enhance your current business site.
Contents and Overview
Even if you're a complete beginner, this course will show you how to make a website functional, attractive and successful. It will walk you through all of the steps required to enhance the User Experience on any site, right down to the code, content, and design.
You'll begin by defining who your website users are and what they expect from the website. You'll also learn how business goals — yours or your client's — have to be uncovered and addressed for site success.
You'll learn what questions to ask both groups, and you'll use the answers to inform your content and design decisions.
Next, you'll dig into Information Architecture (IA), which looks at the content on your website, how you should categorize it, what you should call it, and more.
This will lay the foundation on which you can further build out your website to make users flock to it, stay on it, and hopefully make purchases.
Plus, you'll tackle how to design your website depending upon who your visitors are, whether your website is B2B (business-to-business), B2C (business-to-consumer), or an ecommerce site for selling products online.
Different audiences have different needs, so learning what your target user expects from your site means you'll be able to design and build a site that meets those expectations and leads to greater conversions.
In addition to knowing what you need to put into your website to make it stand out from the crowd, you'll also learn how to identify and remove UX- and UI-related obstacles.
The ability to see and solve these problems will ensure every website you build moving forward will be useful, usable and valuable to the people who use it.
Most importantly, you'll then learn how to actually build and code these types of sites using HTML, CSS, WordPress, and more.
You'll not only know how to effectively design B2B, B2C, and ecommerce sites, but you'll also know exactly how to develop these sites, from start to finish.
By the end of this course, you'll have an in-depth understanding of UX and web design, as well as the tools to develop a variety of sites with the right code.
You'll know why UX is so important to both users and businesses, what content is needed on a site, what UI design is appropriate, and how to transform your vision into a fully functional website using the most effective tools available.
target_audience: New or established business owners who want to gain more from their online presence
Beginners who want to learn UX, web design and/or development
Website designers who want to enhance their skills
Print designers who want to move into web design

courses.description:
Are you excited to get into the world of UI/UX but you don't know where to start? This course will allow you to add UX designer to your CV & start getting paid for your new skills.
Hi there! My name is Dan & I’m an Adobe Certified Instructor. I’m here to help you learn Adobe XD efficiently and comprehensively. XD is a fantastic design tool used by industry professionals to product high quality & functional mockups. By the end of this course, you will be able to produce practical and effective User Experience (UX) and User Interface (UI) designs.
Throughout the course I’ll invite you to participate in a real-life freelance project which I’m working on. It’s a project that requires a fresh website and mobile app interface. This will prepare you for dealing with real world projects if you choose to move towards a UX/UI career path.
Aria: "This course is definitely above expectations so far. I didn't expect to get so much insight into the briefing and the communication between UX Designer and a client. It helps to see the brief and to learn that there are different tiers of income based on projects and experience. Love It!"
This course is aimed at people interested in UI/UX Design. We’ll start from the very beginning and work all the way through, step by step. If you already have some UI/UX Design experience but want to get up to speed using Adobe XD then this course is perfect for you too!
First, we will go over the differences between UX and UI Design. We will look at what our brief for this real-world project is, then we will learn about low-fidelity wireframes and how to make use of existing UI design kits.
I’ll go over all of the essential tools necessary for creating excellent wireframes, including: type, colours, icons, Lorem ipsum, artboards, prototyping, models and popups, symbols and repeat grids. We will even make use of the new prototyping app so that you can experience your prototype on your mobile device.
Kate: Excellent course - Dan is an excellent teacher and I thoroughly enjoyed following along with his videos. Highly recommend! July 2018: I have updated this review with an extra star because of how useful this course has been in the months following it's completion. I am using Adobe XD daily and Dan's instruction was instrumental to adding this feather to my front-end web development hat.
An important part of maximising your UX Design workflow is being able to utilise other software such as Photoshop and Illustrator. This is why I’ll be teaching you how to make use of both to help boost your XD productivity.
One of the awesome new features of XD is micro-interactions. I’ll be teaching you all about those and how to use them to grow icons and scenes. This is one of the parts of web design that’s growing and being adopted rapidly so you won’t want to miss out on learning it early.
Leigh: "I really enjoyed this course. I was a UX designer before the course and was looking for more information on XD and getting to know the program itself better, and this course really nailed it! It has great UX references and a few refreshing perspectives. As well as it really helps you learn XD in the process. The instructor is engaging and fun to listen to. Really really great course. I highly recommend to any new UX designers, as well as veterans looking for a refresh, or just to learn how to use XD."
There are two class projects for you to complete during this class, these will help develop your skills and will give you something for your own portfolio.
It is now time to upgrade yourself & learn Adobe XD.
target_audience: Anyone who wants to start using Adobe XD in their career & get paid for their user experience design skills.
This course is for beginners, newbies & amateurs in the field of UX design.
Aimed at people new to the world of design & user experience.
For anyone that needs to add ‘UX Design’ to their portfolio.

courses.title: UX Design
courses.bio: Créer des expériences utilisateurs hors du commun pour vos conception web
objectives: Comprendre la différence entre UX Design, UI et Usabilité
Prendre conscience des risques et enjeux de l'UX Design
Apprendre à connaître son utilisateur
Réaliser un userflow et un prototypage
Déjouer les pièges les plus courant d'une interface
Tester son design

Risques et Enjeux: Comprendre les risques potentiels de chaque enjeu
Connaître son utilisateur: Comprendre l'utilisateur et anticiper ses besoins

requirements: Aucun.
courses.description:
L'UX Design, ou User Experience Design, est une discipline fondamentale dans le monde de la conception numérique.
L'UX Design repose sur la compréhension profonde des besoins, des motivations et des préférences des utilisateurs. Il vise à créer des produits et des interfaces qui sont non seulement fonctionnels, mais aussi agréables à utiliser. Au cœur de cette discipline, on trouve la recherche utilisateur, qui consiste à collecter des données qualitatives et quantitatives pour mieux connaître le public cible.
Une fois ces informations en main, les UX designers utilisent des méthodes de conception centrée sur l'utilisateur pour créer des prototypes et des maquettes. Ces prototypes permettent de tester et d'itérer rapidement les idées, en garantissant que l'expérience utilisateur s'améliore constamment.
Le cours abordera également des concepts clés tels que la conception d'interfaces utilisateur intuitives et la gestion de la cohérence visuelle. Vous découvrirez comment créer des wireframes, des prototypes interactifs et des tests utilisateurs pour évaluer la convivialité de vos conceptions.
Dans ce cours, découvrez comment améliorer vos interfaces et pensez vos designs. Il y a des règles à respecter et des patterns efficaces qui vont vous simplifier la vie et celles de vos futurs utilisateurs !
Rejoignez ce cours pour acquérir les compétences essentielles de l'UX Design et devenir un créateur d'expériences utilisateur exceptionnelles qui répondent aux attentes de vos utilisateurs.
target_audience: Aux développeurs ou web designer souhaitant améliorer leur UX

courses.title: دورة تصميم تجربة المستخدم: من نقطة البداية إلي سوق العمل
courses.bio: هذه الدورة هي لكل من يهتم بتصميم تجربة العميل.
objectives: أساسيات تجربة المستخدم
الفرق بين المهام الوظيفية والوصف الوظيفي لمصمم تجربة المستخدم
ستتمكن من تطبيق تصميم متمركز حول المستخدم

فهم معنى سهولة الاستخدام وكيفية اختباره
معنى هندسة المعلومات وأهميتها أثناء التصميم للمستخدم
العناصر والمكونات الأساسية لهندسة المعلومات
(MVP Prototype) كيفية إنشاء واختبار نماذج منتج الحد الأدنى
أنواع النماذج الأولية
(Lean UX) تصميم تجربة المستخدم بمنهجية توفير الموارد

مقدمة عن تصميم تجربة المستخدم: مقدمة في مجال تصميم تجربة المستخدم وما المقصود به
لماذا تعتبر تجربة المستخدم مهمة لمؤسستك وكيفية حساب عائد الاستثمار
المسئوليات المختلفة والوصف الوظيفي لمصمم تجربة المستخدم
التصميم المتمحور حول المستخدم: شرح مفاهيم التصميم التي تركز على المستخدم
لماذا تحتاج إلى تنفيذ عمليات التصميم المتمحور حول المستخدم
مراحل عملية التصميم المتمحور حول المستخدم
تصميم تجربة المستخدم بمنهجية Lean و معمليات التصميم المتمحور حول المستخدم
ابحاث المستخدم: في أي مرحله في التصميم تبدأ ابحاث المستخدم
هندسة المعلومات: ما المقصود بهندسة المعلومات ولماذا هو مهم عند التصميم للمستخدم
النماذج الاولية: ما المقصود بالنماذج الاولية ولماذا هي مهمه

requirements: هذه الدورة لا تتطلب أي خبرات سابقة عن تصميم تجربة المستخدم
تتطلب فقط مهارات استخدام الحاسب الأساسية
courses.description:
هذه الدورة هي مخصصة لمتحدثي اللغة العربية الراغبين بامتهان تصميم تجربة المستخدم. اخترنا مواضيع الدورة التعليمية بعناية فائقة لتركز على، التصميم المتمركز حول المستخدم، بحث المستخدم، سهولة الاستخدام، هندسة المعلومات والنماذج الأولية، مما يسلحك بالمعرفة الكافية لتسهيل دربك نحو الخبرة والاحتراف وذلك من خلال التطبيق المتواصل.

نقطة البداية هي فهم وإدراك أساسيات تصميم تجربة المستخدم وأهميته، وأثناء اقترابنا من خط النهاية ستسنح لك الفرصة بإنشاء نموذج أولي قابل للاختبار والعرض ضمن مجموعة أعمالك الشخصية. هدفنا من هذه الدورة التعليمية هو أن نزودك بالمعرفة الأساسية التي تمكنك من تصميم عناصر تتناسب مع حاجة المستخدم بكل فعالية وكفاءة، لذا ستتعرف على الأسباب التي تجعل من تصميم تجربة المستخدم أحد الأسباب المهمة لنمو المؤسسة، وكيفية استغلال بحث السوق لتقييم حاجة المستخدم الفعلية.

في نهاية هذا المطاف التعليمي باستقلاله وتنوع أساليبه، والذي خطوته بكل حماس وشغف، ستتمكن من صناعة أو إنشاء نموذج أولي قابل للتجربة والاختبار والتقييم. هذا ما يميز دورتنا التعليمية عن غيرنا، لأنك ستتمكن من التجربة عمليًا بدلًا من تداول المعلومات نظريًا.

اكسبيرت لابس هي جهة استشارية متخصصة بتجربة المستخدم مقرها المملكة العربية السعودية، تعرف بكونها عملت مع العديد من الشركات العملاقة وأبرزها هي أرامكو، وأمازون، سبوتيفاي، وشركة الاتصالات السعودية. كرسنا وقتنا وجهدنا لنعلم الآخرين من تجاربنا السابقة لنصمم بأفضل الطرق احترافيًة وتفاعلًا ولكي نستطيع أن نساعد الآخرين ببناء أساسٍ قوي في هذا المجال.
target_audience: هذه الدورة موجهة إلى متحدثي اللغة العربية
من أراد أن يتعلم أساسيات تصميم تجربة المستخدم
من يود أن يمتهن تصميم تجربة المستخدم باحترافية
من يعمل في مجال التسويق الرقمي وتطوير المشاريع وأراد أن يوسع آفاق معرفته حول تصميم تجربة المستخدم
من يهدف لإثراء سيرته الذاتية و ملفه التعريفي.

courses.bio: Woodmaker-Woodworking. Build your own carpenters workbench
objectives: woodworking. Build your own carpenters workbench
what woods to buy
how to interpret the technical plan
how to mount the clamping screw
define the functions of the carpenter's bench
Estimación de los gastos de fabricación del banco

Introducción: 17_Explanation of drilling the mortices with the drill
26_Preparing the supports for the lower shelf
34_Making the lower axis of the vice
35_Adjustments to the lower axis on the vice
36_Glueing the lower axis of the vice
37_Setting the depth for the top part 1
38_Setting the depth for the top part 2

requirements: no
with a little patience, you will get it
courses.description:
In this second course in carpentry and cabinetmaking, you will learn how to make a carpenter's bench step by step. Because you want to know more about wood, because you are interested in everything related to this beautiful trade, because you have only started working in your workshop once and you do not know how to continue but you want to know more or because you want to be a future professional.


My goal is to teach you the steps to follow to achieve your project and to assimilate the theory and practice of building a solid and practical bench.


You will see what are the necessary tools, machines and materials and how to buy them.


- A very interesting and very pleasant exercise to learn to trace with the gramil and work with saws, chisels, drilling and final sanding. So you will see all the steps to follow when carrying out a work in wood. I am adding a technical drawing in pdf of the exercise so you will learn to read a carpenter-cabinetmaker's plan.


-I also attached an exploded view with all the wood with its exact measurements and hardware that you will need.


Here I present this second course so that you know the steps to follow. Of course there is material for years if you want, it depends a lot on the time you can dedicate to it. For this reason, I will be presenting several different works and in different courses so you can learn at your own pace what you like the most. for example: how to make a box with dovetails, how to make a frame with fork assemblies, or how to make marquetry. Different courses that I will offer you from now on.


* It is highly advisable to first complete and assimilate the material from my first initiation course, so that learning will be easier for you.


Some of the courses I currently have:


-BASIC CARPENTRY AND CABINET


- MANUFACTURE YOUR CARPENTER BENCH, with technical drawing and downloadable wood cutting included.


- MAKE YOUR FIRST FURNITURE, a box with dovetails with a technical drawing and a downloadable piece of wood included.


- HOW TO GLUE THE FURNITURE, techniques and tips.


- THE ASSEMBLIES of the carpenter -joiner


- THE BASIC MARQUETRY


I hope you enjoy wood as I have been doing for more than 35 years.


All the best. Jean Baptiste Van den Heede, cabinetmaker.
target_audience: Build your own carpenters workbench
is aimed at beginners

courses.title: Figma Campus: Vollständige Ausbildung zum UX/UI Designer
courses.bio: Komplettpaket zum Figma UI UX Designer mit Abschlussprojekt zum Mitmachen!
objectives: Effektive Nutzung der Figma-Oberfläche und ihrer Tools.
Einsatz von Auto-Layout und Constraints für responsives Design.
Einsatz von Effekten wie Schatten und Unschärfen.
Grundlagen von Typografie, Formen, Farben und Layouts.
Erstellung interaktiver Prototypen mit Animationen.
Aufbau und Verwaltung von Design-Libraries.
Erstellung und Nutzung von Komponenten und Varianten.
Zusammenarbeit im Team und Nutzung von Kommentarfunktionen.
Gestaltung eines kompletten Projekts von der Idee bis zum Launch.
Tipps für den Einstieg in die Praxis als UI/UX-Designer.

Grundlagen der Figma-Oberfläche: Benennung der einzelnen Leisten im Interface.
Grundlagen von Typografie, Formen, Frame: Einsatz von Plugins für z.B. Icons
Styles: Erstellen und Verwenden von Styles (Farbe, Text, Effekte)
Komponenten und Instanzen: Erstellen von Komponenten und erste Instanzen
Praxisprojekt – Erstellung einer flexiblen Button Komponente

requirements: Du brauchst keine Vorkenntnisse! Alles was du wissen musst, lernst du im Kurs!
courses.description:
Du möchtest deine Kreativität freien Lauf lassen und ins Thema Webdesign mit Figma eintauchen?
Dann ist dieser Kurs genau das Richtige für Dich!


In diesem Kurs wird Dir beigebracht wie Du Webseiten, Apps und User Interfaces mit Figma designen kannst.




Hast du dich schonmal gefragt wie es wäre...
dein eigener Boss zu sein?
aufzustehen wann du möchtest?
von Zuhause aus zu arbeiten?
und damit richtig gutes Geld zu verdienen?

All das ist möglich im Leben eines Webdesigners. Und mit diesem Kurs bekommst du die vollständige Ausbildung dazu.


Abschnitt 1: Einführung in den Kurs

Dieser Abschnitt bietet dir einen warmen Einstieg in die Welt von Figma. Du lernst, was Figma so besonders macht und wie du das Tool einrichtest, um sofort loszulegen. Diese Einführung gibt dir einen klaren Überblick über die Kursstruktur und bereitet dich optimal auf deinen Weg zum Figma-Profi vor.


Abschnitt 2: Grundlagen der Figma-Oberfläche

In diesem Abschnitt erkundest du die Benutzeroberfläche von Figma bis ins Detail. Du wirst lernen, wie du Menüs und Werkzeugleisten effizient nutzt, Seiten verwaltest und die Figma-Community als Ressource einbindest. Mit praktischen Tipps und einem Quiz festigst du dein Wissen über die grundlegenden Werkzeuge, die du immer wieder verwenden wirst.


Abschnitt 3: Grundlagen von Typografie, Formen, Frames und Icons

Hier lernst du die essenziellen Bausteine des Designs kennen. Von Typografie über Farben und Formen bis hin zu Layout-Grids und Plugins – dieser Abschnitt vermittelt dir die Grundlagen, um professionelle und visuell ansprechende Designs zu erstellen. Ein Praxisprojekt zur Erstellung eines YouTube-Thumbnails macht das Gelernte direkt anwendbar.


Abschnitt 4: Einführung in die Effekte

Bringe deine Designs auf das nächste Level! Du lernst, wie du Schatten, Unschärfen und andere Effekte geschickt einsetzt, um deinen Entwürfen Tiefe und Eleganz zu verleihen. Dieser Abschnitt ist perfekt, um deinem Stil den letzten Schliff zu geben.


Abschnitt 5: Besondere Tools, Tipps & Tricks

Dieser Abschnitt ist vollgepackt mit Insider-Wissen. Du erfährst, wie du mit Align-, Masking- und Boolean-Tools präzise arbeitest und wie du Historien und Speicheroptionen clever nutzt. Hier lernst du Tricks, die dich schneller und effizienter arbeiten lassen.


Abschnitt 6: Styles

Entdecke die Macht von Styles! Du lernst, wie du Farben, Texte und Effekte standardisierst, um konsistente Designs zu schaffen. Mit dieser Fähigkeit baust du nicht nur schöne Designs, sondern auch effiziente Workflows auf.


Abschnitt 7: Responsive Design mit Auto-Layout und Constraints

In diesem Abschnitt tauchst du in die Welt des responsiven Designs ein. Du lernst, wie du mit Auto-Layout und Constraints flexible Designs für unterschiedliche Geräte erstellst. Ein Praxisprojekt zeigt dir, wie du einen beeindruckenden Smartphone-Login-Screen entwirfst.


Abschnitt 8: Libraries

Hier erfährst du, wie du Design-Libraries erstellst und verwaltest, um deine Arbeit und die deines Teams zu organisieren. Du lernst, wie du Libraries teilst und veröffentlichst, sodass dein Workflow nahtlos und effizient bleibt.


Abschnitt 9: Komponenten und Instanzen

Dieser Abschnitt macht dich zum Meister der Wiederverwendbarkeit. Du lernst, wie du Komponenten erstellst und anpasst, Varianten erstellst und verschachtelte Designs meisterst. Ein Praxisprojekt zur Erstellung einer flexiblen Button-Variante sorgt für den direkten Lerneffekt.


Abschnitt 10: Variablen

Mit Variablen bringst du noch mehr Dynamik in deine Designs. Lerne, wie du Farben, Booleans und Strings als Variablen definierst und so deine Projekte noch effizienter gestaltest. Diese Techniken sind essenziell für professionelle Design-Prozesse.


Abschnitt 11: Animationen und Interaktionen

Lass deine Designs lebendig werden! Du lernst die Grundlagen des Prototypings sowie fortgeschrittene Animationen und Interaktionen. Von Hover-Effekten bis zu Mikrointeraktionen – dieser Abschnitt zeigt dir, wie du Nutzererlebnisse optimierst.


Abschnitt 12: Zusammenarbeit, Team-Funktionen und FigJam

Figma ist perfekt für Teamwork. Hier lernst du, wie du mit Kommentaren, Team-Funktionen und FigJam effektiv zusammenarbeitest. Du entdeckst, wie du Ideen visualisierst und Feedback einholst – ideal für kreative und produktive Teams.


Abschnitt 13: Großes Kursprojekt – Erstellung einer Landingpage

Zum Abschluss setzt du all dein Wissen in die Praxis um. Von der Erstellung eines Moodboards über Wireframes bis hin zum finalen Design einer responsiven Landingpage – dieser Abschnitt führt dich Schritt für Schritt durch ein komplettes Projekt. Animationen, Interaktionen und die Präsentation runden dieses Highlight ab.


Abschnitt 14: Kursabschluss und Fazit

Im letzten Abschnitt deines Lernabenteuers reflektierst du über das Erlernte und erhältst wertvolle Tipps für deine weitere Praxis als UI/UX-Designer. Du erfährst, wie du dein Wissen vertiefst, Projekte selbstständig umsetzt und deinen eigenen Stil entwickelst. Der Kurs endet mit einer Einladung, Feedback zu geben, damit du anderen Teilnehmern hilfst und zukünftige Inhalte mitgestaltest. Mit den Abschlussworten und einem herzlichen Dankeschön wirst du motiviert, dein neues Wissen in der Design-Welt einzusetzen.

Du bekommst sofortigen Zugriff auf:
Über 9 Std. Figma Meisterkurs
Zugang zur Community. Austausch mit allen Kursmitgliedern
Support von Webdesigner Jonah
Lebenslanger Zugriff auf den Kurs und alle zukünftigen Updates

Udemy Zufriedenheitsgarantie
Udemy hat eine 30 Tage 100% Geld zurück Garantie. Wenn Du also doch nicht zufrieden mit dem Kauf bist, bekommst du das gesamte Geld sofort zurück!


Schreibe dich jetzt in den Kurs ein und werde innerhalb kürzester Zeit zum Webdesign-Experten!


Wir freuen uns schon Dich in der ersten Lektion in diesem Meisterkurs begrüßen zu dürfen!
Jonah, Valentin & Marius
target_audience: Anfänger im UI/UX-Design: Perfekt für alle, die ohne Vorkenntnisse starten und professionelle Design-Fähigkeiten aufbauen möchten.
Erfahrene Designer: Ideal, um deine Kenntnisse zu vertiefen und effizientere Workflows mit Figma zu erlernen.
Berufstätige & Teams: Für alle, die Projekte schneller umsetzen, besser im Team arbeiten und moderne Design-Tools nutzen möchten.

courses.title: DFMA Mastery: Unleashing Creativity in Design DFMA TM
courses.bio: Real Time Case Study Design for Manufacturing and Assembly
objectives: Discover how to ignite creativity by observing and analyzing products in the world around you
Learn to derive unique design insights from everyday
Gain a profound understanding of the principles behind Design for Manufacturing and Assembly
Explore how these principles are applied in real-world manufacturing sectors, equipping you with industry-relevant knowledge
Dive into the dissection of various everyday products, including Apple AirPods, bottle caps, plugs, chargers, sockets, switchboards, markers, and chairs
Decode industry ratings and metrics for DFMA, understanding how different strategies impact product evaluation
Learn the basics of DFMA by observing and analyzing simple products in your immediate surroundings
Immerse yourself in detailed demonstrations through images and videos
requirements: Anyone can learn this class it is very simple
Students are advised to take notes for self-reflection purposes
No prior experience is needed to join this course
courses.description:
Embark on a transformative journey into the heart of design innovation with "DFMA Mastery." Join Jagadeesh, a seasoned Mechanical Engineer and award-winning Industrial Product Designer, as he unveils the secrets of Design for Manufacturing and Assembly (DFMA) in this captivating Skillshare course.
Why This Course?
In this dynamic learning experience, Jagadeesh shares over 7 years of diverse industry expertise, encompassing a rich portfolio of 55+ successful projects. Learn not only the theory but the art of applying DFMA principles through real-world examples and hands-on exercises.
What You'll Learn:
Creativity Unleashed: Ignite your creativity by dissecting everyday products, revealing the design insights that make them truly remarkable.
DFMA Principles Demystified: Gain a deep understanding of Design for Manufacturing and Assembly principles and witness how they shape the manufacturing landscape.
Product Analysis Mastery: Dive into the dissection of iconic products, from Apple AirPods to common household items, and evaluate them through the lens of usability, safety, and ergonomics.
Industry Strategies Unveiled: Decode industry ratings and metrics for DFMA, exploring practical examples like joints, screws, and snap fits to understand how professionals evaluate and optimize designs.
Fundamentals from the Everyday: Learn DFMA basics by observing and analyzing simple products in your surroundings, empowering you to apply these principles to enhance your own designs.
Real-time Demonstrations: Immerse yourself in detailed demonstrations through images and videos, gaining practical insights into applying DFMA concepts across various examples.
Who Is This Course For?
Mechanical Engineers
Industrial Product Designers
Product Development Engineers
UI/UX and Graphic Designers
Students in Engineering and Design Fields
Professionals in Manufacturing, Supply Chain, and Strategic Sourcing
Enthusiasts with a Passion for Design
Innovators
Why Enroll?
Transform your approach to design, elevate your skills, and become a DFMA master. Unleash your creativity and learn to design products that not only captivate but are also efficiently manufacturable and easy to assemble. Enroll now and embark on a journey to revolutionize your design thinking.


Courtesy,
Dr. FAK Noble Ai Researcher, Scientists, Product Developer, Innovator & Pure Consciousness Expert
Founder of Noble Transformation Hub TM
target_audience: Industrial Product Designers: Professionals or aspiring designers specializing in industrial product design looking to enhance their skills in creating products optimized for manufacturing and assembly. Product Development Engineers: Those involved in new product development who want to learn how to design products that are not only innovative but also efficiently manufacturable and easy to assemble. Students and Enthusiasts: Students pursuing studies in engineering or design-related fields who wish to supplement their academic learning with practical insights and real-world applications. UI/UX Designers and Graphic Designers: Designers working in UI/UX or graphic design interested in expanding their knowledge to include the principles of manufacturing and assembly, broadening their skill set
Anyone Passionate About Design: Enthusiasts with a general interest in design who want to explore the intersection of creativity and practicality in the design process
Professionals in Related Fields: Individuals working in manufacturing firms, supply chain and logistics, strategic sourcing, and other related industries aiming to gain expertise in the DFMA approach
Mechanical Engineers: Individuals with a background in mechanical engineering seeking to deepen their understanding of design principles in manufacturing

courses.title: 【2021年最新】UX（ユーザーエクスペリエンス）の基本が完全にマスターできる！現場のプロが教える本場のUXデザイン★

本講座で学べること＆ヤスダ先生の自己紹介: これに当てはまる人はぜひ見てください！
ヤスダ先生の自己紹介
UI（ユーザーインターフェース）とUX（ユーザーエクスペリエンス）の概念を知ろう: まずはUI（ユーザーインターフェース）の概念を知ろう！ユーザーとの接点とは？
UIとUXの違いを知ろう（画面そのものとユーザーが感じる体験の違い）
具体的な仕事内容を知ってよりイメージを沸かせよう

courses.title: UX Research
courses.bio: Aplicando pesquisa com usuários
objectives: Conheça e entenda o conceito de user experience design
Tenha uma visão sobre a maturidade do mercado de UX
Aprenda e veja detalhes do processo do UX design
Conheça métodos de pesquisas para entendimento do comportamento do usuário

Conceitos e contexto: O que afinal é UX? Explicando os pontos centrais de uma boa experiência
Porque o UX é essencial para conquistar clientes e impactar negócios?
Por que você deveria se tornar um profissional de UX?
Saindo da zona de conforto, UX = Pessoas + Tecnologia + Negócios
Práticas | Imersão e pesquisa: Métodos de pesquisa - Questionário e Entrevistas
Métodos de pesquisa - Focus Group e shadowing/etnografia
Práticas | Compilação e insights: Como fazer a compilação da sua pesquisa

requirements: Não demanda conhecimentos prévios na área nem estar atuando em projetos de UX
Profissionais que já tem familiaridade com projetos digitais terão mais facilidade com os temas abordados
courses.description:
A Catarinas Design é uma consultoria que atua como parceiro estratégico de UX de seus clientes, que em geral são empresas de tecnologia e startups. Ao longo dos nossos anos de atuação tivemos oportunidade de vivenciar pesquisas em cenários diversos que foram desde granjas no setor agrícola à fábricas e indústrias. Desenvolvemos com isso uma forte habilidade de pesquisa com usuários em situações e projetos dos mais extremos e complexos e resolvemos agora compartilhar esses aprendizados para auxiliar na formação de novos profissionais de UX do mercado.


Este curso é focado em profissionais do design que estão em busca de aprimorar seus conhecimentos em pesquisa ou que estão entrando agora na área de UX design. O curso é básico aborda conceitos, técnicas e dicas práticas sobre como colocar o processo de UX research no seu dia a dia de trabalho. Você vai aprender a melhor conduzir os momentos ANTES, DURANTE e DEPOIS da pesquisa com usuários.


Pré-pesquisa:
Serão explorados temas que te ajudarão a entender o porque a pesquisa é fundamental e argumentos sobre como você pode convencer os seus colegas de trabalho quanto a esse ponto essencial do processo de UX design. Além disso compartilhamos conhecimentos sobre como desenhar um bom planejamento da pesquisa, construir uma matriz CSD e então métodos eficazes de criar um plano de pesquisa para otimizar ao máximo suas abordagens e investigações.


Aplicação da pesquisa com usuários:
No curso compartilhamos as ferramentas e técnicas de pesquisa que mais utilizamos em nosso dia a dia de consultoria de UX. Explicaremos como aplicar questionários, entrevistas, focus groups e etnografia/shadowing em seus projetos de forma simples e objetiva, para ajudar a desmistificar que pesquisas necessariamente precisam longas, complexas e caras.


Pós-pesquisa:
Um ponto central do UX research é como organizar todas as informações coletadas durante as pesquisas realizadas, pois somente aí você realmente consegue concretizar o valor dessa atividade. Compartilhamos formas e atalhos sobre como compilar da melhor forma os diversos dados vindos de uma pesquisa de campo. A organização e apresentação desses dados e descobertas também são fundamentais para isso detalhamos o uso de frameworks como personas e jornada do usuário para auxiliar você nessa tarefa.
target_audience: Designers gráficos

Profissionais entrando ou migrando para a área de UX

courses.title: UX Strategy Fundamentals
courses.bio: Practical principles and simple methods to make sure your app, site or system delivers GREAT UX!
objectives: Develop a clear, solid strategy for UX that applies to any kind of product or project
Use a simple method to determine which features and functions are truly important (and possible)
Understand who your stakeholders really are and what you need to know from each of them
Get all players in a project to agree on what constitutes value — both for users and for the business
Separate what people say they need from what they actually need
Uncover the things users don't know they need (but really do)
Connect user needs with product strategy and requirements
Determine and control the scope of any project
Set the proper expectations for everyone involved and ensure there are no big, expensive surprises later

Determining Strategic Value: First: Why Are We DOING This?
Three Crucial Questions You MUST Ask
What Are We Designing and Building?
What UX VALUE Does it Provide?
Determining User Needs and Business Goal: UX Isn't Just About Users: The UX Value Loop
Business Research: Clients (and Stakeholders) are People Too!
Exercise: What Are YOUR Business Goals?
Decision Paths: Connecting User Needs with UX Strategy
Determining and Controlling Project Scop: The Three Kinds of UX Requirements
Defining and Controlling the Scope of Work
Planning for User Testing: Why Plan for User Testing NOW?
Creating a Test Plan: Who Are We Testing For?
Decide What to Test: Errors and Exceptions

requirements: No experience required. If you're new to UX you'll get everything you need. And if you're a seasoned pro, you'll find some easier, simpler ways of doing what you do.
courses.description:
Building a site, app or system that’s useful, usable and valuable is not easy. Why? Because you have to consider any number of user motivations, expectations, environments and possible actions. You have to figure out how to research, test and analyze to figure out what they want, what they need and what they’ll be willing to use.
And it’s likely you’ll have to do it with half the time and budget you really need.
UX Strategy Fundamentals walks you through the process of doing just that, step-by-step. You’ll learn how to make good UX decisions at every step of the design and development process, and you’ll see how those choices impact product quality and scope.
Whether you’re a designer, developer, UXer or are completely new to ALL of this, you’ll leave this course with a practical understanding of what makes great products great. And you’ll also understand the mechanics of making those products run smoothly, efficiently and with less stress. Taken from Joe Natoli's popular UX & Web Design Master Course taken by more than 7,000 students, this laser-focused course uses lectures and hands-on exercises, to teach you:
The Three Crucial Questions you must ask of every client, every project, every time
Simple methods for determining who your users really are
How to figure out which features and functions are truly important (and realistic)
Simple methods and tools for business stakeholder research
How to identify business goals — and get everyone to agree on them
How to identify true user needs — getting beyond what people say they need to what they actually need
How to connect user needs with product strategy
How to generate meaningful product requirements
How to determine and control the scope of any project
How to set the proper expectations for everyone involved and ensure there are no big, expensive surprises later
These are the same principles and methods I’ve used with the largest companies in the world for nearly three decades. I walk you through everything step-by-step and I only focus on what works. You’ll find clear, straightforward advice, simple tools and real-world examples.
UX Strategy Fundamentals will prove to you that strategy work isn’t just for experts, and it does not have to be complicated.
target_audience: New or experienced UXers, designers, developers, product managers and product owners

courses.description:
Al finalizar este curso tendrás los conocimientos y materiales para construir Lean Personas representativas de tu proyecto o negocio.
Te guiaré paso a paso en cómo aplicar la técnica y crear Personas en el menor tiempo posible. Empezando por la preparación y la facilitación del workshop (taller de co-creación que no tiene que durar más de 2 horas), así como el análisis e implementación de Personas en tu flujo de trabajo.


TOOLKIT
Obtendrás el toolkit completo para que puedas realizar el ejercicio tanto en persona como en remoto. Este kit incluye:
Cuestionario inicial para arranque del proyecto.
Plantilla de listado de participantes.
Plantilla de acuerdo de confidencialidad.
Diapositivas de la presentación y estructura del workshop.
Plantilla final de Persona.


ESTE CURSO ES PARA TÍ SI...
Formas parte de una empresa y quieres incorporar metodologías de Design Thinking centradas en el usuario.
Eres fundador o tienes una idea de un producto o servicio (digital o físico) y quieres identificar y empatizar con tu audiencia.
Estás en el equipo de UX, producto o marketing, y quieres aplicar herramientas ágiles y colaborativas en las decisiones de producto.
Eres consultor UX o trabajas en agencia para múltiples clientes y te gustaría mejorar el arranque de los proyectos para conocer los requerimientos de tu cliente y su audiencia de forma más efectiva.


ESTE CURSO PROBABLEMENTE NO ES PARA TÍ SI..
Buscas aprender conocimientos básicos de diseño UX.
Ya tienes un método ágil para crear Personas.
Ya utilizas Personas en tus decisiones de producto.

Estoy muy contenta de tenerte aquí y espero que disfrutes mucho de Lean Personas conmigo :)

courses.title: Robot structural analysis
courses.bio: “Analyze, Design, and Document Structures with Confidence”
objectives: Understand the interface, tools, and workflow of Autodesk Robot Structural Analysis.
Build accurate structural models using grids, geometry tools, and element definitions.
Define sections, materials, and loads according to international design codes.
Create and manage load cases and load combinations for realistic design scenarios.
Perform structural analysis to evaluate forces, stresses, displacements, and reactions.
Interpret results and validate structural performance against design criteria.
Design and optimize reinforced concrete (RC) and steel elements using built-in design modules.
Generate professional reports and documentation to communicate analysis and design outcomes.
Apply best practices to ensure accuracy, efficiency, and code compliance in structural projects.
requirements: Basic Knowledge of Structural Engineering
Understanding of Reinforced Concrete & Steel Design Principles:
General Computer Skills
courses.description:
This course is a complete guide to Autodesk Robot Structural Analysis, a powerful tool for structural modeling, analysis, and design. It is designed to help students and engineers move from theory to practice by applying structural engineering principles within a modern software environment.
Throughout the course, participants will learn how to:
Build accurate structural models using grids and geometry tools.
Define materials, sections, and supports for different elements.
Apply loads, load cases, and load combinations in compliance with international codes.
Perform structural analysis to evaluate forces, stresses, reactions, and displacements.
Interpret results and check structural performance against design requirements.
Design reinforced concrete (RC) and steel elements using the built-in design modules.
Generate reports and documentation suitable for academic and professional projects.
The course is structured step by step, starting from the basics of the interface and modeling, progressing through load definitions and analysis, and culminating in full design workflows. Emphasis is placed on practical applications, ensuring that students can confidently use Robot Structural Analysis for both academic studies and real-world engineering projects.
By the end of the course, participants will have the skills to model, analyze, and design complete structural systems with Autodesk Robot, ensuring safe, efficient, and code-compliant results.
target_audience: Civil Engineering Students who want to strengthen their understanding of structural analysis and design software
Fresh Graduates and Junior Engineers aiming to build practical skills in structural modeling and design.
Practicing Structural Engineers who want to add Autodesk Robot Structural Analysis to their professional toolkit.

courses.bio: Design Web Sites and Mobile Apps that Your Users Love and Return to Again and Again with UX Expert Joe Natoli.
objectives: Understand user experience design and why it's important
Understand the elements of user experience
Understand how the elements of user experience work together
Understand strategy as an element of user experience
Understand the research process
Identify business goals, and user needs

requirements: Computer with internet connection and web browser
courses.description:
Are your web conversion rates low? Do you know whether your web site is effective at meeting your goals?  Do users get "stuck" and aren't able to complete the tasks they want to?  Are your forms effective? How can your mobile app be improved?

It's becoming easier and easier to create web sites and mobile apps-- But harder and harder to measure the effectiveness of these applications. In Joe Natoli's well-designed course User Experience Design Fundamentals you'll learn how to create effective web sites, mobile sites and mobile applications that encourage conversions and leave users wanting more.

It's not enough to simply have a web presence -- you must have a web presence that's effective to be successful.  In this dynamic course Joe will expand on Jesse James Garrett's pioneering model of the critical elements of user experience -- strategy, scope, structure, skeleton and surface. As you learn you'll be able to apply the knowledge Joe teaches in dynamic lab exercises-- and later to your own work as a developer or designer.

If you're a designer moving into a more complex digital world or a developer who has to occasionally function as a designer as well, this course is for you. You'll feel more confident as you make design related decisions about layout, color, information, design and typography after completing this exciting course.
target_audience: Web Designers

Anyone who wants to make more effective web sites and mobile sites

requirements: Adobe XD 2020 and Above And A Computer
courses.description:
Hi everyone welcome to Adobe XD mega course.
Before I jump into the details of the course I want to quickly tell what adobe xd is used for.
Adobe XD is a simple easy to use application dedicated to UI UX design we can call it user interface or user? basically, we use adobe xd to design mobile apps and websites


Just like our other mega courses this course is designed to take you from absolute beginner to advanced level in UI design.
This course is divided into 4 main parts, basics of design mode, basics of prototype mode, advanced technique and finally working with real projects.


In the design mode basics. We will start with downloading Adobe XD and installing then we will open it for the first time.
I will show you how to work with artboards, shape tools line tools, I will teach you how to use text tools, how to use images easily and effectively. After that, we will cover alignment tools and boolean operations. Then I will show you how to work with components and assets inside XD. later, we will cover a very exciting feature in XD which is a repeat grid. After that, we will cover responsive resize I will show how to use it and how to get an advantage from it for your designs. The last thing we will cover some free Plugins, we will cover the most useful ones. When you finish this part you will have a complete understanding of Adobe XD design tools, you will be ready to use what you have learnt to create some professional design. Together we are going to design two screens of a finance app, we will use all that we learnt in the design mode basics part.
After we covered and practised everything about design mode we will move to the prototype model. We will start with the basics and then we will cover all of the tools and settings in the prototype mode. We will cover time transition, component states, scrolling groups, overly animation, drag animation, sound, voice and keyboard triggers and much more. At the end we will cover an exciting prototype feature which is auto animate, we are going to animate the design we made in the design part with auto animate.
After we covered both design and prototype mode we will cover some advanced techniques. Like 3D transform and animation, Glassmorphisms, input prototype, scroll number scroll colours.
At the end of the course, we are going to create two projects together, the first one is a website homepage for a financial company, we will create it from scratch, we will start with the brainstorming and written form then we will design and prototype it.
The second project will be an e-commerce app, we will start this one from the brainstorming to the design and then to prototyping.
After you finish this course you will have a full understanding of Ui design and Adobe XD. You will be ready to use Adobe XD effectively and professionally. You will be ready to start your carrier with UI design.
target_audience: Beginner who wants to start their UI design carrier and Advanced who want to expand their knowledge in UI Design

requirements: Être ouvert d’esprit et être prêt à passer à l’action.
courses.description:
Programme complet sur le Design Thinking
Cette formation est une introduction au Design Thinking dans le monde de l’entreprise.
Dans cette formation, je partage avec vous les principes et les méthodologies du Design Thinking, créativité et innovation.
Mon objectif à travers cette formation est de vous aider à booster votre créativité grâce à la méthode Design Thinking.
Vous apprendrez les différentes étapes pour mener un projet selon la méthode Design Thinking.
Vous verrez comment découvrir les besoins de vos clients que ce soit au travers des questionnaires ou en créant un avatar.
Vous découvrirez des méthodes pour trouver des idées de façon structurée.
Enfin, vous apprendrez comment créer des prototypes et les tester.
Vous trouverez aussi des exemples et des exercices pratiques pour illustrer chaque point.
Voici quelques témoignages venants de participants à mes cours :
« Je suis content de pouvoir écouter des personnes comme Jamal. C’est concret, il va à l'essentiel, il y a un véritable partage, c'est précis et surtout on sent qu'il sait de quoi il parle avec une belle préparation en amont. Je ne peux que recommander cette formation car c'est clairement un investissement à faire ! ». Salahddine
« Agréablement surpris par ce cours, j'ai appris plein de choses. Du coup, grosse remise en question qui tombe au meilleur moment dans ma vie. Très motivant ! » Nicolas
« Merci pour le concret, la clarté et la synthèse ! ». Lyne
_________________________________________
Pourquoi rejoindre cette formation sur le Design Thinking ?

Si vous voulez apprendre à créer des produits innovants ?
Si vous voulez créer des produits qui répondent aux vrais besoins de vos utilisateurs ?
Ou si vous voulez mettre en place la méthodologie du Design Thinking dans votre entreprise ?
Cette formation est pour vous !
La démarche du Design Thinking est à la mode depuis plusieurs années maintenant. Elle est utilisée par les grandes entreprises comme Google, IBM ou encore Microsoft. Mais en quoi consiste-t-elle exactement ? Comment l’utiliser ? Et comment la mettre en pratique ?
Dans un monde où la compétitivité est de plus en plus féroce, il ne suffit plus de créer des produits innovants, il faut se démarquer.
De nos jours, les produits doivent répondre au plus juste aux besoins spécifiques des utilisateurs finaux. C’est exactement le rôle de la méthode Design Thinking.
Que vous soyez développeur, analyste fonctionnel, designer ou chef de produit, connaitre cette méthodologie peut faire la différence dans vos résultats et dans ceux de votre entreprise.
Vous n’avez pas besoin de deviner, voici juste quelques compétences que vous allez acquérir dans cette formation :
Découvrez les étapes clés de la méthode Design Thinking
Comprenez les vrais besoins de vos clients
Appliquez la méthode Design Thinking pour résoudre vos problèmes de façon créative
Boostez l’innovation et la créativité dans votre organisation
Trouvez des idées plus facilement
Créez et testez vos prototypes avant le lancement de votre produit
Créez et utilisez des storyboards pour présenter vos idées
Et bien plus encore
Ce n’est pas un cours théorique, je partage avec vous des techniques que vous pouvez mettre immédiatement en application. Tout au long de la formation, vous trouverez des exercices pratiques pour appliquer immédiatement ce que vous apprenez.
Maintenant, si vous êtes prêt pour faire passer votre créativité au niveau supérieur, je vous dis à tout de suite à l’intérieur.
target_audience: Cette formation s’adresse à vous si vous voulez découvrir la méthode Design Thinking.
Si vous voulez libérer votre créativité.
Si vous voulez innover de façon structurée.

courses.title: UX: Laws and Fundamentals explained with practical examples
courses.bio: Learn about UX design, and psychological principles and get practical tips on how to apply them in your designs.
objectives: You will understand what UX is and why User Experience design is so important.
You will learn the laws and principles that determine whether a UX is positive or negative.
You will learn about Usability and Usability Heuristics.
You will discover which psychological principles matter in UX design and how to apply them.

Usability: Usability Definition and Heuristics #1: Visibility of system status
Usability Heuristic #3: User control and freedom
Usability Heuristic #2: Match between the system and the real world
Usability Heuristic #7: Flexibility and efficiency of use
Usability Heuristic #8: Aesthetic and minimalist design
Usability Heuristic #9: Help users recognize, diagnose and recover from errors
Huge UX mistakes: learn from historical: The importance of UX. Historical mistakes of large companies.

requirements: You don't need to have any previous knowledge or any other type of requirement to take this course.
courses.description:
Hello! Are you interested in the UX world? Are you a developer looking for a way to optimize your work by understanding the user and their needs? Or are you even a designer and would like to learn more about user experience design?  This course is what you are looking for.
In this short journey into the world of UX design, I will explain what UX is and which are the fundamental principles of User Experience design.
You will learn about usability, Jakob Nielsen's usability heuristics and mental models. I will also explain to you the importance of UX when designing a product or a digital service. Also, you will learn what are the mental models of users and their importance in the design a product or a digital service. I will teach you some of the most important psychological principles in the UX world and which are their most widespread applications. In addition, we will look at some of the historical UX mistakes and the cost to the companies that committed them.
In this course, we will be constantly supported by practical examples, so you will understand how you can apply each of these concepts in your designs. Therefore, this course, despite being a theoretical course, will be especially useful and practical: it will provide you with suggestions and tips that you can apply to your designs to improve your users' experience.
If you are looking for a quick course that is practical and useful, here it is: I'll be waiting for you in the first class!
target_audience: Beginners who want to learn about UX.
Developers who want to understand more about the UX world.
Designers who want to refresh knowledge or learn more about UX.
Anyone looking to approach the world of UX design.
