requirements: لا تحتاج لأي خبرة سابقة في التصميم
لا تحتاج معرفة ببرامج تصميم معقدة
فقط جهاز كمبيوتر واتصال بالإنترنت
courses.description:
ابدأ رحلتك في تصميم واجهات وتجربة المستخدم (UI/UX) باستخدام Figma من الاساسيات وحتى تنفيذ مشاريع واقعية خطوة بخطوة
في هذه الدورة، هتتعلم كل ما تحتاجه لتصبح مصمم واجهات محترف، حتى لو ما عندكش أي خلفية في التصميم. هنبدأ من الصفر: يعني هتفهم الفرق بين UI و UX، وهنمشي مع بعض واحدة واحدة لحد ما تقدر تبني تطبيق حقيقي بنفسك.
هنتعرف على أدوات Figma الأساسية، ونمارس مع بعض Auto Layout، وهنستخدم Variables وStyles وننشئ Components قابلة لإعادة الاستخدام. مش بس كده، كمان هنتعلم إزاي نربط الشاشات ببعض ونعمل Prototype تفاعلي كأننا بنعرض تطبيق حقيقي لعميل أو فريق برمجة. كمان هنستعرض التصميم بتاعنا على اي تليفون عن طريق Figma Mirror عشان نقدر نحدد الابعاد والاحجام الصحيحة للتصميم بتاعنا.
الدورة بالكامل باللغة العربية، ومقسّمة بطريقة مبسطة، كل فيديو مدته قصيرة علشان تستوعب بسهولة وماتحسش بالملل.


وهتشتغل على مشاريع تطبيقية حقيقية زي:
Weather App Design
Landing Page Design
Dashboard Design
هنشرح كمان كل اضافات فيجما الجديدة (Buzz, Draw, Sites, Slides). اللي مش هتلاقيه في مكان تاني مشروح.
بالإضافة إلى ذلك، ستتعلم كيفية التعامل مع أنظمة التصميم، وإنشاء ملفات منظمة تساعدك على العمل ضمن فريق أو كمستقل.
كل المهارات اللي هتكتسبها قابلة للتطبيق في سوق العمل مباشرة.
في نهاية الدورة، هيكون عندك ملف أعمال (Portfolio) تقدر تقدمه لأي شركة أو عميل، وتبدأ شغلك كمصمم UI/UX بثقة وجدية.
target_audience: المبتدئين الذين يرغبون في دخول مجال تصميم واجهات المستخدم (UI/UX) من الصفر
أصحاب المشاريع الناشئة الذين يريدون تصميم واجهات تطبيقاتهم بأنفسهم
طلاب الجامعات والكليات التقنية الراغبين في بناء أساس قوي في تصميم المنتجات
أي شخص مهتم بتعلم Figma واستخدامه في تصميم تطبيقات ومواقع واقعية

courses.title: Visualização De Dados Para Designers
courses.bio: Aprenda como deixar seus dashboards visualmente agradáveis utilizando gráficos da maneira correta
objectives: Ao final do curso os alunos estarão aptos a construir painéis (dashboards) harmônicos capazes de prender e direcionar a atenção do público. Além de capazes de comunicarem com visuais (gráficos) de maneira mais assertiva.

Introdução: O que é visualização de Dados?
O que será abordado no curso

requirements: não
courses.description:
Esse curso é destinado a profissionais/estudantes de Design, UI, UX, áreas afins ou curiosos que possuem o interesse de se especializar em Visualização de dados/ Data Viz.


O curso tem como principal objetivo ensinar como aprimorar o visual de seus painéis utilizando conceitos de Design (DT), tais como:


Descoberta/Entendimento - aqui você irá entender como Identificar o seu público-alvo, compreender o contexto/cenário que esse público está inserido, até chegar a problemas e necessidades reais.
Descrição - nesse momento você irá perceber que é necessário analisar/estudar todo material que foi coletado na primeira etapa do processo, para então estar apto a fazer o levantamento dos indicadores, escolha do gráfico ideal e saber como/onde posicionar os gráficos no painel.
Desenho - nessa terceira etapa você estará pronto para por a mão na massa: construir protótipos de baixa fidelidade e layouts, fazendo uso de técnicas de design capazes de prender a atenção do público-alvo.
Por fim, na última etapa (entrega), você aprenderá a criar documentações funcionais, afim de realizar uma boa entrega.


Ao final do curso, você estará apto a criar painéis do zero, aplicando todas ou grande parte das atividade/técnicas aprendidas e com a segurança de uma entrega mais assertiva.


se quiser uma palhinha do curso, antes de tomar a decisão, as primeiras aulas estão liberadas ;)
target_audience: Estudantes e profissionais de Design, UI, UX e analistas de dados que tenham interesse em aperfeiçoar o visual de seus dashboards.

courses.title: Information Architecture (IA) Fundamentals
courses.bio: Everything you need to know — from what content should be presented to what it’s called to how it’s organized!
objectives: Develop an IA that clearly illustrates the depth of content, its organization and priority.
Label and organize content in a way that makes sense to users.
Rules and methods for organizing the content and flow of a website, app or system.
Identify and diagram the content workflows critical to your product’s success.
Work with clients or stakeholders to find out how content should be edited, approved and published.
Extend an IA to logical structures and naming conventions of the code files that make the product reality.
Make sure your content — and its organization — is relevant, appropriate and useful.
Organize the content and flow of any kind of website, app or system.
The five core types of IA models, and when to use each type.
Five ways to organize and categorize content types that always apply, no matter what you’re creating.
The best way to test and validate your IA with clients, stakeholders and users.
How to use IA work to develop primary, secondary, global and local navigation.
How to determine key navigation paths and test their appropriateness.
My tips for rock-solid IA, based on nearly three decades working with the biggest brands in the world.

Creating Successful IA: Models, Categori: First: My Tips for Successful Information Architecture
Exercise: Turning Information Priority Into an IA Model
The Five Types of IA Models (and Which t: Which IA Model is Right for My Site (or App or System)?
Socializing Your IA: Validating Decisions and Getting Approval
Snack Break: Create and Prioritize Your Own IA Model
Navigation Design: Getting from Here to: Navigation Design for Different User Types

requirements: Nothing. I speak plainly and I deal in reality; no technical terms, jargon or unnecessary acronyms here. This course is for anyone already creating digital products, and anyone completely new to all of it!
courses.description:
Without good, relevant content, there’s no compelling reason for anyone to visit or use the site or app; without clear, understandable structure, no one can find anything! How pages or screens are divided and categorized is a direct result of Information Architecture (IA). What shows up in your navigation menus and interactive controls is a result of IA. The information on a single screen and how people move through it — and what’s connected to it — is the result of IA.
Your physical body can’t perform any task without the bones under your muscles and skin, which are designed to support those actions. In the same way, a site, app or system can’t deliver anything to anyone unless its bone structure — it’s Information Architecture — is specifically designed to support those tasks.

Information Architecture Fundamentals walks you through everything you need to know — from determining what content should be presented to what it’s called to how it’s organized and what format it’s delivered in. Taken from Joe Natoli's popular UX & Web Design Master Course taken by more than 7,000 students, these laser-focused lessons will show you how to:
Develop an IA that clearly illustrates the depth of content, its organization and priority.
Label and organize content in a way that makes sense to users.
Rules and methods for organizing the content and flow of a website, app or system.
Identify and diagram the content workflows critical to your product’s success.
Work with clients or stakeholders to find out how content should be edited, approved and published.
Extend an IA to the logical structures and naming conventions of the code files that make the product reality.
Make sure your content — and its organization — is relevant, appropriate and useful.
The five core types of IA models, and when to use each type.
Five ways to organize and categorize content types that always apply, no matter what you’re creating.
The best way to test and validate your IA with clients, stakeholders and users.
How to use IA work to develop primary, secondary, global and local navigation.
How to determine key navigation paths and test their appropriateness
My tips for rock-solid IA, based on nearly three decades working with some of the biggest brands in the world.
target_audience: Anyone responsible for the success of digital products (apps, sites, systems) — designers, developers, UX professionals, content professionals, marketing folks, project managers and product owners.

courses.title: Figma Masterclass: UI / UX Design & Prototyping
courses.bio: Figma & UX UI Design von A-Z: Webseiten gestalten, Prototypen erstellen, Design-Systeme nutzen & effizient arbeiten
objectives: Grundlagen von UI/UX-Design und deren Unterschiede
Erstellung und Verwaltung von Figma-Projekten
Nutzung der wichtigsten Figma-Tools und -Funktionen
Erstellung von Wireframes, Sitemaps und Userflows
Gestaltung ansprechender und funktionaler UI-Designs
Einsatz von Design-Systemen für Konsistenz und Skalierbarkeit
Erstellung interaktiver Prototypen mit Animationen
Grundlagen des responsiven Designs für verschiedene Geräte
Zusammenarbeit mit Entwicklern und Asset-Export
Nutzung von FigJam und Slides für Ideen und Präsentationen
requirements: Du brauchst keine Vorkenntnisse! Alles was du wissen musst, lernst du im Kurs!
courses.description:
Du bist Designer, Freelancer, Online Marketer oder willst du dich endlich in einem kreativen Bereich selbstständig machen und Geld verdienen?


Dann führt kein Weg an der Figma Masterclass: UI / UX Design & Prototyping vorbei!


Lerne, effizient und kostengünstig Webseiten, Apps und User Interfaces zu erstellen – und meistere Prototyping mit Figma!


Hast du dich schon einmal gefragt, wie es wäre …
Webseiten Projekte effizient und kostengünstig erstellen zu können?
dich endlich in einer Branche selbständig machen und Dienstleistungen hochpreisig anbieten zu können?
deine Dienstleistungspalette erweitern und gutes Geld verdienen?
von überall auf der Welt arbeiten zu können?
dann zu arbeiten, wann du willst, egal ob du Frühaufsteher oder Nachteule bist?
mit deiner Kreativität Geld zu verdienen?


All das ist möglich, wenn du Figma verwendest! Und mit diesem Kurs bekommst du die vollständige Anleitung von A bis Z!


Abschnitt 1: Einführung in den Kurs
In diesem Abschnitt bekommst du einen ersten Überblick über den Kurs, seine Struktur und die Lernziele. Du lernst, was Figma ist, warum es ein unverzichtbares Tool für UI/UX-Design ist und wie sich User Interface Design (UI) von User Experience Design (UX) unterscheidet. Außerdem erfährst du mehr über verschiedene Arten von Webseiten und ihre Ziele.


Abschnitt 2: Figma Account
Bevor du mit dem Designen loslegen kannst, benötigst du einen Figma-Account. Hier lernst du, wie du dich registrierst, welche Lizenzmodelle es gibt und ob du die Software installieren oder im Browser nutzen solltest.


Abschnitt 3: Einführung in Figma (Figma Basics)
Jetzt geht es los mit Figma! Du bekommst eine Tour durch die Benutzeroberfläche, die Community-Features und das Dateimanagement. Damit legst du die Grundlage für effizientes Arbeiten mit dem Tool.


Abschnitt 4: Dein erstes Projekt
Nun wird es praktisch: Du erstellst dein erstes Design-Projekt in Figma. Du lernst, wie du den Datei-Bereich organisierst, Voreinstellungen anpasst und Thumbnails sowie Vorlagen verwendest.


Abschnitt 5: Benutzeroberfläche UI3
Figma bietet viele Arbeitsbereiche – von Assets über Design und Prototyping bis hin zu hilfreichen Plug-ins. In diesem Abschnitt lernst du, wo du welche Funktionen findest und wie du sie effizient nutzt.


Abschnitt 6: Tools Übersicht
Hier bekommst du einen umfassenden Einblick in die wichtigsten Figma-Tools. Du lernst, wie du Elemente bewegst, skalierst, gruppierst und maskierst, sowie Kommentare zur besseren Zusammenarbeit setzt.


Abschnitt 7: Formen
Formen sind die Bausteine deines Designs. Du lernst, wie du Formen erstellst, bearbeitest und mit Werkzeugen wie dem Pen Tool und Pathfinder komplexe Elemente erstellst.


Abschnitt 8: Füllebene
Farben und Bilder sind essenziell für ansprechende Designs. In diesem Abschnitt lernst du, wie du mit Farbverläufen, Bildern, Videos und kreativen Tricks beeindruckende Füllebenen gestaltest.


Abschnitt 9: Design Briefing
Bevor du mit dem Design beginnst, brauchst du ein klares Konzept. Hier erfährst du, wie du ein Design Briefing erstellst und worauf du achten solltest.


Abschnitt 10: Erstes UX Design
Nun tauchst du in die Welt des UX-Designs ein. Du lernst, wie du User Research durchführst, Sitemaps und Userflows erstellst, Wireframes entwickelst und Auto Layout effizient nutzt.


Abschnitt 11: Erstes UI Design
Jetzt geht es an die visuelle Gestaltung! Du lernst, Farben auszuwählen, Grafiken zu importieren, Buttons und Karten zu stylen sowie eine passende Bildsprache zu entwickeln.


Abschnitt 12: Konsistent und skalierbar arbeiten
Um dein Design effizient zu verwalten, brauchst du ein durchdachtes Design-System. Du lernst, wie du Styles, Variablen und Komponenten erstellst und eine eigene Bibliothek aufbaust.


Abschnitt 13: Responsive Design
Moderne Designs müssen auf allen Geräten funktionieren. In diesem Abschnitt lernst du, wie du mit Layout Constraints, Min/Max-Werten und Stacks responsive Interfaces erstellst.


Abschnitt 14: Prototyping
Hier geht es um Interaktivitat! Du lernst, wie du Animationen, Hover-Effekte, Navigationselemente, Carousels und sogar Lottie-Animationen in deinen Prototypen integrierst.


Abschnitt 15: Design Pitch
Dein Design ist fertig – jetzt musst du es präsentieren! In diesem Abschnitt erfährst du, wie du deine Designs professionell pitchst und Prototypen mit anderen teilst.


Abschnitt 16: Übergabe an die Programmierung
Damit Entwickler deine Designs umsetzen können, brauchst du eine saubere Übergabe. Du lernst den Dev Mode kennen, setzt Messungen und Annotationen und exportierst deine Assets.


Abschnitt 17: FigJam
FigJam ist das digitale Whiteboard von Figma. Du lernst, wie du es für Brainstormings, Mindmaps, Userflows und Team-Meetings optimal nutzt.


Abschnitt 18: Slides
Figma bietet auch ein Präsentationstool! Hier erfährst du, wie du mit Slides interaktive Portfolios und Brand Guidelines erstellst, animierst und exportierst.


Abschnitt 19: Weitere Mehrwerte für dich
Zum Abschluss gibt es noch weitere Ressourcen und Tipps, mit denen du dein Wissen vertiefen kannst. Willkommen in der Welt des professionellen UI/UX-Designs mit Figma!


Du bekommst sofortigen Zugriff auf:
8 Stunden Figma Masterclass: UI / UX Design & Prototyping
7 Kursmaterialien zum Download
Praktische Beispiele zum sofortigen umsetzen
Support von David, Geschäftsführer und Figma Experte
Lebenslanger Zugriff auf den Kurs


Udemy Zufriedenheitsgarantie
Udemy hat eine 30 Tage 100% Geld zurück Garantie. Wenn Du also doch nicht zufrieden mit dem Kauf bist, bekommst du das gesamte Geld sofort zurück!

Ich freue mich schon Dich in der ersten Lektion der Figma Masterclass begrüßen zu dürfen!

courses.title: Fundamentos de UX, UX Research, UI, CX e Service Design 2024
courses.bio: Conheça o que fazem os profissionais que mais se destacam e geram resultados em todo mundo em 2024 (trabalhe de casa)
objectives: Entenda o que é Design e como ele se relaciona com Inovação e Negócios
Desmistifique da forma CORRETA o que é Design de Experiência do Usuário
Entenda a diferença entre UX e UI
A relação entre User Experience (UX) e Customer Experience (CX)
Descubra o que é Service Design e como se relaciona com produtos
Compreenda a Diferença entre Usuário, Cliente e Cliente do Cliente

Fundamentos que você precisa saber sobre: O que você aprenderá nesse curso
Exemplos de trabalhos de UX de destaque
UX e CX - Usuários, clientes, clientes do cliente
Pesquisa em UX, Empatia e Alteridade

requirements: Não precisa saber desenhar
Não precisa ter nascido com dom criativo
Não precisa saber programar
courses.description:
Esse curso é a primeira aula oficial do nosso programa mais avançado em UX Design. Um programa que em menos de 12 meses ajudou quase 1000 pessoas a conquistarem sua primeira vaga ou crescerem na carreira chegando até mesmo a triplicar os seus salários.


Nossos alunos foram contratados por empresas de diversos tamanhos e segmentos incluíndo unicórnios que valem mais de 1 bilhão de dólares como Unico, Movile, Stone e muitas outras.


Nesse curso você entenderá o que é a profissão UX e o que fazem os profissionais que trabalham com:


- Design,
- UX Design,
- UI Design,
- Service Design,
- Customer Experience,
- Inovação centrada na experiência dos usuários.


Nosso objetivo NÃO é te ensinar toda a profissão, pois temos formações profissionalizantes mais avançadas de 3 a 18 meses.


Nosso objetivo é ajudar quem ainda não conhece a área a entender se gosta dela e se faz sentido aplicar em seu dia a dia e até mesmo migrar de carreira.


Além de entender os conceitos, você verá um exemplo de trabalho de Teste de Usabilidade aplicado em um caso de estudo prático. Essa técnica de pesquisa e avaliação de experiências é uma das mais utilizadas e desejadas pelas empresas que buscam profissionais da área.
target_audience: Iniciantes na área de inovação e design
Quem já ouviu falar que UX é a profissão do presente e do futuro e precisa entender o que é de uma vez por todas
Programadores, Gestores e qualquer pessoa que queira entender rapidamente o que é Design e UX de fato

Here’s the fully extended version with 50 more words for even stronger engagement:
Starting a UX project the right way is everything!
In this video, I’ll walk you through the most important first step in UX design—because how you begin will shape the entire project journey.
What You’ll Learn:

Ready to elevate your UX game? Watch now and take your skills to the next level!
#UXDesign #UserExperience #UXTips #UXResearch #DesignThinking #UIUX #ProductDesign #UXStrategy #DesignLeadership

courses.bio: Plan usability testing / user testing studies for UI UX Design process in 2024 (with hands-on exercises)
objectives: Importance of Usability testing in UX Design process
Plan and execute real-life usability tests for your projects
Recruit the right participants for User / Stakeholder Interviews
Collect and analyse behavioural data for qualitative user research
How to analyse & prioritize findings & present it to stakeholders

Understanding the basics: Why is it important to focus on usability?
Why is focus on usability more important NOW than ever before?
When is it most helpful to do usability test?
Planning & preparation: Assignment: Write the test goals for your project

requirements: Passion and willingness to improve the UI/UX of digital products (including mobile and tablet apps on iOS / Android, websites, web applications, desktop software etc.)
Computer, headset and a internet connection, to conduct usability studies online effectively.
courses.description:
No matter how much effort do we put in UX Research, we still make many assumptions during the ideation & prototyping. To minimize business risk, it is crucial to validate our designs. Usability testing (or simply user testing) is the most effective method for uncovering usability issues in apps or websites.
I have mastered usability tests by practicing it for over a decade now! I have packaged all of that for you learn in a course just under 2 hours.


We will cover a range of topics including but not limited to:
What is usability testing & why is it important?
What are different type of usability tests?
How to keep your biases out throughout the test process?
The art of "shutting up and observing"
Planning usability testing sessions
Where & how to find test participants?
Learn to moderate like a pro
Analysing and reporting the findings
By the end of this course, you will be a skilled test moderator with the knowledge and confidence to conduct usability tests. You will be able to answer questions such as:
How to speed up the process of collecting user feedback?
How to do UX research on a budget with limited resources/budget/users?
How to get actionable insights our of usability testing studies?
As part of this course, you will get access to:
Lifetime access to video content
Five hands-on usability testing exercises
Downloadable UX resources to get you started today


If you specialise in any of these areas related to UI/UX design, learning Usability Testing as a skill will help you up-skill yourselves in your career: Design Theory, Design Thinking, Graphical User Interface, Information Architecture, Integration Testing, Interactive Design, Personas, Product Design, Prototyping, Research Methods, Sketch Software, Technical Writing, User Experience Design, User Interface, User Research, Wireframing, Adobe XD, Figma
So, are you ready to add Usability Testing as a skill to your resume as a product UX designer? Sign up now!
target_audience: Designers who want hands-on techniques for evaluating their designs with end users of mobile apps or websites (including UI/UX Designers, UX researchers, Graphics & Visual designers)
Students aspiring to start a career in User Experience field.
Junior designers who want to upskill themselves in the principles of Usability Testing for career growth.
Product Managers (PMs) and founders who want to choose the right usability test for the current product lifecycle stage, and validate the designs before development.
Product Marketing Managers who want to understand user behaviour for reducing drop rates or churn, increase conversion & retention rates and drive optimal product positioning.

courses.description:
This online course helps you collect data that really matter, be more relaxed when interviewing and facilitate your analysis of the results.
A carefully crafted interview guideline is needed for any kind of interview, UX test or prototype testing and your key to successful research.
A well-prepared interview guideline
Helps you plan your research and structure your thoughts
Facilitates the full alignment with all team members and stakeholders on goals and key areas of the research
Reduces your stress during the interview
Allows you to have enough time for the important topics during the conversation and skip unimportant topics

What you will learn in this course:

courses.title: Kurs Sketch
courses.bio: Projektowanie UI
objectives: Ustawienia Interfejsu
Tips & Tricks
Narzędzia wektorowe
Praca z symbolami
Przegląd ważnych technik i skrótów
Eksport grafik
Kolory, Ikony i Typografia
Praktyczny Projekt UI
requirements: Podstawowa umiejętność obsługi komputera
courses.description:
Wprowadzenie
Sketch to aplikacja, która w ostatnim czasie zdobyła serca wszystkich, którzy projektują UI czy UX, choć tak naprawdę Sketch to program, którego nauczyć może się każdy. Oprócz licznych zalet, Sketch posiada także jedną dużą wadę - dostępny jest wyłącznie na platformę Mac OS. Jeśli jednak jesteś szczęśliwym posiadaczem Mac'a - grzechem byłoby nie wykorzystać potencjału, który tkwi w pracy w Sketch'u. Zapewniam Cię, że praca z grafiką i projektowanie interfejsów jeszcze nigdy nie było tak szybkie i przede wszystkim - przyjemne.
Ustawienia Interfejsu
Przegląd ważnych technik i skrótów
Tips & Tricks
Eksport grafik
Narzędzia wektorowe
Kolory, Ikony i Typografia
Praca z symbolami
Praktyczny Projekt UI


Dlaczego Sketch?
Ponieważ to aplikacja, która została stworzona wyłącznie w jednym celu - pracy z grafiką wektorową pod kątem UI. To dlatego Sketch zyskał ogromną przewagę nad narzędziami takimi jak Pohotoshop czy Illustrator, które są przeładowane funkcjami, a co za tym idzie - praca w nich staje się mniej wydajna. To tak, jakby chirurg podczas operacji nie używał precyzyjnego skalpela, tylko scyzoryka Swiss z dziesiątkami narzędzi. Szybsza praca, mniejsze pliki, lepsza wydajność a także dedykowane dla UI narzędzia i setki przydatnych pluginów napisanych przez społeczność sprawią, że szybko uzależnisz się od Sketch'a! Nie wspominając już o cenie, która jest w zasięgu każdego i braku konieczności subskrypcji!


Co w Kursie?
Kurs opracowałem tak, abyś poznał Sketch'a od najlepszej strony, mogąc w pełni wykorzystać jego potencjał. Niektóre zagadnienia, jak eksport grafik, lepiej wypunktować w krótkich lekcjach teoretycznych, natomiast inne, jak przygotowanie pod tworzenie nowego projektu - w praktyce. Dlatego podzieliłem Kurs na dwie części - w pierwszej otrzymasz skompresowaną do granic pigułkę wiedzy z przeglądem setek ważnych technik i skrótów klawiaturowych, tipsów i trików. Ta część została nagrana z ekspresową narracją i dzieje się w niej tak dużo, że zapewne będziesz wiele razy zatrzymywał wideo... o to chodzi! Wracaj do tych lekcji, kiedy tylko będziesz potrzebował odświeżyć podstawowe informacje. Druga część jest w 100% praktyczna, gdzie koncentrujemy się na wykorzystaniu poznanych w teorii technik do zaprojektowania kilku ekranów aplikacji inteligentnego domu. Dopiero obejrzenie obu części gwarantuje efekt w postaci przyswojenia potrzebnej wiedzy z aplikacji, ale także tego, jak tą wiedzę przełożyć na codzienną pracę z projektami.


Nowa Era w Projektowaniu UI
Ten Kurs to esencja nowego podejścia do projektowania nowoczesnych interfejsów użytkownika. Z trudem mogę pohamować entuzjazm z powodu kierunku, który wyznacza materiał jaki dla Ciebie przygotowałem. Kurs jest uzupełniony dziesiątkami dodatkowych technik i materiałów - jego przerobienie zapewne sprawi Ci dużo frajdy, jednak dopiero kiedy dowiesz się, że to dopiero początek wspaniałej przygody z nowoczesnymi narzędziami dla UI i UX Designerów, zrozumiesz, że otwiera się dla Ciebie zupełnie nowy rozdział. Kolejno pochłoną Cię narzędzia do prototypowania, tworzenia mikrointerakcj, w końcu eksportowania designu do front-endu i aplikacji, od czego dzieli nas naprawdę niewiele! To, jak szybko przejdziesz na drugą stronę lustra zależy tylko od Ciebie i od tego, czy podejmiesz wyzwanie z tego Kursu.


Skompresowana Teoria
Część teoretyczna to kompendium niemal wszystkich narzędzi, skrótów, tipów i tricków w Sketch'u, które niczym niebieska pigułka w Matrixie napełnią Twoją głowę pomysłami i oswoją z aplikacją. Będziesz do niej często wracał, ponieważ prezentowane techniki to wiedza, niekiedy tajemna, w najczystszej postaci. Mimo, że to teoria, nie będzie nudno!


Interfejs Sketch'a i Narzędzia
Dowiesz się jak sprawnie poruszać się po interfejsie aplikacji, jak zorganizować swoje pliki w Page czy Artboard'y, jak wyciągnąć maksimum z możliwości organizacji warstw, grup czy symboli. Poznasz też narzędzia, z których będziemy korzystać w dalszych częściach kursu.


Eksport Grafik
Poznasz rozmaite warianty eksportu grafiki, czy to w postaci finalnych plików dopasowanych idealnie do nowoczesnych urządzeń, czy czystego kodu SVG czy CSS. Dowiesz się jak przygotować komponenty do eksportu w ten sposób, aby wszystkie rozmiary i niezbędne formaty eksportowane były automatycznie.


Narzędzia wektorowe
Sketch w całości opiera się o wektory. Tworzenie ikon i praca z kształtami jest prosta, szybka i przyjemna. Atut takiego podejścia to możliwość wyeksportowania projektu na dowlone urządzenie i skalę. Poznasz dobre podejście do pracy z wektorami a także najważniejsze techniki i skróty, które zapewnią wysoką wydajność.


Kolory, Ikony i Typografia
W pracy z praktycznym projektem dowiesz się jak stworzyć Style Guide z kolorami, typografią czy jak wykorzystać ikony w taki sposób, aby były reużywalne w projekcie i abyśmy mogli zachować spójność, co jest niezwykle ważne w tworzeniu profesjonalnych interfejsów.


Praca z Symbolami
Symbole w Sketch to reużywalne komponenty, dzięki którym możemy budować złożone, spójne aplikacje w rekordowym czasie. To jedna z najbardziej potężnych funkcji nowych wersji Sketch'a, a zagnieżdżanie Symboli i ich zaawansowane ustawienia jak Override'y wykorzystamy w praktyce w naszym projekcie. Dzięki Symbolom praca w konwencji tzw. Atomic Design, czyli atomów, molekułów i organizmów - nabiera sensu i jest niezwykle wygodna, a eksport do CSS czy SVG jest w zasięgu ręki.


Praktyczny Projekt UI
W drugiej części Kursu skupimy się na stworzeniu kompletnego projektu w schemacie Mobile First. Na jego przykładzie poznasz konkretne zestawienia technik wykorzystywane w kontekście projektowym. Zaczniemy od konfiguracji Grida i ustawień Artbordów, przez projektowanie ikon i Symboli aż do gotowych plansz aplikacji. Ta wycieczka po konkretnych funkcjach Sketch'a nie tylko pozwoli Ci uporządkować wiedzę z części teoretycznej, ale także zrozumieć właściwe praktyki płynące z wielu projektów wykonanych w tej aplikacji.


Działający Prototyp
Na koniec, w oparciu o prostą metodę (tzw. Rapid Prototyping) i darmową aplikację Marvel App, stworzymy działający prototyp, który będziesz mógł wysłać np. z pomocą SMS na telefon, na którym można będzie go uruchomić. Zaplanujemy przejścia plansz oraz animacje, a wszystko to zrobimy w rekordowym czasie!


Prototypowanie w Sketch!
Nowość - kurs został rozszerzony o lekcję, w której dowiesz się jak działają funkcje prototypowania w aplikacji Sketch, które pozwalają szybko stworzyć działający, interaktywny prototyp aplikacji. Metoda, którą wykorzystujemy to tak zwane Rapid Prototyping, czyli szybkie prototypowanie w oparciu o przejścia plansz i hotspoty, na razie nie możemy natomiast tworzyć bardziej złożonych animacji czy mikrointerakcji. Na potrzeby prezentacji flow w naszym projekcie jest to jednak świetne rozwiązanie, a możliwość zaprezentowania takiego prototypu przez udostępnienie go w chmurze Sketcha czy podgląd na urządzeniu z pomocą aplikacji Sketch Mirror pozwala na przetestowanie Twojego projektu jeszcze w Sketchu!


Dla kogo jest ten kurs?
Sketch jest narzędziem, którego może (i powinien;) nauczyć się każdy użytkownik Mac'a. To prosta aplikacja, w której możesz pracować zarówno z grafiką wektorową, jak i edytować bitmapy. Osoby bardziej zaawansowane mogą zadać pytanie - po co się go uczyć, skoro to tak proste narzędzie. Okazuje się jednak, że pełny potencjał tego fantastycznego programu tkwi głębiej, a kolejne odkrywane techniki sprawią, że przeżyjesz wiele - 'a więc to tak można!' - momentów. Zdecydowanie jest to materiał, który zadowoli także osoby bardziej zaawansowane w projektowaniu UI, a nawet tych z Was, którzy już od jakiegoś czasu korzystają ze Sketch'a!


Sketch tylko na mac OS?
A co z użytkownikami systemu Windows? Cóż, to prawda, że Sketch dostępny jest tylko na komputery firmy Apple - istnieją jednak sposoby, aby korzystać z dobrodziejstw systemu mac OS również na PC i laptopach wyposażonych w bardziej popularny system Windows. Więcej o takich możliwościach przeczytacie tutaj. Nie jest to proste rozwiązanie i nie możemy polecać go dla każdego, ale wysiłek może okazać się wart zachodu - szczególnie, że większość nowoczesnych narzędzi do UI i UX designu dostępnych jest w wersjach na system mac OS.


Dlaczego wybrać właśnie ten kurs?
Kurs wideo to najbardziej efektywna a zarazem najprzyjemniejsza forma nauki. Jest on tak prowadzony, byś cały czas mógł go śledzić z zainteresowaniem i zaangażowaniem, a także czerpać satysfakcję ze zdobytej wiedzy!
Wiedza, którą otrzymujesz w tym kursie, to nie tylko sucha teoria, ale również wskazówki od praktyka z wieloletnim doświadczeniem, dzięki którym dużo łatwiej będzie Ci opanować materiał i pracować efektywniej.
Uczysz się na praktycznych przykładach. Kurs, który masz przed sobą to esencja praktycznej wiedzy i doświadczenia a także wzorów, które oszczędzą Ci godziny pracy i poszukiwań.
target_audience: Sketch jest narzędziem, którego może (i powinien;) nauczyć się każdy użytkownik Mac'a. To prosta aplikacja, w której możesz pracować zarówno z grafiką wektorową, jak i edytować bitmapy. Osoby bardziej zaawansowane mogą zadać pytanie - po co się go uczyć, skoro to tak proste narzędzie. Okazuje się jednak, że pełny potencjał tego fantastycznego programu tkwi głębiej, a kolejne odkrywane techniki sprawią, że przeżyjesz wiele - 'a więc to tak można!' - momentów. Zdecydowanie jest to materiał, który zadowoli także osoby bardziej zaawansowane w projektowaniu UI, a nawet tych z Was, którzy już od jakiegoś czasu korzystają ze Sketch'a!

courses.title: AI in UX Design
courses.bio: Improve your design skills using AI - Apply AI tools for each stage of design process and improve your craft of design
objectives: How AI is game Changer for UX design and Research
Using AI for ideation and conceptualization.
Using AI for UX Writing.
Using AI for User Research
AI Tools for UX Writing and Usability testing

Introduction: Do you need to know how AI works
UX and AI: Why use AI in UX design
How to Design in age of AI
AI For Ideation: AI For brainstorming and generating ideas
AI For UX writing: AI Helps in UX Writing and Content Design
AI For User Research: How AI add advantage in doing User research

requirements: No prior knowledge of AI is required.
A curiosity to learn how AI is changing UX Design and research paradigm is all you need!
courses.description:
In the age of Artificial Intelligence, this course presents a unique opportunity to blend traditional design principles with cutting-edge AI applications and tools.
Participants will embark on a comprehensive journey through the realm of AI in design, gaining insights into how AI enhances user experiences and streamlines design processes. The course covers popular AI tools such as Writer, Copy, and Jasper, showcasing effective techniques for leveraging ChatGPT to generate compelling prompts.
The curriculum offers an in-depth exploration of AI's role in ideation, UX writing, and user research. Participants will learn to integrate AI into the design process, gaining valuable insights into user behavior and refining UX writing through usability testing. A significant portion of the course addresses the limitations of AI. Participants will also learn how to design with AI. This course also includes the free AI tools that UX designers and researchers can use to do usability testing.
Ideal for UX/UI designers, product managers, graphic designers, user researchers, web developers, and anyone passionate about integrating AI into their design processes, this course is designed to keep professionals ahead of the curve in their current roles and explore new horizons in design. Join me and unlock the future of design.
target_audience: This course is for designers, product managers, UX professionals, and enthusiasts who are eager to explore the potential of AI in UX design and Research.
Students and Academics: Students in design, computer science, or related fields, as well as academics looking to stay abreast of the latest AI applications in design.
Freelance Designers: Independent designers and consultants looking to offer cutting-edge AI-integrated design services to their clients.

courses.title: Figma를 활용한 디지털 기획 입문
courses.bio: 디자인 비전공자도 쉽게 다룰 수 있는 기획 도구!
objectives: Figma의 기본적인 개념과 활용법
Agile형 작업 프로세스의 구조
실전 프로젝트를 통해 무한한 디자인적 상상력 발휘
전 세계 디자이너들이 만든 템플릿 사용
requirements: 실습 위주의 강의로, 강의 화면과 실습 화면을 분리할 수 있는 듀얼 모니터 또는 여분 기기 활용을 권장드립니다.
Windows OS 기반으로 실습이 진행되므로, Windows 환경에서의 강의 수강을 추천 드립니다.
courses.description:
"어제보다 성장하겠습니다. 그리고, 어제보다 성장하려는 사람을 돕겠습니다."


마소캠퍼스의 진심과 소망을 담은 Actionable Content로,
2013년부터 온오프라인으로 함께해 온 누적 강의 1억시간!
이 소중한 경험과 시간은 언제나 마소캠퍼스와 수강생 모두의 성장의 원천입니다.


-


Figma란?
현재 웹 디자이너, 개발자 모두에게 가장 주목받는 디자인 툴로
UXtools 서베이에서 가장 흥미롭고 발전이 기대되는 툴로 Figma가 선정되었습니다.
특히 단순히 UI디자인 영역에 한정되는 것이 아닌 "디자인 소프트웨어"로서,
과거 포토샵의 위상만큼이나 대중적인 소프트웨어로 자리잡을 것입니다.
윈도우, 맥, 웹 브라우저 어디에서도 접근이 가능하고,
웹 기반 프로그램으로 별도로 설치를 하지 않아도 되기 때문에 활용 범위가 넓습니다.
실시간 동시 작업 기능을 제공함으로써 작업 시간이 단축되고,
다양한 아이디어 도출 등 업무 효율성을 높일 수 있습니다.


본 강좌를 통해 주요 기술 용어에 대한 핵심 구조를 이해하고 기획에서부터 마케팅까지 활용해볼 수 있습니다.


1. Figma의 개념부터 활용까지 알찬 기초 다지기
‘Figma'에 대해 들어는 봤지만 제대로 활용하지 못하거나,
활용하고 있지만 어려워하는 사람이라도 부담없이 시작할 수 있습니다.
프로그램의 개념과 기초 지식을 차근차근 쌓아가며 프로젝트에 활용할 수 있습니다.


2. 단순한 흐름의 제작 방식이 아닌, 유기적인 흐름의 제작 방식
단순히 앞,뒤로만 이동하는 직선적인 프레젠테이션 자료가 아니라,
원하는 페이지로 이동하고 이미지나 동영상 자료를 아주 쉽고 정교하게 편집하여 배치할 수 있습니다.


3. 사내 인사이트 공유를 넘어 실전 기획까지
실시간 협업을 통해 여러 사람이 동시에 같은 파일을 작업할 수 있어 팀원들 간의 협업을 순조롭게 도와줍니다.
커뮤니티 템플릿 활용법을 익혀 실전 프로젝트에 적용해 적절한 결과물을 만드실 수 있습니다.


마소캠퍼스의 <Figma를 활용한 디지털 기획 입문> 강의를 듣고 나면, 여러분께서는 다음과 같은 역량을 확보하실 수 있습니다.


1. Figma에 대한 이해 : Figma가 가진 강력한 기능들에 대한 전반적인 이해 능력
2. 다양한 도구 활용 : 어댑티드 레이아웃, 플러그인, 컴포넌트 등 다양한 기능들에 대한 이해 능력
3. 커뮤니티 템플릿에 대한 이해 : 수많은 디자이너가 공유한 디자인 리소스를 통한 업무 생산성 향상


디지털 시대의 필수 역량들을 모두 키워가실 수 있습니다.
누구보다 빠르고, 탄탄하게 Figma를 완전 정복해보세요!


-


[ 강 사 소 개 ]
유서호
現 마소캠퍼스 이사
서울대학교 졸업
유서호 이사는 서울대학교를 졸업 후 대우정보시스템에서 ERP 시스템을 개발하였으며, 네이버, 라이엇게임즈, 에픽게임즈 등 국내외 유명 IT 기업에서 개발 및 데이터분석 업무를 담당했다. 네이버에서는 지식iN, 카페, 블로그 등 다양한 데이터를 기반으로 한 서비스 개선 프로젝트를 진행했으며, 책, 웹툰 등 수천만의 대중들에게 사랑 받는 서비스 프로젝트를 이끌며, 대용량의 데이터를 실무에서 직접 활용하는 업무를 주로 담당했다. 라이엇게임즈 및 에픽게임즈에서는 수많은 해외 프로젝트를 진행하여 국내뿐 아니라 해외 최신 기술 동향에까지 해박한 지식을 갖추고 있으며, 최신 기술 트렌드를 실무에 직접 적용하는 경험까지 겸비한 글로벌 트렌드 전문가이기도 하다. 최근까지도 데이터 분석, 블록체인, 머신러닝에까지 이르는 최신 IT 기술 분야에서의 폭넓은 실무 경력과 전문지식을 쌓아 온 현장전문가로 마소캠퍼스의 데이터분석 분야에서 현장의 생생한 경험을 바탕으로 한 테크 기반 콘텐츠를 직접 생산하여 전달하는 역할을 수행하며, 수강생들의 IT 기술과 데이터분석 역량을 높이는 역할을 담당하고 있다.


-
target_audience: UX 디자인이 처음이신 분들
의미있는 성과를 내야하는 직장인 분들
마케팅 직무 입사/ 이직을 꿈꾸는 분들
소프트웨어 개발자와 의사소통을 원활하게 하고자 하는 현업 종사자
"창업/입사/직무전환/리스킬/탤런트 트랜스포메이션"을 꿈꾸는 분들

Subtitles, video quality, your certificate, tips on watching & common course Q&A

courses.description:
This is an interview style course where I interview Alex Harris who is an expert and an authority in website conversion optimization to increase sales.
In the course you will learn strategies that Alex uses to optimize sales conversion, tools he recommends, and social media tips and tricks he shares as well. He also shares a couple of case studies for how he gets customers with his podcast and he he was able to get a lot of professional referrals to bring him clients.
This course is about 1 hour of video content. The course is almost all video. Some of the lectures are theoretical discussing tools and strategies. And some of the videos give actionable suggestions for things to try to improve conversion on various platforms like your website, email, Twitter and Facebook.
OFFICE HOURS WITH PERSONAL HELP
What really sets this course apart is the bi-weekly regular office hours I hold with students in this course. The office hours are a group call with other students where you can make connections and get extra business advice from a real expert. During the office hours you can ask me any business question you want, and I will do my best to help you. The office hours are free, I don't try to sell anything. It is just another thing I do to make your course experience better.
I form many amazing and long-term business relationships with people in my courses and I hope one day I can meet you.
MONEY BACK GUARANTEE
This  course comes with an unconditional, Udemy backed, 30 day money-back guarantee. It is also my personal promise to you that you will get great value from the course and succeed.
Join me and my community of successful students, right now. See you in class.
target_audience: Entrepreneurs
Website owners
Online marketers

courses.title: 智能硬件产品：从0到1方法与实践
courses.bio: 从概念方法到丰富案例拆解，系统建立智能硬件产品设计与实践全景认知，5步规划好智能硬件产品
objectives: 掌握C端产品中的5种AI选择和5步规划好产品的方法论
掌握智能硬件产品搭建的4大核心环节
通过具体案例来掌握智能硬件从0到1的搭建流程
帮助企业了解智能硬件产品搭建的全流程

二、智能硬件从0到1搭建流程: 2.智能硬件产品的分类和盈利模式

requirements: 有一定产品设计经验，了解智能硬件
courses.description:
智能硬件行业从开始的火爆期逐渐驶入理性期，智能硬件产品不仅要有光鲜的外表，还要有技术含量；不仅要有好的工业设计，还要能够抓住用户痛点。
那么，如何建立一套较完善的智能硬件设计体系？
本课程不仅讲解了在产品中如何规划和运用AI，还为你从概念到案例详细起底了智能硬件产品从0到1的搭建流程，内容涵盖了智能硬件产品的分类和盈利模式、市场机会（市场定位）、产品定位（产品化）、产品需求和概念、工业设计（硬件）、软件设计、可用性测试、上市准备等。
通过老师的细致讲解和实战案例分享，你能掌握5步规划好AI产品的方法，能对智能硬件从0到1的方法与实践有系统的认知，能够按照课程提供的思路，结合以往的产品经验，完成相应场景下的智能硬件产品的搭建和创新，推动智能硬件产品的蓬勃发展。
讲师铃儿，科大讯飞交互设计专家。拥有5年+智能硬件+语音交互设计经验，主导过销量百万级的行业爆品完整设计，擅长To C软硬件一体化设计思维。

courses.description:
Adobe XD is a brand new design and prototyping tool created by Adobe specifically for UI/UX designers.
In this course, I will teach you the fundamentals of this new software and show you how to design a beautiful and modern iOS mobile app step by step.
Adobe Xd is a UI/UX tool that allows you to work at breakneck speed to create beautiful designs and user experiences.
Adobe Xd is ideal for design because it is free, cross-platform, vector-based, and receives regular updates.


Hello, my name is Ayman Taher, and you will learn the following in this course:


What exactly is Adobe Xd?
It provides design tools.
Tools for bringing your designs to life
How to Work with Various Files
How to Distribute Your Work
And how to get started with UI Kits in your designs.


This course is designed for beginners and those interested in Adobe Xd. You do not need any prior knowledge of Adobe Xd; we will cover everything in this course.


Using Adobe Xd, you can achieve all of your UI / UX design goals, start your career, share your designs, and improve your skills for free.

This course takes a hands-on approach to learning. There won't be much theory; it'll all be about teaching you how to design a real-world mobile product and demonstrating Adobe XD's full potential.


By the end of the course, you will have a clear understanding of how Adobe XD works and will be able to apply the design techniques, productivity tips, and skills you have learned in your future design projects.

courses.title: Design Unveiling BMW's Legacy at the BMW Museum, Germany TM
courses.bio: Real Time Case Study
objectives: Designer's Perspective Mastery
BMW Design Evolution
Architectural Appreciation
Data-Driven Insights and Trends
Form Language and Sensual Experience Design
Exploration of BMW's Design Houses
Practical Documentation Skills
Application of Design Principles in Real-Life Settings

LOGO Meaning and Evolution of BMW: LOGO Meaning and Evolution of BMW
10-50 Years of BMW Exhibition of Cars: 10-50 Years of BMW Exhibition of Cars

requirements: Accessibility for Everyone This course is designed to be inclusive, welcoming individuals from all backgrounds.
Encouraging Self-Reflection Students are encouraged to actively engage with the content by taking notes for self-reflection purposes. This practice enhances the learning experience.
No Prior Experience Required A standout feature of this course is its inclusivity – no prior experience is needed to enroll. Regardless of your background or expertise.
Simplified Learning Approach the course adopts a simplified learning approach, breaking down complex concepts into easily digestible segments.
Universally Understandable Content The language and delivery of content have been meticulously crafted to be universally understandable.
courses.description:
Embark on a thrilling journey through automotive history with "Drive Through Design," a course that takes students on an immersive exploration of the BMW Car Museum in Munich, Germany. Uncover the secrets behind BMW's iconic brand, delve into the architectural marvels of the museum space, and learn from the designers who have shaped the aesthetics and form language of BMW cars through the decades.
Key Highlights:
Designer's Perspective Exploration: Gain insights into the designer's perspective when visiting a car museum. Understand the nuances of form language, economics, color fit, finish, and aesthetic beauty through the lens of BMW's iconic designs.
BMW's Design Evolution: Trace the captivating history of BMW's design, from its early days in the 1940s to the present and envisioning its future. Explore the evolution of design principles that have defined BMW's iconic status in the automotive world.
Architectural Marvels Unveiled: Immerse yourself in the architectural beauty of the BMW Museum, BMW Office inspired by the iconic Gram Jeet aircraft engine, and BMW World. Learn how the physical spaces contribute to creating an engaging environment for selling experiences, not just products.
Data-Driven Insights: Explore statistics, data, and trend analysis relevant to the future of organizations and traffic congestion. Understand how the museum aligns with United Nations sustainability goals, addressing challenges such as carbon dioxide emissions and sustainable urban mobility.
Form Language and Sensual Experience: Delve into the intricacies of BMW's form language and how designers create a sensual experience for users. Analyze real-time examples and pictures to understand how students can extract design elements and replicate expressive forms in their own designs.
Houses of BMW Design: Explore the various "houses" within BMW, including the House of Design, House of Brand, and House of Motorsports. Gain insights into how each house contributes to BMW's overall design philosophy and brand identity.
Practical Class Project: Engage in a hands-on class project that encourages students to visit a local showroom or any car museum. Document observations creatively, developing crucial documentation skills that can be utilized in portfolios and future career endeavors.
Enroll in "Drive Through Design" to unravel the secrets of BMW's legacy, understand the intricacies of automotive design, and gain practical skills that bridge theory and real-world application in the dynamic field of automotive design.


Courtesy,
Dr. FAK Noble Ai Researcher, Scientists, Product Developer, Innovator & Pure Consciousness Expert
Founder of Noble Transformation Hub TM
target_audience: Automotive Design Students
Design Enthusiasts and Hobbyists
Architectural and Interior Design Students
Sustainability and Urban Planning Professionals
Brand and Marketing Professionals
Design Researchers and Analysts
Aspiring Automotive Journalists
Educators and Instructors
Anyone with a Curiosity for Design and Automotive Culture

courses.title: Responsible UX Design for AI
courses.bio: AI UX Design: Master Human-Centered AI Using Cutting-Edge Tools, Methodologies & UX Best Practices
objectives: UX Design For AI
UX Design using AI Tools
UX Design to build Human and AI partnership

Introduction: Introduction : Responsible UX Design for AI
Basics of AI: Basics first - AI | Gen AI | AI & ML | NLP | Voice Assistants | Big Data etc
UX for AI: Guide : Triptech method | Probelm statement Abstraction | Reframing Workshop
Building the Right Thing : Problem statement Abstraction and Concept Evaluation
Building the Thing Right : UX Guidelines and Patterns with Examples

requirements: None! This course is designed for everyone—whether you're new to AI-driven UX or an experienced designer looking to refine your skills. You'll learn how to design for AI systems and explore various AI tools that can act as your creative sidekick
courses.description:
What will you learn ?


UX for AI :
Students will learn How to understand latent needs, innovate using Industry 4.0 technologies using problem abstraction and reframing workshops to make the problem statement more inclusive and general.
Students will learn AI and Human partnership challenges, System-centric and User-centric evaluation and Risk Analysis.


Mixed-Initiative Interfaces:
The principles of Human AI Collaboration will be a focus area, ensuring an optimal balance between automation and user control. This involves understanding how to design interfaces that enhance user agency while leveraging AI Capabilities.


AI-Powered Data Visualisation:
Participants will gain insights into using various visualization techniques like parallel coordinates, Radar Charts and Box Plots to make AI-driven insights more understandable and actionable.


AI in Usability Testing & Risk Analysis:
This course covers different User testing methods for testing AI solutions.
Wizard OZ
KLM - GOMES
Teachable model
Computational Methods - Such as oracle


The Course will cover methods to automate the research process, Analyse the impact of AI on usability and ensure that AI implementations are ethical and user-friendly.


Who should take this course?
There are no prerequisites as such. UX Designers, UI Designers, UX Researchers, Product Designers and Managers, AI & Data Enthusiasts and Anyone Curious about AI in UX
target_audience: UX/UI Designers & Researchers – Looking to adapt their skills for AI-driven systems and advocate for responsible AI design.
Product Designers & Managers – Wanting to integrate ethical and user-centered AI into their products.
AI & ML Enthusiasts – Keen on understanding how UX design plays a crucial role in shaping AI interactions.
Developers & Engineers – Interested in learning UX principles to create more intuitive and human-friendly AI systems.
Anyone Curious About AI & UX – No prior experience needed—this course will help you navigate the future of AI-driven design!

courses.title: Kurs Figma
courses.bio: Projektowanie Interfejsów
objectives: Narzędzia i interfejs Figma
Praca grupowa w Figma
Eksport Grafik
Projekt Aplikacji Apple Watch
Praca z Komponentami
Optymalizacja wektorów i bitmap
requirements: Podstawowa umiejętność obsługi komputera.
courses.description:
Wprowadzenie
Figma to rewolucyjna aplikacja, ponieważ działa w całości po stronie przeglądarki. Choć możesz pobrać wersję desktopową, będziesz zaskoczony, jak świetnie sprawuje się wersja webowa! Jak się jednak okazuje, jej podstawowe przeznaczenie, czyli tworzenie interfejsów to tylko jeden z wielu scenariuszy, do których możesz wykorzystać Figmę. Dzięki niezwykle intuicyjnej i prostej obsłudze jest to narzędzie, w którym projektować i edytować grafikę może każdy! Jednak w porównaniu do konkurencyjnych aplikacji, jak Sketch, ma ogromne zalety - jest dostępna też dla PC, a także oferuje genialny system kolaboracji, w którym więcej niż jedna osoba może pracować nad projektem w czasie rzeczywistym!
Narzędzia i interfejs Figma
Projekt Aplikacji Apple Watch
Praca grupowa w Figma
Praca z Komponentami
Eksport Grafik
Optymalizacja wektorów i bitmap


Narzędzia i interfejs Figma
W trakcie Kursu poznasz wszystkie narzędzia i techniki pracy w aplikacji Figma. Choć sam interfejs jest niezwykle intuicyjny, warto korzystać ze sprawdzonych schematów oraz technik pracy, które zagwarantują Ci maksymalną wydajność pracy.


Projekt Aplikacji Apple Watch
W trakcie Kursu skoncentrujemy się na stworzeniu z pomocą Figma kilku praktycznych przykładów interfejsów, odkrywając potencjał narzędzi wektorowych, artboardów i wiele więcej! Przygotujemy także uzupełnienie dla aplikacji inteligentnego domu, z którą pracowaliśmy w Kursie Sketch - osobną wersję aplikacji na Apple Watch!


Praca grupowa w Figma
Figma jest często porównywana do aplikacji Sketch, rozszerzonej o genialne opcje współpracy dla UI/UX Designerów. Dzięki opcji współpracy w czasie rzeczywistym możesz zaprosić do pracy nad projektem klienta lub inne osoby z Twojego zespołu. Wprowadzane zmiany są widoczne na żywo w przeglądarce! Jest to najlepszy sposób na dyskusję nad projektem i zdalny, konstruktywny feedback. Dodatkowo w pracy zespołowej możesz też wykorzystać Biblioteki, w których przygotujesz elementy, z których będzie mógł korzystać przy projektowaniu cały zespół! Zmiana elementu biblioteki, np. Style Guide'u skutkuje aktualizacją wszystkich projektów.


Praca z Komponentami
W Figma z dowolnego elementu możesz utworzyć Komponent, którego instancje mogą znaleźć się w innych miejscach w projekcie, a nawet w Bibliotekach. Zmiana oryginalnego komponentu skutkuje podmianą wszystkich jego instancji! To niezwykle skuteczny i wydajny sposób projektowania.


Eksport Grafik
Z pomocą Figma łatwo wyeksportujesz grafiki dla aplikacji webowej czy urządzeń mobilnych. W Kursie dowiesz się jak zoptymalizować wektory i bitmapy, a następnie wyeksportować je w optymalnym formacie na potrzeby wykorzystania na stronie WWW czy w mobilnej aplikacji.


Dla kogo jest ten kurs?
Kurs Figma jest przeznaczony dla wszystkich, którzy chcą efektywnie edytować grafikę czy tworzyć interfejsy w przyjaznym i darmowym środowisku przeglądarkowym. Figma nie wymaga subskrypcji ani mocnego komputera - wszystko działa po stronie przeglądarki, oferując komfort pracy zarówno osobom początkującym, jak również doświadczonym projektantom.


Dlaczego wybrać właśnie ten kurs?
Kurs wideo to najbardziej efektywna a zarazem najprzyjemniejsza forma nauki. Jest on tak prowadzony, byś cały czas mógł go śledzić z zainteresowaniem i zaangażowaniem, a także czerpać satysfakcję ze zdobytej wiedzy!
Wiedza, którą otrzymujesz w tym kursie, to nie tylko sucha teoria, ale również wskazówki od praktyka z wieloletnim doświadczeniem, dzięki którym dużo łatwiej będzie Ci opanować materiał i pracować efektywniej.
Uczysz się na praktycznych przykładach. Kurs, który masz przed sobą to esencja praktycznej wiedzy i doświadczenia a także wzorów, które oszczędzą Ci godziny pracy i poszukiwań.
target_audience: Kurs Figma jest przeznaczony dla wszystkich, którzy chcą efektywnie edytować grafikę czy tworzyć interfejsy w przyjaznym i darmowym środowisku przeglądarkowym. Figma nie wymaga subskrypcji ani mocnego komputera - wszystko działa po stronie przeglądarki, oferując komfort pracy zarówno osobom początkującym, jak również doświadczonym projektantom.

courses.title: Design Thinking : the fundamentals
courses.bio: Introduction to Design Thinking. Unleash your creativity and innovation in a structured way.
objectives: Discover the key stages of the Design Thinking method
Understand the real needs of your customers
Apply Design Thinking to solve your problems creatively
Boost innovation and creativity in your organization
Find ideas more easily
Create and test your prototypes before launching your product
Create and use storyboards to present your ideas
And much more

Empathy: An example of an empathy map
The test phase: The purpose of the test phase

requirements: Be open-minded and ready to take action.
courses.description:
Complete program on Design Thinking
This training is an introduction to Design Thinking in the business world.
In this training, I share with you the principles and methodologies of Design Thinking, creativity and innovation.
My goal through this training is to help you boost your creativity through the Design Thinking method.
You will learn the different steps to carry out a project according to the Design Thinking method.
You will discover how to identify the needs of your customers, whether through questionnaires or by creating an avatar.
Furthermore, you will discover methods for finding ideas in a structured way.
Finally, you will learn how to create prototypes and test them.
You will also find examples and practical exercises to illustrate each point.
Here are some testimonials from my course participants:
"Jamal Lazaar is very competent in his training, he provides clear working methods to be successful. I recommend this course for those who question themselves. Excellent course!". Landry
"You can't help but be motivated and have confidence in yourself after this course. Thank you Jamal". L. Naraine
"Simple, concise and concrete. Thanks!" Dave
_________________________________________
Why join this training course on Design Thinking?
Would you like to learn how to create innovative products?
Would you like to create products that meet the real needs of your users?
Or would you like to implement the Design Thinking methodology in your company?
This training is for you!
The Design Thinking approach has been fashionable for several years now. It is used by large companies such as Google, IBM and Microsoft. But what is it? How to use it ? And how to put it into practice?
In a world where competitiveness is increasingly fierce, it is no longer enough to create innovative products, you have to stand out.
Nowadays, products must meet the specific needs of end users as closely as possible. This is exactly the role of the Design Thinking method.
Whether you are a developer, functional analyst, designer or product manager, knowing this methodology can make the difference in your results and those of your company.
You don't have to guess, here are just a few skills you will learn in this training:
Discover the key stages of the Design Thinking method
Understand the real needs of your customers
Apply Design Thinking to solve your problems creatively
Boost innovation and creativity in your organization
Find ideas more easily
Create and test your prototypes before launching your product
Create and use storyboards to present your ideas
And much more
This is not a theoretical course, I share with you techniques that you can immediately apply. Throughout the training, you will find practical exercises to immediately apply what you learn.
So what are you waiting for?
Click the Buy now button and learn how to apply Design Thinking today.
target_audience: This training is for you if you want to discover Design Thinking.
If you want to unleash your creativity.
Or if you want to innovate in a structured way.

courses.description:
人們在使用科技產品之餘，逐漸注重用戶體驗，未來的設計師們除了要設計符合業務目標的產品外，還要使產品從能用→好用→令用戶愛不釋手。


接到需求後，如何一步步設計一個最小可行MVP產品呢？各種看似天馬行空的創新，其實都有理性方法可循的。


課程中將會從UX/UI介紹與基本功開始，帶你了解品牌、UX、UI等密不可分的關係與優點，最後完成帶有用戶體驗思維的App作品。


課程不只是教Figma軟體操作，思維與實作並重，以UX的用戶體驗為核心，學習理性的設計方法來建立思維來解決問題，不論是設計業、製造業，或創業，都可以複用這個邏輯，UX思維甚至還能起到自我引導人生規劃的作用。課程中也特別設計了作品集提點、職場分享、從設計師到資深設計師的章節，帶你直接領略最真實的職場需求！

AI로 피그마에 날개 달기: FAI0902 실전 피그마 AI 플러그인 활용법
FAI0904 실전 AI 피그잼 AI 활용법

requirements: 실습 위주의 강의이기 때문에 강의 화면과 실습 화면을 분리할 수 있는 듀얼 모니터 또는 여분 기기를 함께 준비해주면 좋습니다. 또한 Figma 웹이 아닌 데스크톱 앱을 기본으로 진행되기 때문에 Figma 홈페이지에서 데스크톱 앱을 먼저 설치해주시고 수강 시작하시는 것을 추천드립니다.
본 강의는 예제 제작 위주로 강사님의 움직임 하나하나 따라하실 수 있도록 진행되기 때문에 누구나 배우실 수 있습니다.
강좌에는 무료버전을 먼저 제공하는 플러그인들로 선별했기 때문에 강의 중 결제가 발생하지는 않고, 강의 수료 후 더 사용하고 싶은 플러그인만 추후 선택해서 결제 후 사용할 수 있게 커리큘럼을 구성했습니다.
저작권이 없는 가상의 플랫폼을 만들 것이기 때문에 작업물을 더 다듬거나 보완해서 개인의 포트폴리오로 사용하는 것은 전혀 문제가 되지 않습니다.
courses.description:
"어제보다 성장하겠습니다. 그리고, 어제보다 성장하려는 사람을 돕겠습니다."


마소캠퍼스의 진심과 소망을 담은 Actionable Content로,
2013년부터 온오프라인으로 함께해 온 누적 강의 1억시간!
이 소중한 경험과 시간은 언제나 마소캠퍼스와 수강생 모두의 성장의 원천입니다.


-


IT 시대에서 경쟁력을 갖출 수 있는 AI와 Figma 결합!
디자이너들에게 가장 각광받는 툴, Figma!
AI로 쉽게 만들어서 각광받는 UX/UI 디자이너 되기!


디자인부터 협업까지, AI와 함께하는 실전 Figma
각종 실무자 설문조사에서 가장 기대되는 UX/UI 툴로 선정되며 퍼지기 시작한 Figma는
2022년 거대 실무 도구 플랫폼 어도비에서 200억 달러(한화 2조 6천억 원 이상)에 인수 시도,
2022년과 2023년에는 전 세계 디자이너들을 대상으로 조사한 디자인 툴 서베이에서
Figma가 압도적인 1위로 선정되었습니다.


왜 업계의 모두가 이토록 피그마를 좋아하고 탐낼까요?
도구를 좋아하는 데는 다른 이유가 없습니다.
성능
편의성
가격
모두가 원하는 위의 요소를 모두 갖춘 것이 피그마이기 때문입니다.
Figma는 단순한 UI 도구를 넘어서, 기획자, 마케터, 개발자까지
모두가 함께 사용할 수 있는 협업 툴로 완전히 자리잡았습니다.


최근에는 Figma 사용법에 인공지능을 활용한 디자인 기능이 추가되어,
디자인 과정에서의 혁신을 더욱 가속화하고 있습니다.
이제 사용자들은 인공지능이 제안하는 디자인 요소와 레이아웃을 쉽게 탐색하고,
자신의 프로젝트에 적용할 수 있습니다.
이로써 디자이너들은 더욱 빠르고 효율적으로 아이디어를 시각화하고,
창의적인 디자인을 생성할 수 있게 되었습니다.


강의 샘플 영상만 보셔도 여러분이 스마트폰 어플에서 익숙하게 보았던 화면이 보일 것입니다.
실제 마소캠퍼스에서 제공하는 Figma 강의는 이러한 최신 기능을 포함하여,
Figma의 핵심 기능과 필수 활용 플러그인에 대해 깊이 있게 다룹니다.
강의 샘플 영상만 봐도 여러분이 스마트폰 앱에서 익숙하게 보았던 화면부터,
실제로 페이지를 만들고 수익을 창출하는 데 필요한 애플리케이션 화면,
이벤트와 캠페인을 진행하는 데 필요한 마케팅 페이지,
각종 SNS에서 좋아요를 받는 감성 있는 게시물 등,
여러분이 알고 있는 모든 화면을 Figma 하나로 만들 수 있다는 것을 확인할 수 있습니다.


누구나 쉽게 만들 수 있는 간편한 기능과
성능 및 편의성을 극대화시켜주는 플러그인,
그리고 이 모든 요소가 무료 사용 가능하다는 점까지 갖춘 피그마는
단순 UI툴로 디자이너만을 위한 도구가 아닌 기획자, 마케터
그리고 개발자까지 모두 함께 쓰는 협업툴로 완전히 자리매김 했습니다.


마소캠퍼스의 [AI로 Figma에 날개 달기]를 통해, 빠르게 변화하는 디지털/IT 시대에서
경쟁력을 갖춘 인재로 성장할 수 있는 최고의 기회가 될 것입니다.
무료 사용 가능하며, 누구나 쉽게 만들 수 있는 간편한 기능,
성능 및 편의성을 극대화해주는 플러그인까지 갖춘
Figma와 함께라면 여러분의 디자인 능력을 한 단계 끌어올릴 수 있습니다.
지금이 바로 Figma를 시작할 때입니다.




본 과정은 Figma를 이용해서 현업 작업 프로세스를 진행해보고 실제 현업에서 사용하는 에셋들을 직접 만들어보며 인공지능을 활용한 실무 역량을 키워 바로 적용할 수 있게 하는 과정입니다.


STEP 1. 개념부터 실제 에셋 제작을 통한 완벽 이해!
기초 개념 정리부터 툴 사용법을 세세하게 몰라도 따라올 수 있게 작은 디테일까지 놓치지 않고 커리큘럼을 구성했습니다.


STEP 2. 아무 것도 몰라도 고퀄리티 앱 화면 만들 수 있다!
실습을 통해 화면 구성 요소부터 버튼까지 에셋을 직접 만들어 실무 역량을 확실하게 기르고, AI를 활용해 누구나 손쉽게 퀄리티 높은 앱 디자인을 만들 수 있습니다.


STEP 3. 실무 흐름대로 흘러가는 강의!
기획 단계부터 개발자 핸드오프, 파일 관리까지 실제 실무에서 작업하는 방식을 따라 실제 화면 아웃풋까지 만들어 볼 수 있게 구성했습니다.


STEP 4. 일급비밀! 실무 플러그인 정리본 공유!
강의에서 사용된 플러그인 외에도 상황 별로 사용할 수 있는 플러그인들을 엄선해서 정리한 비밀 파일을 공유드립니다.




작업 효율 향상을 위한 AI 활용 Figma 강의를 듣고 나면
마소캠퍼스의 <AI로 Figma에 날개 달기> 강의를 듣고 나면,
여러분께서는 다음과 같은 역량을 활보하실 수 있습니다.


Figma 핵심 기능 이해
: 반응형 컨텐츠, 재활용 버튼 등 실제 실무에서 사용하는 다양한 기능과 에셋 이해


실제 아웃풋 화면 제작
: 단순 이론과 파편화된 결과물이 아닌 실제 앱 화면 제작을 통한 실무 스킬 향상


다양한 플러그인 활용
: 플러그인 활용을 통한 업무 생산성 향상


AI로 간단히 퀄리티 상승
: 기초 피그마 역량으로 제작한 작업물에 AI를 활용한 고급 디자인 요소 적용


내가 사용하는 애플리케이션 화면!
따라 만들기부터 AI 플러그인까지 연습해 더 멋진 화면까지!


예상 질문 Q&A
Q. Figma 선수 지식이 필요한가요?
A. 본 강의는 예제 제작 위주로 강사님의 움직임 하나하나 따라하실 수 있도록 진행되기 때문에 누구나 배우실 수 있습니다. 혹시 아예 Figma를 접해보지 않아 걱정이신 분들이라면 마소캠퍼스 유튜브 및 홈페이지에서 [Figma를 활용한 디지털 기획 입문] 강의를 한번 살펴보시고 오는 것도 권장합니다. 파워포인트와 같은 문서 툴을 한번이라도 만져본 적 있는 분들은 인터페이스를 보는 것만으로 사용법이 보이는 직관적인 인터페이스를 가지고 있습니다.
Q. 강의를 수강하기 위한 요구 사항 또는 필요 조건이 있나요?
A. 실습 위주의 강의이기 때문에 강의 화면과 실습 화면을 분리할 수 있는 듀얼 모니터 또는 여분 기기를 함께 준비해주면 좋습니다. 또한 Figma 웹이 아닌 데스크톱 앱을 기본으로 진행되기 때문에 Figma 홈페이지에서 데스크톱 앱을 먼저 설치해주시고 수강 시작하시는 것을 추천드립니다.
Q. 플러그인 사용에 추가적인 비용이 발생하지는 않나요?
A. 강좌에는 무료버전을 먼저 제공하는 플러그인들로 선별했기 때문에 강의 중 결제가 발생하지는 않고, 강의 수료 후 더 사용하고 싶은 플러그인만 추후 선택해서 결제 후 사용할 수 있게 커리큘럼을 구성했습니다.
Q. 강의에서 만든 작업물을 포트폴리오에 사용해도 되나요?
A. 네 가능합니다. 저작권이 없는 가상의 플랫폼을 만들 것이기 때문에 작업물을 더 다듬거나 보완해서 개인의 포트폴리오로 사용하는 것은 전혀 문제가 되지 않습니다.




-
[ 강 사 소 개 ]


김 대 일
現 마소캠퍼스 강사
•現 피그마피디아팀 운영
•現 탐앤샘솜 디자인 팀장
•前 청년 PnC 팀장


•유튜브 [월간피그마] 라이브 강의 및 프로그램 진행
•제주대학교 및 다수 기업 강의 진행
•다수 기업 웹 디자인 및 광고, UX/UI 디자인
target_audience: Figma를 배우고 싶은 초보자
UI/UX 디자인 기술을 향상시키고 싶은 디자이너
인공지능을 활용하여 작업 효율을 높이고자 하는 프로덕트 디자이너 및 웹 디자이너
AI를 활용한 디자인 시스템과 컴포넌트 관리에 관심 있는 모든 디자인 관련 직군
IT업계로 창업/이직/입사 등 커리어를 쌓고 싶은 모든 분

courses.title: 100 UX UI Design Tips for Beginners
courses.bio: Practical tips on UI Design, UX Design, User Interface Design, User Experience Design.
objectives: Digital Product Design
User-Centered Design
UX Design Approach
User Interface (UI) Principles
UI Object Usages
UI Interactions
Best Practices
requirements: Computer
Internet Connection
A curious person
courses.description:
Welcome!
This course is designed to immerse you directly in real-world, hands-on design practice with a focus on clarity, usability, and user needs.
In each section, we focus on frequently encountered UX/UI scenarios. Rather than overwhelming you with theory, we dive into what works, how it works, and why it makes a real impact on the usability and success of digital products.
What’s inside?
Real design examples with side-by-side breakdowns of effective and ineffective choices you’ll see in real interfaces
Actionable methods to craft solutions that support user behavior, intent, and interaction flow
Clear, practical answers to the question: “What makes an interface genuinely useful, intuitive, and enjoyable to use?”
Who is it for?
Anyone who wants a fast, hands-on introduction to UX/UI fundamentals through applied learning
Entrepreneurs looking for real-world inspiration while designing their own digital products or MVPs
Curious, self-driven learners who prefer doing over just watching and crave real-life context
Developers, product owners, project managers, e-commerce professionals, and digital teams working to improve product experience
If you're ready to engage directly with practical design challenges, identify common UI/UX issues, and explore smarter, user-centered solutions step by step—this course is the right place to start building your skills with confidence.
target_audience: Jr. UX Designers
Jr. UI Designers
Jr. Product Designers
Jr. UX/UI Designers
Software Developers
Product Managers
Project Managers
Entrepreneurs
E-Commerce Experts
Digital Marketing Experts

courses.title: Construa protótipos rápidos e funcionais com Figma
courses.bio: Aprenda construindo o redesign do aplicativo Netflix todas as funcionalidades do software Figma
objectives: Criar componentes reutilizáveis
Criar protótipos navegáveis
Aprender a lidar com grid-layout e auto-layout
Construir um conceito de aplicativo do zero
Criar efeitos de transição e aprovar seus projetos com cliente
requirements: Navegador de internet (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Opera)
Sistema Windows, MacOS ou Linux
courses.description:
Figma é um software de design colaborativo, rápido, multiplataforma (Linux, Windows, MacOS), que roda nos navegadores mais modernos, ele é super simples, com ele podemos transpor nossas telas desenhadas para um modelo navegável, mais fiel e próximo ao que se planeja criar, com isso economizamos custo operacional de desenvolvimento de software, conseguimos coletar feedback e criar um produto mais poderoso e próximo do que se deseja.


O software se tornou referencia no mercado pelo poder e facilidade, designers de diversas empresas (Zoom, Dropbox, BeatStars, Microsoft, Coinbase) usam o Figma para validar suas ideias.


Com o Figma é possível criar design não só para mobile, mais para diversos formatos como desktop, tablet, mobile, mídias sociais, formatos físicos de papel A4, A5, A6 e muitos outros formatos.


Neste curso você irá aprender com vídeos rápidos os principais pontos do software, algumas funcionalidades estão escondidas e descobri com o tempo você irá conferir em primeira mão, o Figma é um software em constante atualização, mas espero que com esse curso você conheça as principais funcionalidades.


Que tal impressionar seu cliente com belíssimas apresentações funcionais? Nesse curso mostro você da forma mais rápida e simples possível como construir interfaces poderosas com o Figma, seguindo a linha dos meus cursos de ser direto ao ponto, vamos juntos aprender?!
target_audience: Desenvolvedores que querem aprender a prototipar
Qualquer profissional da área de TI que deseja aprender sobre protótipos
Interessados em aprender sobre o Figma e prototipação para aplicativos

courses.title: UX Research desde Cero
courses.bio: Aprende las técnicas fundamentales para diseñar experiencias digitales basadas en evidencia.
objectives: Aprenderás a planificar, ejecutar y analizar investigaciones de experiencia de usuario desde cero.
Identificarás los métodos de investigación adecuados según el objetivo del proyecto y el tipo de usuario.
Aprenderás sobre las entrevistas, encuestas, pruebas de usabilidad y análisis heurístico.
Entenderás cómo crear mejores productos digitales para los usuarios.

Métodos de UX Research: Métodos de investigación cualitativa de UX
Métodos de investigación cuantitativa de UX
Cómo elegir un método de investigación de UX
Ejecución de investigaciones de UX: Cómo hacer buenas preguntas en UX Research
Cómo crear una guía para una entrevista de experiencia de usuario
Selección de participantes para investigación de UX
Cómo hacer entrevistas a usuarios en UX
Comprendiendo a los usuarios: Mapa de experiencia y recorrido del usuario
Modelos mentales en la investigación de UX

requirements: No necesitas experiencia previa. Este curso está diseñado para quienes quieren iniciarse en UX Research desde cero.
courses.description:
Curso de UX Research desde cero: Domina la Investigación de Usuarios y Mejora la Experiencia Digital
¿Quieres crear productos digitales que realmente conecten con las personas? Este curso de UX Research te enseñará cómo investigar, analizar e interpretar el comportamiento de los usuarios para diseñar experiencias más intuitivas, efectivas y centradas en las personas.
A lo largo del curso, aprenderás sobre las metodologías y herramientas más importantes para hacer investigación de usuarios, desde entrevistas y encuestas hasta mapas de empatía, análisis de modelos mentales y pruebas de usabilidad.
Ya sea que trabajes en diseño, desarrollo, producto o innovación, este curso te dará las bases para tomar decisiones informadas y diseñar mejores productos y servicios.
¿Qué veremos en el curso?
Comprender qué es UX Research y por qué es clave en el diseño digital
Identificar necesidades reales de los usuarios a través de distintas técnicas
Aplicar entrevistas, encuestas, pruebas y otras herramientas de investigación
Interpretar hallazgos para mejorar productos, interfaces y experiencias
Usar modelos mentales para diseñar con base en cómo piensan los usuarios
Comunicar tus descubrimientos de forma clara para generar impacto en tu equipo
¿A quién está dirigido este curso?
Diseñadores UX/UI que quieren profundizar en la investigación
Desarrolladores que buscan entender mejor a los usuarios
Product Managers, emprendedores y equipos de innovación
Cualquiera que quiera crear productos digitales centrados en las personas
target_audience: Diseñadores, desarrolladores, estudiantes o profesionales que quieran entender mejor a sus usuarios y mejorar productos digitales.
Personas interesadas en cambiar de carrera hacia UX o complementar sus habilidades con investigación centrada en el usuario.
Gerentes de proyectos, emprendedores y personas interesadas en construir mejores productos digitales.

courses.title: Полный курс по UI/UX и веб-дизайну Полякова Алексея
courses.bio: Курс по UI/UX дизайну включает в себя: Обучение Figma, проектирование, дизайн-система, UI/UX и веб-дизайн сервиса
objectives: Освоение работы в Figma: Научитесь эффективно использовать инструменты Figma для создания интерфейсов, включая слои, автолейауты, компоненты и варианты.
Проектирование интерфейсов: Сможете проектировать интуитивно понятные и визуально привлекательные интерфейсы, ориентированные на потребности пользовател
Создание и внедрение дизайн-системы: Научитесь разрабатывать и настраивать дизайн-системы
Разработка дизайна веб-сервиса: Освоите разработку дизайна веб-сервиса с нуля до передачи макетов разработке

Проектирование: Что такое проектирование и его важность
User Story и базовое описание требований
Дизайн-система: Что такое дизайн-система и для чего она нужна
Бонусы: Воркшоп по старту в профессии: Как получить максимум: введение и ключевые ошибки новичков
Что нужно знать помимо Figma: команда, исследования, процессы
Портфолио, резюме и собеседование: шаг к карьере дизайнера

requirements: Навыки дизайна не требуются, вы научитесь всему необходимому
courses.description:
Цель курса — дать вам полное представление о процессе создания веб-сервиса с нуля, научить вас основам работы в Figma, проектированию интерфейсов, созданию дизайн-систем и разработке финальных макетов. Этот курс предназначен для тех, кто хочет научиться создавать профессиональные, функциональные и визуально привлекательные интерфейсы.
Почему стоит выбрать этот курс:
Курс разработан практикующим профессионалом с 10-летним опытом в UI/UX дизайне — Алексеем Поляковым, дизайн-лидом и арт-директором, а также ведущим популярного YouTube канала о дизайне. Алексей делится своими знаниями и лучшими практиками, которые помогут вам быстро освоить необходимые навыки и начать применять их на практике.
Особенности курса:
Подробное обучение работе в Figma, включая слои, автолейауты, компоненты и варианты и тд.
Создание интерактивных прототипов и организация User Flow для визуализации пользовательских сценариев.
Проектирование ключевых интерфейсов веб-сервиса, таких как главная страница, каталог, авторизация, блок оплаты и личный кабинет.
Разработка и настройка дизайн-систем для обеспечения визуальной консистентности.
Практические задания и исследования, включая usability-тестирование и улучшение пользовательского опыта.
Что нужно будет делать:
В рамках курса вы будете выполнять практические задания по каждому разделу, включая создание макетов, проектирование интерфейсов и разработку дизайн-системы. Вы научитесь проводить исследования и тестировать свои прототипы, а также подготовите финальные макеты для передачи разработчикам.
Разделы и задания:
Работа в Figma: Освоение инструментов и функций Figma, создание базовых макетов.
Проектирование интерфейсов: Разработка пользовательских сценариев, создание интерактивных прототипов.
Создание дизайн-системы: Сбор компонентов, настройка токенов, разработка UI-элементов.
Разработка дизайна веб-сервиса: Проектирование и создание ключевых страниц сервиса, включая главную, каталог и личный кабинет.
Исследование и тестирование: Проведение usability-тестирования, улучшение прототипов на основе отзывов.
Автор курса:
Алексей Поляков — дизайн-лид и арт-директор с 10-летним опытом в UI/UX дизайне. Ведущий YouTube канала, посвященного дизайну интерфейсов
target_audience: Этот курс предназначен для начинающих дизайнеров и всех, кто хочет систематизировать свои знания и освоить создание веб-сервисов с нуля, от проектирования интерфейсов до разработки дизайна.

courses.description:
Aiming to master Figma by creating amazing in demand projects that rich your portfolio ?
You are the one who love to learn by doing, If so Figma the complete guide is your match. A complete course with more than 10h of content that will take you from zero to hero, starting from the tool setup, till wrapping up the course by designing 4 big projects, targeting different domains (e-commerce,  online messaging, food shops and more).
When I started preparing the course, the aim was bridging the gap between theory and practice. As learning the theory part is so important to know the behind of scene for every topic then illustrating it with the practice part.
From here and starting from section one with some theory regarding UI/UX, how they differ, the different job opportunities in both of them  and what are the in demand tools that a UI engineer may use in nowadays. Diving more in Figma, our course, mastering topics like frames, shapes, reusable components and even some advanced topics like Mobile-first design, Desktop-first design and prototyping.


Course sections :
Introduction to the UI world
Figma Setup & Project tools
Gentle dive in Figma basics
Frames & Shapes (The complete Burger Shop)
Reusable components  & Boolean selections
Prototyping & Comfy (  The complete e-commerce project)
Design Systems & Sticker Sheets

Responsive Design (The complete WhatsApp clone App/Web)

Everyone willing to master Figma by building amazing projects

courses.bio: Quickly learn Figma to Design and Prototype an awesome looking Mobile App with screen transitions and hone UI UX Skills
objectives: Introduction to Figma interface, tools and tips to improve your design workflow
Create Clickable interactive Prototypes with transition effects in Figma
Wireframe and Design your own App idea using Figma

Introduction to Figma in Urdu Hindi: 01 What is Figma and how to install it
How to use Figma for UI and Web Design: 04 Frames and Layout Grid in Figma

16 Designing login signup screens in figma
Prototyping in Figma: 21 Time Delay and Push in Prototype

requirements: Just a learning mindset
courses.description:
Figma is one of the most powerful UI and UX Design tool that can even run in your browser. Figma’s power is hidden in its being cross-platform and its Collaboration feature where you can easily collaborate with other Designers and Developers. It works seamlessly on Windows and Mac Operating Systems with a Desktop Application. In recent times, it is one of the most powerful and popular User Interface Design App due to being a Cloud based App (saves your file version history) and its FREE to use too
This course will teach you all about User Interface Designing and also adding interactivity to your Designs with powerful prototyping features of Figma. First, we will learn about the basic tools, common keyboard shortcuts and familiarizing ourselves with the Figma’s interface.
Once you have solid basics, we will move on to Auto Layout, Responsive design and few advance things like viewing your Prototype live on an actual Mobile Device. I will show you everything step by step.
We will design together the User Interface and then the prototype of a “Workout App Called Workin” from the scratch and make it into a pro level design by multiplying Artboards, using reusable Styles and Components.
If you are Beginner in UI UX Design or a seasoned UI/UX Designer trying to switch from Sketch or Adobe XD, please join me in this learning experience.
Let's learn Figma together in Hindi Urdu Language
target_audience: Beginner Designers

courses.title: Usability Tests für Einsteiger und Fortgeschrittene
courses.bio: Verbessere die User Experience (UX) deines Produkts durch regelmäßige Nutzertests
objectives: Wie ein Usability Test abläuft und was man dabei beachten muss.
Wie man einen Leitfaden/Testskript erstellt.
Wie man an Teilnehmer/Probanden für einen Usability Test kommt.
Welche Moderations- und Fragetechniken bei einem Usability Test angewendet werden sollten.
Welche verschiedenen Situationen es bei einem Usability Test geben kann und wie man damit umgeht.
Welche verschiedenen Auswertungsmethoden es gibt und wie man diese durchführt.
Wie man die Usability Test Ergebnisse kommuniziert.
requirements: Es sind keine Vorkenntnisse nötig. Im Kurs werden alle Begrifflichkeiten erklärt.
courses.description:
Usability Test sind eine sehr mächtige und wichtige UX-Aktivität. Man kann damit seine Designs testen, Nutzer-Feedback einholen und es ist auch eine super Methode, um den Team-Mitgliedern die Bedeutung und den Mehrwert von Nutzerintegration in dem Entwicklungsprozess zu vermitteln und damit langfristig die UX-Reife im Unternehmen zu steigern. Es ist quasi eine Allzweckwaffe, die jeder UX Professional beherrschen sollte.
In diesem Kurs lernst du, wie du einen Usability Test planst, vorbereitest, durchführst und auswertest. Zudem gibt es eine Reihe an Beispielen von Usability Test Situationen, in denen erklärt wird, wie du am besten mit diesen umgehst. Alle im Kurs verwendeten und gezeigten Vorlagen sind als Download verfügbar.
Der Kurs ist anhand der Phasen einer Usability Tests strukturiert. Diese Phasen sind immer die gleichen egal ob du mit 5 oder mit 60 Probanden testen willst, sie unterscheiden sich nur in der Länge. In dem gesamten Kurs wird ein Beispiel verwendet, anhand dessen ein Leitfaden erstellt wird und Beispiele aus der Auswertung gezeigt werden. Nach dem Kurs wirst du in der Lage sein, Usability Tests für dein eigenes Produkt durchführen zu können.
Falls du bereits Erfahrung mit Usability Tests hast, kannst du dir bei den Situationen sicherlich noch ein paar Tricks abschauen. Vielleicht kannst du auch einfach mithilfe der gezeigten Vorlagen deine eigene Effizienz steigern. Außerdem werden verschiedene Weisen vorgestellt, wie du eine Auswertung machen kannst.
Profitiere von meiner langjährigen Erfahrung mit der Durchführung unzähliger Tests und erleichtere dir den Start für eine erfolgreiche Nutzereinbindung.
target_audience: User Experience Designer (UX/UI Designer), bzw. UX-Professionals, die keine bis wenig Erfahrung mit Usability Test haben.
Produkt Owner oder Produktentwickler, die sich dafür interessieren, wie ein Usability Test abläuft oder auch selbst einen durchführen wollen.
