courses.description:
大家好！我是Rainnie吳雨涵,這堂課是智能機器人大未來,主要講的是智能機器人的設計基礎入門課。
這堂課主要目的是為您建立人人都可以參與智能機器人設計系統觀,我想跟您分享的觀點-設計機器人並非理工科生的專利。
文科生透過不同的方式也能夠參與設計機器人的變革,同時也會跟您分享我如何從不同維度切入智能機器人行業的方法。
透過講師本人真實案例說明,帶您了解機器人設計涵蓋哪些維度,做個科普通識課程,希望不僅是實力堅強的理工科,希望有更多的文科商管學生也能夠加入各種跟機器人相關的行業。


Hello everyone! I'm Yu-Han Wu(Rainnie). This course is the basic introduction course of intelligent robot full-stack experience design!
The main purpose of this course is to establish a systematic view that everyone can participate in the design of intelligent robots. I want to share with you the view that designing robots is not a patent of science and engineering students.


Liberal arts students can also participate in the innovation of robot design in different ways. At the same time, I will share with you my methods on how to enter the intelligent robot industry from different dimensions.


Through the real case study of the lecturer, we will show you the dimensions of robot design. We hope that we will not only be strong science and engineering students but also more liberal arts and business management students will be able to join various robot-related industries.
target_audience: 對機器人設計有興趣的所有社會大眾

courses.title: Foundations of UX/UI with Figma
courses.bio: Fundamentals of User Experience (UX), User Interface (UI), and Figma. A hands-on introduction to the world of Design
requirements: No specific skill required, course is suitable for anyone who is interested in getting started with UX UI & Figma Design
courses.description:
Are you ready to take your first step into the exciting world of UX/UI Design? Whether you're a complete beginner curious about a career in tech, a startup founder looking to build better products, or a developer wanting to understand design, this course is your perfect starting point.
This is not just another theory-based course. This is a hands-on, foundational program designed to give you a clear and concise introduction to the core principles that drive all great product design. We'll cover the essential concepts and give you the confidence to start using Figma, the industry-standard design tool.
In today's competitive digital landscape, great design is no longer a luxury—it's the core of every successful product. Understanding the principles of UX/UI is a superpower that allows you to create intuitive and beautiful experiences that users love. This program is engineered to demystify the design world, breaking down complex topics into simple, actionable steps that you can immediately understand and apply.
My goal is to give you a real, tangible feel for what a professional design workflow looks like. Instead of just talking about abstract concepts, we will connect every piece of theory to a practical application. You'll see how the elements of UI design, like typography and color, come together to form a cohesive user experience. This approach ensures that you're not just memorizing terms, but are truly internalizing the mindset of a designer and building a strong foundation for your future learning and career growth.
This course is a free sample from my comprehensive, best-selling program, the "Definitive UX UI Course with Figma & AI." I've selected the most critical foundational lessons to give you a real taste of the professional design process and set you up for success.
target_audience: Beginners
Startups

Assessment Description:
A User Experience Design assessment is a crucial tool for evaluating the knowledge and skills of individuals in this field. It consists of a series of questions that assess a person’s understanding of various aspects of UX design, including user research, information architecture, usability testing, prototyping, and visual design. The assessment helps to determine a person’s level of expertise in UX design and identify areas where they may need further development.


For employees, taking a User Experience Design assessment can be a valuable way to assess their skills and knowledge in this field. It can help them to identify areas where they may need further development, as well as areas where they excel. By taking the assessment, employees can gain a better understanding of their strengths and weaknesses in UX design and work to improve their skills where necessary.


For companies, conducting User Experience Design assessments for their employees can be an effective way to evaluate their workforce’s skills and knowledge in this field. It helps companies to identify areas where their employees may need further training or development and make decisions about how to allocate resources to improve their team’s overall expertise in UX design. By investing in their employees’ skills and knowledge in UX design, companies can improve the quality of their products and services, leading to better customer satisfaction and increased profits.


User Experience Design is a valuable and in-demand skill set in today’s job market. Companies across industries are recognizing the importance of UX design in creating successful products and services that meet the needs of their users. As a result, there is a growing need for individuals with expertise in UX design.


Building a career in UX design begins with a solid understanding of the foundational principles and skills in this field. A User Experience Design assessment can help individuals to evaluate their skills and knowledge and identify areas where they need further development. By continually developing their skills in UX design, individuals can become more valuable to employers and increase their opportunities for career advancement.


In addition to technical skills, successful UX designers must also possess strong communication and collaboration skills. They must be able to work effectively with cross-functional teams, including product managers, engineers, and stakeholders, to ensure that the design meets the needs of all stakeholders. They must also be able to communicate their design decisions effectively, both verbally and visually, to stakeholders who may not have a background in UX design.


User Experience Design assessment is a valuable tool for both employees and companies. It cans help individuals to evaluate their skills and knowledge in this field and identify areas where they need further development, as well as help companies to evaluate their workforce’s skills and knowledge in UX design and make decisions about how to allocate resources to improve their team’s expertise in this field. By investing in their skills and knowledge in UX design, individuals can build successful careers in this growing field, while companies can create successful products and services that meet the needs of their users.

courses.description:
Adobe XD UI/UX Design (Hindi) | Become UI/UX Designer in India 2023/2024 ( हिन्दी  )
Welcome to my Full Masterclass on "UI/UX Design in Adobe XD ( हिन्दी  ) for 2024. In This particular lecture series, You will understand Fundamentals of UI/UX Design in Hindi language. If you want to know that How to Become UI/UX Designer in India in 2024, Then also you should attend my all lectures.
After Completing my course on Adobe XD UI/UX Design, You will feel more Confident in UI/UX Design. You can easily Create Interface of Web or app with the help of these masterclass. We will clear your concept, So that you can Build your own application or website Interface.


Q: What is UI/UX design?
UI/UX design, or user interface and user experience design, is the process of creating digital products that are both visually appealing and easy to use. UI designers focus on the look and feel of a product, while UX designers focus on the user's journey and how they interact with the product.


Q: Why should I learn UI/UX design?
UI/UX design is a valuable skill to have in today's digital world. Businesses of all sizes need UI/UX designers to create user-friendly websites, apps, and other digital products. UI/UX designers are also in high demand in the tech industry, and they can earn a good salary.


Q: What is Adobe XD?
Adobe XD is a cloud-based design tool that is popular among UI/UX designers. It is a powerful tool that can be used to create everything from simple wireframes to high-fidelity prototypes. Adobe XD is also collaborative, so designers can work on projects together in real time.


Q: Why should I learn UI/UX design in Adobe XD?
Adobe XD is a popular tool among UI/UX designers for a reason. It is powerful, easy to use, and collaborative. By learning UI/UX design in Adobe XD, you will be able to create professional-looking designs that are also user-friendly.


Q: What will I learn in this course?
In this course, you will learn the basics of UI/UX design, as well as how to use Adobe XD to create your own designs. You will learn about different design principles, such as typography, color theory, and layout. You will also learn how to create wireframes, prototypes, and mockups.


Q: Who is this course for?
This course is for anyone who wants to learn UI/UX design. Whether you are a complete beginner or you have some experience, this course will teach you everything you need to know to create professional-looking designs.


Q: What are the prerequisites for this course?
There are no prerequisites for this course. All you need is a computer and an internet connection.


Q: How long is the course?
The course is approximately 10 hours long. You can learn at your own pace and complete the course in as much or as little time as you need.


Q: What will I receive after completing the course?
After completing the course, you will receive a certificate of completion. You will also be able to download all of the course materials, including the Adobe XD files and templates.
target_audience: Who want to Learn Adobe XD & Become UI/UX designer

Impostiamo l'artboard per il nostro progetto

requirements: Non è richiesta alcuna esperienza precedente nella progettazione UI/UX o nell'uso di Figma. Il corso è strutturato per guidare i principianti attraverso i concetti fondamentali e avanzati.
courses.description:
Benvenuti al corso professionale di progettazione UI/UX con Figma!
Se siete pronti a esplorare il mondo della progettazione di interfacce utente (UI) ed esperienze utente (UX) con il migliore strumento per designer, siete nel posto giusto. Il corso è progettato per guidarvi dalle basi ai livelli più avanzati di progettazione UI/UX utilizzando Figma, la piattaforma di progettazione basata su cloud più potente e collaborativa del momento.
Cosa imparerete:
Padronanza di Figma: Inizieremo dalle basi, imparando a utilizzare Figma in modo efficiente. Scoprirete come creare, organizzare e gestire i vostri progetti.
Progettazione centrata sull'utente: Approfondiremo i principi di progettazione incentrata sull'utente, apprendendo come capire le esigenze degli utenti e tradurle in design efficaci.
Creazione di componenti e stili: Esploreremo come creare componenti riutilizzabili e stili per mantenere la coerenza nel vostro design.
Prototipazione interattiva: Acquisirete competenze avanzate nella creazione di prototipi interattivi e animazioni per testare le vostre idee e migliorare l'usabilità.
Gestione di progetti complessi: Imparerete a gestire progetti complessi, collaborando con team multidisciplinari e clienti, e a fornire design di alta qualità.
Design di un sito all'avanguardia: Ci eserciteremo disegnando il sito di Airbnb uno dei siti più ben fatti nella nostra epoca, punto di riferimento per minimalismo e usabilità.
Per chi è questo corso:
Principianti: Se siete nuovi alla progettazione UI/UX, questo corso offre un punto di partenza ideale per acquisire competenze fondamentali.
Designer in crescita: I designer che desiderano ampliare le loro competenze e passare alla progettazione UI/UX troveranno questo corso una risorsa preziosa. Se prima usavate Sketch o Adobe XD troverete questo corso molto utile per imparare a usare Figma.
Professionisti del design: Anche i designer esperti possono trarre vantaggio dal corso, ottenendo una panoramica approfondita su Figma e metodi avanzati di progettazione UI/UX.


Cosa distingue questo corso:
Lezioni chiare e strutturate, con esempi pratici.
Progetti pratici per applicare le competenze apprese.
Esercitazioni e quiz pratici.
Aggiornamenti regolari per rimanere al passo con le ultime tendenze e funzionalità di Figma.
Supporto della community e opportunità di condivisione e feedback.
Esercitazione pratica con il sito airbnb


Preparati a diventare un designer UI/UX esperto con Figma:
La progettazione UI/UX è una competenza sempre più richiesta nell'industria del design. Concludendo questo corso, sarete pronti a creare esperienze digitali coinvolgenti e a intraprendere una carriera di successo nella progettazione UI/UX. Inizia il tuo viaggio nella progettazione con Figma oggi stesso!
target_audience: Principianti: Coloro che sono nuovi alla progettazione UI/UX troveranno il corso un punto di partenza ideale. Il corso fornisce una solida base per iniziare una carriera nella progettazione
Aspiranti designer: Gli studenti di design che desiderano ampliare le loro competenze e passare alla progettazione UI/UX troveranno il corso estremamente utile.
Professionisti del design: Anche i designer esperti possono trarre vantaggio dal corso, poiché offre un approfondimento su Figma e metodi avanzati di progettazione UI/UX.
Sviluppatori: Gli sviluppatori che desiderano comprendere meglio il processo di progettazione UI/UX e collaborare più efficacemente con i designer troveranno il corso informativo.

Imprenditori e Startup: Gli imprenditori che stanno sviluppando le proprie app o siti web avranno la possibilità di apprendere come progettare interfacce utente coinvolgenti e usabili, consentendo loro di creare prodotti di successo fin dall'inizio.

Grafici e artisti visivi: I grafici e gli artisti visivi troveranno valore nel corso per ampliare la loro gamma di competenze. Impareranno come applicare il loro talento artistico alla progettazione di interfacce utente creative ed efficaci.

Studenti di design: Gli studenti di design in cerca di una formazione completa in progettazione UI/UX avranno l'opportunità di acquisire competenze essenziali per il mercato del lavoro e la creazione di progetti accademici di alta qualità.

Professionisti del marketing e del branding: I professionisti del marketing e del branding possono migliorare le loro competenze di progettazione per creare contenuti visivamente attraenti e comunicare in modo efficace con il pubblico attraverso le interfacce utente.

requirements: A computer/laptop with access to the Internet.
A Figma account. A free plan is available on the Figma website.
No previous UX Design/UI Design experience is needed.
No previous Figma skills are needed.
courses.description:
Ready to launch your UI UX app design journey or take your skills to the next level? This class is your rocket fuel!


We're ditching dry theory and jumping right into pixel-perfect reality. Turn your vision into a stunning mobile app, one pixel at a time.
Here's what you'll master:
The importance of wireframes and prototypes in the early stages of the design process.
How to use the Figma design tool.
How to design low-fidelity wireframes.
How to design high-fidelity mockups.
How to create interactive prototypes.
Visual design fundamentals: Master color psychology, the 60-30-10 rule, select font that enhances readability and brand identity, and iconography.
Organization: Keep everything neat, finding what you need in a flash.
UX principles and laws: Build user-centered apps that anticipate needs and solve real problems.
UI design: build high-fidelity mockup and prototype by following best practices.
Who's this class for?
Anyone who wants to learn the A-Z of creating wireframes and low-fidelity prototypes. then turn them to high-fidelity mockups and interactive prototypes! No prior experience is needed, just a passion for creating amazing apps.
Your co-pilot on this journey? Me! We'll craft a delicious food-ordering app together, mastering UX/UI principles along the way. By the end, you'll be ready to conquer any app you dream of.


Benefits? Buckle up!
Master visual design and UX principles: From colors and fonts to user journeys, you'll build a rock-solid foundation.
Craft stunning high-fidelity mockups and prototypes: Say hello to your future portfolio!
Become a user-centered design champion: Build apps that truly solve problems and make life easier.
What are the requirements for taking this class?
A computer/laptop with access to the Internet.
A Figma account.
Ready to launch your UI/UX design journey? Let's get started!
target_audience: Anyone who like to become a UI/UX designer
Anyone who wants to start using Figma in their career & get paid for their user experience design skills.
Anyone who wants to learn the basics of wireframes and low-fidelity prototypes
Anyone who wants to learn the A-Z of building high-fidelity mockups and interactive prototypes!

Importância de Atenção, Memória

Curso de Psicologia Cognitiva aplicada a: Visão Geral dos Principais Conceitos e Estruturas em Psicologia Cognitivas
Conceitos de Cognição, Atenção e Memória
Nossos Sentidos e as Estruturas Envolvidas
Os Sete Temas Ligados à Cognição
Memória de Curta, Média e Longa Duração
Os 12 Princípios que unem Psicologia Cognitiva a UX Design

requirements: Conhecer o conceito de UX
courses.description: Neste curso descrevo em detalhes quais são os conceitos de Psicologia Cognitiva e a coleção de processos mentais e atividades usadas para: Perceber, Aprender, Lembrar, Pensar, Entender, & usar esses processos.  Falamos sobre: Atenção, Processamento automático versus consciente, Processamento pragmático versus conceitual, Representação, Memória explícita versus implícita, Metacognição e sobre o Cérebro. No final, relaciono a Disciplina à Experiência do Usuário e à prática de criação de Interfaces.
target_audience: Designers, profissionais de Fullstack ou marketing, profissionais de UX

courses.description:
ご挨拶
皆さん初めまして、 8年間デザイナーをしておりますヤスダ先生と申します。
私は今まで100本以上の大手企業様・中小企業様のWEBサイト/スマホアプリ/バナー等のデザインに携わってきました。
自身でHP制作会社を運営している傍らWEBデザインスクールの立ち上げを行い、多くのWEBデザイナーを輩出してきました。


本講座で学べること
本講座では今はやりの「ユーザーインターフェース」という言葉の意味を学んだあと、
UI（ユーザーインターフェース）デザイナーになる方法をお教えします。
また、実際にUIデザイナーのヤスダ先生の仕事の内容やアプリデザインの作成について学べます。


今この講座に出会えたあなた、本当にラッキーです！
皆さん、UIデザイナー/UXデザイナーってご存知ですか?


あの有名なウーバーイーツのアプリだってUIデザイナーが作ったんです。
アプリデザインを手掛けるってめちゃくちゃカッコよくないですか？


でも、実際は他のデザインよりも圧倒的に簡単なんです。
私はUIデザイナーとして今まで多くの誰もが知るアプリデザインに携わってきました。


WEBデザイナーとしてコーディングが上手く書けない毎日..
デザイナーとして単価が下がっていく毎日..


もううんざり！って思った時に出会ったのが「UIデザイナー」でした。


UIデザイナーになってから単価が3倍にも跳ね上がったのです！
皆さんにもぜひ、UIデザイナー/UXデザイナーという素晴らしい職種に出会ってほしい！


本当に楽しいし、天職だと思っています。


アプリデザインにはAdobeXDを使用します。


AdobeXDは近年もっとも注目されているデザインツールです。
今AdobeXDを学ぼうと思っている方、本当にラッキーです。


何故なら「AdobeXDa」はPhotoshopやillustratorを全く触ったことない人でも簡単にプロ並みの本格アプリデザインが作れるようになります。


私もAdobeXDを使うようになってからAdobeXDの虜になり、
今では、バナー、WEBサイトやスマホアプリなどほとんどAdobeXDを使用しています。


最新デザインツールで難しそう..と思っているそこのあなた！全く心配いりません。
AdobeXDはめちゃくちゃ簡単なんです。




私の現場の話や想い、ためになる話をいっぱい詰め込んでいます！
ぜひ、このチャンスを逃さずこの講座でお会いできること楽しみにしております！

courses.title: UX & Research | Pesquisa do usuário e experiência na prática
courses.bio: Curso 1 da Formação em Product design com +10 cursos em experiência do usuário, pesquisa, interface e metodologias ágeis
objectives: Definir e aplicar os princípios fundamentais do UX design para criar experiências de usuário excepcionais e intuitivas, baseadas em boas práticas e metodologias
Compreender a história e a evolução do UX, reconhecendo os principais marcos e mudanças na abordagem de design centrado no usuário ao longo do tempo.
Identificar e incorporar emoções no design de UX, utilizando técnicas para entender e influenciar as respostas emocionais dos usuários aos produtos e serviços.
Executar pesquisas de UX eficazes, empregando diversas técnicas como entrevistas, surveys e testes de usabilidade para obter insights valiosos.
Implementar o Design Thinking para resolver problemas de design, aplicando suas etapas de imersão, ideação, prototipagem e implementação em projetos reais.
Utilizar a metodologia Double Diamond no desenvolvimento de projetos, seguindo suas fases de descoberta, definição, desenvolvimento e entrega.
Conduzir pesquisas desk e documentar resultados, aplicando métodos de pesquisa secundária para reunir informações relevantes e fundamentar decisões de design.
Aplicar a análise SWOT em projetos de UX, identificando forças, fraquezas, oportunidades e ameaças para desenvolver estratégias mais robustas e eficazes.
Desenvolver planos de pesquisa e validar hipóteses em UX, estruturando pesquisas de forma eficiente e testando suposições para garantir a eficácia das soluções

requirements: Requisitos ou Pré-requisitos para o Curso de UX & UX Research Requisitos Necessários: Nenhuma Experiência Prévia Necessária: O curso começa do zero em UX, ideal para iniciantes completos. Ferramentas: Computador com acesso à internet. Software de design como Figma ou similar. Equipamentos: Fones de ouvido para assistir às aulas. Espaço de trabalho adequado para estudar e praticar. Para Iniciantes: Sem Obstáculos: O curso é estruturado para acolher iniciantes, facilitando a aprendizagem de todos os conceitos desde o básico. Acesso a Recursos: Material Didático: Todos os recursos e materiais necessários serão fornecidos durante o curso. Suporte e Comunidade: Acesso a fóruns de discussão e suporte para tirar dúvidas e compartilhar experiências.
courses.description:
Este curso é uma peça central na formação em Product Design do UX Marte Club, ideal para quem deseja dominar os fundamentos de UX e UX Research. Aprenda a criar experiências de usuário impactantes e conduzir pesquisas eficientes, essenciais para qualquer designer de produtos.
Estrutura do Curso:


Boas-vindas & UX:
Introdução ao curso e ao professor.
Recados importantes e material didático.
Apresentação das etapas do projeto e da turma.
User Experience:
O que é User Experience (UX):
Definição e importância do UX design.
História do UX:
Evolução e marcos importantes.
Emoções em UX:
Como as emoções influenciam a experiência do usuário.
Bases do UX:
Princípios fundamentais e guarda-chuva do UX.
Especialidades:
Diferentes áreas e especializações dentro do UX.
Design Thinking:
Conceito de Design Thinking:
Abordagem e benefícios.
Etapas do Design Thinking:
Imersão, ideação, prototipagem e implementação.
Projeto de Estudo:
Aplicação prática dos conceitos.
Resolução de Problemas:
Técnicas e metodologias para solucionar desafios de design.
UX Research:
O que é UX Research:
Importância e aplicação na criação de produtos.
Descoberta, Compreensão e Validação:
Métodos e técnicas de pesquisa.
Plano de Pesquisa:
Estruturação e execução de pesquisas de UX.
Hipóteses e Matriz de Pesquisa:
Definição e organização das hipóteses de pesquisa.
Técnicas e Ferramentas:
Entrevistas, surveys, testes de usabilidade e análise qualitativa e quantitativa.
Double Diamond:
Metodologia Double Diamond:
Descoberta, definição, desenvolvimento e entrega.
Imersão e Medição:
Técnicas para cada fase do processo.
Desk Research:
O que é Desk Research:
Pesquisa secundária e suas aplicações.
Dicas Práticas:
Como conduzir e documentar pesquisas de forma eficaz.
Viés de Confirmação:
Identificação e mitigação de vieses na pesquisa.
Análise SWOT (FOFA):
Forças, Fraquezas, Oportunidades e Ameaças:
Como realizar e aplicar a análise SWOT em projetos de UX.
Ferramentas e Técnicas:
Figma e Miro:
Ferramentas para design de interfaces e colaboração.
Métodos de Pesquisa:
Entrevistas, testes de usabilidade, surveys, análise SWOT e pesquisa desk.
Destaques do Curso:
Interatividade e Praticidade:
Projetos reais e desafios práticos para aplicar o conhecimento.
Networking:
Faça parte de uma comunidade com mais de 30 mil alunos espalhados pelo Brasil e no mundo.
Certificação:
Obtenha um certificado reconhecido no mercado, comprovando suas habilidades em UX e UX Research.
Por Que Participar?
Educação de Alta Qualidade:
Conteúdo de ponta, elaborado por especialistas.
Acessibilidade:
Preços acessíveis, eliminando barreiras ao ensino de qualidade.
Oportunidade de Carreira:
Prepare-se para transformar sua carreira e se destacar no mercado de Product Design.
Inscreva-se Agora: Aproveite esta oportunidade para adquirir habilidades valiosas e dar um salto na sua carreira de Product Design. Transforme suas ideias em soluções impactantes com o UX Marte Club!
target_audience: Iniciantes em UX e UX Research: Pessoas que estão começando na área de UX e desejam aprender do zero sobre design de experiência do usuário e pesquisa. Designers Gráficos e Digitais: Profissionais que já possuem conhecimentos em design gráfico ou digital e querem expandir suas habilidades para incluir UX e pesquisa de usuário. Desenvolvedores e Programadores: Desenvolvedores de software e programadores que querem compreender melhor o design centrado no usuário para melhorar a usabilidade de seus produtos. Gerentes de Produto e Empreendedores: Profissionais que gerenciam produtos digitais ou possuem startups e desejam incorporar práticas de UX para criar produtos mais eficazes e centrados no usuário. Estudantes e Recém-formados: Estudantes de design, tecnologia, comunicação ou áreas afins, e recém-formados que buscam uma introdução sólida e prática ao UX e UX Research. Profissionais de Marketing e Comunicação: Especialistas em marketing e comunicação interessados em entender como o design de UX pode melhorar a experiência do cliente e aumentar a eficácia das campanhas. Pesquisadores de Mercado: Profissionais que realizam pesquisas de mercado e querem aprender técnicas específicas de pesquisa de UX para obter insights mais profundos sobre os usuários. Interessados em Transição de Carreira: Pessoas que desejam mudar de carreira para a área de UX e precisam de uma formação completa e prática para iniciar essa nova trajetória. Freelancers e Consultores: Profissionais autônomos que querem adicionar UX e UX Research ao seu portfólio de serviços para oferecer soluções mais abrangentes aos seus clientes. Entusiastas de Tecnologia e Design: Qualquer pessoa apaixonada por tecnologia e design que deseja aprender mais sobre como criar experiências digitais que encantem e satisfaçam os usuários.

requirements: No prior knowledge of UX/UI design required.
courses.description:
Unlock the World of UX/UI Design: A Beginner's Guide to UX/UI Design - Learn the Essentials, Build Confidence, and Kickstart Your UX Journey


Are you curious about UX/UI design but don't know where to start? Do you want to create user-friendly digital experiences but feel overwhelmed by the tools and skills involved? Then this course is for you!


Mind of a UX/UI Designer is designed to introduce beginners to the fundamentals of UX /UI design. You'll learn what UX design is, how to start a career in the field, and the key principles that guide great design. Whether you're transitioning from another career, a business owner looking to improve your digital presence, or simply passionate about creating seamless user experiences, this course will provide you with the knowledge and confidence to get started.


Who This Course is For:
- Aspiring UX/UI designers looking for a structured introduction to the field.
- Graphic designers & Creatives who want to transition into UX.
- Entrepreneurs & Business owners aiming to improve their digital products.
- Anyone interested in understanding how digital experiences are designed.


By the end of this course, you'll have a clear understanding of UX design, a roadmap to kickstart your career, and the confidence to take your first step in the industry.


Ready to dive into the Mind of a UX/UI Designer? Enrol now and start your UX journey today!
target_audience: Beginner UX/UI designers

objectives: Przeprowadzanie warsztatów z klientem.

Dostęp do aplikacji Figma (program jest darmowy)
Posiadanie programu do obsługi plików PDF i ZIP (aby korzystać z załączonych materiałów)
courses.description:
Jako autor starałem się wyjaśnić poszczególne zagadnienia w taki sposób, aby były one zrozumiałe dla wszystkich. Jeżeli Twoja sytuacja zawodowa Cię nie zadowala, szukasz zmiany i masz chęci do nauki, to ten kurs jest właśnie dla Ciebie.

Przed stworzeniem kursu starałem się przeszukać obecnie dostępne na rynku oferty i przeanalizować je pod kątem docelowego klienta. To, czego brakowało jednym kursom, to kompleksowość, czyli oparcia wszystkich tematów na przykładzie konkretnego produktu, w celu stworzenia spójnej całości. Minusem szkoleń i warsztatów, nawet jeśli są one w pełni kompleksowe, jest brak elastyczności. Zamiast być zobligowanym do pracy w trybie weekendowym i terminów oddania konkretnych zadań, każdy powinien sam decydować, kiedy jest dla niego najlepsza pora i czas na naukę.

W moim kursie staram się posługiwać łatwym i przystępnym językiem, tak aby każdy, bez względu na wiek i doświadczenie zawodowe, mógł z łatwością przyswoić przekazywane przeze mnie treści. Dlatego jeśli jesteś osobą, która z jakichś powodów chce zmienić swoje zatrudnienie, przekwalifikować się lub która nadal szuka pomysłu na siebie, to zachęcam Cię do zapoznania się z tym kursem.

Całość kursu to 3 rozdziały, trwające łącznie 9 godzin i 40 minut.

01. ROZDZIAŁ BIZNES
2 godziny i 12 minut
Wstęp do rozdziału biznes
Brief
Wprowadzenie do aplikacji miro
Mapa myśli
User Centered Design Canvas
Analiza SWOT
Technika MoSCoW


02. ROZDZIAŁ UX
4 godziny i 10 minut
Wstęp do rozdziału UX
Badania ilościowe i jakościowe
Przygotowanie ankiety i analiza wyników
Persony
Mapa empatii
Customer journey
Scenariusze
Flow map
Architektura informacji
Wireframe Lo-Fi vs Hi-Fi
Tworzenie wireframe'ów UXPin
Prototypowanie
Testowanie


03. ROZDZIAŁ UI
3 godziny i 20 minut
Wstęp do rozdziału UI
Accessibility, czyli design dla wszystkich
Design system
O responsywności i czym jest grid
Tworzenie mockup'ów w aplikacji Figma
Prototypowanie
Testowanie, heatmap'a, testy A/B
Do większości lekcji załączane są materiały, abyś mógł spokojnie się im przyjrzeć. Moim celem jest, abyś po ukończeniu tego kursu był/a w stanie samodzielnie podjąć swoje pierwsze kroki w zawodzie UX/UI Designera.
target_audience: Początkujący designerzy.

Każdy, kto chce się nauczyć projektować użyteczne produkty.

courses.bio: 科学的开展A/B test，降低风险实现增长

courses.description:
A/B test这个概念，相信互联网产品、数据方向从业者都不会陌生，作为一种用于测试新产品或性功能的在线测试常规方法，能够摆脱主观猜测、用科学的实验来衡量决策收益，在帮助增长、降低风险、为组织赋能等方面都起着至关重要的作用。
本节小课就来带你探索A/B test。三节课特地邀请到拥有2次从0到1设计A/B test平台经验、经历了不同行业不同业务线数百个 A/B test实验的冯孙颖老师，与你分享A/B test的发展与流程，教你掌握和运用 A/B test 实验框架，带你学会科学的设计和解读A/B test 实验的方法。
本节课程是由授课老师与三节课合作制作的。在此，要特别感谢老师的辛苦付出！经历了课程立项、设计、开发中的众多环节，我们才能最终为你呈现现在的这门课程。无论是授课老师还是三节课团队，都希望这门课程能够让你有所收获，希望同学们结合个人工作情况，学以致用。

requirements: Figma
courses.description:
■ Course Goal
Complete your UXUI design portfolio and start applying for jobs
■ What kind of person is a good fit for UX/UI designer role?
(o) You’re logical, you enjoy researching, studying, and analyzing things.
(x) You’re not that into researching, studying and analyzing things.
■ Who This Course is For
This course is recommended for:
Those aiming to get a job in UX/UI or Product Design
People who enjoy logical thinking and love researching, analyzing, and continuously learning.
People who want to experience a sense of accomplishment by helping launch successful products like mobile apps.
Also relevant for those interested in Web Design
People who enjoy creating visually appealing designs.
Web designers often work on websites, banners, and social media content—refining visuals and making things look beautiful.
However, please note:
This course does not focus on building a portfolio for purely visual or graphic design roles.
The main focus is on UX/UI design—including user research, problem definition, and solution development—rather than purely aesthetic design.
■ Curriculum
The course is structured into four main stages:
Research - Interview, Survey
Problem Definition - Affinity Diagraming, Defining clear problem statements and user needs, Creating user personas, Journey Mapping, Think Out Loud
Creating a Solution - Wireframing, Prototyping, Design System
Testing
target_audience: Beginner UXUI designer

courses.title: Understand customer needs through research
courses.bio: Stop wasting your time creating features based on assumptions. Start out-performing competitors through meeting goals
objectives: Recognise the effects of a good customer experience
Recognise the types of materials that are typically called personas
Recognise how your own organisation uses research-based customer profiles
Recognise the elements that make an effect research-based customer profiles
Recognise the need to persuade leadership to invest in research
Recognise how to create a research plan and to execute it
Recognise how to roll out the research-based customer profiles across the organisation
Recognise the gap assessment of processes required from those which exist today
requirements: Understanding customer profiles and how they are used in product development, design and marketing
courses.description:
Organisations struggle to make the best decisions as they have a host of deeply-held assumptions about their customers.
This naturally leads to:
Multiple moments throughout the customer journey where the organisation doesn’t meet the customer’s goals
Disagreement amongst stakeholders about what the customer actually wants
Awkwardness around prioritising what matters the most to the customer
This course will teach you how to go about creating that insight and how to put it into practice.


Avoiding the persona trap
Don’t make the mistake creating hypothetical personas. They don’t provide permission for change, as they’re simply made up. Without the depth of trusted insight, your stakeholders can and will ignore you.
Conducting research properly can be a time consuming exercise, but a rewarding one. But this is only a quarter of the story. Simply executing your research and issuing profiles will most likely lead to business as usual.
You need to concentrate on changing hearts and minds and know how to mitigate against the numerous risks. This course has been specifically created to address the effectiveness of developing and implementing profiles.


Focused on what matters
There’s no ‘what is a persona?’ or long-winded explanations - you don’t have time for that. It’s straight to the point with specific lectures and tools in just over 90 minutes, enabling you to:
Understand the hard numbers behind great customer experiences to powerfully convince your leadership why create such a tool
Conduct an audit of what’s in use today and start to change mindsets by unpicking assumptions about your customers
Have a comprehensive plan of activities and mitigate against common risks
Know the exact steps and methods to plan and conduct research yourself
Know what elements in your profiles are most useful, with a plan for rolling-out across your organisation.


If you’re at a mid level in your role and looking to make a real impact to breakthrough to the leadership level, this course is for you.
target_audience: Products managers looking to generate double digit growth
Experience designers looking at creating user-centred services
Mid-level Marketers looking to deepen skill sets

courses.title: UX/UI Projects for portfolio
courses.bio: Making quality projects in your portfolio like amazon redesign and many more, we will be together making it along
objectives: Design
UX/UI
Prototyping
Application Design
Mockups
requirements: Figma
courses.description:
Figma is a powerful design tool that helps you to create anything: websites, applications, logos, and much more.
By learning to use Figma, you'll take your first steps into User Interface Design and and User Experience Design. These skills are essential for building a great portfolio for yourself and potentially for your own company.
In this Figma Crash Course, I will use a real project website from Frontend Mentor which we will recreate in Figma. Learning by building a project is a great way to solidify your knowledge, so I recommend downloading the assets and following along.
Adobe XD is the Adobe prototyping tool for user experience and interaction designers. Adobe XD features are used for creating wireframes, prototypes, and screen designs for digital products such as websites and mobile apps.
We will be making projects in both, in adobe XD and in figma
Figma is one of the most revolutionary graphics editing apps that’s taking over the design world by storm. What makes it so attractive is the fact that it’s free to use.
If you’re still not familiar with this wondering web-based app or looking for tips on how to make the most of the software, you’ve come to the right place.
In this beginner guide, we outline some of the tutorials and video guides in one place. You can use them to learn everything you need to know about Figma without having to spend hours searching on Google and getting frustrated.
Figma is different from other graphics editing tools. Mainly because it works directly on your browser. This means you get to access your projects and start designing from any computer or platform without having to buy multiple licenses or install software.
Another reason why designers love this app is that Figma offers a generous free plan where you can create and store 3 active projects at a time. It’s more than enough for you to learn, experiment, and work on small projects.
target_audience: Creative people

courses.title: Der ultimative Figma Kurs für UX Designer
courses.bio: Figma von A bis Z: Lerne wie du intuitive User Interfaces und interaktive Prototypen wie ein UX Designer gestaltest!
objectives: Alle Grundlagen in Figma um erfolgreich Prototypen zu erstellen
Zusammenarbeit in Figma durch Team Libraries und Design Handoffs
Figma Funktionen für Responsive Design
Erstellung einer eigenen Portfolio Webseite in Figma
Grundlagen und Vorgehensweisen für einen UX Designer
requirements: Es werden keine Vorkenntnisse benötig. Für den Kurs ist ein kostenfreier Figma Account empfehlenswert.
courses.description:
Möchtest du UX Designer werden oder bist bereits ein UX Designer? Dann solltest du Figma kennen.
Figma ist eine kollaborative Design-Plattform, die es UX Designern ermöglicht, interaktive Prototypen und intuitive Benutzeroberflächen schnell und einfach zu erstellen. In der heutigen digitalen Welt ist ein gutes UX Design unerlässlich, um eine positive Benutzererfahrung zu schaffen und ein erfolgreiches Produkt zu entwickeln.
In diesem Kurs werden dir von mir die notwendigen Kenntnisse vermitteln, um Figma effektiv zu nutzen und großartige UX Designs und interaktive Prototypen zu erstellen. Ich werde dir zeigen, wie du eine neue Datei in Figma erstellst, wie du Benutzeroberflächen und Prototypen entwirfst und wie du interaktive Prototypen erstellst und testen kannst. Du wirst auch lernen, wie man Farben, Typografie und Symbole in deinem Design verwendet und wie man mit anderen Designern zusammenarbeitet und Designvorlagen teilt.
Dieser Kurs ist für alle geeignet, die sich für UX Design interessieren und ihr Wissen und ihre Fähigkeiten erweitern möchten, egal ob du bereits Erfahrung in der Branche hast oder gerade erst anfängst. Ich werde dich durch den gesamten Kurs begleiten und dir wertvolle Einblicke in die Welt des UX Designs geben.
Nutze die Chance deine Fähigkeiten im UX Design zu verbessern und deine Karriere auf die nächste Stufe zu bringen. Melde dich jetzt für diesen Kurs an und werde ein Experte in Figma!
target_audience: UX Designer/UI Designer die Figma von Anfang an lernen wollen oder ihr Wissen vertiefen möchten.

courses.title: How to train your designer eye & develop your design skills
courses.bio: Learn how you can use design inspiration effectively, how to analyze UI designs and how to practice & experiment
objectives: Learn a framework for developing your design skills
Learn how to collect design inspiration and what to collect
Develop an eye for good design
Learn how to analyze UI designs
Establish a workflow for researching design patterns and good practices
Discover the most effective ways of practicing and experimenting
Understand that UI design is learnable, it is not only for the "talented" ones
requirements: No previous experience needed, it is suitable for complete beginners
Whether you are a student, a beginner or a more experienced professional, learning how to train your designer eye in a systematic way will boost your skills as a UX, UI or product designer
courses.description:
You'll learn how to consistently improve your design skills by continuously getting inspired by the offline & the digital world around you, and by building a habit around collecting design inspiration, analyzing UI designs and practicing our design craft.
I'll explain how to collect and analyze designs and practice designing user flows, layouts and UI elements: I will show you some effective techniques, my favorite resources, and I'm going to give you many-many practice activities. As a result, you'll have an approach or framework for train your designer eye on a daily basis.


Main topics
getting inspired by the offline & the digital world around you
collecting design inspiration
analyzing UI designs
practicing and experimenting
conducting UX audits (coming soon)


This course is for your if
you read a lot about design theory, but there is a gap between your theoretical understanding and practice, or
you completed a design bootcamp (or you are in the process of completing one) but you don't have a plan for developing your designer eye on a consistent basis, or you just simply
need a systematic approach to develop your skills
So if
You are in the process of getting into design or
You are a designer or researcher who wants to work on UI or visual design skills
You are a student who needs some guidance
You just simply want to train your designer eye,
I’m confident that you’ll greatly benefit from this course.


This course is NOT
This is not a comprehensive design curriculum, review what is included in the course before purchasing it.
I won't teach you how to use a certain design tool (e.g. Figma or Sketch). However, you'll find most of the practice activities inside a Figma file, so it is easier to complete the assignments if you have a Figma account (it is free).
The course is not about an end-to-end UX/UI design process.


My goal
I'm a design mentor and teacher with 10+ years of professional experience, and throughout my years I've noticed that many designers don't know how to develop their design (UX, UI and visual design) skills effectively. They attend a bootcamp or some online courses, then they don't really know how they can improve their design skillset.
I wish I had known these tactics and approaches when I was a beginner designer!
If you are searching for a comprehensive, A to Z design course, then this is not the one you are after. However, my suggestion is that you should still apply this as a complementary course (e.g. if you are in the process of completing a design bootcamp), I promise that you will find a lot of gems inside it!
My goal is to constantly improve the course material, the first update is going to be a new section about UX Audits!
target_audience: Beginner UX designers, Beginner UI designers, Beginner product designers
UX designers, UX researchers, Content designers who want to work on UI design or visual design skills
Beginners who are in the process of completing a bootcamp - I believe that the mindset and framework shared here'll greatly complement your studies!
Design bootcamp graduates who need some guidance on how to develop an eye for design
Designers wanting to learn a framework or systematic approach about training their designer eye

courses.description:
Merhaba. Uzun bir süredir Adobe Xd üzerinde çalışmalar yapıyor, her gün yeni ve yaratıcı projelere adım atıyorum. Sizler de Adobe Xd kursumu satın alabilir, html,css yapısına uygun web siteleri tasarlayabilir, sevdiğiniz ya da hoşunuza giden mobil arayüzü çizebilirsiniz. Bir işletme sahibi iseniz kendi mobil uygulamanızın arayüz tasarımını çizebilecek duruma gelecek, Kendinize bu kurs sayesinde çok şey katacaksınız. Sizler için Türkiye de bulabileceğiniz büyük, etkileyici, kreatif ve yaratıcı bir eğitim seti hazırladım. Şimdi sıra sizde. Bu kurstan faydalanmalı, mobil uygulama arayüzleri tasarlayabilecek duruma gelmeli, istediğiniz web sitelerini html/css 'yapısına uygun olarak çizmelisiniz.
Bu Kurstan Çıktıntan Sonra Ne Yapacağız?
-UI-UX Tasarımcı Ünvanına Sahip Olacaksınız

Sizler için sade, sakin ve eğlenceli bir şekilde Adobe Xd kursunu tanıttım, anlattım ve mobil arayüzler çizdim. Uygulamalı olarak tasarımlar yaptım ve bu sayede sizlerin de bilgilenmesini sağladım. Sizler de kendi tasarım alanınızı oluşturmak ya da kendinizi geliştirmek istiyorsanız uygun fiyatlı ve kaçırmamanız gereken bir kurs.
Vakit kaybetmeyin, direkt kursumu satın alın ! - Aklınıza takılan herhangi bir durumda bana mesaj gönderebileceğinizi de unutmayın..

courses.title: UI UX Spatial Prototyping/Design For AR/VR Technology
courses.bio: Figma / XD UI UX Design Essentials for Augmented and Virtual Reality Spatial Prototyping
objectives: Fundamentals of AR/VR: Understand the basics of augmented and virtual reality technologies.
UI/UX Design Techniques: Master UI/UX design principles tailored for immersive digital experiences.
Prototyping Tools: Gain proficiency in using prototyping tools for creating AR/VR user interfaces.
Hands-On Projects: Apply learned concepts through practical projects to enhance skills and understanding.
Future Trends: Stay updated on emerging trends and advancements in AR/VR technology and design.
requirements: Basic Design Knowledge: Familiarity with design principles like layout, color theory, and typography can be helpful.
Understanding of UI/UX Concepts: Some knowledge of user interface and user experience design fundamentals is advantageous.
Digital Design Tools: Proficiency in design tools such as Adobe XD, Figma, or Sketch can facilitate the learning process.
Interest in AR/VR Technology: Enthusiasm for augmented and virtual reality and a curiosity about spatial design concepts is encouraged.
Computer Skills: Basic computer skills, including file management and navigation, are sufficient for this course.
Creativity and Openness to Learning: A creative mindset and willingness to learn new concepts and technologies are essential.
courses.description:
The UI/UX Spatial Design for AR/VR Technology course offers a comprehensive exploration into the principles and practices of user interface (UI) and user experience (UX) design within the dynamic realms of augmented reality (AR) and virtual reality (VR). Throughout the course, students delve into the intricacies of spatial design, understanding how to craft immersive digital experiences that seamlessly integrate with the user's physical environment. Emphasizing spatial awareness, students learn to navigate challenges such as occlusion, distortion, and discomfort to create compelling AR/VR interfaces.
Covering fundamental concepts of AR and VR technologies, students gain insight into spatial design principles, motion dynamics, text readability, and prototyping tools essential for creating immersive user experiences. The curriculum combines theoretical knowledge with practical application, offering hands-on projects that allow students to implement learned concepts and refine their skills. With a focus on the future of AR/VR in UI/UX design, the course equips participants with the expertise needed to design user-friendly and engaging digital experiences in augmented and virtual realities.
By the end of the course, students emerge with a deep understanding of spatial design for AR/VR technology, positioning themselves as adept designers ready to tackle the challenges and opportunities presented by the rapidly evolving landscape of immersive digital experiences. Whether aspiring designers, seasoned professionals, or tech enthusiasts, learners from diverse backgrounds will find this course invaluable in unlocking their potential in the exciting field of UI/UX spatial design for AR/VR technology.
target_audience: Aspiring UI/UX Designers: Individuals interested in breaking into the field of user interface and user experience design, particularly in the context of augmented and virtual reality.
Design Students: Students pursuing degrees or certifications in design-related disciplines who want to expand their knowledge and skills to include spatial design for AR/VR technology.
Professionals Seeking Career Transition: Professionals from diverse backgrounds looking to transition into the rapidly growing AR/VR industry and enhance their design skill set.
Digital Entrepreneurs: Entrepreneurs and startup founders aiming to incorporate immersive digital experiences into their products or services and understand the principles of UI/UX spatial design.
Tech Enthusiasts: Individuals passionate about emerging technologies and eager to explore the creative possibilities of AR/VR in designing engaging user experiences.

Whether you're a beginner looking to enter the field or an experienced designer seeking to specialize in AR/VR design, this course offers valuable insights and practical skills to propel your career forward.

courses.title: Getting Started with ServiceNow Visual Task Boards
courses.bio: Learn everything about ServiceNow Visual Task Boards (VTBs): Guided, Freeform, and Flexible Boards [Unofficial]
objectives: Select the optimal Visual Task Board (VTB) type (Freeform, Guided, or Flexible) to meet different business needs and workflows.
Build and customize all three types of Visual Task Boards from scratch, including configuring lanes, swimlanes, and data filters.
Manage tasks effectively by assigning users, adding checklists, using labels, and attaching relevant files directly to VTB cards.
Automate ServiceNow record updates, such as changing an incident's state, by moving task cards on a Guided board.
requirements: No prior knowledge or experience is required.
Basic familiarity with ServiceNow as a user is advised.
courses.description:
This course is designed to transform your productivity by mastering one of the platform's most powerful and intuitive tools: Visual Task Boards (VTBs).
This comprehensive journey will guide you through everything you need to know to turn your task lists into interactive, drag-and-drop boards that visualize your work and enhance collaboration.
We will dive deep into the three distinct types of Visual Task Boards, ensuring you know exactly which one to use for any scenario:


Freeform Boards: Discover the ultimate flexibility for managing personal To-Do's or team projects. You'll learn to create private tasks, customize lanes, and even pull in existing ServiceNow records, such as incidents and change requests, for a single, consolidated view.


Guided Boards: Learn how to create structured boards where lanes are automatically driven by record fields like "State" or "Priority". These are perfect for standard processes, and you'll master the powerful feature of updating ServiceNow records simply by moving a card from one lane to another.


Flexible Boards: Get the perfect blend of data integration and visual freedom. You will learn to pull in specific records based on filters you define, then organize them in custom lanes without altering the underlying data—ideal for tracking unique workflows for development teams or special projects.


Throughout the course, you will master essential skills, including adding members and labels, managing attachments and checklists, setting work-in-progress (WIP) limits, and utilizing swimlanes for an extra layer of organization.
This course is designed for any ServiceNow user—whether you're a project manager, team lead, IT support professional, or an individual contributor looking to boost personal productivity. No prior experience with Visual Task Boards is necessary.


Enroll today and start transforming the way you work in ServiceNow, bringing clarity, efficiency, and seamless collaboration to your projects.
target_audience: Anyone who uses or is interested in using ServiceNow
Project Managers, Team Leads, IT Support Professionals
Individual Contributors looking to enhance their personal productivity
Anyone interested in using Kanban boards or Visual Task Boards (VTBs)

courses.title: App Design with Adobe Xd
courses.bio: Get into UX design with Adobe's brand new design and prototyping tool
objectives: Build interactive Mobile App and Website prototypes
Share their working app and website prototypes with anyone
requirements: Adobe Creative Cloud subscription is needed (or the 30-day free trial version)
Basic knowledge of Adobe Illustrator and Adobe Photoshop is useful
courses.description:
With Adobe Xd you can quickly visualise app ideas, turning wireframes into interactive, animated prototypes and testing them out on desktop browsers on or your mobile devices.
This course teaches you all the features of Adobe Xd by demonstrating a full app design workflow. Downloading the project files you can follow along and create your first working app prototype. You can also learn how to combine Adobe Xd with Adobe Photoshop and Adobe Illustrator and utilise the seamless integration between these creative tools intended to be used in combination.
Being able to create your own prototypes gives you ultimate control over the design of an app or website, you can improve the user experience with ease and even have others test out the design to see what they think.
This application not only saves you time that would be spent going back and forth between wireframes and mockups, it also allows you to show a client exactly what they are getting much earlier in the creative process.


“This is an excellent foray into Adobe XD. I knew nothing about it when I started, now I can use XD to design my own projects.”
Thomas Hverring


A closer look at what you will learn:
Learn the basics of User Experience Design (UXD) and why it became such an important segment of the creative industry with the increased usage and importance of mobile devices.
Next up you can learn how to prepare a new project. Master wireframing as well as designing and gathering assets to use.
Then it’s all about getting to grips with Adobe Xd. This section will cover Artboards, Drawing, working with Text, Images and loads more!
Next it’s time to design your own app by following along with training videos and practise with the included project files.
Finally learn about creating transition and interactions to create a working a app prototype.
Once you are finished with the course you will have a fully functioning prototype and be ready to create loads more!


This course includes:
25 Videos
2.5 Hours of total playtime
Downloadable working files
All future updates to Adobe Xd will be included in this course for no extra payment
Estimated finish time: 5 hours (including finishing all exercises)
Completion certificate upon finishing the entire course


‘Being a hands-on learner, I enjoyed following along with the instructor and creating the project with the supplied exercise files. Thorough start to finish instructions. I feel confident now to start my own app prototypes.’
Janine Eisner-Wall


Martin is an Adobe Certified Instructor – voted as one of the Top 10 Adobe instructors in the world – with years of experience teaching in classrooms, seminars and webinars. He also worked professionally in the creative industry for over 10 years on a wide range of projects for clients such as Disney, Accenture, Mattel, etc.


Who will find it useful:
Those who are brand new to Adobe Xd and want to learn from the basics.
Anyone who would like a professional career in UX/UI design.
Existing creative professionals who are looking to grow their knowledge/transition into these areas.
Anyone who has an idea for a potential application they would like to bring to life.
Anyone who is interested in the future of prototyping.


Skills you will gain
Understanding core concepts and rules of user experience design
Turning wireframes into engaging screen layouts
Building a fully functioning app prototype by adding interactions, transitions and animations
Being able to share your prototype with others and ask for their comments.


Stay ahead of the game and master Adobe Xd by enrolling to this course today!
target_audience: Anyone who wants to learn about UX (user experience) design
Anyone interested to learn a new skill that is extremely high in demand in the creative industry
Anyone wanting to get into the digital design industry

courses.title: UI 設計入門：畫出有程式邏輯的設計稿
courses.bio: 這門課程將會帶你完整跑過一次設計流程，從設計準則、常用版型、元件繪製觀念到與工程師協作，並將理論導入實作，完成自己的作品。
objectives: 了解 UI 介面設計師的工作範疇
掌握 UI 介面設計的實務知識
如何繪製有程式邏輯的設計稿
設計屬於自己的電商網站作品
requirements: 最好需要會操作任一套介面繪圖軟體（e.g. Adobe XD）
courses.description: 這門線上課程將會帶你完整跑過一次設計流程，讓你了解在每個流程當中需要產出什麼樣的文件或內容。課程還會提供常見的排版版型，並且運用一些設計準則讓排版更加靈活。此外更透過原子設計與 Google Material Design 等設計規範來介紹 UI 元件的正確繪製觀念，並會對應程式碼的撰寫方式，讓你繪製出有程式邏輯的設計稿，與工程師的協作更加流暢。這門線上課程最後還規劃了一個電商網站的最終作業，讓你不用擔心只學到理論卻沒有實作作品！
target_audience: 對 UI 設計有興趣
想要轉職成為 UI 介面設計師
想要複習基礎知識的 UI 介面設計師

courses.title: Como prototipar com Figma
courses.bio: Aprenda praticando com cases reais a utilizar uma das ferramentas mais utilizadas no mercado
objectives: Utilizar o Figma e fazer protótipos de aplicativos do mercado

Extras: Recriando o APP do Nubank no Figma
Como Fazer Efeito de Carrossel no Figma
Autolayout, Componentes e Variantes no Figma

requirements: Ter internet e boa vontade
courses.description:
O Figma se apresenta como uma excelente ferramenta que permite o design e a prototipagem de telas para aplicativos, sites ou sites responsivos. Trata-se de uma ferramenta de design de interface na qual todo o trabalho é feito através do navegador, sendo compatível com Windows, Linux, Chrome e Mac. Ele traz a vantagem da criação de alterações em projetos em tempo real, que podem ser feitas ao mesmo tempo por todos os membros de uma equipe, por exemplo, sendo um ótimo suporte para quem trabalha em grupo.
Aprenda a trabalhar com Design Digital com esta ferramenta de interface simples e intuitiva, para alcançar ótimos resultados e destacar-se profissionalmente como UI designer.
Para quem é este curso
Iniciantes em design: Você vai aprender os fundamentos da profissão, aprofundar seus conhecimentos e ter todo o apoio de mentores experientes
Designers que querem ampliar seus skills: Neste curso você vai ter a chance de desenvolver uma grande variedade de habilidades de diferentes áreas do design.


O que você encontra no curso


Os primeiros passos
Aprenda a produzir um app mobile no Figma com conceitos direcionados para o UI design e para design visual, entendendo seu workflow. Entenda como trabalhar com fontes, cores e pictogramas para compor layout interessantes. Entenda as heurísticas criadas por Jakob Nielsen, cientista da computação, que ajudam a projetar uma boa interface e por consequência uma ótima experiência de uso.
Interfaces
Aprenda a criar um aplicativo no Figma a partir da construção de sua interface. Entenda diretrizes do Design de Interfaces e boas práticas para obter resultados amigáveis e intuitivos. Veja as melhores formas de trabalhar os componentes da interface com conceitos como o Design Atômico e o Design Patterns, aprendendo a criar elementos reutilizáveis. Entenda a importância dos grids para a organização visual do seu aplicativo. Ao final, aprenda a criar um protótipo navegável para apresentar ao cliente.
Entenda sobre os UI Design Patterns, padrões de interface mobile, para obter soluções elegantes para problemas de usabilidade do usuário. Veja como fazer uma análise de problemas de interatividade em um aplicativo que passou por testes e chegue à soluções simples para torná-lo mais amigável.
Microinterações
Aprenda a criar protótipos realistas de alta fidelidade para aplicativos. Utilize telas criadas no Figma para gerar interações. Aprenda princípios da interação, trabalho com gatilhos, condições, modal e muito mais. Ao final, veja como exportar seu protótipo e crie uma apresentação com as interações criadas pronta para ser mostrada para clientes, usuário ou usada em seu portfólio.
target_audience: Curiosos e UX Designer iniciantes

courses.title: Curso de diseño de aplicaciones - apps - para iOS y Android
courses.bio: Aprende a diseñar apps Y A GANAR DINERO CON ELLO.
objectives: Diseñar una app destinada a un negocio real que cubra las necesidades de ese negocio.
Realizar un prototipo interactivo de esta app para poder presentarlo a sus futuros clientes o colaboradores.
Buscar una salida para esta app, es decir, hacer que la app sea rentable

Introducción: La realidad actual de las aplicaciones móviles.
Experiencia de usuario (UX) e Interfaz de usuario (UI).
Elementos de interfaz y recomendaciones de diseño de Apple y Google.
La idea: En busca de un tema para nuestra app.
Estructura de la app: El esqueleto de una app. Diagrama de flujos.
El diseño final - Sketch 3: Diseño de las pantallas de nuestra app.
Adaptando el diseño a los distintos tamaños de pantalla.
El diseño final - Illustrator: Diseño de las pantallas de nuestra app.
El diseño final - Photoshop: Adaptando el tamaño de los gráficos con acciones de Photoshop.
El diseño final - Prototipo: Prototipo del diseño final en Pop.

requirements: Para realizar el curso, los alumnos deben contar con un ordenador (Mac o pc), y con un smartphone o tablet (iPhone, iPad, o bien móvil o tablet Android de gama media/alta).
Sería conveniente (aunque no imprescindible) conocer las nociones básicas del diseño gráfico.
Sería recomendable estar familiarizado con los programas Adobe (Photoshop / illustrator)
courses.description:
Aprende a diseñar apps de la mano de Mar Ballesteros, la diseñadora española que ha conseguido más de un millón de descargas con sus aplicaciones móviles.
Si eres diseñador gráfico o programador y te gustaría aprender diseño de apps y aumentar así tus ingresos mensuales, este curso es para ti.
Al finalizar el curso, serás capaz de diseñar una app dirigida a un negocio concreto, para cubrir las necesidades de este negocio.
Aprenderás a hacer un prototipo interactivo sin saber programar. Este prototipo será la carta de presentación de tu app.
Podrás diseñar un icono o logotipo perfecto y unos screenshots con los que promocionar tu app.
Aprenderás también a sacar partido de tu app, es decir, a ganar dinero con ella.
A lo largo del curso, trataremos el diseño de apps para las dos app stores principales, la Apple App Store y Google Play, realizando así apps tanto para iPhone y iPad como para celulares y tablets Android.

** Trataremos el diseño de apps con los programas Sketch 3 e Illustrator.
** No necesitas tener conocimientos de programación para hacer el curso.
target_audience: El curso va destinado a todos los diseñadores gráficos, o personas con inquietudes por el diseño, que quieran conocer esta nueva via o camino que les permitirá aumentar sus ingresos.
También pueden beneficiarse del curso, aquellos desarrolladores que quieran completar su formación aprendiendo a diseñar apps.

courses.title: Mobile design
courses.bio: Disegna siti web responsive o app mobile native grazie alla UX e UI mobile design
objectives: I principi per disegnare un'app mobile nativa
I principi per disegnare un sito web responsive
Perché l'utente sceglie di navigare da cellulare?
Come usa il cellulare l'utente mobile?
Come disegnare la navigazione principale, il menu, le tab, la splash, i filtri?

Introduzione: Esercizio: studia il tuo modo di navigare
Mobile UX: Esercizio: studia la versione mobile dei siti
Esercizio: fai il restyling di un sito per ricette
Una sola azione in una sola schermata
Esercizio: fai il restyling di un sito per voli
Sopra la piega, sotto la piega
Esercizio: fai il restyling di Kijiji
Esercizio: fai il restyling di LibreOffice
Esercizio: rifai il processo di registrazione di ForfettApp
Mobile UI: i pattern: Esercizio: fai il restyling della homepage di Ansa.it
I tipi di navigazione all’interno dell’app

requirements: Una conoscenza base di web design
Una conoscenza base dei siti web responsive e le applicazioni mobile
courses.description:
→ Chi è l’utente mobile?
→ Perché sceglie di navigare da cellulare?
→ Quali sono le differenze con quello desktop?
→ Cosa cerca in una pagina responsive o un’app mobile?
→ Come usa il cellulare, dove si posa il suo sguardo, in che posizione si trovano i tasti che statisticamente preme di più?
→ Qual è il suo rapporto con la tastiera del telefono?
→ Come dovremmo disporre gli elementi nella pagina per far sì che la legga veramente la call to action?
→ Come dobbiamo disegnare la navigazione principale, il menu, le tab, la splash, i filtri?


Ma perché parlare esclusivamente di mobile design? Ecco perché:
→ Al mondo ci sono 3 miliardi e mezzo di smartphone.
→ Un adulto in italia spende in media 2 ore al giorno sul proprio cellulare;
→ Nel 2020 la pubblicità su mobile su scala globale ha rappresentato i due terzi di tutta la spesa in pubblicità sul digitale;
→ La percentuale di accessi tramite mobile a livello globale nell’ultimo anno è stata del 62% e si pensa che raggiungeremo il 75% nei prossimi cinque anni.


Mi chiamo Luca Panzarella e negli ultimi 13 anni ho aiutato aziende di qualunque dimensione a creare delle esperienze positive per gli utenti dei loro prodotti o servizi digitali, attraverso i loro siti web o applicazioni mobile e in questo corso parliamo di mobile design. Si comincia.
target_audience: web designer
ux designer

courses.title: 如何有效地评测一个智能对话系统
courses.bio: 智能对话系统评测入门
objectives: 了解对话评测系统
了解对话系统的主要分类和应用场景
了解对话系统的评测方法
了解人工评测与自动评测的技术理论依据 通过案例，了解如何搭建智能对话评测系统
requirements: 了解智能对话系统和相关技术
courses.description:
科技的快速进步让人工智能渐渐的深入我们的工作和生活。从智能家居设备到智能电话助手，从客户服务到情感陪伴，智能对话系统在我们的生活中已经被广泛使用。随着智能对话技术的不断发展，不同场景和业务的应用要求智能对话产品更懂用户。
为此，三节课邀请到拥有5年＋对话类产品设计与管理经验的单赢老师，与你分享不同类型的对话系统，带你了解如何有效评测对话系统，为你讲解评测任务的设计、数据采集与评测维度依据，帮你更直观的体会到对话评测的意义和价值，助你从零到一构建对话评测系统。
本节课程是由授课老师与三节课合作制作的。在此，要特别感谢老师的辛苦付出！经历了课程立项、设计、开发中的众多环节，我们才能最终为你呈现现在的这门课程。无论是授课老师还是三节课团队，都希望这门课程能够让你有所收获，希望同学们结合个人工作情况，学以致用。

致力于智能对话评测方法探索的研究者或爱好者

courses.title: Design Thinking | Unlock Innovation and User-centricity
courses.bio: Learn the concepts, tools and techniques & create the right environment to apply them successfully in your own work
objectives: Master every step of the design thinking process through concepts and tools
Articulate how design thinking, lean startup and agile work together and their shared characteristics
How to structure and run design thinking workshops through the various stages of the process
How to conduct quality user research
The skill of empathy
How to identify and handle the cognitive biases which may undermine your team’s work
How to synthesize user research data into insights
How to build tools such as an Empathy map, a User persona, an Affinity diagram and numerous idea generation and selection techniques
How to create the right mental and physical environment for brainstorming
How to structure and facilitate brainstorming sessions
The concept of prototype and the shapes and forms it can take
How to run proof of concept and functional experiments
How to gather and analyze user testing feedback
How to de-risk your projects by testing hypotheses early and by saving time and money
Anticipate the organizational pre-requisites for design thinking
Identify the skills required for a design thinking project team
Adopt the right mindset and corporate culture for design thinking

Welcome: Why did I create this course ?
What do I cover ? And how ?
Introduction to Design Thinking: Definition, core principles and key benefits
How Design Thinking, Lean startup and Agile work together
Process overview : the Understand phase: Discover your users and their environment
The methods and tools of user research
Capture your user research data in an empathy map : concepts and practical case
Capture your user research data in a user persona : concepts and practical case
Homework : empathy map and user persona
4 tips for conducting quality user research
Cognitive biases and frames of mind you need to be aware of
Synthesize your insights into an affinity diagram
How to frame your problem statement

requirements: This course requires no prior learning
courses.description:
This course will give you all the concepts, tools and techniques of design thinking together with the user manual to apply them successfully to your own work !


In this course you will learn everything that makes up the entire Design Thinking process ; a methodology which is fundamental to ingraining innovation and user-centricity within your company.
For every tool I teach (what), I share the best practices on its application (how) and highlight its purpose and benefits (why). I illustrate each one of them using practical cases and homework for you to learn, practice and reflect in a safe trial environment.


You will also learn that, beyond adopting a process, applying design thinking means adopting a new mindset and new ways of working which will shake up your established organization in its management and leadership models, culture, skills and processes.
This will give you a head start on the understanding and identification of the many challenges and changes your company will need to be managing to optimize the benefits of its design thinking projects.


This course is divided into three major parts :
1) Understanding design thinking’s core principles and key benefits
2) Mastering the process by learning its concepts, tools and techniques
3) Creating new ways of working to ensure a successful application of the process and the adoption of the right mindset


This design thinking course is designed as a comprehensive course together with its user manual. By the end of the course, not only will you be able to run the entire process on your own but you will also get to grips with the many organizational and human dynamics at play within your core cross-functional project team and with their internal stakeholders. The combination of both learnings will set you up for success.
target_audience: Anyone aspiring to take a fresh perspective on old problems to develop novel solutions
Innovation and product managers who own and run the design thinking process
Project managers who want to learn an efficient way to align their cross functional teams towards a common goal centered around the user
HR managers who want to spearhead user centricity and promote cross-functionality and agility within siloed organizations
Entrepreneurs who want to make sure they solve real problems and create products or services which meet real user needs
Consultants who advise on innovation or service design
Anyone interested in having an impact and adding value when attending a design thinking workshop by learning to adopt the right mindset
Anyone looking to minimize the risks and optimize the use of resources in time and money associated with the design of new products, services or experiences
Anyone interested in having a more in-depth understanding of Design Thinking

courses.description:
In this Scratch to Advanced Mobile APP UI Design course we’ll learn wireframe, APP UI Design, Animated prototypes & Freelancing. The contents of this course are divided precisely and even a beginner can understand and feel confident about Adobe XD. courses.title: Curso UX UI Design: Oficial homologado [Experto de 0 a 100]
courses.bio: Curso de UX/UI con el que aprenderás a realizar proyectos únicos y conseguir oportunidades laborales desde casa.
objectives: El Curso de Diseño UX/UI ofrece una formación integral en el diseño UX/UI. Los alumnos se convertirán en diseñadores UX/UI de 0 a 100.
El Curso de Diseño UX/UI incluye todas las lecciones, prácticas y herramientas necesarias para que los alumnos se formen como diseñadores UX/UI.
El Curso de Diseño UX/UI se basa en una formación práctica, incluyendo tareas específicas en cada una de las lecciones para asentar todo lo aprendido.
El Curso de Diseño UX/UI ofrece una formación flexible, para que el alumno pueda gestionar su aprendizaje a su gusto.
requirements: Para realizar el Curso de Diseño UX/UI no se necesitan conocimientos ni experiencia previa en materia de diseño, no obstante, estos conocimientos pueden ser de ayuda en el desarrollo del curso.
courses.description:
Con el Curso de Diseño UX/UI tendrás la oportunidad única de sumergirte en el fascinante mundo del diseño de experiencia de usuario (UX) y de interfaz de usuario (UI). Este curso te permitirá crear productos digitales que no solo sean visualmente atractivos, sino también intuitivos y funcionales para los usuarios.
A lo largo del programa, explorarás los principios fundamentales del diseño UX/UI, aprendiendo cómo investigar las necesidades y deseos de los usuarios, diseñar prototipos efectivos y realizar pruebas de usabilidad para mejorar continuamente la experiencia del usuario. Además, te familiarizarás con las últimas tendencias y herramientas en el campo del diseño digital, desde software de diseño hasta técnicas de prototipado de alta fidelidad.
Nuestro objetivo principal es proporcionarte un entorno de aprendizaje interactivo y enriquecedor, donde puedas desarrollar tus habilidades creativas y críticas. A través de proyectos prácticos y ejercicios de diseño, te desafiamos a pensar de manera innovadora y a aplicar tus conocimientos en situaciones del mundo real. No solo adquirirás habilidades técnicas sólidas en diseño UX/UI, sino que también desarrollarás una mentalidad centrada en el usuario y una capacidad para crear experiencias digitales memorables y efectivas.
Al completar este curso, te convertirás en un profesional altamente capacitado en el campo del diseño de experiencia de usuario (UX) y de interfaz de usuario (UI). Obtendrás las habilidades y el conocimiento necesarios para enfrentarte a desafíos complejos en el diseño digital, desde la conceptualización hasta la implementación. Nuestro enfoque práctico y orientado a resultados te preparará para destacarte en el mercado laboral, ya sea que desees trabajar como diseñador UX/UI independiente, en una agencia creativa o en una empresa tecnológica líder. Con el respaldo de este curso, estarás listo para enfrentarte a cualquier proyecto de diseño con confianza y excelencia profesional.
¡Únete a nosotros en este emocionante viaje del diseño UX/UI!
target_audience: El Curso de Diseño UX/UI está dirigido a cualquier persona que quiera adentrarse en el mundo del Diseño UX/UI. Cualquier persona sin conocimientos previos de diseño podría convertirse en un diseñador UX/UI con el Curso de Diseño UX/UI. Este curso también es ideal para profesionales de otras ramas del diseño que quieren aumentar su currículum y experiencia con el diseño UX/UI.

objectives: Curso de Adobe XD que será sempre atualizado com novos recursos.

Com enviar seu projeto para desenvolvimento da forma certa.

Aula de apresentação: O que você vai aprender nesse curso.
Comece aqui: Video de boas vindas - Comece aqui
Como sugerir um novo tópico para o curso

Dominando o Adobe XD: Como usar os Kits de interface - UI KITs

TRILHAPP - Montando as telas e interaçõe: Configurando as pranchetas, guias e grids
Criando tela de configuração do app

Área de Download: Baixe aqui os arquivos utilizados neste curso.

requirements: O único pre-requisito é querer aprender!
courses.description:
Bem vindo ao Curso de Adobe XD DEFINITIVO, você aprenderá o programa em detalhes. Começando pelos fundamentos, em seguida irá se aprofundar nos principais recursos do programa até o nível profissional. Para completar, você terá a oportunidade única de ver de perto o case de um PROJETO REAL e acompanhar o processo de criação técnica da interface do TRILHAPP, que é um aplicativo voltado ao segmento de ecoturismo e esporte de aventura.

Porque esse é considerado o CURSO DE ADOBE XD DEFINITIVO?
Por ser um dos segmentos que mais cresce, esse mercado de design de aplicativo tem evoluído muito rápido, e por isso o programa tem recebido atualizações mensais e para acompanhar essa velocidade, eu criei esse curso que irá ensina-lo a usar o programa, ao mesmo tempo que irá mante-lo atualizado a medida que novos recursos forem surgindo. Então quando você se inscrever nesse curso terá a tranquilidade de que seu aprendizado em Adobe XD estará garantido no futuro. Assim você evita o risco de perder seu tempo e dinheiro em um curso que logo ficará desatualizado.


Resumidamente, imagine que este curso tem como diferencial:
1 - Ensinar o programa a fundo para você conhece-lo em detalhes para atuar profissionalmente.
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
2 - Esse é um curso diferenciado pois oferece uma oportunidade de acompanhar o processo de criação técnica das telas de um projeto de aplicativo real, oferecendo assim uma experiência de aprendizado mais imersiva e próxima da realidade do dia a dia de trabalho.
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
3 - Criado pelo designer e diretor de arte com significativa experiência no segmento de design interativo e fundador do projeto Tutorial Master, site e canal do youtube com objetivo de compartilhar conhecimento de nível profissional.

courses.title: Adobe XD UI/UX Design, prototype, and handoff from scratch
courses.bio: Learn how to design and prototype apps and webpages using Adobe XD
objectives: You'll learn how to use Adobe XD to design and prototype apps from scratch
You'll learn tools that are universal across multiple design apps to enhance your design workflow
You'll learn how to incorporate best practices in reusing design elements and styles to increase efficiency
