Um Mundo de Possibilidades na Confluência de UX/UI e IA
Imagine ter o poder de criar experiências do usuário excepcionais, combinando o poder do design de interface com a inteligência artificial. Neste curso, você vai explorar essa sinergia e descobrir como projetar produtos e aplicativos que não apenas cativam os usuários, mas também se adaptam, evoluem e aprendem com o tempo.
O que Você Vai Aprender
Durante esta extensa jornada de aprendizado, você irá mergulhar fundo no mundo do design de interface com Figma, uma das ferramentas mais poderosas da indústria. Você dominará a criação de wireframes, mockups e protótipos de alta qualidade. Além disso, aprenderá a criar designs de classe mundial, capazes de elevar a experiência do usuário a novos patamares.
Mas isso não é tudo! Vamos além, adentrando no emocionante campo da inteligência artificial. Você aprenderá como incorporar IA em seus projetos de design, tornando suas criações mais inteligentes e eficientes. Imagine interfaces que aprendem com o comportamento do usuário e se adaptam para fornecer experiências altamente personalizadas. Isso é o futuro, e você estará na vanguarda.
Um Curso Sem Pré-Requisitos
Não importa se você é um iniciante completo. Este curso foi projetado para guiá-lo desde o zero. Tudo o que você precisa é de um computador com acesso à internet e entusiasmo pelo design e pela inteligência artificial.
Para Quem Este Curso é Destinado
Este curso é uma porta de entrada para um mundo de oportunidades. É perfeito para:
Iniciantes que desejam entrar no mundo do design de interface e inteligência artificial.
Designers aspirantes que buscam aprimorar suas habilidades e criar portfólios de alto nível.
Profissionais que desejam melhorar a experiência do usuário em seus produtos ou aplicativos.
Criativos que desejam incorporar IA em seus projetos de design.
Entusiastas de tecnologia interessados em UX/UI e IA.
Qualquer pessoa que deseje obter uma certificação em design.
Por que Escolher Este Curso
Este curso não é apenas uma coleção de vídeos. É uma experiência imersiva, onde você aprenderá na prática, desenvolvendo projetos reais que mostrarão seu domínio em UX/UI e IA. Nossos instrutores experientes estão aqui para orientá-lo em cada passo do caminho, garantindo que você esteja pronto para enfrentar os desafios do mundo real.
Ao concluir este curso, você estará pronto para obter a certificação em UX/UI Design e estará equipado com as habilidades prontas para o mercado que os empregadores desejam. Você será um profissional altamente qualificado que não apenas cria designs incríveis, mas também os aprimora com a inteligência artificial.
Está pronto para dar o próximo passo em sua carreira? A hora é agora! Inscreva-se e junte-se a nós nessa emocionante jornada de aprendizado e inovação. O futuro da UX/UI e da IA aguarda por você!
target_audience: Iniciantes que desejam mergulhar no mundo de UX/UI e IA.
Designers aspirantes em busca de habilidades avançadas.
Profissionais que buscam melhorar a experiência do usuário.
Criativos que desejam incorporar IA em seus projetos.
Entusiastas de tecnologia interessados em UX/UI.
Qualquer pessoa disposta a obter uma certificação em design.

courses.description:
Unlock the Power of Figma and Transform into a UI/UX Design Pro!
Are you ready to immerse yourself in the world of UI/UX design and create stunning user interfaces and experiences that captivate users? Look no further! Our "Learn Figma - UI/UX Design Essential Training Course" is your comprehensive guide to mastering Figma, the industry-leading design and prototyping tool.
Course Highlights:
Introduction to Figma: Get started with Figma and explore its intuitive interface. Learn to navigate the platform with ease and harness its powerful design features.
Design Fundamentals: Build a strong foundation in design principles, including layout, typography, color theory, and user psychology. Understand what makes a design visually appealing and user-friendly.
UI Design: Dive into the world of user interface (UI) design. Create visually striking and functional interfaces for websites, mobile apps, and more using Figma's versatile tools.
UX Design: Master the art of user experience (UX) design. Understand user behavior, conduct user research, and design intuitive and seamless user journeys and interactions.
Wireframing and Prototyping: Create wireframes and interactive prototypes that bring your design concepts to life. Test and refine your designs for optimal user satisfaction.
Responsive Design: Learn to design responsive interfaces that adapt to various screen sizes and devices, ensuring a consistent and user-friendly experience.
Collaborative Workflows: Collaborate seamlessly with team members and clients using Figma's real-time collaboration features. Streamline your design workflow and foster efficient teamwork.
Design Systems: Discover the power of design systems in Figma. Create and maintain consistent design elements, styles, and components for scalable and efficient design projects.
Pixel-Perfect Design: Polish your designs to perfection with pixel-level precision. Ensure every element aligns flawlessly and adheres to design standards.
Lifetime Access: Enroll today and enjoy lifetime access to the course materials, including updates and additional resources. Stay up-to-date with the latest Figma features and design trends.
Certification: Upon course completion, receive a certificate of achievement to showcase your proficiency in Figma and UI/UX design.
Unlock Creative Possibilities: Whether you're an aspiring designer, a developer looking to enhance your design skills, or a professional seeking to broaden your design knowledge, this course empowers you to create exceptional digital experiences.
Who Should Enroll:
This course is perfect for:
Aspiring UI/UX Designers: Start your journey into the exciting field of UI/UX design.
Web and App Developers: Enhance your design skills to create more compelling user interfaces.
Graphic Designers: Expand your skill set into digital and interactive design.
Product Managers: Gain a deeper understanding of design principles to lead successful product development.
Join our community of learners who have transformed their design skills with our "Learn Figma - UI/UX Design Essential Training Course." Enroll now and embark on your path to becoming a UI/UX design expert!
Don't miss this opportunity to turn your passion for design into a valuable skill. Enroll today and start creating exceptional user interfaces and experiences with Figma!
Enroll now and begin your journey to UI/UX design excellence with Figma!

courses.description:
Have you ever tried to create your own color palette but you couldn't choose your colors harmoniously? If so, you are in the right place.
Many designers, especially beginners, aren't comfortable working with colors. That's why they try to find pre-made color palettes on websites. But why? The reason is they don't know the fundamentals of color.
If you are a UI/UX designer, you know how important color is. In fact, one of the most important aspects of user interface and user experience design is color, and if you don't use it properly, your design won't stand out.
In this course, you will learn everything you need to know about colors step by step, from color theory to color psychology. You will learn how to create harmonious and beautiful color palettes in no time. In addition to creating color palettes, you will learn how to apply colors to your design like a professional, no matter if it's a website or a mobile application.
Moreover, we will dive into the color accessibility topic, and you will learn how to create amazing color palettes that are accessible to everyone.
During this course, we will create different color palettes and apply them to websites and mobile applications using Figma. You will also learn how to validate your colors based on contrast ratios easily.
I’ll go over all of the essential tools and techniques for creating amazing color palettes required for User Interface (UI) and User Experience (UX) design.
This course has been designed for people who are struggling to choose and apply colors properly. We will start with the most basic principles and work all the way through, step by step.


Course highlights:
Master Color Theory
Master Color Psychology
Learn how to create harmonious color schemes
Tips & Tricks for working with colors
Learn about the required colors in UI/UX design projects
Learn how to apply colors to your design like a pro
A certificate of completion upon finishing the course.


We are so confident that you will love this course that we're offering a 30-day money-back guarantee! So you can sign up today with zero risks.
So, what are you waiting for? Enroll today!!

courses.title: Build Persuasive Products
courses.bio: Learn how to apply psychology to design engaging online user experiences that make people take action.
objectives: Use psychology to design more effective, more fun, and more engaging interactions
Design with purpose and intent
Motivate your users to act
Sustain passionate users through mastery and honest seduction
Create better and more engaging interactions, today.
Frame choices to your benefit

Sustaining passionate users: From being seduced to falling in love
From falling in love to staying in love
Thank you: Thank you for joining this course

requirements: You should have familiarity with websites, apps, and/or technology products.
courses.description:
In this 3 hour course, I will go through the most effective persuasive design patterns and explain how you can easily apply them to your own design. You will learn the underlying psychological principles that drive us toward action.
You will learn how to design for engagement
The starting point will be in psychology rather than in graphical design. We will examine how we are as humans: how we think. You will learn what motivate us when we make decisions and how we make decisions. After this course, you will be able to apply this principles to make seductive user experiences, that drive users toward action.
The full life-cycle
The appropriate approach to engaging your users depend on where they are in your product's lifecycle. We will examine all stages of your user-relationship:
How to get people onboard
How to get people started and discovering all your product has to offer
How to make them stick around (and love your product)
An always growing course
I believe in creating the best possible course for you to enjoy. This is why I will continuously be adding more lessons. If you liked the course in its current state then be sure to buy it now, to get free access to all existing and future lessons at the current low rate.
target_audience: Web designers
Interaction designers

さいごに: さいごに〜デザイン思考で一番大切なポイントとは？〜

requirements: とくになし
courses.description:
【あなたは、以下のようなことで悩んでいませんか？】
デザイン思考を学んでみたいけど、よくわからない
これからの時代に活かせる問題解決力を身につけたい
職場で一目置かれるアイデアマンになりたい
「０」から「１」を生み出すクリエイティブな思考を身につけたい
ポジティブな職場の雰囲気を作りたい
日常の業務を効率よく改善していきたい


これらに一つでも当てはまるなら、この講座がオススメです！


「いかなる問題も、それが発生したのと同じ次元で解決することはできない」
これはアインシュタインの名言ですが、これからの変化の大きい時代では、
まさにゼロベースで考えて解決策を生み出す、そんな手法が求められています。
これまでの常識にとらわれない、
クリエイティブな問題解決のための考え方。
それが、デザイン思考です。


デザイン思考のプロセスを実践して学ぶことで
ユーザーに共感し、本質を見抜く問題発見力
理想を高め、枠を飛び出して考える発想力・企画力
アイデアを最短・最速で体感・検証していく行動力
など、これからの時代ではすべての社会人が身につけておくべき
「クリエイティブな問題解決の考え方」が身につきます。


しかし、デザイン思考は、レゴや粘土を用いるような
「ワークショップ」や「イノベーション」という言葉の
イメージが先行してしまい、なかなか日常に
取り入れることが難しいとされています。
「デザイン思考が組織に定着した」と感じる企業は
５％程度しかないという調査結果も出ています。


そこで、この講座では
デザイン思考の基本となるエッセンスを解説し、
デザイン思考を「日常へ活かす方法」について解説します。


デザイン思考で学べるマインドセットやスキルの解説に始まり、
本質はアジャイル開発にも活かせる「デザイン思考の基本サイクル」
UXデザインでも利用されるヒアリング手法「弟子入り」
アイデアを生み出す技法「要素分解・フィルタインプット・アナロジー」
生まれたてのアイデアに魂を吹き込む「コンセプト・ストーリー」
誰でもできる簡単な試作法「ペーパープロトタイピング」
などの実践的な方法について解説し、
また各章の最後には
『クリエイティブ・スイッチ〜デザイン思考の活かし方〜』
として、日常に活かすための38個のヒントを収録しました。

もしあなたが初めてデザイン思考を学ぶ場合は、
日常でスキルを意識しながら過ごすことで
実際の応用の仕方を体感しながら学んでいただけます。
また、これから他の講座で学ぶ場合も、
本講座を使っていちどデザイン思考を「体感」しておけば、
より深くデザイン思考について学ぶことが可能です。

動画を見て学ぶだけではなく、
「デザイン思考を日常で実践して、体感・体得する」
これが、この講座の学び方です。


【例えば、もしあなたがデザイン思考を日常に取り入れると、、】
上司に依頼された資料作成を短時間で効率よく行うことができる
意見が出て、アイデアが進む会議を開催することができる
同僚や部下からの相談の本質をとらえて的確に解決に導くことができる
日常会話から職場をよくするヒントを見つけ出すことができる
自分のこだわりを表現してやりがいをもって働くことができる
など、すぐに目の前の仕事に活かすことができます。


あなたがどんな仕事をしていても、
デザイン思考の考え方を取り入れることで、
日常の問題解決に役立てていただく事ができます。
56個のレクチャー、計5時間10分のビデオと38個のヒントで
あなたの問題解決スキルを次世代のステージに高めていきましょう。
target_audience: デザイン思考を学んでみたいけど、よくわからない
これからの時代に活かせる問題解決力を身につけたい
職場で一目置かれるアイデアマンになりたい
「０」から「１」を生み出すクリエイティブな思考を身につけたい
ポジティブな職場の雰囲気を作りたい
日常の業務を効率よく改善していきたい

courses.description:
¡Descubre el Arte del Diseño Web Responsive con Figma!
¿Te gustaría dominar la habilidad de diseñar páginas web que se adapten perfectamente a cualquier dispositivo? ¡Entonces este curso es para ti!


Por Qué Deberías Unirte
En la era digital actual, la demanda de diseñadores capaces de crear experiencias web que brillen en todos los dispositivos ha alcanzado su punto álgido. Con nuestro curso de Diseño Web Responsive con Figma, te convertirás en un experto en diseñar para pantallas de todos los tamaños, desde móviles hasta escritorios.


¿Qué Aprenderás?
Diseño Responsivo de Alto Nivel**: Adquiere las habilidades esenciales para adaptar tus diseños a diferentes pantallas, asegurando una experiencia de usuario impecable en todos los dispositivos.
Uso Contextual de Dispositivos**: Descubre la importancia de considerar el contexto de uso de cada dispositivo al diseñar de forma responsiva, para crear experiencias personalizadas y efectivas.
De Principiante a Experto en Figma**: Incluso si eres nuevo en el diseño, te guiaremos desde los conceptos básicos hasta el dominio experto de Figma, la herramienta líder en diseño colaborativo.
Proyectos Prácticos y Profesionales**: Aprende diseñando la página web de una agencia de diseño, un proyecto que te permitirá aplicar tus conocimientos, fortalecer tu dominio en Figma y crear un impresionante portafolio.
Conversaciones Diseñador-Desarrollador**: Ganarás conocimientos básicos para participar de manera efectiva en conversaciones entre diseñadores y desarrolladores, mejorando la colaboración y el éxito de tus proyectos.


Beneficios del Curso
Al finalizar, podrás:
Aplicar con confianza el diseño web responsive en proyectos personales y para clientes.
Dominar Figma al 100%, entregando diseños organizados y optimizados.
Construir un proyecto impresionante para tu portfolio personal.
Utilizar la página web diseñada como base para futuros proyectos.
Destacar entre tus colegas, siendo un experto en diseño web responsive.


¡Únete Hoy y Potencia tu Carrera!
Este curso es tu boleto para destacar en el competitivo mundo del diseño web. ¡No te pierdas la oportunidad de aprender y crecer con nosotros! ¡Inscríbete ahora y comienza tu viaje hacia el diseño web responsive!

courses.title: Designing Usable AI
courses.bio: How to Build Trustworthy AI Experiences
objectives: User experience designer
UX Designer
Product designer
UI Designer
Product manager
UI Engineer

Welcome & Mindset: The UX Mindset Shift for AI
Designing for clarity & explainability: Making AI Understandable - Explainability in AI
The Strategic Role of UX in AI: The strategic role of UX in AI products

requirements: You don’t need to be an AI expert to take this course. It’s built for designers, product teams, and business professionals who want to understand and design AI experiences without needing to code. No prior technical AI knowledge is required. We explain concepts in clear, accessible terms. A basic understanding of UX or product design helps, but it’s not essential. If you’ve ever designed, tested, or managed a digital product, you’ll follow along easily. Familiarity with digital products or software (apps, websites, or enterprise tools) will help you connect the lessons to your own work. Curiosity about AI is the only must-have. This course is about designing for people — not programming models. By the end, you’ll be able to apply usable AI principles to your own projects, even if you’ve never worked directly with AI before.
courses.description:
AI is everywhere — but truly usable AI is rare. Most AI features confuse users, overpromise, or break trust. That’s why designing AI isn’t just about technology — it’s about clarity, transparency, and experience design.
In this course, you’ll learn how to design AI experiences that people actually want to use. We’ll break down what makes AI usable, trustworthy, and valuable — and give you the frameworks and practical tools to make it happen in your own projects.
You don’t need to be an AI expert. This course is designed for UX designers, product designers, product managers, and engineers who want to build AI into their products the right way — focused on usability, not just novelty.
What you’ll learn:
The foundations of AI usability and why mental models matter
How to design clear and useful AI experiences that reduce friction
Ways to build trust and transparency into AI products
Common UX mistakes that break trust in AI — and how to avoid them
Practical frameworks, checklists, and guardrails for AI design
How to apply UX strategy to AI in real-world B2B and consumer products
Why take this course?
Practical, not theoretical: Based on real-world experience designing AI products in global organisations
Clear frameworks you can use immediately: No fluff, just tools and guidance
Accessible to non-experts: No coding or technical AI knowledge required
By the end of this course, you’ll have the confidence and skills to design AI experiences that people can understand, trust, and use — setting you apart as someone who can bridge the gap between powerful technology and human-centered design.
Let’s make AI usable, together.
target_audience: This course is designed for professionals who are building, shaping, or contributing to AI-driven products and want to make them truly usable and trustworthy. It’s not a coding course — it’s about experience design, product strategy, and building AI that people actually want to use. UX & UI Designers who want to confidently design for AI features without getting lost in technical detail. Product Designers & Strategists who need practical frameworks for integrating AI into existing user journeys. Product Managers who must balance technical feasibility with user trust and adoption. Engineers & Developers who are building AI-powered interfaces and want to understand the user experience side. Leaders & Innovators in digital products who want to stay ahead of the curve by understanding what “good AI UX” looks like. This course is not for learners looking for machine learning coding tutorials, algorithm design, or heavy technical training. Instead, it focuses on the applied design side of AI: creating clarity, trust, and usable experiences.

Leveraging Design Thinking to Drive Innovation In Organisations

requirements: There are no specific prerequisites for taking this course. It is designed for beginners and professionals alike. An open mind and a willingness to engage in creative problem-solving are all you need!
courses.description:
Imagine you’re in a meeting, and your team is struggling to come up with a solution for a persistent problem. The ideas floating around feel uninspired, and time is running out. You start feeling the pressure to innovate, but every direction seems like a dead end.
Now, imagine that you have a secret weapon—a mindset that allows you to approach the problem from a fresh, creative angle. Instead of feeling stuck, you have a framework that not only helps you generate new ideas but also helps you test, refine, and implement those ideas effectively. You confidently guide your team through the process, turning that tricky problem into an opportunity for innovation. The solution you propose not only impresses your colleagues but also improves user experience and drives results for the business.
This transformation is possible when you master Design Thinking.
In this course, Design Thinking for Creativity and Innovation, you will become that person who leads with confidence, creativity, and empathy. Whether you're a manager seeking to solve complex business problems, an entrepreneur looking to innovate, or simply someone eager to boost your creative thinking skills, this course will provide you with a practical toolkit that you can apply immediately to real-world situations.
What You’ll Learn:
This course offers a deep dive into the design thinking process, which focuses on putting the user at the center of every decision. You will learn how to use design thinking techniques to unlock creative potential, solve challenging problems, and develop innovative solutions that deliver value to both users and organizations. By the end of the course, you'll be able to:
Understand the Fundamentals of Design Thinking: We’ll start by covering the basics of design thinking, exploring the key principles, frameworks, and mindsets that make this approach so powerful. You'll learn why design thinking is essential for innovation and how it can be applied across industries and sectors.
Master the Five Phases of Design Thinking:
Empathize: Learn how to deeply understand the needs and pain points of your users by building empathy. You’ll explore techniques such as empathy interviews, journey mapping, and observation.
Define: Learn how to synthesize your findings and define the core problem you need to solve.
Ideate: Unlock your creative potential and generate a range of ideas using brainstorming, mind mapping, and other ideation techniques.
Prototype: Discover how to bring your ideas to life by building prototypes that users can interact with.
Test: Learn how to test and refine your solutions based on real user feedback.
Apply Design Thinking to Real-World Challenges: Throughout the course, you will work through interactive case studies and activities that help you apply what you’ve learned to real-world problems. You’ll gain practical experience designing solutions that are not only innovative but also feasible and user-centered.
Leverage Innovation and Creativity: You’ll explore the connection between design thinking and innovation, learning how this approach can be used to drive creativity in your organization. From incremental innovations to radical disruptions, you’ll discover how to use design thinking to push the boundaries of what’s possible.
Integrate Design Thinking with Other Key Approaches: In addition to design thinking, this course covers related methodologies like Lean Thinking, Agile, and Human-Centered Innovation. You’ll learn how these approaches complement design thinking and how you can integrate them into your own workflows to maximize results.
Build Practical Tools for Success: You won’t just learn theory in this course—you’ll leave with actionable tools and frameworks you can use immediately. From empathy maps and user personas to journey maps and prototypes, you’ll develop a toolkit that will help you navigate complex challenges and build solutions that work.
Who This Course is For:
This course is designed for anyone who wants to drive innovation and solve problems creatively. Whether you’re a business leader, product manager, entrepreneur, designer, or simply someone interested in enhancing your creative thinking skills, this course will empower you to create impactful solutions. No prior experience with design thinking is required—just a willingness to learn and a desire to think outside the box.
Why Take This Course?
In today’s rapidly evolving world, the ability to think creatively and innovate is crucial for staying ahead. Companies are increasingly relying on design thinking to solve problems and enhance user experience. By mastering these skills, you will not only boost your career prospects but also become a more valuable contributor to your team or organization. Whether you're tackling product development, improving business processes, or solving customer experience challenges, design thinking can help you deliver more effective, user-centered solutions.
This is your opportunity to become a hero in your organization—a leader who drives innovation, solves complex challenges, and inspires others to think creatively. Take the first step in mastering design thinking and unlock your potential for creativity and innovation!
target_audience: This course is ideal for aspiring innovators, business leaders, managers, product designers, and anyone interested in learning how to use design thinking to drive creative solutions. Whether you're a beginner seeking to understand design thinking or a professional looking to enhance your innovation skills, this course will equip you with practical tools to solve complex problems and create user-centered products. It’s also perfect for entrepreneurs, product managers, and digital transformation leaders aiming to stay competitive in today’s fast-changing environment.

courses.description:
Do you want to become a UI/UX designer but you don't know where to start? This course will allow you to develop your user interface design skills and you can add UI designer to your CV and start getting clients for your skills.


Hi everyone. I'm Arash and I'm a UI/UX designer. In this course, I will help you learn and master Sketch app comprehensively from scratch. Sketch is an innovative and brilliant tool for User Interface design. It's used by everyone from entrepreneurs and start-ups to Apple, Airbnb, Facebook, etc.
By the end of this course, you will be able to create world-class User Interface (UI) and User Experience (UX) designs. Throughout the course first, you will learn about all the Design Basics, UI Elements, Typography, etc. and then we will work on real-world projects together.
Moreover, we will redesign the Instagram app completely and I will share with you all the necessary techniques and hidden secrets you need for mobile application and web design. Furthermore, we will design a finance app from scratch and then we will create a modern and creative website for it.
This course has been designed for people completely new to UI/UX design or let’s say design in general. We will start with the most basic principles and work all the way through, step by step.
We start the course by explaining the differences between UI and UX design. And then we will start learning about Sketch app in Sketch Academy section. After that, we'll create a simple low-fidelity wireframe to understand its usage and benefits.
I’ll go over all of the essential tools necessary for creating an amazing User Interface (UI) and User Experience (UX). Not only will you learn about Sketch app, but also you will learn about Adobe Photoshop, InVison Studio, Vectary, Dribbble, Behance, etc.
The Design Basics section covers all the necessary principles, including: Layout, Iconography, Typography, Color Contrast, Composition, Spacing, etc.
One of the interesting parts of the User Experience design process is micro-interactions. I will teach you how to use InVision Studio for creating this kind of interaction.
With over 9 hours of content across 150+ lectures, I will take you from beginner to expert, and teach you everything you need to know in order to use Sketch in a professional manner.
An amazing course for people with zero design experience, or for experienced designers that want to learn and master Sketch software and want to become a User Interface designer. By the end of this course, you’ll have a complete, real-world project for your own portfolio, and every student will have the knowledge and confidence to apply for a UI/UX designer job.


Don't just take my word for it, see what my past students had to say about the course:

Figma 와 피그마의 툴을 사용하는 방법
피그마 내에서 디자인하는 방법
기능적인 프로토타입을 제작하기 위한 와이어프레임 작성하기
협업 기능 사용 방법
프로토타입에 대한 피드백 주고 받는 방법
UX 디자인의 원칙
색 이론의 중요성
초보자가 가장 많이 하는 실수와 이를 방지하는 방법
양식, 버튼 및 플러그인의 원리
앱 만드는 방법
웹사이트 만드는 방법
콘텐츠 제작에 관한 모든 것
Figma에서 애니메이션을 만드는 방법
인터랙티브 캘린더 만드는 방법

강의 소개: 강의 + 사용자 인터페이스 개요에 오신 것을 환영합니다
접근 방식: 생각하기 - 설정하기 - 디자인하기 - 반복하기 (Think - Setup - Design - Iterate)
디자인 시스템: 컴포넌트의 모든 것: 효율적이고 확장 가능한 디자인 만들기 - 1부
컴포넌트의 모든 것: 효율적이고 확장 가능한 디자인 만들기 - 2부
컴포넌트의 모든 것: 효율적이고 확장 가능한 디자인 만들기 - 3부
컴포넌트의 모든 것: 효율적이고 확장 가능한 디자인 만들기 - 4부

requirements: 피그마에 대한 사전 지식이 필요하지 않습니다!
인터페이스 디자인 및 레이아웃에 대해 배우고자 하는 의지와 열정!
타겟 고객의 디자인 요소에 맞춰 디자인할 수 있는 유연성
양호한 인터넷 속도
인내심과 긍정적인 사고방식!
courses.description:
[꼭 읽어주세요] 한글 AI 자막 강의란?
유데미의 한국어 [자동] AI 자막 서비스로 제공되는 강의입니다.
강의에 대한 질문사항은 Creativity Unleashed 팀이 확인할 수 있도록 Q&A 게시판에 영어로 남겨주시기 바랍니다.


이 강의는 지속적으로 새로운 강의가 추가되고 업데이트 되고 있습니다.


나만의 앱, 웹사이트 또는 블로그를 디자인하고 싶었던 적이 있나요? 요즘 우리는 아무 생각 없이 이러한 것들을 사용합니다. 앱, 웹사이트, 블로그들은 우리의 매일의 경험과 금융 시장 모두에서 필수적인 부분이 되었습니다. 입소문을 타게 될 새로운 앱에 대한 새로운 아이디어를 떠올리는 것은 쉽지만, 그 앱을 현실로 만드는 것은 생각만큼 쉽지 않습니다. 바로 이것을 위해서 Figma 가 필요합니다. 피그마 는 다양한 인터페이스를 매우 세밀하게 디자인할 수 있는 무료 협업 UI/UX 디자인 도구이며, 피그마 사용 방법을 알려드리고자 이 강의를 만들었습니다.


이 강의에서는 Figma 를 사용한 사용자 인터페이스 디자인에 대한 모든 것을 배웁니다. 피그마를 처음 설치하고 여는 것부터 시작하여, 완성된 디자인을 마무리하는 것까지 피그마에 대해 알아야 할 모든 것을 단계별로 가르쳐줍니다. 모든 툴 사용 방법 및 각 툴의 사용 시기에 대해 배우게 됩니다. 또한 협업 기능을 통해 다른 웹 개발자와 쉽게 협업하는 방법도 알려드립니다. 이 강의에서는 목적에 맞게 디자인하기 위한 사용자 인터페이스 디자인의 원칙과 인간과 컴퓨터의 상호작용 원칙에 대해 배웁니다. 마지막으로 특정 프로젝트의 요구 사항에 맞게 조정하는 방법과 여러분의 디자인을 기능적인 프로토타입으로 전환하기 위해 와이어프레임을 만드는 방법을 알려드립니다.
저희와 함께 여러분의 UI/UX 개발 여정을 시작해보세요!


이 강의를 수강하면 다음을 할 수 있게 됩니다:
프로토타입을 만들고 웹 개발자와 쉽게 협업할 수 있습니다.
프로토타입 디자인의 프로세스, 목적 및 도구에 대한 이해
목적에 맞는 디자인을 위한 사용자 인터페이스 디자인의 원칙 이해
인간과 컴퓨터의 상호작용에 대한 원칙 이해
사용자 인터페이스의 표준 툴 알아보기
사용자 인터페이스에서 특정 프로젝트 인도물에 적용시키기
사용자 경험 (UX) 의 원칙 이해하기
target_audience: 사용자 인터페이스 디자인을 배우고 싶은 모든 분 - 사전 경험은 필요 없습니다!
자신만의 애플리케이션, 웹사이트, 블로그를 디자인하고 싶은 분
포트폴리오를 확장하고 싶은 UI/UX 디자이너

courses.title: 心を揺さぶるプレゼン企画とトークのコツ！選ばれる「コンセプト」の作り方【デザイン思考Vol.2】
courses.bio: 【”選ばれる理由”を創る！】ふつうの会社員でも使えた！大好評のデザイン思考講座の続編！必要とされるアイデア・コンセプトの発想から、上司へのプレゼン提案まで使える【価値創造テンプレート】「VPキャンバス」の使い方をやさしく解説します
objectives: あらゆる価値創造のもとになる「コンセプト」の作り方がわかる
お客様により高い付加価値を提供できるようになります
心を揺さぶる提案・プレゼンの基本がすぐに作れるようになる
必須ツール「VPキャンバス」の使い方がわかり”お客様目線”を獲得できる
価値創造のパターンが理解でき、良い商品・プロダクトを量産できる
仲間の経験とスキルを活用することができる

はじめに: すべての価値創造の基本「コンセプト」とは何か？
なぜ「コンセプト」が大事なのか？
多くの人がやりがちな「からまわり提案」とは？
「価値＝〇〇」お客様が感じる”価値の本質”とは？
なぜ、顧客理解が必要なのか？
最大の価値を生み出す「VPキャンバス」とは？
顧客プロフィールの作り方: VPキャンバス３つのポイント
顧客プロフィールを作る5つのステップ
★ステップ１：ターゲットを決める
★ステップ２：ジョブを洗い出す
洗い出しツール1：共感マップ
洗い出しツール2：カスタマージャーニーマップ
洗い出しツール3：ペルソナ
★ステップ3：ペインを書き出す3つのポイント①深さ
ペインのポイント②感情
ペインのポイント③セリフ
★ステップ4：ゲインを書き出す3つのポイント①高さ
ゲインのポイント②価値観
ゲインのポイント③他の人
顧客プロフィールを深める3つのチェックポイント：①複数になっていないか？
チェックポイント②洗い出しは十分か？
チェックポイント③解決したいか？
バリューマップとは: 製品・サービスの価値を引き出すバリューマップとは？
バリューマップを作る4つのステップ
「プロダクト・アウト」によるVPキャンバスの作り方
VPキャンバスのマッチ・フィット
価値を高める3つの方法: 価値を高める3つの方法
製品・サービスの価値を高めるチェックリスト
アイデアを出すときに重要なマインドセット
差別化ツール①戦略キャンバス
戦略キャンバスをアイデア出しに使う方法
他のツールとの連携：３C分析
他のツールとの連携：BMキャンバス（ビジネスへの応用）
VPキャンバスを使った提案: VPキャンバスを使った提案の全体像
はじめの10秒で心を掴む提案方法
提案における3つの”かくれペイン” ①変化
かくれペイン② ペインを見つめる
VPキャンバスを使った提案例
VPキャンバスによる提案例の解説
付録：VPキャンバス・トークシートの使い方

requirements: 特になし。デザイン思考についての初歩的な知識があるとなおよし。
courses.description:
※この講座はUdemy講座「すぐに使えるデザイン思考」の続編ですが、
これ単独でも理解できるように作成しております。


【あなたは、以下のようなことで悩んでいませんか？】
新しい製品・サービスの企画開発でアイデアが出ない
製品が売れない、良いサービスなのに使ってもらえない
お客様の”本当の望み”がわからず、何を提案したら良いかわからない
頑張って考えた企画も、上司に刺さるプレゼンができない
わかりやすい説明ができず、相手を納得させられない
そのお悩み・・
「コンセプト」を創ることで、解決するかもしれません！


コンセプトとは、商品設計の方向性を決めるもので、
あらゆる価値創造や提案の「背骨」と言えるものです。
コンセプトが定まらずに商品や企画を作っても
お客様には買ってもらえず、
コンセプトのない企画書は
いくらプレゼンしても心に響きません。


つまり「コンセプト」は、
顧客が欲しがる価値を生み出し
”あなたが選ばれる理由”を創る
価値創造において最重要のポイントです。


【これからの時代で選ばれるために】
モノが溢れ、大量の情報が流れる今の時代は、
あなたの製品やサービスを選んでもらうには
明確な理由が必要です。
「刺さるコンセプト＝お客様が感じる価値」
を明確にして、
顧客の本当のニーズにあった製品・サービス・企画を生み出せる
数ある競争相手から、自信を持って選ばれる
シンプルなプレゼンで心を揺さぶり、多くの人の役に立つ
そんな未来を手にしましょう！


ここまで聞いて、


「難しいのでは・・？」


と感じる方もいるかもしれませんが、
この講座では、数あるコンセプトの定義の中でも、
シンプルな「Who-What」を取り扱い、
価値を見える化できるテンプレート「VPキャンバス」の使い方や、
そのまま読むだけで心を揺さぶる提案ができる
「VPキャンバス・プレゼントークシート」の
活用法について、やさしく解説いたします。


その他、この講座で学ぶツールは以下のようなものがあります。
【この講座で学ぶツール】
VP（バリュー・プロポジション、価値提案）キャンバス
埋めていくだけで顧客の求める価値がわかる
共感マップ
”五感”を通して顧客の行動を深堀りする
カスタマージャーニーマップ
顧客の体験から感情が動くポイントを探り出す
ペルソナ
具体的なイメージを作り、提案の軸にする
戦略キャンバス
競合の抜け・モレを見つけ、自分たちだけの価値を浮き彫りにする
比較表
自由な発想で価値のポイントを洗い出す
VPキャンバス・プレゼントークシート
そのまま読むだけで、相手の心を揺さぶる提案ができる
その他ツール（3C分析・BM（ビジネス・モデル）キャンバス）との連携
ビジネスに繋がる連携で、これからの学習につなげる
実際に触れるワークシートも用意しましたので、
ダウンロード・プリントアウトしてご活用ください！


どれもシンプルだからこそ、
■誰でも使える
新入社員でも、新しい企画・価値を生み出すことができる
■いつでも使える
価値提案は、夫婦間コミュニケーションにも応用できる
■かんたんに使える
ワークシートを埋めるだけ、すぐに使うことができます。


「自社ならではの強み」「あなただけの価値」を見つけ出して、
”刺さる価値提案” を量産していきましょう！
target_audience: お客様の”本当の望み”がわからず、何を提案したら良いかわからない
デザイン思考のスキルを深めたい
企画をとおすプレゼンを作りたい
クリエイティブな発想のためのプロセスやツールが知りたい
既存の商品の価値を見いだし、新規の顧客を開拓していきたい

courses.title: Systems Design Electric Vehicle Designing Efficiently TM
courses.bio: Real Time Case Study
objectives: Introduction to EV Design
Startup Dynamics
Fast Ideation Techniques
Styling and Research in Design
Competitive Study Deep Dive
Customer-Centric Design
Battery Management System Focus
Team Collaboration and Prototyping
Resourceful Mock-Ups
requirements: Accessibility for Everyone This course is designed to be inclusive, welcoming individuals from all backgrounds.
Encouraging Self-Reflection Students are encouraged to actively engage with the content by taking notes for self-reflection purposes. This practice enhances the learning experience.
No Prior Experience Required A standout feature of this course is its inclusivity – no prior experience is needed to enroll. Regardless of your background or expertise.
Simplified Learning Approach the course adopts a simplified learning approach, breaking down complex concepts into easily digestible segments.
Universally Understandable Content The language and delivery of content have been meticulously crafted to be universally understandable.
courses.description:
Unlock the secrets of product design within the dynamic realm of electric vehicles (EVs) and delve into the intricate process of Battery Management System (BMS) design. This course provides a comprehensive understanding of the startup industry's inner workings, guiding students through every phase from initial customer discussions to prototyping and testing. The real-time case study focuses on a cutting-edge EV startup, revealing the challenges and triumphs of crafting a revolutionary Battery Management System.
BENEFITS OF THIS COURSE:
Fast Ideation Mastery:
Gain proficiency in the art of fast ideation, a crucial skill in the fast-paced startup environment. Learn how to generate a plethora of ideas swiftly and efficiently.
Styling and Research Techniques:
Understand the significance of product styling and delve into effective research methodologies. Explore competitor studies, benchmark data, and the pivotal role they play in the design process.
Competitive Study Deep Dive:
Witness a real-time case study showcasing the meticulous collection and analysis of more than 20 competitive studies. Learn to extract vital insights needed for project inputs and effective decision-making.
Sketching for Rapid Communication:
Embrace the power of raw sketches for quick communication and feedback. Discover the efficiency of conveying ideas rapidly, fostering a culture of agile progress within design studios.
Customer-Centric Approach:
Master the art of effective customer communication. Uncover the nuances of understanding client requirements deeply and delivering resourceful solutions with optimal efficiency.
Battery Management System Focus:
Immerse yourself in the intricacies of Battery Management Systems. Focus on fast ideation and concept generation tailored specifically for the EV industry's critical component.
Team Collaboration and Prototyping:
Enhance your collaborative skills and learn how to communicate effectively within a team. Dive into the art of rapid prototyping for swift testing and valuable initial feedback.
Resourceful Mock-Ups:
Acquire the skills to create resourceful mock-ups using available tools. Learn how to present your prototypes neatly, facilitating effective documentation and communication within the team.
Embark on a transformative journey into the world of electric vehicles and battery management systems, where innovation meets efficiency. Whether you're a student, designer, or industry professional, this course offers invaluable insights into the dynamic landscape of EV design.


Courtesy,
Dr. FAK Noble Ai Researcher, Scientists, Product Developer, Innovator & Pure Consciousness Expert
Founder of Noble Transformation Hub TM
target_audience: Product Design Enthusiasts
Engineering Students and Graduates
Start-up Enthusiasts
Professionals in Electric Vehicle Industry
Designers and Innovators
Engineering and Design Educators

courses.title: Service Design for the Real World: A Practical Introduction
courses.bio: Industry experts share the content we wish we'd had when we were getting started
objectives: An overview of the end-to-end Service Design process and methodology
Key considerations and practical tips for applying Service Design in an organizational context
The basics of qualitative customer research and synthesis
How to use lo-fi prototypes to validate concepts and ideas
Effective ideation techniques & facilitation
Stakeholder management for Service Design
The basics of developing journey maps, service blueprints and other artifacts
Business Model Canvas for Service Design
How to prepare for a job in Service Design

IDEATION: Creating the Conditions for Great Ideation

requirements: Some familiarity with the very basics of Service Design (e.g. you've participated in a Service Design session or have read a few articles) is helpful but not required.
courses.description:
This is the course we wish we had when we started our Service Design careers.
Tools and frameworks alone won't make you a great Service Designer. Most Service Design happens within existing companies and organizations. By understanding the real challenges and barriers to putting Service Design into practice you will be better prepared for the reality of actually doing the work. This is one of the only courses that go beyond methodology alone to focus on how to apply Service Design in an organizational context.
This course includes:
A comprehensive introduction to the Service Design process
7+ hours of recorded content exploring a wide array of topics from Design, Stakeholder Management and Business Modelling
Recorded activities (we walk you through activity templates with pre-recorded facilitation)
A resource list to support your learning beyond this course
Learn from experienced industry professionals who have:
Established and scaled in-house Service Design teams in multiple companies across industries (Telecom, Insurance, Financial Services, Legal, and Retail)
Been recognized with the Service Design Global Network award
Been actively teaching and mentoring students and industry professionals in Service Design for 15+ years
Are regularly invited to speak at events, host workshops, and share their thoughts on the evolution and future of Service Design
At the end of this course, you will:
Become deeply familiar with the overall Service Design methodology and be confident in your ability to speak to it.
Have a meaningful understanding of key phases of work in Service Design: Research, Ideation, Prototyping, and how they fit together as a process
Know how to clearly communicate the value of Service Design
Appreciate the importance of stakeholder management and organizational context when practicing Service Design
Learn what core skills and specialized skills you need to develop in order to succeed at landing your first role or further progressing in your career as a Service Designer
target_audience: Anyone interested in learning more about Service Design and how to apply it in an organizational setting
UX Designers looking to expand their skills
Students interested in jobs related to Service Design, human-centred design or innovation
Working professionals interested in making a transition to a Service Design role or collaborating with Service Design teams

courses.title: UI/UX Design Essentials Bootcamp with Figma
courses.bio: Start your UI/UX Career in 2025; Master in-depth Web and App User Interface & User Experience Design with Figma.
objectives: UI/UX Design - What and Why?
UX Psychology
Introduction to Figma
Figma Workspace and Interface
Basic tools in Figma
Prototyping in Figma
Easing options and Prototype animation
Smart animation in Figma
Colour inspiration, colour palette and eyedropper tool
Masking, Cropping and Image plugins
Component and Effects
Project of Web and App Interface Design

UI/UX Design Bootcamp with Figma: Basic Tools in Figma, Masking, Cropping and Working with Components

requirements: Basic Computer Knowledge
Understand English Language
courses.description:
What you'll learn in this class:
Introduction to Figma
Workspace and Interface Overview
Basic Tools in Figma
Using Pages in Figma
Prototyping in Figma
Easing Options and Prototype Animation
Smart Animation Techniques
Sharing and Adding Comments in Figma
Working with Columns and Grids
Color Inspiration, Palette Creation, and the Eyedropper Tool
Applying Gradients
Using Images in Figma
Masking, Cropping, and Image Plugins
Components and Effects
Exporting Images
By the end of this class, you'll be able to:
Design your own mobile app and web pages
Create color palettes and gradients
Develop a strong understanding of web design coloring
Prototype your designs
Use selected images to create buttons and style fonts on web pages
This is a project-based course, meaning you'll actively apply what you learn through class projects. You'll have access to supporting resources, making it easier to follow along.
By enrolling in this course, you’ll not only learn the latest design techniques and tools like Figma, but you’ll also get insights into creating intuitive user interfaces, optimizing user experiences, and prototyping efficiently.
If you encounter any issues or have questions during the learning process, feel free to reach out to me in the class discussion section. I'm always here to assist you.
Let's begin our Figma journey for UI/UX design together!
For further help, send a message to the mail attached to my profile.
target_audience: Beginner who want to learn UIUX design with Figma

courses.title: 【한글자막】 UX 리서치 & UI 디자인: 디지털 제품 디자인 완벽 마스터 과정
courses.bio: 제품 디자이너를 위한 디자인 교육 완성 프로젝트:사용자의 경험을 조사하고, 이를 토대로 멋진 UI를 디자인하기. 효과적으로 디자인하기 위한 비판적 사고 아이데이션, 사용하기 쉬운 프로토타입 제작, 트렌디한 디자인 등
objectives: UI 디자인과 사용자 경험 리서치
디지털 제품 디자인의 역사
디자인 프로세스 및 지각/인식의 원리
디자인에서의 응용심리학
비판적 사고와 창의성 증가
사용자 테스트
requirements: 누구나 수강하실 수 있습니다. (본 강의 수강을 위해 필요한 요건이나 UX 디자인 경험은 필요 없습니다.)
디자인 실습을 위한 컴퓨터 또는 펜과 공책
피그마 무료 계정 (설정 방법 안내 예정)
열린 자세로 배우고자 하는 열정과 의지
courses.description:
디지털 제품을 위한 디자인 마스터 과정: 포트폴리오 제작은 물론 실무에서 사용되는 기술 능력을 키우기
디자인 초보분도 물론 좀 더 새롭고 심도깊은 디자인 기술을 알고 싶은 경력 디자이너에게도 도움 되는 강의
효과적으로 디자인하기 위한 비판적 사고 아이데이션부터, 사용하기 쉬운 프로토타입 제작, 트렌드를 놓치지 않는 신선한 디자인 등을 다룹니다.


[본 강의를 수강해야 하는 이유]
디지털 제품은 인간이 과거에 디자인한 어떤 제품보다 더 추상적이고 복잡합니다. 사람들은 역사상 그 어느 때보다도 디지털 기기를 더 빠르게 사용하고 있으며, 의식적인 사고를 덜 하고 산만해지고 있습니다.


이러한 문제는 디자인 조직이 해결해야 할 새로운 문제를 제시합니다. 디자인 조직은 행동 심리학, 지각/인식, 창의성, 비즈니스 등 복잡한 영역을 고루 이해해야 합니다. 역사도 알아야 합니다. 디자인의 역사는 아이폰으로 시작되지 않았다는 걸 알아야 합니다. 제품 디자인의 역사는 바로 제품의 역사로부터 시작되었으니까요!


저는 실망감 때문에 이 과정을 만들게 되었습니다. 몇 개의 좋은 인용문, 비효율적인 표준 프로세스, 맹목적인 조사 활동, 철학이나 비판적 사고에 대한 언급 없는 디자인 교육에 대한 실망감이었죠. 우리는 역사상 가장 산만한 사용자를 위해 가장 복잡한 제품을 디자인하고 있습니다. 우리는 디자이너들이 당혹스러울 정도로 좁은 범위를 디자인할 것을 기대합니다. 저는 그런 사람들을 위해 이 과정을 만들어야 했고, 아무도 그렇게 하는 사람이 없었기 때문에 ‘디지털 제품 디자인 마스터 과정’을 만들어야 했습니다.


디지털 제품 디자인 마스터 과정은 사람들이 열광하는 제품을 디자인하는 데 필요한 모든 걸 제공합니다. 시간이 좀 걸리겠지만, 숙고하고 실험할 수 있도록 몇 달에 걸쳐 직접 실습도 해보셨으면 합니다. 디자인 업계에 취업하기 위한 지름길이 아니라 훌륭한 경력을 위해 돌아간다고 생각하시면 됩니다.




[이 강의에서 무엇을 얻을 수 있나요?]
이 과정은 12개의 모듈로 이루어져 있으며, 각 모듈은 대략 1시간 정도 됩니다. 각 모듈에는 질 높은 강의 영상과 함께 다양한 실습과 다운로드 가능한 워크시트가 준비되어 있습니다. 각 영상에는 여러분이 다양한 의견에 노출되고 해당 주제에 더 깊이 파볼 수 있도록 심화 학습을 위한 자료 링크들이 첨부되어 있습니다.


이 모듈은 오늘날 대부분의 디자인 커리큘럼에서 누락되었다고 생각하는 특별한 주제들을 다루고 있습니다. 12개의 모듈은 다음과 같습니다.
소개: 디자인 업계의 배경 및 문제
디자인이란 무엇인가: 디자인이 어디서 시작되었는지와 디자인을 둘러싼 몇 가지 오해들을 살펴봅니다.
디자인 프로세스: 디자인 프로세스의 요소들을 살펴보면서 여러분만의 프로세스를 직접 만들어 보실 겁니다.
비판적 사고: 효과적으로 디자인하기 위한 핵심 기술입니다. 아이디어 (특히 자신의 아이디어)를 챌린지 하는 방법을 살펴봅니다.
경험 경제: 경험은 사람들이 좋아하는 제품을 만드는 데 필수적이지만, 대부분의 사람들은 그걸 무시하고 있습니다.
지각/인식: 사람들이 세상을 어떻게 보고 있으며, 우리가 그들을 위해 어떻게 디자인할 수 있을지 살펴봅니다.
사용성: 사용하기 쉬운 제품을 디자인해야 합니다.
피그마: 빠르게 디자인하고 프로토타입을 만들 수 있는 툴로써, 여러분의 디자인의 목업(mock up)을 만들어볼 겁니다.
형태: 제품이 보기 좋아야 하는 이유와 어떻게 해야 하는지 알아봅니다.
기능: 제품의 기능을 어떻게 효과적으로 끌어올리는지 알아봅니다.
미니멀리즘: 미니멀리즘은 어려운데 우린 그걸 잘못 이해하고 있습니다.
균형: 뭐든 지나쳐서는 안 됩니다. 표준과 트렌드 간 균형을 맞춰봅시다.




[이 과정은 저를 위한 건가요?]
제가 디지털 제품 디자인 마스터 과정을 만든 건 다른 제품 디자인 강의의 결점을 메우기 위해서 였습니다. 이러한 이유로, 저는 이 과정이 숙련된 디자이너들에게 유용할 거라고 생각합니다. 또한, 초심자도 염두에 두고 만들었기 때문에, 디자인을 해본 적이 없으시더라도 괜찮습니다. (누구나 디자인을 해본 경험이 있습니다. 여러분은 그냥 그걸 모르고 있을 뿐입니다!)


디자이너뿐 아니라 디지털 제품을 관리하고 개발하는 분들도 고려했습니다. 디지털 제품 개발에 있어 기업 전체가 새로운 관점으로 생각해 볼 수 있는 흥미로운 자료들이 많이 준비 되어 있습니다.




1강에서 뵙겠습니다!


- Rob
강의를 들으시고 강의와 관련하여 궁금하신 점은 무엇이든 Q&A에 남기실 수 있지만, 꼭 영어로 내용을 남겨 주세요. 그래야 상세한 답변을 드릴 수 있습니다. :)
target_audience: UX 디자인 커리어를 시작하는 초보 디자이너 및 제품 매니저
UX & UI 경력 디자이너
디자인 관련 구직을 위한 포트폴리오가 필요한 취업준비생 및 대학생
기업가 및 관련 회사 직원

courses.title: Baştan Sona Uygulamalı Güncel Figma Eğitim Seti
courses.bio: Figma'yı sıfırdan öğrenerek UI/UX tasarım yeteneklerinizi temelden zirveye taşıyın!
objectives: Figma konularını en temelden başlayarak Advanced Prototype, Şartlı ifadeler ve Variable mode gibi en kapsamlı konulara kadar adım adım öğreneceksiniz.
Sıfırdan başlayarak prototiplemesine kadar bir mobile uygulama tasarımını ve one page bir web sitesi tasarımını adım adım öğreneceksiniz.
Figma'da yaptığınız bir tasarımın responsive olarak HTML ve CSS'e nasıl döküldüğünü öğreneceksiniz.
Tasarımcılar için HTML ve CSS bölümü ile bir tasarımcının bilmesi gereken HTML ve CSS kodlarını öğrenecek ve deneyimleyeceksiniz.
Responsive Tasarım konusunu Figma'da Auto Layout, Variable ve Constraints üçlüsünü kullanarak uygulamalı olarak öğreneceksiniz.
Auto Layout, Component, Component Properties, Prototype, Variants, Variable konularını tüm detaylarıyla uygulamalı olarak öğreneceksiniz.
Yeniden kullanılabilir bileşenleri ve stilleri kullanarak yönetimi kolay tasarımlar oluşturabileceksiniz.
Hiç kod yazmadan Figma ve Bravo Studio kullanarak gerçek mobil uygulamalar yapabileceksiniz.
Eğitim içindeki onlarca gelişmiş örnek uygulamalar ile Figma bilgilerinizi pekiştirecek ve bilgilerinize ekstra değer katacaksınız.
Design System yapısını öğrenip nerede ve ne şekilde tasarımlarınıza uygulayabileceğinizi öğreneceksiniz.
Kariyer gelişimi, sektöre dair ip uçları, Behance'e proje yükleme ve portfolyo oluşturma konusunda bilgi sahibi olacaksınız.
Google E-Tablolar, Airtable ve JSON dosyalarından Figma içine dinamik verilerin aktarılması ve kullanılmasını öğreneceksiniz.
Tasarımcının el çantası niteliğinde ikon setleri, renk paletleri, font kullanımı, mockup gibi materyaller için kaynak link ve web sitelerine erişeceksiniz.
Bu eğitimi belirtilen sıraya göre örnekleri uygulayarak tamamladığınızda kendi mobil uygulamanızı ve web sitenizi yapabiliyor bir seviyeye ulaşmış olacaksınız.

TEMEL FİGMA ÖZELLİKLERİ ve KULLANICI HES: UI ve UX Kavramları Nedir, Arasındaki Farklar Nelerdir?
Figma Nedir, Özellik ve Avantajları Nelerdir?
FİGMA ARAYÜZÜNE GİRİŞ ve GENEL FİGMA KUL: Çalışma Yüzeyine Hakim Olma ve Menü Seçenekleri
FigJam Kullanımı ve Userflow (Kullanıcı Akışı) Oluşturma
FİGMA ARAÇLARI: Bu bir ders videosu değil bir ricadır Arkadaşlar!
Move Tools (Taşıma Araçları)'nın Kullanımı - Move Tool, Scale Tool ve Hand Tool
Region Tools (Alan/Bölge Araçları)'nın Kullanımı - Frame, Section, Slice Tool
Creation Tools (Oluşturma Araçları)'nın Kullanımı - Pen Tool, Pencil Tool
FİGMA'YA HAKİM OLUYORUZ: Çalışma Alanına Resim Yerleştirme ve Resim Özellikleri
Efektlerin Kullanımı (Layer Blur - Background Blur - Inner/Drop Shadow)
EN ÇOK KULLANILAN PLUGINLER (GÜNCELLENİY: İçerik Eklentileri (Lorem Ipsum, User Profile, Content Reel)
Resim Eklentileri (Unsplash, StorySet ve RemoveBG Eklentisi)
Artboard Studio Mockup ve Auto Flow Eklentisi
Ink Wireframe Eklentisi İle Pratik Olarak Wireframeler Oluşturma
Figmap ve Map Maker Eklentileri ile Harita Kullanımı
GELİŞMİŞ FİGMA ÖZELLİKLERİ: Component (Bileşen) Oluşturma ve Master Component (Ana bileşen)
Tüm Detaylarıyla Auto Layout (En Son Versiyon) Bölüm 1
Tüm Detaylarıyla Auto Layout (En Son Versiyon) Bölüm 2
Advanced Prototype Özelliği - Şartlı İfadeler - (Conditional Logic)
UYGULAMALI ÖRNEKLER: Değişkenler Kullanarak Responsive Navbar Componenti Yapalım
Scroll To Özelliği İle One Page Sayfa Mantığı
Overlay Kullanımı ve Kayan Yazı Uygulaması
Fix Position When Scrolling Özelliğini Anlamak
Pen (Kalem) Tool ve Shape (Şekil) Araçlarıyla Detaylı Mobil Hava Durumu Tasarımı
Smart Animate Kullanarak Footer Navigation Menu Yapıyoruz
Figma Mirror Uygulaması ile Telefon Üzerinden Yaptığımız Tasarımı Ön İzleme
Drag Özelliği ve Maskeleme Kullanarak Kayan Yazı Uygulaması
Auto Layout ile Responsive Card Tasarlayalım
Interactive Component Kullanarak Animasyonlu Share Butonu Yapımı
Auto Layout ve Interactive Componentler ile Takvim Çalışması
Sidebar Hover Menu - İç İçe İnteractive Component Kullanımı
Tek Seferde Tüm Cihaz Boyutlarına Uygun Tasarım Yapma
DESIGN SYSTEM: Renk Sistemi Oluşturma ve Kütüphanede Yayınlama
Grid (Izgara) Yapısını Belirleme - Desktop - Tablet - Mobil
Spacing System (Boşluk Sistemi Oluşturma ve Kullanımı)
Atomic Design Sistem Mantığı ile Buton Seti Oluşturma

requirements: Başlangıç seviyesinde bilgisayar kullanabiliyor olmanız yeterlidir.
Önceden program hakkında bilgi birikiminiz olmasına gerek yoktur.
courses.description:
Merhaba, Baştan Sona Uygulamalı Figma Eğitim Seti'ne hoş geldiniz!

Eğitimin Özellikleri
* Bu eğitim seti Türkçe dilde hazırlanmış ilk Figma eğitim setidir.
* Figma, tamamen UI/UX tasarımcılar için geliştirilmiş bir arayüz tasarım ve prototipleme aracıdır.
* Bu eğitim ile Arayüz Tasarımı ve UI/UX tasarım yeteneklerinizi temelden başlayarak profesyonel seviyeye kadar, tüm detaylarıyla öğrenerek geliştireceksiniz.
Aşağıda yer alan sektörün önde gelen alanlarında kariyerinizi bir adım öne çıkarmak için bu kursa hemen kaydolabilirsiniz.
UI/UX Tasarımı
Kullanıcı Arayüzü Tasarımı
Kullanıcı Deneyimi Tasarımı
Web Tasarımı
Mobil Uygulama Tasarımı
Ürün Tasarımı
Responsive Tasarım


Eğitimin Kazanımları
* Eğitim setinin ilk bölümünde Figma'nın temellerini öğrenecek ve tasarım oluşturabilmenin ilk adımlarını atacaksınız.
* Figma'yı etkin bir şekilde kullanarak tasarım projelerinizi oluşturabilecek ve geliştirebileceksiniz.
* Sonraki aşamalarda ise öğrendiğiniz temel bilgileri uygulamalar ile zenginleştirerek Figma becerilerinizi artıracaksınız.


Eğitimin Kapsamı ve Öğrenecekleriniz
* Bu eğitim sıfırdan başlayarak ileri seviyeye adım adım ilerleyeceğiniz komple UI/UX Tasarım eğitimidir.
* Bu eğitim Figma Arayüzünün Kullanımı, Pluginler, Katmanlar, Maskeleme gibi temel konulardan; Auto Layout, Variables, Token, Layout Grid, Component, Variant, Component Properties, Prototip, Design System, Conditional Logic gibi ileri seviye konulara varıncaya kadar geniş bir müfredat içermektedir.
* Özellikle uygulamalı örnekler kısmıyla zenginleştirilmiş bu eğitimde her konuyu uygulayarak öğreneceksiniz.
* Sıfırdan one page bir web sitesi tasarımının yapılmasını tüm detaylarıyla öğreneceksiniz.
* Son bölümde ise Sıfırdan bir mobil uygulama tasarımının ve prototiplemesinin nasıl yapıldığını öğreneceksiniz.
* Rest apileri ve json dosyalarını kullanarak hiç kod yazmadan Bravo Studio ile native bir app yapma hakkında bilgi sahibi olacaksınız. Kendi cep telefonumu ekrana yansıtarak çalışmayı sizlere göstereceğim. Bu konu ile ilgili Udemy'de ayrı bir eğitimim de bulunmaktadır.
* Tasarımcılar için HTML ve CSS derslerini de eğitim seti içeriğinde bulabileceksiniz.
* Figma to HTML bölümünde ise Figma da tasarlamış olduğumuz çalışmayı CSS ve HTML'e nasıl dökeceğinizi öğreneceksiniz.



Ek Bilgiler
- Kursu belirtilen ders sırasına göre izlemeniz faydalı olacaktır.
- Herhangi bir sorunuz olduğunda soru cevap ya da mesaj kısmından bana ulaşabilirsiniz.

Bu seti hazırlarken fikirleriyle destek olan arkadaşım Sertaç ONAY'a teşekkür ederim.
target_audience: UI ve UX Tasarım sektöründeki başlangıç düzeyindeki tasarımcılar
Grafik Tasarımcılar ve Endüstriyel Tasarımcılar
Sıfırdan kendi mobil uygulamasını tasarlamak isteyen kullanıcılar
Design System ve Token yapısını kullanarak tasarım süreçlerini yönetmek isteyen başlangıç düzeyindeki tasarımcılar ve profesyonel kullanıcılar
Tasarım ve yazılım arasındaki köprüyü sistematik olarak yönetmek isteyen yazılımcı ve iş analistleri
Figma'da kullanım becerilerini ileri seviyeye taşımak isteyen profesyonel kullanıcılar
Yapmış olduğu tasarımları etkileşimli prototiplerle canlandırmak isteyenler
Yaptığı tasarımları CSS ve HTML'e Responsive olarak aktarmak isteyen tasarımcılar

courses.title: 【한글자막】 피그마를 활용한 UI/UX 디자인: 프로젝트와 함께 웹 & 앱 디자인해보기 (2025)
courses.bio: 2025년에는 여러분의 UI/UX 커리어를 시작하세요. 심층적인 UX 이론과 함께 피그마, 웹 및 앱 디자인 마스터하기! 초심자에서 전문가로 실력을 향상시켜 드립니다!
objectives: 2025년 최신 디자인 트렌드에 따라 다양한 산업 분야의 놀라운 실제 프로젝트를 구축하는 방법을 배워보세요.
기초부터 고급까지 단계별로 가장 높은 연봉을 받는 기술을 습득하고 시장에서 수요가 높은 UI/UX 디자이너가 되어 보세요.
이 강의에는 프로젝트의 마지막에 모든 에셋, 디자인 소스 파일 및 PPT 슬라이드가 포함되어 있습니다. 자신의 포트폴리오에 맞게 커스터마이징할 수 있습니다.
실제 프로젝트에서 작업하고 UX 디자인 원칙을 통합하여 색 이론부터 고급 애니메이션에 이르기까지 Figma의 필수 요소를 마스터하세요.
Figma의 고급 기능을 사용하여 동적 인터페이스를 만들고 디자인 사고와 접근성 원칙을 적용하여 스킬을 향상하세요.
Figma의 애니메이션 도구의 비밀을 알아보고 트랜지션, Easing curve, 마이크로 인터랙션을 마스터하여 디자인 역량을 향상하세요.
색채 심리학, 형태 심리학, 게슈탈트 원리를 깊이 있게 이해하여 효과적인 디자인 결과물을 만들어 보세요.
타이포그래피 규칙과 텍스트 도구를 마스터하고 요소를 완벽하게 정렬하여 Figma의 기본에 능숙해집니다.
Apple의 HIG와 Google 머티리얼 디자인을 적용하여 업계 표준에 부합하는 디자인 시스템과 효과적인 UI 패턴을 제작하세요.
모양과 색채의 심리를 탐구하고 프로젝트에서 인터랙션 디자인에 대한 Nielsen의 원칙을 구현해 보세요.
성공적인 결과를 보장하기 위해 FIGJAM 브레인스토밍, 사용자 페르소나 및 전체론적 접근 방식을 통해 UX 디자인 프로세스를 이해합니다.
WCAG 및 사용성 휴리스틱을 포함한 접근성 표준을 준수하여 디자인 기술을 향상하세요.
배우는 데 몇 년이 소요되는 전문적인 워크플로 요령과 키보드 단축키를 빠르게 마스터하세요.
조화로운 인터페이스와 디자인 패턴을 만들기 위한 원자적 디자인 방법론의 비법을 알아보세요.
디자인 사고를 사용하여 목적에 맞게 디자인하고 성공적인 프로젝트를 위한 원칙과 규칙을 적용하세요.
피그마의 기초부터 고급 프로토타이핑까지 총체적인 디자인 스킬셋을 확보하는 여정을 시작하세요.

피그마 인터페이스 소개 & Breakpoint가 있는 Grid: Figma 인터페이스 소개 및 프레임 설명
모바일 태블릿 및 데스크톱 화면을 위한 디바이스 Breakpoint
색상 이론 : 색상 조화, 색상 모델, 색상 팔레트: 색상 이론 및 색상 조화 설명 (예시 포함)
플러그인으로 놀라운 색상 팔레트를 생성하는 방법
플러그인 저장 및 스포이드(EyeDropper) 툴 사용법
피그마에서 스트로크, 효과 및 내보내기: 효과 - 드롭 섀도우 및 이너 섀도우 설명
효과 - 레이어 블러 및 배경 블러 (예제 포함)
도형 도구(직사각형, 선, 화살표, 타원, 원, 다각형 및 별 도구): 선 및 화살표 도구 설명 (예제 포함)
정렬 도구, Boolean 연산 및 펜 도구를 사용한 벡터 모양: 펜 도구 및 연필 도구로 벡터 도형 만들기
타이포그래피 원칙 : 타이포그래피 규칙 및 텍스트 도구: 텍스트 및 타이포그래피 이론 - 세리프 및 산세리프 서체
피그마의 세 가지 기둥: AutoLayout , 컴포넌트 및 배리언트: 패딩 및 정렬을 사용한 AutoLayout 기초 설명 (예제 1)
AutoLayout 스페이스 비트윈, 스트로크, 캔버스 스태킹 설명 (예제 2)
AutoLayout 채우기, 허그, 고정 속성 설명 (예제 5)
컴포넌트 속성(배리언트, 부울, 인스턴스 스왑 및 텍스트 속성)
프로젝트 1: 에듀테크 스타트업 웹사이트 디자인: 에듀테크 홈페이지 디자인 및 커뮤니티 탐색
프로토타입 및 공유 가능한 링크 만들기
프로젝트 2: 여행사 웹사이트 디자인: 여행 활동 페이지 최종 색상 채우기

requirements: 디자인 경험은 필요하지 않습니다. 모든 것을 처음부터 배우게 됩니다.
디자인 소프트웨어에 대한 사전 지식도 필요하지 않습니다.
courses.description:
이 종합적인 피그마 UI/UX 디자인 강의를 통해 UI/UX 디자인의 세계로 혁신적인 여정을 시작해보세요!


창의력을 발휘하고 시각적으로 매력적인 디지털 경험을 제작하는 데 필요한 필수 기술을 습득하세요.
이 실습 과정은 이론과 실습을 완벽하게 통합하여 실제 시나리오를 시뮬레이션 하는 프로젝트와 함께 여러분을 이끌어드립니다!


레이아웃, 색채 이론, 타이포그래피, 시각적 계층 구조를 살펴보며 UI 디자인의 기초에 대해 자세히 알아보세요.
사용자 심리, 연구 방법론, 사용자 페르소나 생성을 탐구하여 UX 디자인 원칙에 대한 전문성을 높이세요.

사용자 참여를 향상 시키는 마이크로 인터랙션, 애니메이션, 피드백 메커니즘과 같은 개념을 익히며 인터랙션 디자인에 몰입해 보세요.


이 강의의 주요 하이라이트는 업계 최고의 디자인 도구인 Figma 에 대해 심층적으로 다룬다는 것입니다.

웹 사이트 인터페이스 디자인부터 직관적인 모바일 앱 제작에 이르기까지 프로젝트의 모든 측면에 Figma 의 기능을 활용할 수 있습니다.
커리큘럼에는 필수 UX 이론도 포함되어 있어 복잡한 사용자 경험과 사용성을 이해할 수 있습니다.


웹 디자인, 앱 디자인 두 가지 모두에 관심이 있는 분이라면 이 강의를 통해 UI/UX에 대한 전체적인 접근 방식을 배울 수 있습니다.

실제 프로젝트를 통해 실무 경험을 쌓고, 기술을 적용하여 반응형 웹사이트와 매력적인 사용자 인터페이스를 제작해 보세요.

피그마, 웹 디자인, 앱 디자인, UX 이론의 시너지를 발휘하여 역동적인 UI/UX 디자인 분야에서 여러분의 경력을 한 단계 더 발전 시켜 보세요.


【한글자막】 피그마를 활용한 UI/UX 디자인: 프로젝트와 함께 웹 & 앱 디자인해보기 (2024) 강의에 지금 수강신청하시어, 혁신적인 피그마 UI/UX 학습 여정을 시작하세요!
target_audience: UI/UX 디자이너가 되어 사용자 경험 디자인 스킬로 돈을 벌고 싶은 분
초보자, UI/UX 분야 또는 디자인 분야에 처음 입문하는 분
다른 디자인 소프트웨어나 커리어에서 피그마로 커리어 전환을 희망하는 분
프리랜서가 되거나, 회사에서 디자이너로 일하거나, 자신의 창업 프로젝트를 디자인하기 위해 UI/UX 기술을 습득하고자 하는 분

courses.title: Interview UX UI Designer Questions and Answers for beginners
courses.bio: Top 25 Interview Questions and Answers for UX UI Designer
objectives: In this course you will get top 25 interview questions and answers for ux ui designer
In this course you will get tip to answers
In this course you will get example answers
At the end you will ready with 25 interview answers
Top 25 UX UI Designer interview questions and answers for beginners
requirements: No experience required.
courses.description:
Top 25 UX/UI Designer Interview Questions and Answers for beginners


Welcome to the course on UX/UI Designer Interview Questions and Answers designed for beginners. Whether you're just starting your journey in UX/UI design or preparing for your first job interview in this field, this course will help you with fundamental understanding and practical insights to master your interviews.
Throughout the course, you'll learn:


Foundations of UX/UI Design: Understand the core principles of user experience (UX) and user interface (UI) design, including usability, accessibility, and interaction design.


Interview Strategies: Learn proven strategies for preparing and performing well in UX/UI design interviews, including how to answer common questions confidently and professionally.
Course Outline:
Introduction to UX/UI Design
Understanding User Experience (UX) Design
Exploring User Interface (UI) Design
Importance of UX/UI in Development
Preparing for Interviews
Common Interview Questions
Tips and Answers


By the end of this course, you'll feel confident and prepared to tackle UX/UI design interviews, armed with a solid understanding of the principles, tools, and strategies needed to succeed in the industry.


Enrol now and take the first step towards launching your career as a UX/UI designer!!


Prepare for your interview now and Land on your Dream Job Soon!!!
All the best for your future.
target_audience: Beginner in ux ui designer and getting ready for interview

courses.title: The Complete Mobile App Design Course - UI/UX
courses.bio: Create E-commerce Mobile Application from A to z
objectives: Create mobile app designs from scratch
You'll learn how to use Adobe XD to design and prototype a mobile app.
You'll be one step closer to becoming a good UI/UX designer
Create wireframe designs for any digital project
You'll be able to apply the design techniques and productivity tips you have learned in your own design workflow
requirements: You need Adobe XD CC installed on your machine (macOS or Windows 10)
Basic Adobe XD Software Knowledge
courses.description:
The App Store now has over 2 million apps and is still growing. The only apps that perform well are those that are well designed in terms of both user interface and user experience. That is why it is critical to learn design skills that will help your app stand out in a crowd.


The App Design Course is ideal for people with no design experience or experienced designers who want to quickly learn mobile app design. We'll teach you how to create beautiful apps. We'll look at key UI and UX concepts that are critical for creating visually appealing and user-friendly apps.


This course has a learn-by-doing approach. There won’t be much theory, it’s all about teaching you how to design a real-world mobile product and showing you the full potential of Adobe XD.
By the end of the course, you will have a very clear picture of how Adobe XD works, and you will be able to apply the design techniques, productivity tips, and all the skills you have learned in your future design projects.


The course has a practical component that takes you step-by-step through the workflow of a professional app designer. From user flow diagrams to wireframing to mockups and prototypes.


Check My learn-adobe xd for UI UX design Course if you need to learn Adobe XD Software.
target_audience: Beginners and intermediate UI/UX Designers

courses.title: Axure RP 7 原型設計基礎課程 – 基礎工具應用
courses.bio: 不論是網站、App或是研究專案，這堂課教你利用Axure RP，描繪出你心中所想要呈現介面的樣貌。
objectives: 快速將數位產品的概念建立成 Prototype
使用互動效果提高介面規劃擬真程度
規劃數位產品的整體架構
Prototype 透過文件或網址分享跟共享者

Axure RP 原型設計基礎: Axure RP 介面介紹與工作前設定

requirements: 下載Axure RP軟體
courses.description:
Axure RP 最大的特色是將網頁或 APP 元素模組化，以及可以建立互動模擬數位產品的真實運作情況。幫助不會寫程式的朋友能快速建立心中對介面的想法。因此上完這堂課程，可幫助大家學到如何利用 Axure RP 快速建立具有互動性的 prototype ，協助各位在介面規劃的表現。
課程主要分成三個大章節：
第一章我們會介紹基本介面，包含如何建立頁面、將元件置入頁面排版與編輯。
第二章，我們會幫助各位了解如何將檔案與文件分享給其他合作夥伴。
第三章我們會介紹 Axure RP 最核心的功能，初級互動，幫助可謂可以建類完整具有互動的 prototype。

因次，數位產品的ＰＭ非常適合來上這門課程，因為 Axure RP 可以幫助您表達對數位產品的構想，以及透過互動效果呈現整體結構。 UI 的設計師也非常適合，因為 Axure RP 的互動設定非常簡單學習，可以免去寫程式，幫助 UI 設計師快速呈現整體互動。
target_audience: 數位產品的PM
UI 設計師
對 UI 設計有興趣的人
網站製作人
網站企劃
專案經理

courses.title: Kurs podstawy projektowania Ui
courses.bio: W tym kursie poznasz podstawy projektowania UI komponentów interfejsu użytkownika. Naucz się tworzyć strony i aplikacje
objectives: czym jest hierarchia i stany przycisków?
czym jest przystępny i dostępny design?
jak dobierać fonty do elementów?
jak prawidłowo ustawić interlinie?
jak dobierać ikony do projektów?
jak poprawić czytelność ikon?
jak ożywić ikony?
jak samodzielne stworzyć paletę kolorów?
czym charakteryzuje się udany gradient?
jak tworzyć naturalnie wyglądające cienie?
jak wyrównywać elementy formularzy?
poznasz budowę komponentów: checkboxy, pola, switche
jak zaprojektować rozwijane listy?
jak projektować dane w formie tabel oraz list?
jak ustawić przestrzeń oraz wyrównania?
jak stosować siatkę oraz kolumny?
jak tworzyć wizualne separatory?
poznasz podstawy projektowania mobilnego
zobaczysz podstawy pracy w Figma

Pryciski: Co to przycisk i gdzie go znajdziemy na stronach

requirements: Dla osób bez żadnego doświadczenia w projektowaniu
courses.description:
Czego się nauczysz?
W tym kursie poznasz podstawowe elementy, na których projektowane są strony internetowe. Zobaczysz najlepsze praktyki projektowania komponentów dla interfejsów stron oraz aplikacji.
W ciągu 10 godzin, zrozumiesz kluczowe techniki projektowania najważniejszych komponentów, na które składa się wiedza o: kolorach, przyciskach, formularzach, typografii, ostępach, przestrzeni, elementach typu checkboxy, polach, lischt i tabelach.
Wiedza z tego kursu pozostanie aktualna nawet po wielu latach, kiedy wszystkie narzędzia i trendy zmienią się kilkakrotnie. Tutaj nauczysz się projektowania, a nie tylko narzędzi projektowych.


Kolory
Spory rozdział kursu został poświęcony kolorom. To tutaj dowiesz się jak od podstaw zaprojektować palety kolorów mając wybrany tylko jeden, główny kolor. Utworzysz do niego odcienie oraz paletę szarości. Pokażę Ci również jak ten proces zautomatyzować.
Dowiesz się jak tworzyć nowoczesne, subtelne cienie, ustawiając odpowiednie parametry. Poznasz 3 rodzaje cieni jak: Umbra, Penumbra, Ambient. Zobaczysz również jak tworzyć dobrze wyglądające gradienty.


Przyciski
To elementy, dzięki którym kupujesz lub zapisujesz się do newslettera, czy pobierasz ebooka. Poznasz ich hierarchię oraz podział. Zobaczysz jak projektować stany przycisków oraz ustawić typografię i odpowiednie odległości.


Formularze
Jednym z ważniejszych elementów projektów są formularze. Warto zadbać o prawidłowe zaprojektowanie, ponieważ często to w głównej mierze od nich zależy konwersja. Na początek poznasz anatomię formularza, gdzie zobaczysz czym jest etykieta, kontenery, pola zastępcze, podpowiedzi.
Zobaczysz jak dobierać kolory na potrzeby formularza, jak ułożyć tekst pomocniczy oraz etykiety. Idąc dalej nauczysz się tworzyć stany pól formularza.


Checkboxy, pola, switche
W kursie poznasz zasady projektowania oraz stosowania opcjonalnych komponentów jakimi są checkboxy, pola wyboru, switche czy listy rozwijane. Zobaczysz jak podjąć decyzję, kiedy zastosować pole, a kiedy checkbox. Zobaczysz jak dobierać kolory na potrzeby formularza, jak ułożyć tekst pomocniczy oraz etykiety. Idąc dalej, nauczysz się tworzyć stany pól formularza.


Tabele
Projektowanie ui, to często też wizualizacja danych. Tutaj warto posiąść wiedzę na temat projektowania tabel. Dzięki temu możesz zaprojektować listę produktów w sklepie czy wyniki filtrowania i sortowania.


Ostępy i przestrzeń
Dobry projekt charakteryzuje się odpowiednio ustawioną przestrzenią. Pokażę Ci, jak pracować z wolną przestrzenią, zarówno całego projektu jak i wewnątrz poszczególnych komponentów, jak karty, przyciski, ikony. Zobaczysz jak ustawić padding i marginesy. W tym rozdziale przekażę Ci wiedzę na temat wykorzystania wizualnych separatorów oraz rodzajów siatek.
target_audience: Początkujący zainteresowani projektowaniem UX/UI
Dla osób, które chcą rozpocząć karierę designera UI

courses.bio: Kompaktkurs für inklusives Design nach WCAG
objectives: Du verstehst die WCAG-Richtlinien 2.1 & 2.2 und kannst sie direkt auf deine Apps anwenden.
Du erkennst Barrieren in Apps sofort und weißt, wie du sie schnell verbessern kannst.
Du entwickelst neue Features barrierefrei, statt später mühsam nachzubessern.
Du testest Apps mit Tastatursteuerung und verstehst, wie motorisch eingeschränkte Nutzer navigieren – damit du schneller optimieren kannst.
Du setzt VoiceOver, Kontraste & größere Schrift ein, um Apps für Menschen mit Sehschwächen nutzbar zu machen.
Du erkennst, warum Gestensteuerung oft nicht reicht – und entwickelst smarte Alternativen.
Du analysierst User Flows aus der Sicht kognitiv eingeschränkter Nutzer und optimierst sie mit Leichtigkeit.
Du nutzt praxisnahe Checklisten & Beispiele, um stundenlange Recherche zu vermeiden.
Du weißt, worauf du bei neuen Features achten musst, damit deine App für alle zugänglich bleibt.

Externe Tastatur
courses.description:
Barrierefreie UX für Apps: Kompaktkurs für inklusives Design nach WCAG 2.1 und 2.2


Ab Juni 2025 wird Barrierefreiheit für Apps Pflicht – bist du bereit?
Wenn du mobile Apps für iOS oder Android designst, dann hast du jetzt die Chance, Barrierefreiheit direkt in deine Prozesse zu integrieren – ohne stundenlange Recherche oder komplizierte Guidelines.
Ich bin Melinda Albert, UX-Designerin mit 15 Jahren Erfahrung für Marken wie Telekom, Sparkasse, Idealo, RTL und ImmobilienScout.
In den letzten Jahren habe ich mich auf Barrierefreiheit spezialisiert und weiß, dass viele Designer und Produktmanager vor den gleichen Fragen stehen:
Was genau bedeutet Barrierefreiheit in der Praxis für mobile Apps?
Welche Maßnahmen sind wirklich notwendig, um meine App barrierefrei zu machen?
Wie teste ich meine App auf Barrieren – und wie löse ich sie?
UX- und Produktdesigner stehen vor einer Herausforderung: Wenn wir barrierefreie digitale Produkte gestalten wollen, müssen wir uns durch endlose Accessibility-Guidelines kämpfen. Dort steht dann zum Beispiel:
- Der Kontrast von Text und Bildern muss mindestens 4,5:1 betragen – außer großer Text, der darf 3:1 haben.
- Interaktionen, die Mehrpunkt- oder pfadbasierte Gesten erfordern, müssen auch mit einem einzigen Zeiger nutzbar sein – es sei denn, sie sind unentbehrlich.
Hilft dir das, eine intuitive, ästhetische und gleichzeitig barrierefreie Benutzeroberfläche zu gestalten? Wahrscheinlich nicht.
Die Lösung: Dieser Kurs!
Hier lernst du die wichtigsten Best Practices für barrierefreies UI-Design in nativen mobilen Apps, mit konkreten Beispielen aus iPhone-Apps – aber übertragbar auf Android.
Ohne unnötiges Blabla. Ohne Code-Kenntnisse. Nur das, was du als Designer, Entwickler oder Produktverantwortlicher wirklich brauchst.
In diesem Kurs lernst du:
- WCAG-Richtlinien 2.1 und 2.2 (A & AA) für mobile Apps verstehen & prüfen – speziell für native Apps
- Apps mit VoiceOver, Kontrasten & Textskalierung auf Sehschwächen testen
- Barrieren für hörgeschädigte Nutzer erkennen & lösen
- Apps auf motorische Einschränkungen prüfen – mit Fokus auf Gesten-Alternativen
- Apps für Nutzer mit kognitiven Einschränkungen bewerten, z. B. im Checkout-Prozess
- Praxisnahe Beispiele, Best Practices & direkt umsetzbare Lösungen
- Nützliche Checklisten, Ressourcen & Links für deinen Design-Alltag
Für wen ist dieser Kurs?
- UX/UI-Designer, die barrierefreie Apps gestalten wollen – ohne stundenlange Guidelines zu wälzen
- Product Owner & Entwickler, die sicherstellen müssen, dass ihre Apps für alle zugänglich sind
- Alle, die Barrierefreiheit in mobile Apps integrieren möchten – egal ob bei neuen oder bestehenden Produkten
Warum jetzt?
- Ab 28. Juni 2025 wird Barrierefreiheit für Apps Pflicht – Unternehmen müssen handeln.
- Dieser Kurs spart dir Zeit & Nerven – praxisnah, verständlich & kompakt.
- Keine trockene Theorie – nur direkt anwendbare Best Practices, Beispiele & Checklisten.
Mach den ersten Schritt zu einem inklusiven Design – starte jetzt!
target_audience: UX Designer
UI Designer
Entwickler
Produktmanager

courses.title: دورة شاملة في علم تجربة المستخدم والتصميم الاحترافي
courses.bio: المهنة الأكثر طلبا حول العالم
objectives: نقدم لكم كورس التصميم الأول من نوعه في العالم العربي، معتمداً على آخر ما توصل إليه خبراء تصميم تجربة المستخدم حول العالم. سيحتوي الكورس على كم هائل من المعلومات التي ستنقلك من مجرد مستخدم للبرامج، لتكون مصمماً قادراً على الإبداع وإنتاج الأفكار.

القسم النظري: فلسفة "لماذا" وتكوين مهنة المصمم بأساس صحيح
القسم العملي: تصميم الشعار - ترتيب الأفكار وانتاج الشكل
تطوير الشعار - استخدام الخطوط و استنتاج الألوان
تصميم بروشور#1 - التفكير والتنسيق و ترتيب التصميم والخلفيات
تصميم بروشور#2 - مدارس التصميم المختلفة - التغذية البصرية
تصميم فلاير والقرطاسية - التوازن وتوحيد المقاسات
تصميم موقع انترنت #1 - عالم الويب وأنواع الواجهات
تصميم موقع انترنت#2 - تطبيقات "واير فريم" لتخطيط المواقع
أسئلة واجابات ونصائح هامة: كيف أسوق لنفسي كمصمم و أبني مهنة حقيقية و أكسب المال

requirements: هذه المهنة هي الأكثر طلباً حول العالم الآن، لما لها من أهمية في ثورة التكنولوجيا الرقمية التي نشهدها
ما زال هذا الاختصاص في بدايته، لذلك كن السبّاق في اغتنام هذه الفرصة الثمينة وكن من أوائل من يمتلكون هذه المهنة
courses.description:
هذه الدورة ليست مجرد دورة عادية، وانما هي مشروع كامل متكامل يبدأ بك من لحظة فتح الصفحة البيضاء وانتهاء باكتمال المشروع
تتضمن الدورة قسما نظريا للتحدث في النظريات العالمية للفن وأسلوب انتاج مصمم فنان ومحترف
بينما تتضمن قسما عمليا يبدأ معنا بمشروع لشركة وهمية سنقوم بتصميم كامل منتجاتها متضمنا الشعار والقرطاسية وفلاير وبروشور بالاضافة لموقع انترنت وبالنهاية تطبيق موبايل
وبالتأكيد القسم الأهم وهو أسلوب التخطيط واستراتيجيات التصميم سواء الجرافيك أو الويب وكيفية جذب الزبائن وبناء مهنة مصمم حقيقية
target_audience: على مدار ما يقارب ثلاثة أشهر قام طلاب الدفعة الأولى بمتابعة الدورة وتطبيق الخطوات النظرية والعملية، وبناء عليه استحقوا شهادات الحضور.

Die User-Experience: Benutzerfreundlichkeit mit dem Prototyp-Modus testen
Jede Gestaltung wird mit Adobe XD noch besser und erlebbar! Mit dem Prototyp-Modus kannst du jede Seite deiner Gestaltung realistisch verknüpfen und dich so durch deine gestaltete Benutzeroberfläche oder App testen oder eindrucksvoll deinen Kunden präsentieren. Dein Udemy-Dozent
Laith Wahab

courses.title: User Research And Testing For UX Writing
courses.bio: How To Prepare And Test UX Writing Decisions With User Research
objectives: Know about what Exploratory and Validating User Research are
Know why we need Exploratory User Research to prepare UX Writing decisions
Know which Exploratory User Research methods to use to prepare UX Writing decisions
Know what Competitor Analysis is and how and when to use it
Know what Conversation Mining is and how and when to use it
Know what Target Group Observation is and how and when to use it
Know what Focus Groups are and how and when to use them
Know what User Interviews are and how and when to use them
Know why we need Validating User Research to test UX Writing decisions
Know which Validating User Research methods to use to test UX Writing decisions
Know what Search Term Analysis is and how and when to use it
Know what A/B Testing is and how and when to use it
Know what a Comprehension Survey is and how and when to use it
Know what Card Sorting is and how and when to use it
Know what Usability Testing is and how and when to use it
Know what Cloze Testing is and how and when to use it
Know what Highlighter Tests are and how and when to use them
Know about further methods that can be involved to test UX Writing decisions

Course 1: Exploratory User Research: Why Do We Need Exploratory Research For UX Writing?
Course II: Validating User Research & Te: Why Do We Need Validating Research For UX Writing?
How to Prepare Validating User Research
Other Methods for Validating User Research in UX Writing

requirements: Having a basic understanding of what UX Writing is helpful. If you are unsure, check out my course "Introduction To UX Writing: How To Write Great Microcopy"
courses.description:
There are many examples of good and bad UX Writing out there – and no doubt, these examples are helpful for every junior and advanced UX Writer.


But is this really all we need to know in order to write great microcopy for our users?


The answer is short and simple: no.


Great copy and microcopy are always perfectly custom-tailored to the skills, needs, preferences, habits, fears, and values of our very specific target audience. This is why the classic good and bad practice examples of UX Writing are very limited in their informative value.


And this is also why UX Writers – just like designers – more and more rely on proper user research and user testing, as it helps us to make target audience-specific, well-informed decisions about which emotions to address, which information to include, and which words to use.


However, especially for UX Writers who are new to the field, many things about user research and user testing in UX Writing remain obscure:
How can user research actually improve my UX Writing?
What parts of our copy can be tested?
What kinds of different methods for exploring and testing are actually helpful for UX Writers?
How do we choose the right method?
What do we need to keep in mind when setting up our user research and user testing?


If you ask yourself these and other questions and have not yet found an answer to them, this course is the right choice for you!


Who should join
This course is the perfect choice for all UX Writers and for everybody who works with UX Writing.
It may also be interesting for designers, project managers, product owners, and developers who want to include UX Writing into their product development process and are interested in how to make information-based writing decisions.
For user researchers who are very familiar with general user research techniques but have only little experience with using these techniques in the context of UX Writing, this course also provides some new knowledge – not much, but some.


What you will learn
In the first part of this class, you will learn
what user research is and how it goes together with UX Writing
how to properly prepare your user research for UX Writing
about different forms of exploratory user research
how different forms of user research support UX Writing decisions
about real-life examples of how to apply exploratory user research methods
In the second part of this class, you will learn
about the different quality criteria you can test your copy for
how to properly prepare your user testing
about different forms of validating user research and when to use them
about real-life examples of how to apply validating user research methods and tools


Sounds good? Then join this class and learn how to conduct user research and user testing for your UX Writing!


If you want to take all of my UX Writing courses, here is the order recommend:
1 Introduction To UX Writing
2 Transitioning To UX Writing
3 Accessible UX Writing
4 UX Writing: Finding Your Voice and Tone
5 UX Writing in Practice: Documentation & Processes
6 User Research And Testing For UX Writing
7 Inclusive UX Writing: Physical Abilities & Neurodivergence
8 Inclusive UX Writing: Gender, Race & Age
9 Culture-Based UX Writing
10 Localization in UX Writing
11 Fighting „Dark“ UX Writing: How To Write Kind UX Copy
12 Building Your UX Writing Portfolio
13 Freelancing in UX Writing


Please note that all courses stand for themselves and that you don't need to take any course as a prerequisite for taking another one. You don’t have to follow this order. This is only my very own suggestion, which is especially helpful when you need guidance on which course to pick next.
target_audience: UX Writers
Everybody who wants to transition into UX Writing
Copywriters, journalists, and other professionals who are working on transitioning into UX Writing but have not yet conducted research for UX Writing
Designers, developers, and project managers who want to integrate UX Writing into their team
UX Researcher with no experience in exploring or testing UX Writing decisions

courses.title: Government Service Design: Build Innovative Public Services
courses.bio: Learn a practical framework to map government services, define user needs, and design impactful, user experiences
objectives: Understand the core principles of government service design
Identify public services and their target customer segments
Define the core jobs your service must fulfill
Build a Job Map and identify unmet needs using structured analysis
Design workflows, wireframes, and early prototypes
Understand the end-to-end lifecycle from idea to implementation in government settings
requirements: All levels
courses.description:
Are you working in government, consulting for public entities, or simply interested in how to create better services for citizens?
This course gives you a step-by-step framework for designing innovative, user-centered government services.
Instead of theory-heavy lectures, you'll get a practical guide covering:
How to identify which services need redesign
Techniques to define the real job your users are trying to get done
Building a clear Job Map and spotting unmet needs
Translating ideas into process flows and wireframes
Understanding what it takes to bring a service to life across teams, vendors, and systems
Whether you're working in digital transformation, policy, service delivery, or design, this course equips you with real-world strategies you can apply immediately.
You’ll also explore the key principles behind service innovation in the public sector, including customer-centric thinking, collaboration across government entities, and aligning service experiences with broader policy goals.
Even if you're new to service design, this course will help you build confidence and fluency in thinking from a user perspective. If you're experienced, it will give you new tools and a structured approach to communicate your ideas more clearly with teams and decision-makers.
Enroll now to start designing better, more effective government services, and make an impact where it truly matters.
target_audience: Government employees working on digital or service transformation
Consultants serving public sector clients
UX or service designers exploring government work
Students or professionals in public policy and innovation
