courses.title: SensoryAlchemy: Crafting Emotions with Materials Design TM
courses.bio: Real Time Case Study
objectives: Comprehensive Material Understanding
Real-Time Application and Examples
Classification Mastery for Product Design
In-Depth Exploration of Predominant Materials
Emotional Materials and Perception
Visual Mapping of Emotions
Sensory Characteristics and Feelings
Crafting Unique Design Statements
Practical Application through Design Projects
requirements: Accessibility for Everyone This course is designed to be inclusive, welcoming individuals from all backgrounds.
Encouraging Self-Reflection Students are encouraged to actively engage with the content by taking notes for self-reflection purposes. This practice enhances the learning experience.
No Prior Experience Required A standout feature of this course is its inclusivity – no prior experience is needed to enroll. Regardless of your background or expertise.
Simplified Learning Approach the course adopts a simplified learning approach, breaking down complex concepts into easily digestible segments.
Universally Understandable Content The language and delivery of content have been meticulously crafted to be universally understandable.
courses.description:
Embark on a transformative journey into the realm of design and emotions with our course, "SensoryAlchemy: Crafting Emotions with Materials." This immersive program delves into the intricate world of various materials, from the organic warmth of wood to the sleek precision of sheet metal, exploring their fundamental properties and unlocking the art of emotional design.
About the Course: Dive deep into the core of materials, from wood, sheet metal, bamboo, plastic, glass, to ceramic, and discover their unique properties for identification. Uncover the secrets of working with each material, understanding its texture, and learning how to bring out its emotional essence. The course specifically focuses on the interplay of materials and emotions, guiding aspiring designers on how to weave emotional narratives into their creations.
Benefits of this Course:
Comprehensive Material Understanding:
Gain extensive knowledge about various materials, from wood to ceramics, understanding their basic properties crucial for identification.
Real-Time Application and Examples:
Explore each material with vivid pictures and real-life examples, illustrating how these materials are seamlessly integrated into our daily lives.
Classification Mastery for Product Design:
Learn the basic classification of metals, plastics, and alloys, providing a solid foundation for real-time usage in product design.
In-Depth Exploration of Predominant Materials:
Delve into the world of plastic and sheet metal, examining alloys, normal sheet metal, and polymers with a focus on elastomers, thermoplastic polymers, and more through real-time examples.
Emotional Materials and Perception:
Uncover the concept of "emotional materials," understanding how different materials evoke emotions as people perceive and touch them.
Visual Mapping of Emotions:
Equate each emotion with specific materials, providing a visual journey into the emotional landscapes crafted by various materials, enhanced with compelling pictures.
Sensory Characteristics and Feelings:
Showcase examples of how materials create distinct feelings, exploring the spectrum of hardness, softness, medium textures, roughness, and smoothness through engaging visuals and practical examples.
Crafting Unique Design Statements:
Develop the skill to deliberately evoke emotions with materials, empowering designers to curate their own library and carve out a unique design statement, setting them apart in the competitive design landscape.
By the end of this course, participants will not only master the technical aspects of materials but will also become adept emotional designers, capable of infusing their creations with a profound and distinctive emotional resonance.


Courtesy,
Dr. FAK Noble Ai Researcher, Scientists, Product Developer, Innovator & Pure Consciousness Expert
Founder of Noble Transformation Hub TM
target_audience: Aspiring Designers
Product Designers:
Graphic Designers
Architects and Interior Designers
Artists and Creatives
Students in Design Education
Entrepreneurs in the Design Industry
Individuals Interested in Emotional Design

courses.title: Digital design school - Learn and improve as a designer fast
courses.bio: An 8 week bootcamp
objectives: Visual design skills
User interface design
User experience design
Design fundamentals
Typography
Layout
Colour theory
Gestalt
Animated prototyping
requirements: Knowing how to use a design program such as Sketch, Figma or adobe XD would be helpful but you can pick up the basics as you go along with the videos.
courses.description:
This is an 8 week self-directed online course.
This bootcamp has been designed in a way to give you the fastest possible way to becoming a better designer. Giving you the best structure and exercises to follow to improve your skills as a designer and take you to the next level. You will also become more valuable as a designer rather than just a pixel pusher.
Learning design is a long journey and everyone is looking for the secret sauce or the magic bullet. Unfortunately, there isn't a super secret that will short cut you to design mastery. But, there are certain ways of studying and practicing that will propel your learning and make your a better designer in a shorter time frame.
The course uses a learn by doing approach. When you want to be a designer, you want to create cool designs, not listen to hours of boring lectures on theory. This course teaches you the theory while you design, making it more fun and scientifically proven as a better way of learning.
Every week you will have a new project. This means eight different design projects including mobile apps, desktop apps and responsive web pages. You will be given homework every week. A list of design exercises, a main project to work on and some suggested reading.
The projects will follow on from each other so you cement everything you have learnt and have multiple opportunities to practice your new skills. This bootcamp will help you learn a solid design process that top companies use. One of the best things about this course is it gives you a clear path to improvement. Follow the process and you will improve!
So what are you waiting for? Roll up your sleeves and let's design!
target_audience: Beginner and Mid-weight designers will benefit most but any level designer can improve using this course

courses.title: Fondamentaux Design UX/UI + Design Sprint pour débutants
courses.bio: Apprenez les bases du design UX/UI et appliquez-les à des projets concrets en utilisant la méthode Design Sprint
objectives: Découvrez les bases du design UX : origines, naissance d'Internet et biais cognitifs.
Plongez dans l'univers du design thinking et des grands principes du Design UX
Explorez les fondamentaux du design UI : typographie, iconographie, couleurs, grille et système de design.
Maîtrisez la méthode du Design Sprint étape par étape : comprendre, définir, esquisser, décider, prototyper, rédiger et valider en utilisant un exemple actuel
requirements: Il n'y pas de prérequis véritables, ce cours étant surtout pour les débutants.
courses.description:
Embarquez pour un parcours complet à travers l'univers du design UX/UI avec ce cours méticuleusement structuré, conçu pour ceux qui sont impatients de maîtriser les principes essentiels et de les appliquer à des tâches de conception concrètes. Que vous entamiez votre chemin ou que vous cherchiez à consolider vos compétences, ce cours est ajusté pour élever votre savoir-faire en matière de design.
Plongez dans la riche histoire du design UX/UI, en commençant par son contexte historique et en évoluant vers le design thinking moderne. Explorez les fondements psychologiques de l'expérience utilisateur, tels que les biais cognitifs, et découvrez comment ils influencent les décisions de conception. Immergez-vous au cœur de la communication visuelle avec des explorations détaillées de la typographie, de l'iconographie, de la théorie des couleurs, des systèmes de grille et des systèmes de design complets.
Vivez un processus d'apprentissage dynamique et pratique avec le sprint de conception. Ce cours vous offre un cadre pratique pour donner vie à vos compétences naissantes en design, vous mettant au défi de vous engager dans des projets concrets et d'affiner vos capacités dans un environnement interactif et de soutien.


Plan Détaillé du Cours :
Module 1 : Fondements du Design UX

Tracer l'Évolution de l'Expérience Utilisateur
Jalons de l'Internet
Démêler les Biais Cognitifs
Pionniers du Design Thinking
Le Modèle de Sprint de Design de Google

Module 2 : Principes du Design UI
L'Art de la Typographie : De l'Histoire à l'Application
L'Artisanat de l'Iconographie
La Science de la Sélection des Couleurs
Maîtriser les Dispositions en Grille
Construire des Systèmes de Design Robustes

Module 3 : Exécution d'un Sprint de Design
Aperçu Complet des Étapes du Sprint
Plongée Profonde dans :
Empathie et Compréhension
Définition du Problème
Techniques d'Idéation
Processus de Prise de Décision
Méthodologies de Prototypage
Fondamentaux de l'Écriture UX
Stratégies de Validation


À la fin de ce cours, vous posséderez une base solide tant dans la théorie que dans la pratique du design UX/UI, vous permettant de contribuer à une gamme diversifiée de produits numériques. Avec une confiance et des connaissances nouvelles, vous serez bien équipé pour poursuivre votre parcours d'apprentissage et entreprendre une carrière épanouissante dans ce domaine dynamique et en expansion.
Saisissez l'opportunité de transformer votre potentiel en compétence. Inscrivez-vous dès aujourd'hui et tracez votre route pour devenir un designer UX/UI compétent et accompli !
target_audience: Ce cours s'adresse à tous le monde et en particulier les étudiants ayant un intérêt pour le design d'interface utilisateur, les personnes cherchant à changer de carrière ou à se reconvertir dans le domaine de l'UX/UI

Выводы: Что делать дальше? Как получить первого клиента?

requirements: Интернет
Базовые навыки работы с компьютером
courses.description:
Курс неспроста называется "I believe I can design" - я верю, что ты сможешь делать потрясающие дизайны, осталось только поверить тебе в себя!

На этом курсе ты научишься работать в программе Figma, которая отодвинула в сторону такие инструменты как Фотошоп и Скетч. Больше не нужны тяжёлые программы, дорогостоящий Мак или мощный компьютер, всё, что теперь тебе нужно - это обычный ноутбук. Тебе не нужно уметь программировать или рисовать от руки.
Этот курс подойдёт для новичков, которые только услышали о профессии дизайнера или делают первые шаги, а также для более опытных дизайнеров, которые хотят научиться работать в Фигме.
На этом курсе мы рассмотрим основные элементы интерфейса Фигмы, ты научишься делать адаптивный дизайн, сможешь дизайнить быстро с помощью компонентов, будешь вместе со мной создавать эффектный лендинг, а также мобильное приложение. Ты научишься прототипировать свои дизайны и готовить презентацию для портфолио. В конце я подскажу тебе, что делать дальше после курса.
target_audience: Начинающие дизайнеры
Дизайнеры интерфейсов
Веб-дизайнеры
Графические дизайнеры
UX дизайнеры
UI дизайнеры

courses.title: Transição de Carreira para UX Design 2024
courses.bio: O Guia Completo para Migrar e Evoluir em UX Design
objectives: Preparação para carreira em UX Design
Análise de Empresas
Análise de Profissionais de Design
Comunidades de UX
Análise de Vagas de Design
Construção de PDI de Design
Estrutura do Bom Portfólio de Design
Propagando a sua mensagem + Protagonismo
Perguntas Frequentes

Perguntas frequentes: Dúvidas sobre a carreira de UX
Mensagem Final: Workshop Transição de Carreira para UX Design

requirements: Saber usar computador e navegadores de internet
Ter curiosidade e desejo de migrar para UX Design
Conhecimento básico de Excel
Ter uma conta no LinkedIn
courses.description:
No curso Transição de Carreira para UX Design, você embarcará em uma jornada de autodescoberta e crescimento profissional. Este guia prático e objetivo oferece uma análise detalhada do mercado atual, destacando as oportunidades de emprego e o perfil dos profissionais mais procurados.


Você aprenderá a estruturar um Plano de Desenvolvimento Individual (PDI) de Design, personalizado para suas necessidades e aspirações, com base nas análises realizadas. Além disso, o livro orienta na criação de um portfólio de Design impactante, permitindo que você compartilhe seus projetos, aprendizados e visão de mundo de maneira eficaz. Com essas ferramentas ao seu alcance, você estará preparado para aproveitar qualquer oportunidade que surgir.


Como um bônus, o treinamento inclui ferramentas exclusivas para a construção de PDIs para Designers, pesquisa de mercado e construção de Portfólio de Design. Com elas, você poderá mapear suas habilidades e traçar um plano de ação estratégico para migrar ou evoluir na carreira de UX.


Não perca a chance de acelerar sua transição ou crescimento na carreira de UX com este recurso valioso!


ATENÇÃO
É importante reforçar que este curso tem como objetivo: capacitar estudantes, profissionais e qualquer pessoa com desejo de ser um profissional de UX Design. Este curso aborda métodos e ferramentas para a construção de uma carreira sólida em Design. Contudo, não focaremos em ferramentas de Design ou criação de interfaces para portfólios.
Ainda assim, o curso entregará meios para a construção e estruturação de um bom portfólio de design.


Este curso se baseia no método adaptado e validado pelo autor, André Bernardes.
target_audience: Estudantes de Design, Jornalismo, Marketing e áreas afins
Profissionais de Jornalismo
Profissionais de Marketing e Social Media
Qualquer pessoa com desejo de ser UX Designer
Profissionais que desejam construir uma carreira sólida em Design, UX e Produto

objectives: اكتساب مهارات في تصميم تجربة المستخدم

Introduction: How to contact me for questions and advices

requirements: No experience needed
courses.description:
انا اسامة بن دحو من المغرب مرحبًا بكم في عالم تصميم تجربة المستخدم  ساشارك معكم معلومات مهمة جدا ستساعدكم في مساركم
في هذه الدورة الشاملة، سنبدأ من الصفر، ونغطي المبادئ والممارسات الأساسية لتصميم تجربة المستخدم. ستكتسب فهمًا عميقًا للتصميم الذي يركز على المستخدم. سوف يستكشف المشاركون أساسيات التصميم التي تركز على المستخدم، مع التركيز على الأهمية الأساسية للتواصل الفعال مع المستخدم وتعزيز تجاربهم. تم تصميم هذه الدورة التدريبية الجذابة، "تعلم تصميم تجربة المستخدم للمبتدئين"، لتوجيه القادمين الجدد في رحلة شاملة لفهم أساسيات وممارسات تصميم تجربة المستخدم (UX). سوف يستكشف المشاركون أساسيات التصميم التي تركز على المستخدم، مع التركيز على الأهمية الأساسية للتواصل الفعال مع المستخدم وتعزيز تجاربهم.
هذه الدورة الممتعة والشاملة لتصميم تجربة المستخدم (UX) تهدف إلى توجيه المبتدئين في رحلتهم نحو فهم شامل لمفاهيم وممارسات تصميم تجربة المستخدم. يستكشف المشاركون أساسيات تصميم يركز على المستخدم، مع التركيز على الأهمية الجوهرية للتواصل الفعّال مع المستخدمين وتحسين تجاربهم. ستتعلم في هذه الدورة اساسيات و تقنيات تصميم تجربة المستخدم مثل انشاء شخصيات المستخدم و خريطة التعاطف, الهندسة المعلوماتية, خريطة رحلة المستخدم
سواء كنت تستهدف دخول مجال تصميم تجربة المستخدم أو تعزيز مهاراتك الحالية، ستقدم هذه الدورة للمبتدئين إطارًا شاملاً يمكنهم من بناء  أساس قوي في هذا المجال المثير والمطلوب. في سوق الشغل
target_audience: تهدف هذه الدورة إلى تزويد المشاركين بالمفاهيم والمهارات الأساسية في مجال تصميم تجربة المستخدم. ستستكشف الدورة مجموعة واسعة من الموضوعات التي تغطي أساسيات تجربة المستخدم

courses.title: Designers Perspective and Strategies Master Class TM
courses.bio: With Real Time Case Study and Case Method
objectives: Students can learn about a good understanding of the science of psychology
How being a designer it's very important to have this knowledge and awareness with us
How people can differ emotionally with respect to having an expression of that people may range from small to higher
How using power force can change or psychological behaviour by just altering or physiological behaviour
How by changing ourselves by retrospective ourselves and spiritually evolving our cognitive ability
Documentary watching of Into the wind film has been discussed and how the actors behavioural psychology has changed over time and we had a debate about it

Overview of Caste system in India: Overview of Caste system in India
Realtime problems faced by me reg Caste: Realtime problems faced by me reg Caste

requirements: Anyone can learn this class it is very simple
Students are advised to take notes for self-reflection purposes
No prior experience is needed to join this course
courses.description:
About  the Master Class:

This course teaches students about the science of psychology in detail from the basics. Also discuss the psyche and what is our emotional intelligence with respect to psychology. Also how students can learn about controlling emotional intelligence by getting aware of it by relating to a personal story and then example what we did as a class activity. How application of using power poses can be able to make physiologically change affect our psychology of behaviour in real time. Also documentation has been watched and debated for discussion has been summarised in this course.

Design philosophy:


As I used to say in my design courses, that design cannot be learned in the rot learning or Text book way of learning that you do through a chapter wise and remember some formulas that will yield you some solutions. Design is unique and when different people approach the same problems we will get different solutions based on the inputs that designer works on.
So design can be approached in the way of learning through the case studies and by doing action on your own to learn yourself.
Learning by doing and learning by action.


Benefits of the Master Class:


Students can learn about a good understanding of the science of psychology and how being a designer it's very important to have this knowledge and awareness with us.
Real-time activity of recollecting our past behaviour in the two weeks has been made as a mind map to illustrate a self and have a self learning of how we exert control over our own emotional intelligence.
How people can differ emotionally with respect to having an expression of that people may range from small to higher and also their threshold is very unique and it's very subjective from person to person.
How using power force can change or psychological behaviour by just altering or physiological behaviour, by showing real-time pictures of how the emotions are getting changed has been expressed and taught in detail.
How by changing ourselves by retrospective ourselves and spiritually evolving our cognitive ability and thinking and decision-making largely affects her psyche being a designer, and 80% is mindset when we work for a design or problem-solving ability.
Documentary watching of Into the wind film has been discussed and how the actors behavioural psychology has changed over time and we had a debate about it.
Being a designer understanding about your psyche, emotional intelligence and exerting a control over that is very important and also Maslow's hierarchy of self actualisation has been discussed.
target_audience: Anyone who wants to learn real time case studies for Designers
Anyone who wants to learn Designers Perspective and Strategies for Design

courses.description:
随着人口红利的渐去，我们可以看到的是C端互联网产品的市场已经逐渐饱和，而在B端还有着很多可能性，众多企业纷纷入局B端产品/服务。而ToB的产品经理如果想要掌握更多信息、拥有更重的话语权，就需要有进行高效需求分析的能力。那么作为ToB产品经理的你，如何在时间紧、任务重的工作中高效输出一份让团队满意的需求文档呢？为此，三节课邀请到拥有4年+B端和平台类产品策划经验的周家文老师，与你分享他的PRD撰写心得，助你又好又快地完成一份PRD。
本节课程是由授课老师与三节课合作制作的。在此，要特别感谢老师的辛苦付出！经历了课程立项、设计、开发中的众多环节，我们才能最终为你呈现现在的这门课程。无论是授课老师还是三节课团队，都希望这门课程能够让你有所收获，希望同学们结合个人工作情况，学以致用。

Beginner level at design. Knowledge of basic design principles.
courses.description:
تصميم واجهة المستخدم وتجربة المستخدم هما ميدانان يشهدان نموًا سريعًا، حيث يدرك المزيد من الشركات أهمية إنشاء تصاميم مركزة على المستخدم لا تُظهر فقط جاذبية بصرية ولكن أيضًا تكون سهلة الاستخدام وبديهية. كمصمم واجهة مستخدم وتجربة مستخدم، ستكون مسؤولاً عن تصميم واجهة المستخدم وتجربة المستخدم للمنتجات الرقمية، مثل المواقع الإلكترونية وتطبيقات الجوال وتطبيقات البرمجيات.
يتزودك هذا الدورة في تصميم واجهة المستخدم وتجربة المستخدم بالمعرفة والمهارات اللازمة لتحقيق نجاح باهر كمصمم واجهة مستخدم وتجربة مستخدم. طوال الدورة، ستكتسب أساسًا قويًا في مبادئ تصميم واجهة المستخدم وأفضل الممارسات، وستتعلم كيفية إنشاء تصاميم مركزة على المستخدم تلبي احتياجات جمهورك المستهدف. ستطور أيضًا مهارات أساسية في أبحاث المستخدم، وأبحاث السوق، وإدارة المشاريع، وغيرها من المجالات الرئيسية لتصبح مصمم واجهة مستخدم وتجربة مستخدم متكامل.
بحلول نهاية هذه الدورة، ستكون لديك فهم شامل لعملية تصميم واجهة المستخدم وتجربة المستخدم، بما في ذلك كيفية إجراء أبحاث المستخدم، وإنشاء هياكل الأسلاك والنماذج الأولية، والتصميم للويب مقابل التطبيق، والمزيد. ستظل أيضًا على اطلاع دائم بأحدث الاتجاهات والتقنيات في صناعة تصميم واجهة المستخدم وتجربة المستخدم، مثل تصميم الاستجابة، والوصولية، وتصميم أولاً للهواتف المحمولة، وستتعلم كيفية تطبيقها على تصاميمك.
بالإضافة إلى ذلك، ستحصل على فرصة لبناء محفظة قوية من أعمال تصميم واجهة المستخدم وتجربة المستخدم تُظهر مهاراتك وخبرتك لأصحاب العمل أو العملاء المحتملين. ستنضم أيضًا إلى مجتمع من المصممين ذوي الفكر المشابه وستتلقى تعليقات وإرشادات ودعمًا من المدرسين والأقران لمساعدتك في النمو والنجاح في مسيرتك كمصمم واجهة مستخدم وتجربة مستخدم.
سواء كنت مبتدئًا أو مصممًا ذو خبرة يسعى لتعزيز مهاراته، ستوفر لك هذه الدورة في تصميم واجهة المستخدم وتجربة المستخدم الأدوات والمعرفة والدعم الذي تحتاجه لتحقيق النجاح في هذا الميدان المثير والمجزي.تصميم واجهة المستخدم وتجربة المستخدم هما ميدانان يشهدان نموًا سريعًا، حيث يدرك المزيد من الشركات أهمية إنشاء تصاميم مركزة على المستخدم لا تُظهر فقط جاذبية بصرية ولكن أيضًا تكون سهلة الاستخدام وبديهية. كمصمم واجهة مستخدم وتجربة مستخدم، ستكون مسؤولاً عن تصميم واجهة المستخدم وتجربة المستخدم للمنتجات الرقمية، مثل المواقع الإلكترونية وتطبيقات الجوال وتطبيقات البرمجيات.
يتزودك هذا الدورة في تصميم واجهة المستخدم وتجربة المستخدم بالمعرفة والمهارات اللازمة لتحقيق نجاح باهر كمصمم واجهة مستخدم وتجربة مستخدم. طوال الدورة، ستكتسب أساسًا قويًا في مبادئ تصميم واجهة المستخدم وأفضل الممارسات، وستتعلم كيفية إنشاء تصاميم مركزة على المستخدم تلبي احتياجات جمهورك المستهدف. ستطور أيضًا مهارات أساسية في أبحاث المستخدم، وأبحاث السوق، وإدارة المشاريع، وغيرها من المجالات الرئيسية لتصبح مصمم واجهة مستخدم وتجربة مستخدم متكامل.
بحلول نهاية هذه الدورة، ستكون لديك فهم شامل لعملية تصميم واجهة المستخدم وتجربة المستخدم، بما في ذلك كيفية إجراء أبحاث المستخدم، وإنشاء هياكل الأسلاك والنماذج الأولية، والتصميم للويب مقابل التطبيق، والمزيد. ستظل أيضًا على اطلاع دائم بأحدث الاتجاهات والتقنيات في صناعة تصميم واجهة المستخدم وتجربة المستخدم، مثل تصميم الاستجابة، والوصولية، وتصميم أولاً للهواتف المحمولة، وستتعلم كيفية تطبيقها على تصاميمك.
بالإضافة إلى ذلك، ستحصل على فرصة لبناء محفظة قوية من أعمال تصميم واجهة المستخدم وتجربة المستخدم تُظهر مهاراتك وخبرتك لأصحاب العمل أو العملاء المحتملين. ستنضم أيضًا إلى مجتمع من المصممين ذوي الفكر المشابه وستتلقى تعليقات وإرشادات ودعمًا من المدرسين والأقران لمساعدتك في النمو والنجاح في مسيرتك كمصمم واجهة مستخدم وتجربة مستخدم.
سواء كنت مبتدئًا أو مصممًا ذو خبرة يسعى لتعزيز مهاراته، ستوفر لك هذه الدورة في تصميم واجهة المستخدم وتجربة المستخدم الأدوات والمعرفة والدعم الذي تحتاجه لتحقيق النجاح في هذا الميدان المثير والمجزي.
target_audience: This UI/UX course is designed for designers who want to take their career to the next level by learning how to design powerful and engaging user experiences. You will learn how to analyze user needs, create effective user interface designs, and develop comfortable and user-friendly experiences. By the end of the course, you will have the skills and knowledge needed to become an industry professional and land a higher paying job in the field of UI/UX design. Whether you're just starting out or looking to enhance your skills, this course will equip you with the tools you need to succeed in this exciting and rewarding field.

courses.description:
今や当たり前の考え方となってきたUX（ユーザー・エクスペリエンス）デザインですが、非常に多くの手法が提案されており、何から始めればいいのか迷ってしまうほどです。
UXデザインの手法は、大別するとアイデアを見つける手法と、そのアイデアの効果を検証する手法に分けられます。アイデアを見つける手法はあくまでも支援ツールなので、豊かな発想力を持っている人であれば手法を使わなくても面白いアイデアを思いつくことはできます。ただ、そのアイデアを検証せずにそのまま商品化してしまうと、まったくユーザーに受け入れられないおそれがあります。
そう考えると、様々なUXデザイン手法のすべてを実施する余裕がない場合には、まずはアイデアの効果検証手法から始めるのが適当です。その代表的なものがユーザビリティ評価です。
本コースでは、UXデザインのうちユーザビリティに特化して詳しく解説しています（UXデザイン全般について知りたい方は『UXデザイン講座 UXデザイン基礎入門』をご覧ください）。初級者の方にはユーザビリティ評価導入の参考として、中級者以上の方にはノウハウやコツの共有という意味で役立てていただけると思います。
最初に概要をお伝えした後、「ユーザビリティテストの観察/記録」「ユーザビリティテスト結果分析」「ユーザビリティテストの準備」「ユーザビリティテストの実施」で実践的な評価のやり方を解説します。先に観察/記録や結果分析が来ているのは、まずアウトプットに近い部分を理解していただいたうえで、そのために必要な準備、実施方法について考えていただきたいためです
最後に被験者4名分のテスト映像をすべてご覧いただけるようにしました。細かい解説はありませんが、観察、記録、分析のトレーニングにご活用ください。
なお、一部『UXデザイン講座 UXデザイン基礎入門』と内容が重複する部分があります。
target_audience: ユーザビリティ評価について学びたい方
よりユーザビリティの高い製品・アプリ・Webサービスなどを目指している開発者、デザイナー、ディレクター
UXデザイン、ユーザビリティ、人間中心設計などに興味があるものの、どこから手をつけていいか迷っている方
自分なりにユーザビリティ評価を実施したものの、これでいいのか疑問や不安を感じている方
ユーザビリティ評価の経験者で、さらにスキルを高めたいと思っている方

courses.description:
Welcome to "Landing Page Mastery: Boost Conversions and Skyrocket Sales"! In this introductory course, you'll learn how to create high-converting landing pages that captivate your audience and drive impressive results. This course is tailored for digital designers, small business owners, marketers and entrepreneurs who want to unlock the full potential of their landing pages.
Throughout this engaging course, you'll dive into several key areas that will transform your approach to landing page design and optimization:
Crafting persuasive value propositions: Develop compelling messaging that speaks directly to your target audience, highlighting the unique benefits of your product or service.
Handling objections effectively: Learn powerful techniques to address and overcome potential barriers, ensuring a smooth conversion process for your prospects.
Leveraging the power of social proof: Build credibility and trust with your visitors by showcasing testimonials, case studies, and other forms of social validation.
Designing user-focused content and visuals: Create eye-catching and engaging content blocks, calls-to-action, and visuals that resonate with your audience and encourage action.
Optimizing landing page flow and design: Arrange your content and design elements strategically to maximize user engagement, encourage interaction, and ultimately drive conversions.
By the end of this course, you'll have the skills and knowledge to transform your landing pages into lead-generating, sales-driving powerhouses. With expert guidance and practical examples, you'll be equipped to apply these strategies to your own projects, leading to increased conversion rates and overall online success. Don't miss this opportunity to elevate your landing page game and take your business to new heights. Enroll now and start mastering the art of high-converting landing pages today!
target_audience: Freelancers or agencies offering web design, copywriting, or marketing services who want to add value to their clients.
E-commerce store owners interested in increasing their conversion rates and maximizing their return on investment.
Startups and entrepreneurs aiming to launch their products or services with a strong online presence.
Small business owners seeking to drive more leads and sales by optimizing their website's landing pages.
Digital marketers looking to improve their skillset and boost campaign performance through high-converting landing pages.

requirements: No necesitas estudios ni conocimientos previos
Necesitas acceso a una computadora y a internet
courses.description:
¡Convertite en un UX Writer!
En este curso aprenderás las nociones principales sobre UX Writing y por qué es tan importante pensar en el contenido a la hora de diseñar una interfaz. Conocerás las distintas herramientas que puedes utilizar para generar contenidos de calidad.
El rol de UX Writer o como se escucha también UI Writer o Content Designer, se encarga de escribir todo lo que hace a la interfaz de un producto o servicio digital, toda esa comunicación y textos que el usuario va a leer. En este curso vas a aprender todas las técnicas y herramientas para que puedas generar contenidos de calidad centrados en el usuario.
Cada vez son más las interfaces con diálogos o contenido textual, por lo que el UX Writing es una disciplina que está creciendo en todo el mundo. Para que aprendas de la mejor manera el curso está repleto, no solo de teoría, sino también de ejercicios prácticos.


¿Necesito un título para ser UX Writer?
No necesitas un título específico para ser un UX Writer, pero debes tener experiencia con la tecnología, comprender el comportamiento de las personas y tener ánimos de escribir.
Los antecedentes comunes incluyen, entre otros, escritores de contenido, psicología, antropología, sociología, marketing, diseño, comunicaciones y ciencias de la información. Pero aún siendo un principiante con cero experiencia en este campo vas a aprender desde cero.


¿Qué voy a aprender en este curso?
A través de este curso, aprenderás todas las habilidades que necesitas para ayudar a las empresas a brindar la experiencia de usuario adecuada para sus productos. Todas las técnicas incluidas en en el curso son estándares de la industria probados y comprobados, que te equiparán con el mejor conocimiento para comenzar tu nuevo camino profesional.


¿Es una profesión con futuro?
La respuesta es, sí.
Si estás buscando iniciar una carrera como UX Writer, ahora es un buen momento.
La demanda de  UX Writers es, por lo tanto, más alta que nunca, ya son frecuentes en las empresas tecnológicas y existe una creciente necesidad de ellas en otras industrias.


Obtendrás un Certificado del curso verificable y confiable en la industria una vez que hayas completado el curso. Podés resaltarlo en tu currículum, tu perfil de LinkedIn o en tu sitio web.
target_audience: Este curso es ideal y está dirigido para programadores, emprendedores, diseñadores, comunicadores, escritores, sociólogos, psicólogos, analistas y todas las personas con ganas de aprender sobre el proceso de creación de productos y servicios desde cero.

In the final part of the course, you’ll develop knowledge Applying design thinking to business and social challenges. Sustainability and Social Impact Projects., Government and Policy., Healthcare and Education Application, Managing Stakeholder Collaboration. Cross- Functional Teamwork.

courses.description:
¿Querés aprender a diseñar páginas web y aplicaciones móviles que no solo funcionen bien, sino que también se vean profesionales y atractivas? Este curso es para vos. Aprendé a dominar el diseño de interfaz con Figma y convertite en Diseñador UI.
Este curso fue pensado para llevarte paso a paso por los principios fundamentales del diseño visual aplicado a productos digitales. Desde la teoría clásica del diseño hasta la implementación moderna en herramientas como Figma, vas a adquirir los conocimientos necesarios para construir interfaces limpias, estéticas y funcionales.
A lo largo del curso vas a trabajar en un proyecto práctico que aplicarás clase a clase, acompañado por ejercicios, recursos descargables y material actualizado. Además, vas a incorporar herramientas clave como Atomic Design, sistemas de diseño, grillas, tipografía, color, accesibilidad y más.
No necesitás experiencia previa ni estudios formales. El curso está diseñado para que cualquier persona con ganas de aprender pueda comenzar desde cero y avanzar hasta un nivel profesional.
Ya sea que vengas del diseño gráfico, la comunicación, el desarrollo web o cualquier otra área, este curso te va a permitir dominar los aspectos visuales del diseño digital y sumar una habilidad clave para destacarte en el mundo tech.
El curso también es ideal para desarrolladores frontend que quieran mejorar la calidad de sus interfaces, diseñadores que quieran actualizar sus habilidades en UI y cualquier persona que quiera empezar una carrera como Diseñador UI.
¿Qué vas a aprender?
A construir diseños funcionales y estéticos para web y mobile
Principios fundamentales del diseño visual: unidad, jerarquía, contraste, balance y más
Uso profesional de Figma: diseño, prototipado y creación de sistemas de diseño

Inspiración visual y creatividad aplicada al diseño
Cómo convertirte en Diseñador UI y destacarte en el mercado digital
¿Qué incluye?
Más de 16 horas de contenido en video
Proyecto práctico aplicado
Acceso de por vida
Certificado verificable al finalizar
Acceso desde cualquier dispositivo
Garantía de reembolso de 30 días
Este curso es una puerta de entrada al diseño de interfaces. Ya sea que estés empezando desde cero o quieras profesionalizar tus conocimientos, vas a terminar el curso con un entendimiento sólido del diseño UI y un proyecto listo para incluir en tu portafolio.
No es solo una habilidad más: el diseño de interfaz es una de las áreas más buscadas y mejor pagadas dentro del mundo del diseño y la tecnología.
Sumate hoy mismo y comenzá a diseñar productos digitales que funcionen y se vean increíbles. Tu carrera en diseño UI empieza acá.
Espera... ¿Eres desarrollador?
En lugar de este curso, te recomendamos visitar nuestro sitio web de espacio UX y conocer el curso especializado de UX/UI para desarrolladores, diseñado exclusivamente para quienes vienen del mundo del código.
Este curso, en cambio, está orientado a quienes desean convertirse en diseñadores UI y dominar el diseño visual desde cero.

courses.description:
Offert avec ce cours : Mon design system Figma + Mon plugin Figma boosté à l'IA générative pour créer facilement le contenu de vos maquettes + 1 cours Adobe xd !
Vous souhaitez apprendre l'UX/UI Design et la conception de maquettes avec Figma ?
Vous voulez apprendre avec un formateur partenaire Udemy ?
Alors ce cours Figma hyper complet est fait pour vous !

Figma est un outil de prototypage qui vous permet de concevoir des maquettes interactives (Site web, logiciel, application mobile, visuels...).
Cette formation ultra complète a été pensée pour vous permettre d'apprendre et de progresser rapidement sur Figma par la pratique au travers de projets concrets. Vous allez découvrir le design et la conception d'interfaces utilisateurs ainsi que le prototypage au travers de maquettes interactives.


Mon cours est un peu comme un couteau suisse, une encyclopédie. Toutes les vidéos sont classées dans des sections précises. Chaque outil est présenté au travers d'un exemple concret. Toutes les vidéos sont organisées. Après avoir suivi cette formation vous pourrez très facilement revenir à une vidéo précise du cours pour vous remémorer l'utilisation d'un outil.


Apprenez avec un formateur reconnu, accédez à l'intégralité des ressources de cette formation, formez vous avez ma méthode éprouvée depuis plus de 15 ans. Tous les secrets de FIGMA vous seront révélés dans ce tutoriel complet.

Ce cours est découpé en plusieurs sections :
Dans un premier temps nous allons prendre en main le logiciel Figma et son interface
Ensuite nous verrons comment concevoir une maquette basique
Vous découvrirez comment améliorer votre maquette et la rendre interactive
Nous apprendrons à créer des composants réutilisables
Vous verrez comment mettre en place des animations et interactions
Nous allons créer notre propre Design System
On va créer une maquette e-commerce interactive
Nous découvrirons les principaux plugins et comment en créer
On apprendra à utiliser de nombreux outils annexes pour améliorer notre workflow
Nous décuplerons les capacités de Figma grâce à l'intelligence artificielle
En plus de notre fil rouge (créer une maquette complète), vous découvrirez de nombreuses astuces et outils qui vous permettront d'aller encore plus loin dans l'UX Design et la conception d'interfaces utilisateurs.
Vous aurez accès à des exercices et des conseils afin de vous aider à pratiquer et à aller plus loin que ce qui est proposé dans ce tutoriel.
Je partagerai avec vous des tonnes d'astuces et d'outils que j'utilise au quotidien pour me simplifier le travail. Vous découvrirez par exemple comment vous aider de l'intelligence artificielle générative afin d'ajouter du contenu unique sur vos maquettes.


Tous les liens et tous les fichiers de travail vous seront fournis, ainsi vous pourrez suivre sereinement cette formation Figma. Une certification vous sera délivrée à l'issu de ce cours.
Dans cette formation Figma nous allons aller plus loin que simplement du prototypage. Nous allons voir comment utiliser des outils complémentaires à Figma pour créer des maquettes encore plus poussées.


Grâce à ce guide complet sur le logiciel Figma, vous serez en mesure de créer n'importe quelle maquette que ce soit une maquette à destination des ordinateurs de bureaux ou à destination de smartphones.  Vous aurez acquis toutes les bonnes pratiques UX / UI qui vous permettront de délivrer des projets de qualité. En plus de cela, vous aurez des références à mettre dans votre CV afin de trouver plus facilement un travail en tant qu'UX Designer.


* Ce n'est pas tout *
Vous voulez aller plus loin et maîtriser tout l'écosystème des logiciels pour l'expérience utilisateur ? En vous inscrivant à ce cours, vous obtiendrez automatiquement un accès à ma formation Adobe xd afin d'apprendre également à utiliser le concurrent de Figma. Soyez prêt à toutes les situations grâce à ce pack complémentaire !


Si vous voulez vous lancer dans l'UX Design avec Figma et xd, je vous invite à rejoindre ce cours hyper complet !
target_audience: Les débutants qui souhaitent découvrir Figma

courses.title: User Experience & User Interface Design von A-Z mit Adobe XD
courses.bio: Lerne alles über User Experience und User Interface Design und erstelle visuelle und interaktive Prototypen mit Adobe XD
objectives: Grundlagen und fortgeschrittenes Wissen im Bereich User Experience Design
Grundlagen von Human Centered Design, Personas, User Stories und Szenarien
Design Thinking und Lean UX
User Interface Design Grundlagen wie Farbenlehre, Typographie, Animationen
Praktisches Arbeiten mit Adobe XD
Erstellen von Wireframes und High Fidelity Prototypen in Adobe XD
Erstellen von eigenen Animationen in Adobe XD
requirements: Für den praktischen Teil wird die kostenlose Software Adobe XD benötigt (Windows, Mac)
Kein bestehendes Wissen über UX oder UI erforderlich
Kein bestehendes Wissen über Adobe XD erforderlich
courses.description:
User Experience Design vereint Marktforschung, visuelles Verständnis und Kundendienst in einer Disziplin, die besonders im Bezug auf digitale Branchen an Bedeutung kaum zu übertreffen ist.


Der Kurs ist in vier Abschnitte unterteilt:


Im ersten Abschnitt behandeln wir die Grundlagen von Human Centered Design.
In diesem Teil beschäftigten wir uns vor allem mit den Menschen, die unsere Produkte verwenden. Dabei lernen wir, wie man recherchiert und welche Daten für uns als Designer hilfreich sind, um Produkte zu entwickeln, die von Menschen benutzt werden wollen.
Wir lernen bewährte Methoden aus der Psychologie und der Marktforschung kennen, um Prototyp Nutzer - sogenannte Personas - zu konzipieren und auf deren Basis Nutzererfahrungen zu entwickeln.


Im nächsten Teil setzen wir uns mit Jakob Nielsens Heuristiken auseinander, um so zu verstehen, wie wir Systeme und Produkte für User konzipieren.


Anschließend lernen wir konkrete Ansätze des User Experience Design Prozesses kennen. Dabei behandeln wir die drei erfolgreichsten Ansätze im Detail:
Design Thinking
Lean UX
Lean Development


Nachdem wir die Theorie verstanden haben beginnen wir damit die Grundlage für unseren Prototypen zu schaffen, indem wir gemeinsam eine Informationsarchitektur erstellen und die Vorteile von visuellen Prototypen kennenlernen. Wir behandeln ausführlich die Grundlagen des User Interface Designs und lernen Dinge wie Farbenlehre, Typographie und Animationen.


Im finalen Praxis-Abschnitt verwenden wir alles bisher Gelernte, um mithilfe des Prototyping-Tools Adobe XD eine Website zu konzipieren. Vorkenntnisse sind keine erforderlich, da wir das Programm von Grund auf kennen lernen. Zunächst entwickeln wir einen Wireframe, später dann sogar einen voll funktionsfähigen High Fidelity Prototypen.
Zusätzlich gibt es noch jede Menge Tipps, Tricks und Tutorials für den Umgang mit Adobe XD und die Konzeption weiterer Prototypen, sowie das Erstellen von eigenen Animationen.


Dieser Kurs richtet sich vor allem an Einsteiger, die User Experience und User Interface Design praxisnah lernen möchten. Durch die Mischung von Theorie und Praxis bietet der Kurs die perfekte Grundlage für angehende User Experience Designer.
target_audience: Jeder, der sich für User Experience Design oder User Interface Design interessiert
Jeder, der sich für Prototyping mit der Software Adobe XD interessiert
Dieser Kurs ist für Anfänger und Fortgeschrittene im Bereich User Experience Design, User Interface Design und Adobe XD gedacht

courses.title: UX: leyes y fundamentos explicados con ejemplos prácticos.
courses.bio: Aprende sobre UX, sus leyes, fundamentos y principios psicológicos con consejos prácticos para aplicarlos en tus diseños
objectives: Entenderás qué es el UX y por qué es tan importante el diseño de Experiencia de Usuario.
Aprenderás cuales son las leyes y fundamentos que determinan si una UX es positiva o negativa.
Aprenderás sobre Usabilidad y Heurísticas de Usabilidad.
Descubrirás qué principios psicológicos importan en el diseño UX y cómo aplicarlos.
requirements: No hay ningún requisito para realizar este curso.
courses.description:
Hola! Si sientes curiosidad sobre el mundo UX, o incluso si eres diseñador y ya sabes de qué va el tema pero quieres profundizar un poco más, este curso es lo que andas buscando.
Aquí te voy a explicar qué es la UX y cuales son los principios fundamentales del diseño de Experiencia de Usuario.
Entenderás qué es la usabilidad y cuales son las heurísticas de usabilidad de Jakob Nielsen. También, aprenderás qué son los modelos mentales de los usuarios y la importancia que tienen a la hora de diseñar un producto o un servicio digital. Te enseñaré algunos de los principios psicológicos más importantes en el mundo del UX y cuales son sus aplicaciones más difundidas. Además, veremos algunos de los errores históricos de UX realizados por grandes empresas y el coste que conllevó cada uno de ellos.
En este curso, nos apoyaremos constantemente en ejemplos prácticos, para que entiendas cómo puedes aplicar cada uno de estos conceptos en tus diseños. Por eso, este curso, a pesar de ser un curso teórico, te resultará especialmente útil y práctico: te proporcionará sugerencias y consejos que podrás aplicar a tus diseños para mejorar la experiencia de tus usuarios.
Si buscas un curso rápido que te resulte práctico y útil, aquí lo tienes: ¡te espero en la primera clase!
target_audience: Principiantes que quieran aprender sobre UX.
Desarrolladores que quieran entender algo más sobre el mundo del UX.
Diseñadores que quieran profundizar sobre el UX.
Cualquiera que busque acercarse al mundo del diseño UX.

courses.description:
Figma
Figma est un outil de conception qui permet de créer des designs pour des applications mobiles et pour des sites web. C'est un outil ergonomique qui possèdent toutes les fonctionnalités pour réaliser de puissantes conceptions. C'est un outil de conception UX et UI que vous pouvez utiliser pour créer des designs pour des applications ou des sites web. Figma permet de présenter  des maquettes avec des projets complets pour des applications mobiles. C'est un outil idéal qui offre une version gratuite et une version payante en fonction des utilisations. La conception sera ensuite exportée en vue de coder le design pour rendre la conception interactive. Travail avec les plans de travail, ajout de formes, utilisation du texte, travail avec les couleurs, utilisation des images, importation de nombreux éléments avec les bibliothèques, travail avec les interactions.


Pourquoi utiliser Figma
- Logiciel idéal pour créer des designs pour des applications
- Travail en ligne
- Interface ergonomique
- Outils pour créer des formes
- Travail avec les alignements
- Travail avec les couleurs
- De nombreux effets accessibles
- Ajustement des dimensions
- Utilisation de bibliothèques
- Travail avec les interactions
- Exportation avec différents formats


La formation
Dans cette formation, vous allez apprendre le logiciel Figma pour créer des prototypes. Vous serez capable de créer vos propres designs pour des applications mobiles ou pour des sites web. Démarrer avec le tableau de bord, maitriser la navigation et utiliser les plans de travail. Vous verrez comment ajouter des formes avec les différents outils et éditer ces formes. Vous verrez comment insérer des images, créer des masques et ajouter des effets. Vous verrez comment maitriser le texte. Vous verrez comment utiliser les éléments des bibliothèques. A la fin de la formation, un projet permettra de mettre en application les différentes fonctionnalités vues dans la formation.

courses.description:
Design Sprint es una metodología que permite prototipar y validar ideas con usuarios finales de manera rápida, con el fin de definir el roadmap de un producto en 5 fases. Este método fue creado por Google Ventures en 2010, después de haber estudiado cientos de estrategias de User Research y Design Thinking. El Design Sprint reúne las más efectivas y propone una forma de trabajar que te permitirá lanzar pronto e iterar para tener un producto exitoso.
Aprenderás los siguientes temas importantes: Conocimientos básicos en Design Thinking, Etapas y herramientas principales del Design Thinking, Definición de Design Sprint, Etapas del Design Sprint y herramientas principales, Diferencias entre Design Thinking y Design Sprint, Construir tu MVP para el testeo de soluciones ante al cliente en 5 días (Caso práctico)
Con todas esas herramientas serás capaz de crear tu propio Design Sprint y aplicarlo a cualquier proyecto tanto profesional como personal.
Este curso está dirigido a todas aquellas personas emprendedoras, motivadas a crear una nueva idea de negocio y que desean ver su producto o servicio en el mercado de manera rápida y de calidad. Está dirigido a Product Owners, Líderes de equipo, Líderes de UX, Managers, Equipos ágiles, Diseñadores, Consultores, Scrum Máster.
Espero que te guste el curso! Bienvenido!

courses.title: How to Be a UX Expert in 2023 (Fast Guide)

Develop practical UX design skills and techniques: Through hands-on exercises, case studies, and guidance, learners will acquire essential UX design skills.

requirements: This UX Design Masterclass is designed with absolute beginners in mind. There are no prerequisites or prior experience required to enroll in this course. Whether you're completely new to UX design or have some familiarity with the field, this masterclass is tailored to accommodate learners at all levels. Our comprehensive curriculum starts from the basics and gradually progresses to more advanced concepts, ensuring that learners can follow along and grasp the material easily.
courses.description:
Welcome to our exciting and beginner-friendly UX Design Masterclass! Prepare to embark on a transformative journey through the captivating world of User Experience (UX) design. Over the course of 10 immersive and engaging videos, we will equip you with the essential knowledge, practical techniques, and insider secrets to create exceptional user experiences.


Starting with our enlightening "Introduction" video, we lay the foundation by exploring the foundational concepts and principles that drive effective UX design. From there, we dive deep into the iterative design process, target audiences, user research, and the art of mapping user journeys. No aspect of UX design is left untouched.


Discover the power of the "10 Rules of Good UX Design" and learn how to apply them in real-world scenarios by dissecting fascinating case studies. Unearth valuable insights, tips, and tricks from industry experts as we conclude our journey with the inspiring "Final Thoughts & Conclusion" video.


Whether you're a complete beginner or an experienced designer seeking to enhance your skills, this masterclass empowers you to craft user-centered designs that make a lasting impact. Join us on this exhilarating journey as we unlock your potential and help you thrive in the exciting world of UX design.


Enroll today and be prepared to immerse yourself in the magic of UX design. Your creativity will soar, and you'll gain the confidence to deliver user experiences that captivate and delight. Let's embark on this transformative adventure together! #UXDesignMasterclass #UserExperience #DesignTechniques #UserResearch #UserJourney #UserCentricDesign
target_audience: Beginners of UI/UX People who are curious about UX
Beginners of Product Designers who are curious about UX

courses.title: UX Fundamentals: User Testing
courses.bio: Get better in UX by understanding your users
objectives: User Testing Basics
UX Resources and Tips
Useful techniques for gathering information
Best tools to perform User Tests
requirements: Basic understanding of UX
courses.description:
Being a UX designer does not mean you should be able to design any feature or interface perfectly. We are all biased with our own perspectives and experiences, and that's why it's so crucial to validate our design decisions in more objectives ways. This course will introduce the concept of testing with real users through a number of methods, to ensure business risk is minimised and designs are properly evaluated. We will cover a range of topics:
What user testing is and why it is a crucial element of a design process
What are the most common elements of user tests
Introduction of various research methods, with the most attention dedicated to usability testing
Planning testing sessions and conducting them to extract maximum insight
Analysing and reporting the findings
The core of user testing
Learn what are the core components and principles of user testing - from administration and designing test through conducting the tests. You will be able to understand what are the shared elements and useful documents for any type of tests in the product design process.
The most popular methods
Get into the details of usability testing, card sorting, tree testing, split testing and feedback surveys to understand the strengths, weaknesses and elements of each of those methods. Explore the pros and cons of running remote, in-person, moderated and unmoderated studies.
Maximising the value of research
To make sure you get the most out of your tests, learn about effectively communicating with the participants and leveraging the approach of active listening. Learn how to triangulate your research, analyse qualitative data and prepare reports which will be digestible to your stakeholders and focused on the priorities.
The author of the course is Michał Mazur.
target_audience: Beginner UX designers
UI Designers wanting to get better in UX
Owners and managers willing to understand User Testing
UX Designers refreshing their knowledge on fundamentals

courses.title: Ensuring the Success of Product and Service Design
courses.bio: Part 5 of the Getting Design Right Series, this course covers validating the design of your product or service.
objectives: Use design reviews to validate requirements
Use test plans to verify requirements
Use a formal risk-management technique to complete an analysis of potential design failures and to implement corrective actions
Check for completion by mapping test activities to system requirements

Introduction: Methods and Approaches for this Series
Validate and Verify Requirements: Where We Are in the Process
The Process of Getting Design Right™
How to Conduct a Design Review

Ask the Expert: Conduct Design Reviews

Manage Risks: What Went Wrong with the Tacoma Narrows Bridge?
Practice Quiz: Risk and the Design Process
What Went Wrong with the Challenger?
Use a Failure Modes and Effects Analysis (FMEA) to Identify Risks
Use a Failure Modes and Effects Analysis (FMEA) to Quantify Risks
What Went Wrong with the Vasa?
Use a Failure Modes and Effects Analysis (FMEA) to Mitigate Risks

requirements: Getting Design Right Part 1: Getting Started on Product Service and Design
Getting Design Right Part 2: Targeting Product and Service Designs to Customers’ Needs
Getting Design Right Part 3: Exploring the Design Space and Optimizing the Design
Getting Design Right Part 4: Thinking through the Structure of System Design
courses.description:
The primary goal of this course is to validate your product or service, and to practice effective risk management. So, in this course, we will focus on two steps: first, validate and verify system requirements, and, second, manage risks. The title of this course is Ensuring the Success of Product and Service Design.
It is easy to become over-confident at the beginning of any project; over-confidence at the beginning of a project is invariably followed by disillusionment and crisis management later in the project. How can you avoid that trap? How can you temper enthusiasm with sound judgment? You need to find a way to step back from a design and consider it with a critical eye. Is this really what the customer wants? Will this design really work? Is this really something that you can build with the resources at your disposal? Have you thought seriously about what can go wrong with this design? In your enthusiasm to solve design problems, you have likely not paid enough attention to these questions. It is never too late to stop and take a critical view. Look at where you stand on any project that you are engaged in right now. If you have not conducted a critical review of the type you discuss in this course, you should not be surprised by the number of difficulties you face in completing the project.
In this course, you focus on two practical approaches to getting design right: validating the design, and managing risk. By validating the design, you think through how you are going to test the system you are planning to create. The basic question you ask is, “how will you know if the system you construct satisfies the requirements you had for its design?” You will be surprised at how the simple task of planning a test will reveal holes and fuzziness in your thinking, vital things you had not thought about. Unpleasant as it is to discover flaws in your thinking, delaying the discovery only increases the pain and cost. The second approach you consider is managing the risk of the design. For this task, you systematically think through what can go wrong with the design. This is not difficult to do, but it takes time. By identifying what can go wrong, you can then develop a plan to reduce those risks. It is then a matter of working through the plan to reduce the risk of the project as quickly and as early in the life cycle of the project as you can. These two approaches are the best antidotes to overconfidence in design, and the best assurances for design success that you can offer. Commit yourself to these approaches and you will see your project success rate climb. If there is any design aspect to your current job, this course has direct and immediate relevancy. Conducting a design review and attempting to construct a test plan will quickly reveal potentially enormous gaps in your current thinking. You will discover that you do not really understand the requirements of the design as well as you thought you did. You will be forced to go back and fix things. This is not a pleasant experience, but it is vital for your success; you will emerge from the experience a better designer and project manager. Similarly, by taking stock of the current risks of your project by enumerating them and prioritizing them, you discover that you are not helpless in the face of the unknown; there are positive actions you can take to eliminate the risk of failure.
target_audience: Engineering Students
Managers or people interested in becoming managers

courses.title: Learn Adobe XD for Designing User Interface
courses.bio: Repeat Grid | Auto animate | UI Design | Prototyping for Mobile applications
objectives: You could Create and Design User Interface for mobile and web applications

Designing Signup form and Navigation bar: Designing Status bar and Navigation bar
Building app by using UI components and: Building app by using components from UI Kit

requirements: No designing experience required for learning Adobe XD and you would learn most of the concepts with practical examples in this course.
courses.description:
In this course, you will learn about Designing User Interface and Experience with Adobe XD. Here you will learn various tools and techniques used in the process of creating user interface and workflow for the Mobile app. User Experience Designing is a crucial step in overall application development cycle, being the early stage, it allows core team of designers, managers and developers to visualize the application with a prototype. It enables them to make sufficient changes in the UI before the code development and testing begins.
Working in the Adobe ecosystem allows its users to easily integrate with other Adobe CC software such as Photoshop and Illustrator.
What is Adobe XD?
Adobe XD is an industry recognized Designing software used for creating Design prototypes and wireframes for the Mobile applications and Websites. It is used for visualizing complete User Interface by designing individual components that lead to a overall improved User Experience.
This training would give you full insight into how the interface works, all the main tools and features, and the most common shortcuts which will dramatically increase your productivity. Here you will learn how you can give life to your design and create a working prototype directly within Adobe XD, without the need of any third-party software.
Here you will learn to-
Create Photo gallery with thumbnails using Repeat Grid
Create toggle button using component states
Designing and Prototyping Left Navigation panel
Create a prototype for Auto-animate ball game
Designing Signup form, Status and Navigation bar
target_audience: This course is for anyone who is interested to learn Adobe XD for Designing User Interface

courses.title: Antropologia, Inovação e UX Design
courses.bio: Trazendo a Etnografia para perto do seu dia a dia
objectives: Entender o que é Antropologia, quais seus principais conceitos e história e a sua relação com a Inovação e o UX Design
Conhecer e aprender a usar as principais metodologias da Antropologia, com destaque para o trabalho de campo etnográfico com observação-participante
Utilizar as mesmas metodologias de um antropólogo dentro do fluxo de trabalho de Inovação e UX Design, incluindo o framework Design Thinking
Colocar em prática os aprendizados do curso, fazendo o próprio trabalho de campo etnográfico
requirements: Não é necessário ter formação prévia. Apenas lápis, caneta e disposição a aprender.
courses.description:
Boas vindas! Neste curso vamos conhecer estratégias para conhecer a fundo a complexidade cultural dos grupos sociais representados pelos usuários. A pesquisa antropológica / etnográfica vem se mostrando crucial para compreender as dores de pessoas usuárias. Nesse sentido, o curso “Antropologia, Inovação e UX Design” vai demonstrar o valor da pesquisa antropológica para a inovação tecnológica, apresentando todas as fases da pesquisa antropológica aplicada ao UX Design, UX Research e outros frameworks de Inovação como o Design Thinking.
Aqui, vamos passar por vários tópicos:
O que é Antropologia, qual sua história e principais conceitos
Qual é a relação relação da Antropologia com o UX e a Inovação
Quais as metodologias antropológicas, com destaque para a Etnografia
Como ir a campo: pré e pós coleta e trabalho de campo com observação-participante
Dicas especiais
Cases de sucesso
Formas de análise e documentação.
Se você tem interesse em entrar em contato cada vez mais com metodologias centradas no usuário, este curso certamente combina com você. Isso porque ao fim desse curso você terá aprendido ferramentas para adotar os princípios antropológicos no dia a dia do seu fluxo de produto.
Caso você seja um(a) antropólogo(a) ou cientista social, por outro lado, este curso lança bases para você entender como adaptar a sua formação ao fluxo de trabalho em Inovação e UX Design.
Depois dessa introdução, será que você já está pronto ou pronta para pegar o seu caderno de campo e se aventurar pela antropologia?
target_audience: UX Designers, Service Designers, UI Designers, UX Researchers, Product Designers, Product Managers, Antropólogos, Cientistas Sociais, Social Insights Researchers, Marketing Researchers, Agile Leads, pessoas da área de Tecnologia & Inovação no geral

courses.title: Designing AI Assistants
courses.bio: Learn the winning conversation design workflow that creates engaging, human-centric conversations between AI and people
objectives: Combine elements of technology, psychology, and language to create human-centric conversations between people and AI
Articulate the importance of conversation design to a development team
Implement the design workflow that has become the industry standard for best conversation design
Craft a detailed persona for your AI Assistant that shines through all your conversations
Mentalize the conversational context before writing a single piece of dialogue to ensure empathy throughout the experience
Run sample dialogues to create a solid first draft of a conversational flow
Validate a conversational flow and make it inclusive through Wizard of Oz testing
Fine tune dialogue using expert copywriting techniques

The conversation design workflow: Use case: Let's buy some sneakers
Behavior design and the expert rewrite

requirements: No prior knowledge of conversational AI or conversation design necessary.
courses.description:
Conversation designers are in high demand at enterprises and tech companies. By taking this course, you’ll discover if this is the career for you. You’ll also learn the fundamental principles that will guide you throughout your career in conversation design.


This course presents a comprehensive introduction to the field of conversation design. It shares best practices for designing human-centric conversations for AI assistants, whether they be chatbots or voice assistants.


You will also learn the fundamentals of Conversation Design Institute’s workflow, which is used by thousands of conversation designers around the world. Together, these designers create assistants that are interacting with millions of people every day.


The CDI workflow is voice first and technology agnostic. But what do we mean by that?


It means that the principles in this course can be used to create both chatbots and voice assistants. That you can apply these techniques to every type of conversational technology. You can use these principles to create a fun voice experience for a smart speaker, as well as creating a complex customer service case for an enterprise.


Some of the things you’ll learn in this course:


The historical context which is key to understanding conversation design’s place in the world of technology
What conversation design really is, and how businesses are already harnessing its power
Why the demand for conversation designers will only continue to grow in the coming years as more companies automate more conversations
The psychology of conversations, and why conversation design is so vital to creating meaningful interactions between humans and AI
CDI’s industry-recognized workflow that will guide you through every conversation you design going forward
How to consistently design inclusive, human-centric conversations
Copywriting techniques that take conversations from good to superb
How to design conversations with a well crafted and consistent persona
How to design for desired behavior
target_audience: This course is appropriate for people just discovering conversation design, as well as those already familiar with it who want to learn Conversation Design Institute’s internationally recognized workflow. If you are just starting out in the field, this course will give you the background and the tools you need to get started designing conversations for AI assistants the right way. For those who already have some knowledge, this course will reinforce best practices and show you the workflow that designers at enterprises around the world have accepted as the standard for best conversation design.

Deseos de dominar Geniallly desce cero
courses.description:
Directo y al grano: "La primera impresión cuenta". Todo aquel que construya cursos virtuales en MOODLE sabe que el diseño gráfico y una buena apariencia visual, son elementos importantes a la hora de llamar la atención y despertar el interés de los participantes. Sin embargo, la mayoría de los cursos en Moodle utilizan interfaces básicas y poco atractivas.
Pero ¿Cómo creamos interfaces atractivas en MOODLE? En esta propuesta de formación se invita a docentes y diseñadores instruccionales a formar parte de este proceso donde aprenderán a “darle un cambio gráfico de 360 grados” a las posibilidades de diseño que ofrece Moodle incorporando la herramienta Genially como editor visual para crear interfaces profesionales que mejoren la apariencia y diseño de los cursos. El participante hará uso de herramientas de software libre durante el desarrollo del proceso de formación y los resultados les sorprenderán.
En resumen, el curso “MOODLE A UN NUEVO NIVEL CON GENIALLY” ¡Crea interfaces cautivadoras para tus cursos! es una excelente opción para aquellos que desean aprender a diseñar interfaces de cursos atractivas y de manera profesional. El curso es completo, está en formato video cápsulas de aprendizaje, y permite a los participantes aprender de manera práctica y efectiva. A través de los video-tutoriales el participante podrá observar, paso a paso, la transformación de un curso de enlace a un curso gráficamente muy atractivo y a través de los 3 modelos que se construyen se hará una transferencia de conocimientos donde cada secreto de re-diseño y construcción será develado.
Así, el diseño de aulas iconográficas, metafóricas o gamificadas que requieren un alto componente gráfico ya no serán un problema, más bien, después de este curso, tus diseños nunca volverán a ser los mismos.


ASPECTOS MÁS DESTACADOS DEL CURSO:
• El curso fue diseñado en base a la experiencia y modelos creados en proyectos reales.
• El curso ha sido validado con docentes que cuentan con conocimientos básicos en el uso de Moodle y cursos de enlace.
• El curso está dividido en 8 módulos bien estructurados que facilitan el aprendizaje.
• El curso está diseñado en formato de video curso, el cual permite al participante observar paso a paso el proceso de diseño y construcción de interfaces gráficas dando la oportunidad de replicar lo aprendido.
• El curso ofrece una serie de recursos adicionales, recursos descargables y software de licencia libre.
• El participante aprende a su propio ritmo.


Si te interesa este curso u otros relacionados con Moodle, en UDEMY soy el creador de los cursos que han sido muy bien valorados como:
Creación de aulas iconográficas en Moodle
Moodle Gamificación
Google Classroom: Implementación de un ejemplo práctico.
Después de muchos meses de trabajo y con la firme convicción de compartir estos conocimientos con la comunidad de diseñadores de cursos virtuales, les doy la bienvenida esta aventura de aprendizaje, de seguro la disfrutarás mucho, así como he disfrutado construyendo este curso.
Atentamente:
Juvenal A. Nieto V.
target_audience: 1. Todo diseñador instruccional que desee mejorar el diseño gráfico y la interfaz de navegación de un curso creado en Moodle.
2. Toda persona o docente que utilice Moodle como herramienta implementar entornos virtuales de aprendizaje y quiera crear un ambiente de aprendizaje atractivo
3. Tecno pedagogos o cualquier persona vinculada a la educación y que desee mejorar sus habilidades y destrezas para mejorar la construcción de cursos virtuales en Moodle

courses.title: Agentic AI Transform UX Design and Research
courses.bio: From Automation to Innovation: The Agentic AI Shift in UX
objectives: Understand what Agentic AI is and how it works
Be able to identify how it will disrupt each UX stage
Know how to partner with AI to improve creativity and speed
Strategic Impacts on UX Roles due to AI

Risks, Ethics & Responsible Use: What AI Can Do & Cannot Do in UX

requirements: No prior experience needed only desire to learn
courses.description:
The future of UX is not just intelligent — it’s agentic. This course introduces you to Agentic AI, a powerful new wave of artificial intelligence capable of taking initiative, making decisions, and collaborating with human teams to shape meaningful user experiences.
You’ll start by understanding what Agentic AI is, how it works, and why it’s a leap beyond traditional AI tools. Through real-world scenarios and strategic frameworks, you’ll explore how these AI systems are actively transforming UX design, research, and product development — not by replacing humans, but by enhancing creativity, automating repetitive tasks, and surfacing deeper insights faster.
From user research and ideation to prototyping and usability testing, each stage of the UX process is being reimagined. You’ll learn how to adapt and partner with AI, gain tools to reskill and upskill for the emerging job landscape, and understand the strategic impacts on UX roles like designers, researchers, and product managers.
Importantly, this course also addresses the ethical responsibilities of designing with and for AI. You'll gain awareness of privacy, bias, and user trust concerns — and how to build responsible, human-centered AI experiences.
By the end, you’ll walk away with a practical tips to learn Agentic UX practices, future-proofing your career, and staying ahead in a rapidly evolving digital world.
target_audience: UX Designer / Product Designer
UX Research
Product Manager
Design leaders
Curious AI enthusiasts in design

courses.description:
Benvenuti in un viaggio trasformativo nel mondo del UX/UI Design. Questo corso non è solo un apprendimento; è una metamorfosi che ti porterà dall'essere un appassionato a un professionista ricercato nel settore digitale.
Cosa Imparerai?
Dal Principiante a esperto: Scopri i segreti del UX/UI Design e come questi principi rivoluzionano ogni prodotto digitale.
UX vs UI: Esplora la sottile ma significativa differenza tra UX e UI, e perché il mondo è sempre più alla ricerca di esperti come noi.
Profondità e pratica: Dal concetto di usabilità alle strategie di user experience, immergiti nelle profondità del design.
Strumenti del mestiere: Impara a scegliere e utilizzare gli strumenti giusti per la tua visione - da Adobe XD a Figma, dominando ogni aspetto del processo creativo.
Dalla teoria alla realizzazione: Ti guiderò ad ogni passo, dall'intervista agli utenti fino alla creazione di wireframes efficaci e test di usabilità.
Architettura e wireframing: Impara a costruire siti web e app tramite architettura dell’informazione e wireframes di alta qualità.
Conoscenze Avanzate:
Adobe XD e UI kits: Tuffati nelle funzionalità di Adobe XD e scopri come i UI kits possono rivoluzionare il tuo lavoro.
Figma, lo strumento UI del momento: Scopri come Figma può elevarsi al di sopra dei semplici siti web, toccando ogni aspetto del design grafico.
Ispeziona come un pro: Familiarizza con useberry, Zeplin e Invision, diventando un maestro nell'analisi di prototipi e nell'organizzazione di usability testing.
Il tuo futuro nel Design:
Alla fine del corso, non solo avrai acquisito conoscenze teoriche e pratiche, ma sarai pronto a immergerti in un team di design UX, conquistando una delle carriere più desiderate e remunerative del settore.

Hi there - my name is Dan Scott & welcome to Figma Essentials.
Together - you and me - are going to learn everything you need to get started working as a UX Designer using Figma.
We’ll use this UI UX design tool to create beautiful User Interfaces and engaging prototypes. Most importantly... we'll cover the client expectations of you as a new UX designer.

We’ll be focusing on the software Figma but I’ll make sure to explain the techniques & terms used in the UX and how real world projects are run. You will develop a great understanding of the industry and will be able to manage your own UX projects.
I will be setting assignments through the course which will help develop your skills and enable you to create something special and unique for your own portfolio.

courses.title: Methods of Design Synthesis: Research to Product Innovation
courses.bio: Theory and methods for synthesizing design thinking research data to identify innovations and new product features.
objectives: Learn about how to manage the complexity of gathered data
Build both confidence and ability with the various synthesis methods
Learn to make sense of data and translate research into insights
Learn to create a concept map
Learn to create a process flow diagram
Learn to perform insight combination
Learn to reframe

Theory of Design Synthesis: Design as Problem Solving: Well-Structured, Ill-Structured, and Wicked Problems

requirements: A working understanding of design process
courses.description:
User-centered design research activities produce an enormous quantity of raw data, which must be systematically and rigorously analyzed in order to extract meaning and insight.
Unfortunately, these methods of analysis are poorly documented and rarely taught, and because of the pragmatic time constraints associated with working with clients, there is often no time dedicated in a statement of work to a practice of formal synthesis. As a result, raw design research data is inappropriately positioned as insight, and the value of user-centered research activities is marginalized – in fact, stakeholders may lose faith in the entire research practice, as they don’t see direct return on the investment of research activities.
Design synthesis methods can be taught, and when selectively applied, visual, diagrammatic synthesis techniques can be completed relatively quickly. During Synthesis, Designers visually explore large quantities of data in an effort to find and understand hidden relationships. These visualizations can then be used to communicate to other members of a design team, or can be used as platforms for the creation of generative sketching or model making. The action of diagramming is a way to actively produce knowledge and meaning.
target_audience: Design researchers
Designers
Marketers
Product managers
Developers

courses.title: UX Audits Using Heuristic Evaluation
courses.bio: Learn how to do UX Audits for finding usability issues with Neilsen's Heuristics, and improve your product's usability.
objectives: A deeper understanding of Usability and why it is essential for creating any UX
An understanding of the difference between different methods to evaluate a UX - Usability Testing and Usability Audit
A deep dive into Nielsen's Heuristic which is a proven method to identify usability issues
The confidence to contribute in a fast paced environment and meet business objectives quicker
A framework that helps you and your team to reach to the usable and market ready product faster. You will be able to involve your team and client in the whole process

What is Usability and why it matters: How International Organization for Standardization defines Usability
Nielsen's Heuristic Evaluation : 10 Heur: Heuristic 2: Match between system and the real world
Heuristic 7: Flexibility and efficiency of use
Heuristic 9: Help users recognize, diagnose, and recover from errors
How to Conduct Heuristic Evaluation: Steps to conduct the Heuristic Evaluation

requirements: Willingness to learn
Exposure to Web and Mobile Apps
courses.description:
Can you think of two apps that do the same thing, but one is harder to use than the other? This lack of easiness is a result of bad usability of products.
Good news is, by making some small changes in your product you can really improve its usability. The first step is to identify the usability issues. UX Audits are the cheapest way of finding usability issues in a product.
This course will teach you how to conduct Usability/UX Audit using Nielsen's Heuristic. We will start from the very basics of usability and understand the importance of usability. You maybe a UX practitioner or you might be just starting out, this course is good for anyone who is involved in creating digital products.
You will learn the 10 Nielsen's Heuristics which are the set of rules to create usable digital products. We will cover each heuristic in detail with examples and practical ways to use them.
You will have access to the Bonus Content includes 3 more UX guidelines other than Nielsen's Heuritic :
Bruce Tognazini's First Principles of Interaction Design
Ben Shneiderman's Eight Golden Rules of Interface Design
Donald Norman Usability Principles
You will learn a practical step by step guide on how to conduct a UX audit and the team composition and size.
This course is divided into 5 sections with 4 quiz and 1 practice test.
Section 1 - What is Usability and why it matters
You will understand what makes a product usable. By the end of this section, you will have understood the difference between UX Audit and Usability Testing. This section also has a quiz at the end.
Section 2 - Nielsen's Heuristic Evaluation : 10 Heuristics and their application
In this section, you will know all about Nielsen's Heuristics with practical examples and methods to implement them. At the end, you will have a quiz.
Section 3 - How to Conduct Heuristic Evaluation
What are the practical steps to actually do the UX Audit of a Product. You will learn about the ideal composition of an evalutation team. Do not forget to take the quiz in the end
Section 4 - Closing notes, Goodbye and a Practice Test
Section 5 - Bonus Content
Bonus Content 1 (Video) - More Heuristics for UX Audit
Bonus Content 2 ( Video) - Ebooks and Webinars
Bonus Content 3- The List of Additional Resources
